
1a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje sems dpa' i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba bzhugs/
1b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI badzra satwa nA ma sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' i sgrub thabs zhes bya
1b2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor pa dbang rnam pa bzhi tshul bzhin du thob cing/ dam tshig
1b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams srog gi phyir yang mi gtong bas/ ri sul dang brag phug dang/ chu klung dang/ dur khrod la sogs par gnas la/
1b4(rgyud 'grel): nang par dang por Da ma ru'i sgras ldang bar bya'o/ /de nas lag pa g.yas pa kho po'i sdig mdzub snying gar bstan la/ oM su b+ha ni suM
2a1(rgyud 'grel): b+ha huM huM phaT/ oM grih+Na grih+Na huM huM phaT/ oM grih+NA pa ya grih+NA pa ya huM huM phaT/ oM A na ya ho(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga bAn badzra bidya rA dza
2a2(rgyud 'grel): huM huM phaT/ de nas gdong bkru ba la sogs pas khrus byas nas stan 'jam pa la 'dug la/ tshad med pa bzhi sgom par bya ste/ bde ba
2a3(rgyud 'grel): ma thob pa'i sems can rnams bde ba dpag tu med pa la dgod par bya'o/ /de ltar gzhan gyi sems can thams cad gsal ba'i sems
2a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi snying rje bskyed par bya'o/ /de ltar gzhan gyi don bya ba'i sdug bsngal la ji mi snyam pa'i dga' ba bsgom par bya'o/ /phan pa dang bde
2b1(rgyud 'grel): ba bskyed pa la btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi bdag po'i sa bon las 'od byung nas nam mkhar 'khor dang bcas pa bsams la mchod pa dang/ sdig
2b2(rgyud 'grel): pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /smon pa'i sems kyis bdag he ru kar bsgyur la/ sems can thams cad he ru kar gyur cig ces pas smon lam bya'o/ /smon
2b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems kyis de nas g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba'i chos thams cad gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i ngo bor rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar bsgom mo/ /sems brtan par bya ba'i
2b4(rgyud 'grel): phyir sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko haM zhes brjod do/ /de nas bdag gi sdom pa dang/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs kyis bgegs
2b5(rgyud 'grel): bskrad par bya ste/ mdun gyi nam mkha' la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams la/ de'i steng du hUM bsams te/ de las 'od 'phros pas bgegs bskrad par bya'o/ /de nas rdo
3a1(rgyud 'grel): rje'i ra ba dang bla bre dang phur bu rnams kyis phyogs bcing ngo/ /de nas 'jug pa'i sems kyis shin tu yang cha phra ba'i rang bzhin gyis ngo bo mi
3a2(rgyud 'grel): dmigs so/ /a A i a'i u a'u e i o aau aM a(rgyud 'grel): a ka tsa Ta ta pa ya ha k+Sha hUM/ de dag gyur pa las hUM/ de chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya gru gsum
3a3(rgyud 'grel): rtseg mar bsams la/ de'i dbus su sh+rI he ru ka /bA rA hI dang gnyis su med par bsgom par bya ste/ dpal he ru ka zhal bzhi pa zhabs gnyis pa 'jigs byed dang
3a4(rgyud 'grel): dus mtshan mnan pa/ zhal g.yas dkar g.yon ljang/ dbus mthing nag /rgyab ser ljang/ zhal bzhi pa spyan gsum dang ldan pa/ phyag dang po gnyis rdo rje
3a5(rgyud 'grel): dang dril bu bzung bas 'khyud pa /g.yas kyi phyag gnyis pa na kha TwAM ga g.yon gyi gnyis pa na ka pA la bsnams pa/ thod pa'i phreng bas dbu brgyan pa/ sna
3b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rdo rjes spyi bor mtshan pa/ zla ba phyed pa'i gzugs can/ spyi bor mi bskyod pa bzhugs pa/ thod pa'i phreng ba se ral khar thogs pa/ stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can/ ska rags sil sil 'khrol ba/ spyi
3b2(rgyud 'grel): bor nor bu dang/ rna cha dang/ mgul rgyan dang/ gdu bu dang/ tshangs pa'i skud pa dang thal ba ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dag pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ shin tu 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs can/ yum bA rA hI mdog
3b3(rgyud 'grel): mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ spyan gsum pa/ gcer bu skra grol ba 'jigs pa'i gzugs can phyag gnyis na gri gug dang ka pA la thogs te/ gtso bo la 'khyud pa/ zhabs g.yon gyis
3b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khyud pa g.yas brkyang ba'o/ /brgya byin gyi phyogs kyi 'dab mar mkha' 'gro ma/ nor bdag phyogs su lA ma/ chu bdag phyogs su dum skyes ma/ gshin rje'i phyogs su gzugs can ma/ lha mo de rnams kyang kha
3b5(rgyud 'grel): dog nag mo dang/ ser mo dang/ dmar mo dang/ ljang gu'o/ /spyan gsum pa phyag bzhi pa/ phyag dang po na gri gug /gnyis pa na thod pa/ g.yon pa na ka pA la/ gnyis pa na kha TwAM ga /gcer bu skra bshig
3b6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ 'jigs pa'i gzugs can ma/ tshangs pa dang/ biSh+Nu dang/ brgya byin dang/ srin po gdan du bting bas g.yon brkyang ba g.yas bskum pas bzhugs pa/ phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa/ thod pa se ral khar
4a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phyang pa'o/ /de rnams kyis rnam par dag pa ni/ he ru ka'i zhal bzhi ni/ bde ba dang/ shin tu bde ba dang/ rnam par bde ba dang/ bde ba chen po'o/ /yang rnam par thar pa bzhi
4a2(rgyud 'grel): ste/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ rang bzhin gyiS 'od gsal pa'o/ /phyag rgya bzhi ste/ phyag rgya chen po dang/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang/ chos kyi phyag rgya dang/ las kyi
4a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya'o/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni/ la la mA dang/ ra sa nA dang/ a ba d+hU tI dang/ dam rgya na'o/ /phyag rgya bzhi dang sbyar ba'o/ /dpal he ru ka'i bzhugS gnaS dbus kyi lte ba ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'o/ /gru gsum
4a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi 'dab ma bzhi la ni mkha' 'gro ma bzhi'o/ /bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo rtsibS stong pa gnyis sems dang/ mAM sa dang/ me tog gis bkang ba'i dung chen po gnyis bzhog /bdag nyid ni mgon po he ru ka ste byang
4a5(rgyud 'grel): chub sems kyi gzugs can no/ /de nas bdag gi ye shes sems dpa' bsgom mo/ /de nas DA ki la sogs pa'i rigs lnga sogs pa nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs nas bdag gi
4a6(rgyud 'grel): bar bzhugs te/ snying ga'i ye shes sems dpa' la thim ste/ gnyis su med par bsam mo/ /de nyid las he ru ka'i sku phra mo 'phros pas/ de rnams kyi dpal gyis reg pa'i sems can thamS
4b1(rgyud 'grel): cad sh+rI he ru ka'i bdag nyid du bzhugs par bsams la/ de nas go cha drug gis lus bsrung/ oM ha badzra satwa/ na ma hi bai ro tsa ni swAhA/ swAhA hu pad+ma shwa ri/ bau ShaT he te ru ka/ hUM hUM ho badzra sUrya/ phaT haM a mo g+ha/ oM baM badzra bA rA hAM/ haM yoM lA ma ni/ h+rI moM
4b2(rgyud 'grel): ha ni/ h+raM h+rIM Tar sI ni hUM hUM sany+tsa li ni/ phaT phaT tsaN+Di ka/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): ha ha hUM hUM phaT/ oM badzra bai ro tsa nI ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra lA me ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM badzra khaN+Da ro ha huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra rU bi NI huM hUM phaT/ 'di ni bzlas pa'o/ /bde ba chen po'i
4b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas 'di la zhal cig la nyi ma phyed dam/ snga dro 'am de'i phyed la sogs par bsgoms par bya'o/ /de nas ldang bar 'dod na gtor ma btang bar bya'o/ /oM a ra li ho/ /badzra DA ki ni sa ma ya stwaM/ dri sh+ya ho/ /rdo rje snyim pa kha phye ste/ mtshan phyed na gtor ma sbyin no//
4b4(rgyud 'grel): oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sarbba yak+Sha rak+Sha sa b+hu ta pra ta pi shA tsonmA da/ a pasma ra/ badzra DA ka DA ki n+ya da ya/ i daM ba li/ grih+NaM? du sa ma ya rak+Shan+tu/ ma ma sarba sid d+hi mme pra yats+tshan+tu/ ya thai baM ya theSh+TaM/ b+huny+dza tha/ pi ba tha dza gra tha/ mA ti kra ma tha/
4b5(rgyud 'grel): ma ma sarba kar ta ya/ sa ta su khaM bi shud+d+hA? ye/ sa ha yi ka b+ha ban+tu huM hUM phaT/ ces brjod la btang ngo/ /'di ni gsang ba'i mchog nyid kyis/ /rnal 'byor ma yi mkha' la byung/ /rtag tu sems ni bzang po yis/ /sbyor ba'i mchog ni bsgom par
4b6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /'dir ni rab tu gsang ba che/ /gzhan du bstan par mi bya ste/ /dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba dang/ /mchog gi bsgom pa sbyar bar bya/ /rtag tu dam tshig srung bar bya/ /bza' dang bza' min gnyis mi bya/ /bgrod dang bgrod min mi bya ste/ /mthung
4b7(rgyud 'grel): dang 'thung min sbyor ba'i las/ /'di ltar ye shes goms pa las/ /sngags pa dngos grub myur du 'grub/ /bla ma'i zhal nas rnyed pa ni? /rab tu gsang ba'i dngos grub ni/ /gzhan gyis gsol btab gsal bar byas/ /thams cad ma lus 'grub
5a1(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur/ /'di byas bsod nams gang thob pa/ /des na sems can ma lus pa/ /don rtogs stobs dang ye shes ni/ /bsam gyis mi khyab thob par shog /bde mchog gi sgrub thabs/ /slob dpon chen po lU yis pas
5a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bcom ldan phyogs kyi zhal bzhi phyag bcu gnyis/ /bcu gnyis phyag gis glang chen lpags sogs bsnams/ /bde gshegs drug 'gyur phyag rgya drug gis brgyan/ /rdo rje phag mo sku
5a3(rgyud 'grel): brgyan bde ba mchog la rol/ /mkha' 'gro la sogs tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /mkha' 'gro sogs dang de bzhin sa 'og bcas/ /'jig rten gsum mchog 'khor bcas bzhugs so 'tshal/ /ye shes rdo rje dam can dgongs su gsol//
5a4(rgyud 'grel): thog ma med nas skye ba 'di bar du/ /shin tu mi bzad 'khor bar bdag 'khyams pas/ /bskal pa'i dus mdza' bstan pa'i snyigs ma la/ /khyed kyi zhal gyi 'od zer glog tsam mthong/ /sngon gyi 'phro dang khyed kyi thugs rje yis/ /theg pa
5a5(rgyud 'grel): mchog gyur bla na med pa dang/ /gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i don chen 'di/ /blo ngan bdag gis spyad cing bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /bdag gis khas blangs dam bcas tshun chad du/ /bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu mngon du ma gyur kyang/ /dam tshig mi
5a6(rgyud 'grel): 'da' bde gshegs bka' mi bslu/ /mngon sum zhal bzhin rtag tu khyed la dgongs/ /nyon mongs rang bzhin rnam shes ma sbyangs pa/ /khyed kyi sku gsung thugs ni ma mthong yang/ /khyed kyi bka' las bdag ni mi 'da' na/ /bka' yi byin
5a7(rgyud 'grel): brlab bdag la grub par mdzod/ /bdag gi rang bzhin khyed dang yongs su mnyam/ /ma lus 'gro tshogs rnams kyang de bzhin lags/ /bdag gis lus kyis nyes pa ci spyad par/ /sku'i dkyil 'khor tshogs la bzod par gsol/ /bag med
5b1(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyis ngag gis nyes smras pa/ /rig sngags lha yi snying po phyag rgya dag /rgyun mi 'chad par yongs su spyad pa las/ /nyams gyur gsung gi tshogs la bzod pa gsol/ /bdag gi yid kyis gzhan gyis nyes bsams shing/ /ting 'dzin lta
5b2(rgyud 'grel): spyod lha dang slob dpon dang/ /rigs sngags lha yi snying po'i phyag rgya dag /rgyun mi 'chad par tshogs la bzod par gsol/ /slob dpon brnyas shing bka' las 'das pa dang/ /spun la nyes smras byams pa chen po spangs/ /byang chub
5b3(rgyud 'grel): sems spangs theg pa gsum spangs dmod/ /skal min gsang bsgrags bdag nyid phung po dmod/ /chos la yid gnyis sdug la chags bral byams/ /chos la gnyis 'byed dad pa'i sems la dmod/ /dam tshig ji bzhin bsnyad pa
5b4(rgyud 'grel): mi bsten dang/ /rtags pa'i rig ma smad par byed pa dang/ /rtsa ba 'di nyams khyed la bzod par gsol/ /dam tshig mi ldan rigs ma bsten par dga' / /dkyil 'khor tshogs rtsod gsang pa'i chos ston dang/ /sems can dang la dam tshig gzhan
5b5(rgyud 'grel): du ston/ /nyan thos dag dang lhan cig gnas byed cing/ /sbyor ba ma byas snod min gsang ba ston/ /phyag rgya mi shes phyag rgya bsten pa dang/ /bsnyen pa dag par ma byas dkyil 'khor zhugs/ /sdom pa gnyis kyi bcas pa dgos med bzlas/ /
5b6(rgyud 'grel): yan lag dam tshig 'di las 'gal bgyis pa'i/ /bka' chad gnas su gyur pa ci mchis pa/ /bzod par gsol tshangs par stsal du gsol/ /da lta'i dus su bstan pa 'jig dus su/ /nyon mongs shas chen khyed kyis rab tu mkhyen/
5b7(rgyud 'grel): so sor thugs dam bzhin du nyer dgongs la/ /ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du phrin las mdzod/ /ji ltar bu yis rab tu mi shes kyang/ /ba yis brtse bas legs par skyong ba ltar/ /bdag gis gzhung 'di rab tu ma shes kyang/ /thugs 
6a1(rgyud 'grel): rje chen pos yongs su gzung du gsol/ /dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi rgyun bshags bsdus pa/ /dpal ur rgyan lha mo'i gnas pa/ rgyal po in+d+ra bo d+hi sa mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du//
6a2(rgyud 'grel): sh+rI tsakra saM ba ra garb+ha tat+twa sid d+hi/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i snying po'i de kho na nyid grub pa/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang du thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyong bas/ /kun rdzob don dam dbyer med rang bzhin
6a3(rgyud 'grel): can/ /bde dang stong pa 'dus pa'i ras gang ba'i/ /gnyug ma'i ye shes de la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /gang zhig goms par gyur pas srid pa yis/ /brtson rang brkis pa'i 'ching ba kun gcod pa/ /sems kyi dam pa rang rig rin chen
6a4(rgyud 'grel): mchog /gang la brten nas rtogs pa'i thabs bshad bya/ /drug dang brgyad gnyis bcu phrag gnyis dang lnga/ /bzhin rgyas mig yangs gzugs mdzes lang tsho ldan/ /dad dang thos dang snying rjes yid brgyan ma/ /skyabs song sems
6a5(rgyud 'grel): bskyed yang dag dbang bskur ba/ /nyes bral dben par g.yeng ba kun spangs te /khams dang rjes mthun bza' dang btung ba dang/ /dri zhim yid 'ong rgyan mdzes spyod dgu ldan/ /gang dang tha mal 'dzin pa rnams spangs te/ /dbang po'i gzhu
6a6(rgyud 'grel): ltar snang ba lha yi lus/ /de la yi ge dya ni sna rtse dang/ /bya ni mtshan gyi lte bar rnam dgod cing/ /lte ba snying ga kha dang dpral ba ru/ /sngags kyi tshogs dang bcas pas byin gyis brlab/ /'khyud dang 'o byed sen mo 'debs pa dang/ /mchu mthib
6a7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang nu ma 'tshir ba dang/ /nyed dang rdebs dang sor mo bskyod pa yis/ /dbang gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa'i sbyor ba bya/ /gang tshe mnyam med rin chen mchog lta bu/ /sems kyi dam pa rang rig bde chen po/ /gang du rtogs pa de tshe
6b1(rgyud 'grel): srog rtsol ba/ /bkag pa'i sbyor bas bde chen ro myang bya/ /dngos dang dngos med mdza' gnyis rnam spangs shing/ /stong dang snying rje dbyer med rang bzhin can/ /dus gsum rgyal ba'i ye shes bskyed pa'i rgyu/ /rang rig bde chen ye shes gcig pu pa//
6b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyug ma'i rang bzhin gang dar mtshon par bya/ /gang du mtshon cha mtshon byed kyis mtshon pa/ /rnam shes ye shes nyid du mtshon pa dang/ /ye shes gang nges shes byar snang pa yi/ /'gro ba ma lus de kun der mtshon bya/ /de tshe dbang po'i yul du snang
6b3(rgyud 'grel): pa yang/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg byar gyur pa yi/ /dngos po 'di kun ma lus bde chen po/ /gang du bde las gzhan pa'i dngos med cing/ /bde chen ye shes zhes bya gcig pu ba/ /gcig pu'i nyams kyis du mar gar mdzad do/ /gang gis rang gi ye
6b4(rgyud 'grel): shes mchog bsgoms pas/ /srid pa 'ching ba ma lus kun bcad de/ /bdag gzhan nye ba'i 'tsho ba'i 'byung gnas kyis/ /mnyam med mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings la brten/ /dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i snying po'i de kho na nyid grub pa/ /slob dpon chen po dzA
6b5(rgyud 'grel): lan d+hA ras mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang bzhin rnam dag gnyis kyi rgyu byas pas/ /brgyad po 'jig rten pa dang thun mong ste/ lnga nyid spang bya lnga nyid lam yang yin/ /dag byed ngo bo sems kyi rang bzhin
6b6(rgyud 'grel): sku/ /bsam mi khyab pa'i rtog pa rang la byung/ /bzhi dang bral te gsum du rtag tu med/ /dag byed rang bzhin dag pa'i dang du snang/ /gnyis po spangs te lnga nyid lam du bya? lnga la mi chags glang chen smyon pa 'dra/ /ku sha rlung bskyod spyod 'di bdag la
6b7(rgyud 'grel): gces/ /sha'u sar pa 'dra par gso pa 'di/ /kun la gces pa yin zhes ri khrod gsungs/ /ma rtogs rtogs pa'i spyod pa smyon pa 'dra/ /rtogs nas mi spyod blun po'i spyod pa yin/ /gang yang mi rtog de yi ngang la bzhag /grol bar 'gyur te de
7a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid the tshom med/ /gsum po spang bar gyis shing rang la ltos/ /zhes gdams so/ /dpal lhan cig skyes pa'i man ngag /bdag byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba'i khrod pa chen po'i gsung/ rje mi nyag lo tsa bas bsgyur ba rdzogs
7a2(rgyud 'grel): so// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI sa ha dza saM ba ra swa tiSh+Tha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal lhan cig skyes pa bde ba'i mchog /bdag byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba/ /he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kye ho sgrub pa'i snying po bde chen rang gi seMs//
7a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khrul pa'i dbang gis rkyen dang bcas gyur kyang/ /rgya mtsho'i chu ni dangs ma'i rang bzhin yin /rnyog ma'i rang bzhin glo bur rkyen las byung/ /ma bcos rang sar bzhag na rgyal ba'i thugs/ /'di na bla ma'i dus thabs bsten las byung ba ste/ /thabs kyi?
7a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po bya ba thams cad gtang bar bya ba'o/ /zhes ri khrod pa chen pos gsungs so/ /phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ /sh+rI sa ha dza saM bar swa tiShtha na nAM ma/ bod skad du/ dpal lhan cig skyes
7a5(rgyud 'grel): pa bde ba'i mchog /bdag byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba/ he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor rnam gsum zhes bya ste/ /byin gyis brlab dang rang rtags dang/ /rdzogs pa'i gzugs brnyan bsam med do/ /sna tshogs gzugs can yid du 'ong/ /yid
7a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nor bu'i gzugs 'chang ma/ /zin na dngos grub chen po 'byung/ /chos bshad nas ni dbang du bya/ /yang na ri ba'i rin gyis blu/ /shin tu gsang ba'i sgrub pa pos/ /dbang gis yongs su smin pa dang/ /lha ltar bltas la dngos grub blang/ /me long nang gi
7a7(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan ltar/ /gsal la 'dzin med bde ba'i sku/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga yul rnams rdzogs/ /bltas dang rgod dang 'khrig pa yis/ /mkha' sbyor bde ba'i pho brang du/ /dbang gi rgyal pos gang byas pas/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma kun dgyes/ /dpa' bo
7b1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro dgyes pa'i glu /i dang haM gis skra brjod pas/ /tshangs pa'i ri bo rtse nas nyil/ /rgya mtsho'i lbu? ba bltams pa dang/ /gnas pa bzhi yi rim pa yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid 'gyur/ /dbang phyug dam pa'i gsang gtam 'dis/
7b2(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' rdo rje grong du 'jug /bde chen dag pa'i zhing khams mthong/ /thams cad lhan cig skyes pa'i sku/ /shes rab rdo rje rnal 'byor ma/ /gnyis med bde ba'i rnam pa can/ /ma ning zhes byar brjod pa ste/ /kha cig zung 'jug ces byar brjod/ /sgrib pa dang
7b3(rgyud 'grel): bral tshos? sku 'dir/ /rak+ta? la sogs byang sems rnams/ /rten dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid kyi/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad 'di nyid do/ /dpal ldan cig skyes pa'i sgrubs thabs bdag byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba/ rgyal po in+d+ra? po d+hi 'bring
7b4(rgyud 'grel): thos? mdzad pa/ /rje mi ? chen pos bsgyur bzlogs? so// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ saM ba ra byag lyA? /bod skad du/ sdom pa bshad pa/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma 'brel las/ bde mchog bshad pa 'byung
7b5(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ /in+d+ra bo d+hi'i gzhung nyid dang/ /kun spyod dA rig gzhung gis/ /dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa ru gsungs/ /dpal ldan 'bar ba 'dzin zhags sam/ /katso? ta yi gzhung rnams kyis/ /dpal po rang ni rnal 'byor ma//
7b6(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa ru grabs?/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs dpa' 'dir dpyad par zhu bor bcas/ /sgo skyong ma ? yang dag ldan/ /khro bo'i gzugs ni hUM dang bcas/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /lha mo rab tu gtum sogs bzhin/ /sku mdog sna
7b7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs khyad par ro/ /brtul bzhugs zhal snga nas kyis gzhung/ /phyag gnyis dang ni zhal gcig pa/ /sgeg sogs ro ni thams cad kyis/ /de rnams 'gying bas rol par 'gyur/ /yang na sems ni rnam dag pa/ /sku mdog sngon po rnam pa'i dbyibs//
8a1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo lha mor yang dag ldan/ /kha cig gi ni gzhung du brjod/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis/ /kha dog gsum du yang dag gnas/ /gang phyir 'khor lo gsum gsungs pa/ /de phyir kha dog gsum du 'gyur/ /'di rnams nang nas
8a2(rgyud 'grel): gang 'dod pa/ /de kun rnal 'byor pas gus bya/ /phyag gnyis la sogs brtsams nas ni/ /ji srid phyag ni 'bum de bzhin/ /phyag dang zhal ni grub phyir min/ /bsam yas sbyor bas bsam par bya/ /de ltar blo bzang shes nas ni/ /gnyis med ye shes bsgom
8a3(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /dad pa tsam gyis 'jug bya ba/ /dpyad pa nyid du sbyar mi bya/ /mchog tu dga' bas 'di dag kun/ /gang bsgoms 'bras bu mchog phan te/ /lhan cig skyes par thim pa yis/ /he ru ka nyid rnam par bsgom/ /bla ma'i bka' lung blangs nas ni/ /dang por
8a4(rgyud 'grel): gus pa'i sems kyis su/ /brtan pa'i sems kyis bsgom byed na/ /dam pa'i phun tshogs thob par 'gyur/ /'bar ba'i phyag rgyar sdom par min/ /slob dpon kha cig smra bar byed/ /he ru ka 'byung rgyud gsungs yin/ /bde mchog nyid du ma yin pas//
8a5(rgyud 'grel): de phyir bdag gis ma bris te/ /dpal ldan rdo rjes bzod pa mdzod/ /man ngag gis ni phag mo yi/ /rgyud du nges par rab tu grags/ /'bar ba yi ni phyag rgya yis/ /dkyil 'khor dgug pa'i don dang ni/ /bde mchog gtor ma'i las rnams kyang/ /he ru ka
8a6(rgyud 'grel): ni 'byung rgyud du/ /he ru ka phyag la gnas pa/ /he ru ka'i rgyud du gsungs/ /na bza' dag gi khyad par ni/ /stag gi bags pa bsnams pa ste/ /bdag gis bla mas gsungs pa yang/ /lhan cig skyes pas smad dkris na/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro yi ni gzugs/ /rtag
8a7(rgyud 'grel): ? du ba mchog gi mchog /dkar ba dang ni khrag gi mdog /khams drug gis ni bsdus pa yi/ /kha dog la sogs mtshungs pa'i gzugs/ /dang po nyi ma lta bu'i zhal/ /lha mo skra ni grol ba nyid/ /gzhung ni 'di gnyis bgros nas ni/ /snying ga ru ni bsgom bya
8b1(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i de nyid bya/ /gzhan yang khrag gi rtsa rgyud du/ /shin tu dmar bar 'bab pa yang/ /bud med me tog g.yas nas so/ /g.yon du khu ba 'bab pa ni/ /chu yi rgya mtsho lta bu ste/ /de ni dpa' bo'i rang bzhin no/ /rkang dang rus pa rtsa brgyud rlung/ /lnga pa khu
8b2(rgyud 'grel): ba dang ldan pa/ /pha las gyur pa 'di rnams yin/ /ma yi sha lpags khrag dang ni/ /chu dang me dang bcas pa nyid/ /de nyid kyis ni gang grub pa/ /'di ni mgon po he ru ka/ bskyed dang skyed par byed pa po/ /pha ma gnyis ni dbyer med pas/ /dpal ldan bde mchog
8b3(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa 'di/ /yon tan kun gyis gter gyur pa/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin no/ /de ltar shes nas de yi gzugs/ /srid gsum bde ba steng ba ni/ /de nyid rnal 'byor pa yis bsgoms/ /sgra yi tshul la nges 'byung ba/ zhes bya ba la sogs gang 'dod de/ /
8b4(rgyud 'grel): de don bdag gis bshad par bya/ /'jug pa yi yang mtshan nyid ni/ /rab tu 'jug pa'i dkyil 'khor sogs/ /phyi rol rnams cig mtshon nyid do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu gsungs/ /ldog pa bdag gis brjod par bya//
8b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo sdom par yang dag gnas/ /lhan cig skyes pa rnams kyi gzugs/ /de ni snying gar rtag tu gnas/ /phyi rol nang du mnyam pa nyid/ /dkyil 'khor gyi yang sems kyis ni/ /rnam par dgod pa bshad nas so/ /de ni lus gnas bshad par bya he ru
8b6(rgyud 'grel): ka yi rol par brjod/ /rnam dag dang ni he ru ka/ yan lag dag dang nyid lag dang/ /lhan cig skyes pas mnyam gzhag pas/ /phyis ni rnal 'byor pa yi bsgom/ /go rim bzhin du lus skyes ni/ /rdo rje phur bu lhan cig skyes/ /bcings pa thig
8b7(rgyud 'grel): skud? rab tu ldan/ /shin tu mtshams med bstan par bcings/ /gur ni rus pa'i phreng ba nyid/ /mchod pa'i cho ga khyad par bzang/ /yan lag phyag rgyas brgyan pa dang/ /go cha mtshams med bcings pa ni/ /de ni go cha chen por ldan/ /gang zhig mi
9a1(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa yi rtsa/ /sems can kun la phan mdzad ma/ /lha dang lha min chi rnams la/ /'di dag thams cad de yis khyab/ /rkang pa'i mthil du rtsom pa'i rlung/ /yang dag gnas shing lter son par/ /me yi dkyil 'khor gzi
9a2(rgyud 'grel): brjid 'bar/ /lto bar ches ni dkar ba yis/ /chu ni mdzes pa nyid kyi gzugs/ /brang du yang ni dbang chen ni/ /kha dog ser pos rnam par spras/ /mgrin pa'i steng du brtan pa yi/ /rtse brgyad ldan pa'i ri rab bo/ /bdun ldan nyi ma A li zla/ /nang du 'gro
9a3(rgyud 'grel): dang 'od ba dang/ /chu skyes 'dab ma sum cu drug/ ldan par rdo rje'i dbus son par/ /A li kA li las byung grub/ /mdzes pa'i spyi bor hUM byas te/ /der gnam gser gyi gnas su ni/ /sna tshogs dbus su dang po'i ming/ /zhes bya lhan cig skyes pa yang//
9a4(rgyud 'grel): dri med zla ba'i gzi brjid nyid/ /yan lag kun gyi mtshams su ni/ /rim gyi 'gro bar byed pad+ma/ /sna rtse dbus kyi gnas su yang/ /rim pas skyed par byed pa ni/ /sum cu rtsa drug ror? ldan pa'i/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i rtsa rnams kyis/ /spyi skyes thog ma med
9a5(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni bskur bar bya/ /mkha' 'gro ba bzhin rnam dag khams/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba zhes/ /'di yi don ni yang dag grags/ /rgya mtsho shin tu sna tshogs ba'i/ /'gram dang ri yi dbang por ldan/ /zab mo sna tshogs snying po yang//
9a6(rgyud 'grel): gdong nas grub pa'i dur khrod nyid/ /rgyal mtshan ba dan? sna tshogs dang/ /dril bu do shal shin tu mdzes/ /gsum gyis bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /de yi dbus su dkyil 'khor nyid/ /srad bu mchog gis shin tu spras/ /rnga yab kyis ni g.yob pa dang//
9a7(rgyud 'grel): so phag rnam par dag pa yi/ /rdul tshon dri ma med pa dang/ /bum pa la sogs bzhag pa dang/ /de byung ldan par gang bas ni/ /lhan cig skyes gnas bris par bya/ /thal ba ro bsregs las byung ba/ /pad gnas kha ba med pa yis/ /sbyor ba'i ye shes
9b1(rgyud 'grel): shin tu mdzes/ /phag mo gnyis su med pa'i gzugs/ /he ru ka de sems su brjod/ /rgyu lnga zhes bya'i rig pa ni/ /rdo rje zhes ni mngon par brjod/ /der gnas sa bon rdzogs pa ni/ /de ni he ru ka dpal brjod/ /gnyis med don gyis sh+rI yi sgra/ /he ni rgyu ni rnams
9b2(rgyud 'grel): spangs pa/ /ru yi gzugs ni 'jigs ma'i don/ /ka ni gang duAng mi gnas pa'o/ /A la kI li mnyam sbyor bas/ /dkar zhing dmar ba'i rang bzhin can/ /sh+rI ni yang dag bshad pa ni/ /thams cad skyed par byed pa'i rgyu/ /sh+rI na ? klo'i skad kyis na/ /b+ha ga'i
9b3(rgyud 'grel): don du mngon par brjod/ /sems ni he ru ka nyid de/ /dpal he ru kar rab tu bsgrags/ /b+ha ga'i sgra ni ngag lam 'das/ /rA ni dri ma rnam par spangs/ /hI ni rgyu ni rnam 'jig pa/ /phag mo'i sgrar ni rab tu grags/ /skyed par byed pa'i rgyu yi phyir/ /ral pa'i rtsa ba
9b4(rgyud 'grel): shes byar bshad/ /sna tshogs sems can don byed phyir/ /sna tshogs rdo rjer rnam par gnas/ /byang chub sems ni zla bar gsungs/ /dpal ldan bde chen 'khor lor gnas/ /der gnas rtag tu 'dzag pa ni/ /rdo rje pad+mar yang dag gnas/ /cha kun tu ni
9b5(rgyud 'grel): yongs gang pas/ /rgya mtsho yi ni lam rnams su/ /'dzag pa yi ni lam pa ste/ /lte ba'i 'gram gnas bdud rtsi ni/ /sngar gsungs rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams skyes/ /stong pa'i rnam par sbyor ba las/ /lha dang lha min mi rnams ni/ /rang bzhin gcig
9b6(rgyud 'grel): pas dag pa ni/ /shin tu dag pas sdig par byed/ /byang chub sems byung thal ba yis/ /yan lag kun la rnam par gnas/ /thal ba'i dag par rtag tu brjod/ /phyi rol nang du yongs dag gnas/ /yan lag bcu gnyis las byung phyir//
9b7(rgyud 'grel): phyag ni bcu gnyis rnams dang ldan/ /zhal bzhi yang dag gsungs pa ni/ /rnam thar bzhi ni dag pa'o/ /lha mo gzugs can mkha' 'gro ma/ /dum skyes ma dang lA ma nyid/ /grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnam bzhi/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu skyor bar
10a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad/ /gnyis med rnam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /gang tshe dbang sogs 'thung ba ni/ /de tshe bza' ba zhes byang brjod/ /phyag rnams nyid kyi mtshan nyid do/ /rtse gsum sku gsum dag pa'i phyir/ /glang po gti mug rnam par 'jig/ /lus ngag
10a2(rgyud 'grel): yid gsum dang byung ba'i/ /skyon ni dgra stas gcod par byed/ /gri gug rnon pos sems can don/ /brtson 'grus yang dag ldan phyir 'phyar/ /rtag tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ /sgra na cing ter brtag par bya/ /ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin pas/ /rdo rje stong
10a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mes bsregs pa/ byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin gyi/ /kha TwAM ga ni yan lag gnas/ /thod 'gro skyed pa thod pa'i sku/ /nges na de ni thod par brjod/ /snying rje ro yis gang ba ni/ 'thungs pa he ru ka nyid rgyal/ /zhags pas skyon ni rnam par bcings/ lus
10a4(rgyud 'grel): can ma lus gzhan yang 'gyur/ /mgo bo tshangs pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ /dril bu shes rab rang bzhin phyir/ /yig 'bru lnga bcu'i mgo po rnams/ /rang bzhin gyis ni rnam par mdzes/ /mgul gyi nor bu phreng ba'i rgyan/ /grub pa'i gnas ni kun gyi bdag/
10a5(rgyud 'grel): mche ba bzhi dang rab ldan pas/ /bdud bzhi rnam par dral bar mdzad/ /tshems phreng rtag tu gnyis med pa/ /me stag tshogs dang yang dag ldan/ pha rol phyin drug rnam dag pa/ /phyag rgya drug gis legs par brgyan/ /nam mkha' i gos kyi rang
10a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gyis/ stag gi lags pa cha med par/ /kun gyi 'gro ba thams cad ni/ /stong pa'i sbyor bas g.yas brkyang ba/ /he ru ka'i khyad par las/ /des na g.yas brkyang ba zhes bshad/ /g.yon pa'i yan lag bskum pa zhes/ /tshig tu brjod pas
10a7(rgyud 'grel): g.yas brkyang ba/ /mtshan nyid yang dag thob pa yin/ /dpal ldan he ru ka 'byung ba/ /'khor lo tshogs ni kun tu'o/ /slob dpon gzhan gyi lugs dag gis/ /g.yas pa'i zhabs ni bskum par 'dod/ /blo bzang kha cig gar yang byed/ /gnyis ka
10b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa ma yin te/ /g.yon na g.yon pa skye bos mdzes/ don mchog thams cad sbyin par nus/ /g.yon gyis rtag tu rnal 'byor pa'i/ /gnod pa kun las 'jigs rgyal byed/ /gang phyir sdom pa gtso br yis/ /nges par thams cad g.yon
10b2(rgyud 'grel): pas 'byung/ /de phyir tshogs nus pa kun/ /las ni g.yon pas rtag tu bya/ /sems dang sems min 'gog pa'i lam/ /mtsho skyes su ni dus gang mtshon/ /rdo rje mthar ni rnam 'byung ba'i/ /ro mnyam rtse gcig da yin te/ /phag ma sbyor mchog skyes
10b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin rig/ gang phyir gtso bor gnas pa ni/ /lha mo mchog gnas sdom pa ste/ /de phyir g.yon pa'i tshogs brgyan/ /nyi zla rnam dag srid las skyes/ /rang bzhin gyis ni ro mnyam de/ /pad+ma mchog gi gnas su lhung/ ri skyes rang byung yang dag ldan/ /De ni mkha' 'gro
10b4(rgyud 'grel): ma zhes bya/ /sangs rgyas khams su rab tu brtags/ /nam mkha' kun tu rgyu grub pas/ /mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya bar brjod/ de las skyes pa gzugs ji bzhin/ gzugs can ma zhes mngon par brjod/ /gzugs las rim pas skyes pa nyid/ /mtshon par ? ni dun?
10b5(rgyud 'grel): skyes ma/ /gang yang mdzes pas yongs gang ba/ /skyes pa bud med las byung ba/ /mtshan ma kun gyi yongs su rdzogs/ /des na lA mar rab tu grags/ /nga rgyal la sogs kun bral ba/ /nges na bla re ru ni grags/ /pad+ma chos kyi dbyings yin te/ /de ni sangs rgyas kun kyis
10b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /'dod chags skyon dang bral ba ni/ /bzhi pa'i gnas skabs dang ldan pas/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa/ /de ni dpa' bo zhes byar brjod/ /de nas thams cad yang dag thob/ /stong pa nyid rje'i bdag nyid can/ /lhan cig skyes dga' i ngo bo gang/ /de ni
10b7(rgyud 'grel): dpa' mo'i dbang phyug yin/ /'di ni dga' ba'i brjod med pa/ g/'khor lo sdom pa sde mtshan mdza' / /rtag tu kha ni 'og gis ni/ /yan lag kun gyi yid 'phrog 'dzag/ /'dod chags la sogs rtsa dang mtshungs/ /ye shes srin bus zos pa ni/ /mi 
11a1(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa yi rang bzhin gyis/ /kun rdzob tu ni de myong ngo/ /nam mkha' pad+ma'i mkha' dbus su/ /mkha' spyod du ni bgo bar 'dod/ /der gnas shin tu rnam spros pa/ /mkha' spyod 'khor los yang dag bshad/ /sa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas/ /lte ba'i
11a2(rgyud 'grel): pad+mar skye dang 'chi/ /der gnas shin tu legs par bya/ /sa spyod 'khor lor yang dag bshad/ /sa 'og zhes ni gang gsungs pa/ /pad+mar byang chub sems lhung ba/ /dri med yid kyi pha rol tu/ /sa yi 'og tu gnas pa'i sems/ /chos dang longs spyod sprul pa
11a3(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /he ru ka yi rnam par gnas/ /A li kA li mnyam ldan pa/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' bas mdzes/ /A dpe gzhan na a bya 'dug brtags go/ khyA? sprul pa'i 'khor lor ni/ pad+ma'i nang du dag gnas/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i rol pa ste/ /'jig rten gsum gyis
11a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas par brjod/ /oM traM h+ri khaM pad+ma phyogs phyogs 'dab ma la/ /laM maM baM taM mtshams cha la/ /dbus su he ru ka sa bon/ /lte ba mchog tu pad rang gnas/ /chos kyi lte ba pad chen por/ /stong pa'i rdo rje 'chang ba gnas/ /der gnas rtag tu 'jig? pa ste/ /'dod
11a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i don kun grub par byed/ /de ster longs spyod 'khor lo la/ /oM gyi yi ges mtshan pa yis/ /kha ni rtag tu gyen du blta/ /a i lhan cig u e ni/ /rnal 'byor ma mchog dpa' bor ldan/ /de steng mgrin pa'i gnas su ni/ /de ru mkha' 'gro ma gnas pa/ /der ni
11a6(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu gnas pa yi/ /mchog tu dga' ba nyid du 'dod/ /bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor hUM/ /zla ba'i 'od zer ltar mdzag 'dod/ /der ni 'gro dang 'od bar ni/ /mig gis kyang ni mthong mi 'gyur/ /myur ba steng du rnam par bshad/ /rlangs pa ngos su rnam par gnas//
11a7(rgyud 'grel): 'ching la dbus su yang dag gnas/ /dal ba rtag tu rab tu grags/ rgyu mthun dang ni rnam smin dang/ /skyes bu de bzhin mtshan nyid med/ /'dir ni 'bras bu rnam pa bzhi/ /dga' ba rnams su rab tu grags/ /chung du 'bring dang chen po dang/ /chen po las kyang chen po ste//
11b1(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi dbye ba rnam pa bzhi/ /mi la sogs pa rnam par 'khrul/ /lus la sprul pa'i 'khor lo ni/ /nges par lte pa las skyes te/ /de ni sna tshogs skad cig bshad/ /chos kyi rang bzhin skye ba ni/ rtag tu sdug bsngal zhi ba'o/ /rnam par smin nyid snying ga las/ /rtag pa
11b2(rgyud 'grel): du ci skyong bar byed/ /longs spyod ces ni bya ba la/ /du ma rnams kyi cha shes bya/ /de ni rnam nyid rang bzhin no/ /spyi bar shes dang shes bya gnas/ /yid la rnam par spangs pa ste/ /de ni mtshan nyid bral rang bzhin/ /lhan cig skyes sogs dga' ba bzhi/ /lhan cig skad cig
11b3(rgyud 'grel): dag las skyes/ /'khor lor gtso bor skad cig ni/ /gzhan yang dga' ba'i mtshan nyid ni/ /phrad ba tsan dan bud med sogs/ /gang tshe mthong bas bde 'dzin pa/ /de tshe dga' bar yang dag bshad/ /sems can kun la yang dag gnas/ /rdo rje pad+mar mnyam
11b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyor bas/ /ji ltar sems ni rnam par gnas/ /de yi sems gang mtshon pa ni/ /de tshe mchog tu dga' bar brjod/ /sbyor ba las ni dga' bral sems/ bde ba'i mdza' ni yang dag gnas/ /de ni dga' bral zhes byar gsungs/ /skye dang 'jig par rab tu grags
11b5(rgyud 'grel): dga' dang mchog tu dga' ba dang/ /dga' bral dang ni rnam gsum mo/ /lhan cig skyes pa rang bzhin 'di/ /brtan g.yo kun sogs rang bzhin te/ /lhan cig skyes bas thams cad gang/ /bsam yas su ni rgyal bas gsungs/ /gang phyir brjod med kun 'gro ba/ /ye shes he ru
11b6(rgyud 'grel): ka ru brjod/ /shes rab gzhan gyi gnas su brjod/ /gang gi gnas 'di thabs gnyis de/ 'di dag gnyis su med pas ni/ /sbyor ba'i gnas su gnas pa yin/ /de las byung ba de nyid gnas/ /de dang bral bar gang gnas pa/ /lhan cig skyes zhes yang dag brjod/ /ngag gi lam
11b7(rgyud 'grel): 'das spyod yul nyid/ /bdag gi de nyid rtag sngags dang/ /dkyil 'khor de nyid yang dag ldan/ /chos dang long spyod sprul pa 'di/ /'di yi sku la rnam par gnas/ /dmigs pa las ni sangs rgyas yin/ /dmigs pa med pa rdo 'dzin/ /gnas gnyis dag tu ma brten
12a1(rgyud 'grel): par// shes rab gnyis med nye bar gsungs/ /gnas bcu la sogs de bla? ni/ /pha rol phyin mchog bcu pa de/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhir phye ba yis/ /thams cad lus la rnam par gnas/ /'di rnams rim pa ji lta bar/ /spyi bo spyi btsug la sogs dang/ /ji srid pus mo
12a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dag tu/ /'di rnams kyi ni gnas dag tu/ /dpa' bo la sogs blta bar bya/ /bskyed pa dang ni gnas pa dang/ /rab tu thim pa zhes bya ba/ /pu la re ni bdag po ste/ /'bar ba 'dzin par long spyod gnas/ /u rgyan du ni thim par gsungs/ /gnas sogs zhing dang dur khrod du//
12a3(rgyud 'grel): yan lag kun la thim par 'gyur/ /sdom pa zhes bya'i mtshan nyid/ /sprul pa yis ni gang du skyes/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rgyu yi gnas/ /chos kyi sku yi rang bzhin gyis/ /thim par gyur par the tshom med/ /de ltar sku yi cha rnams kyis/ /dbang dang long spyod dag dang thim/
12a4(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar gnas su de bzhin du/ /dga' ba rtag tu skye bar 'gyur/ /skye ba dang ni gnas pa dang/ /rim pa yis ni rab thim 'gyur/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bskul bas/ /gnad kyi sgo nas dbye bar bya/ /dpal ldan 'bar 'dzin bu gang ni/ /de yi skad cig bde 'byung bas/ /bde bas
12a5(rgyud 'grel): thig le skye 'gyur zhing/ /thig le brtan dang g.yo ba'i bdag/ de ni phag mo de sangs rgyas/ /dpa' bo gnyis med ldan pa yin/ /phung sogs sangs rgyas de rnams dang/ /khams kyi 'ang 'byung khungs rnam par brjod/ /bud med skyes pa gnyis su brtags/ /lhan cig skyes
12a6(rgyud 'grel): pa rnam pa gnyis/ /thams cad yul du brjod pa ni/ /nam mkhar thim pas bdud rtsir 'gyur/ /de la gang dag spyod pa ni/ /thams cad mkha' la spyod par 'gyur/ /mkha' 'gro kun gyi dra ba yis/ /bde ba dag gi snying po'o/ /'dir ni phreng med sngags bzlas med/ /lhan cig skyes pas
12a7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad gnas/ /de phyir rnam rtog med pa yis/ /'bad pas gus pa bskyed par bya/ /'jigs dang ngo tsha rtag tu spangs/ /rnal 'byor rol pas gnas par bya/ /'di ltar bzlas brjod sbyin sreg dang/ /mchod sbyin bsam gtan dkyil 'khor sogs/ /bum pa rdul tshon
12b1(rgyud 'grel): thig cho ga/ lus la lhan cig skyes grub pas/ /bsrub dang bsrub pa'i sbyor ba las/ /ye shes me ni shin tu 'bar/ /las kyi rlung gis bskul nas ni/ /lte ba'i pad+mar rnam par gnas/ /du ba thul ba 'bar ba dang/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gsal/ /ye shes 'khor lor son
12b2(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni bsregs nas ni/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lor bzhugs/ /thabs la mchod pa byas nas ni/ /mdzod spur yid ni zhugs gyur pas/ /o rgyan zhes ni bya ba yi/ /gnad kyi sgo nas 'thon nas kyang/ /dzA lan dA? rar rab tu zhugs/ /bde gshegs
12b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bsregs nas ni/ /lha mo yid kyi shugs ldan ni/ /dmigs kyis mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bskul nas ni/ /bdud rtsi phung por byas nas kyang/ /'o ma'i rgyun ltar 'dzag par 'gyur/ /gser gyi sgor ni zhugs par 'gyur/ /long spyod 'khor lor
12b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas nas kyang/ /so yi bu gar 'dzag par 'gyur/ /zo chun brgyud mo lta bu ni/ /sems kyi ngo bor ngal bso nas/ /rgyun mi 'chad par bsregs nas kyang/ /rgyal ba rnams ni mnyes par byed/ /yang dag las ni rab tu 'byung/ /lte ba'i pad+mar yang dag gnas/ /kun nas
12b5(rgyud 'grel): yang ni 'gro ba dang/ /de bzhin du na rgyun po nyid/ /mkha' 'gro rtsa ni kun spyod ni/ /bde chen 'khor lor bshad pa'o// //sdom pa bshad pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa la zhugs pa nag pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
12b6(rgyud 'grel): dza go ta yar 'or ston chos 'byung gis bsgyur ba'o// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ sapta a kA rasA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ yi ge bdun pa'i sgrubs thabs/ /dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byis pa bud med phal cher ni/ rgyas par gzung dkar 'byung? bas na//
12b7(rgyud 'grel): mdor bsdus pa'i yang mdor bsdus nas/ /yi ge bdun pa bsdu bar bya/ /mchod sogs stong nyid byang chub kyi/ /sngags kyi mthar thug 'og tu ni/ /brtser ldan lus kyi dbus son pa'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro rab bsgrub bya/ /yaM raM baM laM 'byung ba bzhi'i/ /dkyil 'khor steng du sum las
13a1(rgyud 'grel): byung/ /lhun po rin chen sna bdun dang/ /rtse mo brgyad pa bsam par bya/ /oM me di ni badzrI b+ha ba badzra band+hA hUM/ oM badzra prA ka ra hUM baM hUM/ oM badzra pany+tsa ra hUM baM hUM/ oM badzra bi tA na hUM khang hUM/ oM badzra sa ra dzA la trAM saM traM/ oM badzra la a na pA rka hUM hUM hUM/ rdo rjes
13a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs drug byas nas/ /'khor lo sna tshogs rdo rjer gnas/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor/ /rtsibs drug pa ni bli? bar bya/ /'dir ni hUM las byung ba yi/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde chen po/ /phyag drug zhal gsum spyan gsum pa/ /mtshan kun gyis mtshan bsgom par
13a3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /dpe byad brgyad cu yang dag ldan/ /khyab bdag A li kA lis byung ka rdo rje dril bus snyoms par zhugs/ /ma yi pags pa rlon pa 'chad/ /g.yon pa thod pa kha TwAM ga/ phyag g.yas na ni mdud rtse gsum/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan dang/ /ral pas sna
13a4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rdo rje 'chang/ /zla ba phyed pa'i thang dang ni/ /phyag rgya drug gis sku la klubs/ /mthing dang ser dang ljang gu'i zhal/ /stag gi pags pa'i ma? bza' gsol/ /'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan mo/ /g.yas brkyang pa yis nyi mar mnan/ /mgon po ji
13a5(rgyud 'grel): lta de bzhin du/ /rdo rje phag mo'ang phyag la sogs/ /lha mo byin pa yang dag 'khyud/ /mchog tu dga' bas myos pa mo/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): yi ge 'dis/ /ye shes dgug pa la sogs pa/ /rnal 'byor ma drug rtsibs drug la/ /g.yon du bskor bas rnams bskor
13a6(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /dang por lha mo khrag 'thung ma/ /gnyis pa rdo rje 'jigs byed ma/ /gsum pa dag gtum ma dang mi/ bzhi pa rdo rje sna byed ma/ /lnga pa rdo rje drag mo yin/ /drug pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro yin/ /sngon po ser po ljang gu dang/ /dmar po dud kha de bzhin dkar/ /skra
13a7(rgyud 'grel): bshig ma la drag chen mo/ /spyan gsum ma ste phyogs kyi gos /phyag ni cig shos phyag gnyis ni/ /sgra sgrog/ ma ru dril bus mtshan/ /mi yi pags pa bsnams pa ste/ /yi dags nyi ma'i steng na gnas/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can/ /g.yas brkyang
13b1(rgyud 'grel): gdan la yang dag bzhugs/ /lta rnams thams cad go rim bzhin/ /yi ge drug las byung ba bsgom/ /laM maM paM taM khaM zhes pas/ /khams lnga po ni byin gyis brlab/ /oM aM h+rI ho hUM h+rI zhes/ /gzugs sogs cung po la yang ngo/ /d+hUM hUM ? A ho taM gis/ skye mched rnams
13b2(rgyud 'grel): ni sbyang bar bya/ /oM ha na ma hi/ swAhA hu/ bau ShaT he/ hUM hUM ho/ /phaT haM/ gang mgo spyi gtsug phrag pa dang/ /mig la sogs pa sbyar bar bya/ /oM baM haM oM h+ri moM h+re h+rAM hUM hUM phaT phaT/ lte ba snying ga kha dang ni/ /spyi bo spyi gtsug gzhan la dgod/ /lus dang dag
13b3(rgyud 'grel): lam sems kyi ni/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM ni dgod par bya/ /'khor lo bsgyur drug 'khor lor gnas/ /lha mo'i tshogs kyi lag gnas pa'i/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi khu bas gang/ /thod pa rnams kyis dbang bskur bya/ /mchod dang po steng dang bdud rtsi myang/ /byas par gyur pas
13b4(rgyud 'grel): spyad? par bya/ /dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /gsang sngags yi ge bdun pa bzlas/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): ha ha hUM hUM phaT/ bsam gtan bzlas pa gang cha skyo/ /de tshe dag pa rjes dran bya/ /dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni dpal he ru ka'o chos rab tu rnam par
13b5(rgyud 'grel): ? byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni khrag 'thung ma'o/ /brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje 'jigs byed ma'o/ /dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni drag gtum ma'o/ /shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni
13b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje snang byed ma'o/ /ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje drag mo'o/ /mgur chu gdu bu rin chen dang/ rna cha gdub kor tshangs skud de/ de dag pha rol phyin pa drug/ phyag rgya'i gzugs su sbyar ba yin/ /yi ge bdun pa'i sgrungs thabs slob dpon
13b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal dga' zla bas btus pa rdzogs so/ //* /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI tsakra saM bar sA d+ha naM a mri ta k+Sha ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub thabs bdud rtsi 'dzag pa zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka la phyag
14a1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /dbang po dgag dka' glang po mchog/ nus pa'i stobs kyis lcags kyus 'gugs/ /thig stong sangs rgyas nyid myu gu/ /zla ba'i 'od zer ltar 'phro ba/ /rang snying pad snang dbus gnas pa'i/ /zla ba'i gzugs brnyan nang
14a2(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa/ /sa chu me rlung mkha' rang bzhin/ /bskyod med thig le la phyag 'tshal/ /brda 'ba' zhig ni gtso gyur pa/ /tshig gi sdebs dang 'brel pa dang/ /rtag rang rnams dga' ba yi rgyud/ /dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom pa mchog/ yun rings
14a3(rgyud 'grel): par rtogs dka' ba/ /'brel med skad ni ma lus gsungs/ /de zab rgya mtsho ltar gnas pa/ /zab mo su yis shes pa yin/ /de phyir bdag gi rtsa ba yis/ /bshad pa phyi ma yongs shes pas/ /'khor lo dag ba de ring brtsams/ /ri dang nags
14a4(rgyud 'grel): tshal phug rnams dang/ /chu bo'i 'gram dang bzhi mdo dang/ /rgya mtsho chen po nyams dga' i 'gram/ /shing gcig drug dang bde ba'i gnas/ /gnas ni nye bar bstan pa yin/ /yang ni yid dang mthun par te/ /de ru rnal 'byor brtsam bar bya/
14a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa kun gyi 'bras bu thog/ /snying ga chu skyes dbus gnas par/ /nyi ma thod pa bsgom par bya/ /de ru de nyid mchog lta ba/ /ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin zhi/ 'od zer sna tshogs rang bzhin mchog/ kun nas rnam par 'phro gyur pa/ /sems tsam nyid du
14a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa ste/ /byang chub mchog ni sgrub par byed/ /nam mkha' i dbyings su bsgom bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor mchog dga' bsgom par bya/ /til gang gtams 'dra'i sangs rgyas dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya/ /'gro ba drug gi sems can rnams/
14a7(rgyud 'grel): bla med go 'phang thob bya'i phyir/ /de ru gsum la skyabs 'gro byas/ /dam bca' yongs su gzung bya ste/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /sangs rgyas he ru ka ru shog/ de nas tshangs pa yi ni gnas/ /bzhi po rnams ni bsgom par bya/ /bsam gtan pha rol
14b1(rgyud 'grel): phyin pa dmigs/ /sems ni mchog ste gcig gyur pas/ /phyi rol nang gi chos rnams ni/ /thams cad stong par blta bar bya/ /oM shU n+ya ? dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba a ta ma ko hi/ rnam shes so sor snang btsam/ /sems tsam rnam par brtag par bya/ /sa yi 'og gi
14b2(rgyud 'grel): mthar thug par/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/ /yi ge yaM las yang dag byung/ /kha dog sngon po gzhu rnam pa/ /du ba'i phreng ba'i tshogs kyis bskor/ /ba dan mtshan pa de bsgom bya/ /de steng yi ge daM las ni/ /me yi dkyil 'khor mchog bsam pa//
14b3(rgyud 'grel): gru gsum kha dog dmar po ni/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba'i tshogs chen pa/ /nyi ma bye ba dang mtshungs bsams/ /rdo rje mtshan pa de bsgom bya/ /de yi steng du chu nyid ni/ /zlum po 'od zer phreng ba can/ /ba mo dang ni mtshungs pa nyid/ /paM skyes bum pas mtshan
14b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /de yi steng du sa bsgom pas/ /yi ge lam las byung ba mchog /gru bzhi rdo rjes mtshan pa la/ /ser po 'od kyi tshogs kyis bskor/ /de steng bsgom par bya ba nyid/ /ri yi rgyal po re rab mchog/ rin chen bdun gyi rang bzhin mchog/
14b5(rgyud 'grel): rtse mo brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan/ /yi ge sum las yang dag byung/ /'od zer sna tshogs kun tu 'khrigs/ /de ru ra 'dra ba dang/ /rdo rje sa gzhi bla re dang/ /mda' yi dra ba byin gyis brlabs/ /mi yi dra ba phyi rol nyid/ /oM me di ni badzri b+ha ba ban d+ha hUM/ oM badzra
14b6(rgyud 'grel): prA ka ra hUM baM hUM/ oM badzra pany+dza ra hUM aM hUM/ oM badzra bi tA na hUM khaM hUM/ oM badzra sa ra dzA la traM saM traM/ oM badzra dzwa la a na lA rka hUM hUM hUM/ /dpal he ru ka 'khor lo/ rtsibs brgyad rab tu 'bar ba'i 'od/ /'dir nyi'i gzugs brnyan la
14b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas blta/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom/ /de nas lugs byung lugs min pas/ /khro bo brgyad ni bri bar bya/ /rdo rjes gtum mo nyi ma me/ /rdo rje gtsug tor de bzhin te/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /rdo rje dus dang stobs po
15a1(rgyud 'grel): che/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed ces bya ba/ /khro bo 'di dag rnam par dgod/ /sngon po ser po de bzhin dmar/ /ljang gu dud kha'i mdog 'dra dang/ /dkar po nag po dmar 'dra ba/ /'jigs byed thod pa dang ldan gcibs?
15a2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /thams cad mi rus rgyan gyis mdzes/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis gnas/ /sna tshogs pad+ma nyi dkyil bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po rnams/ /zhabs kyis gnon pa rnam par bsgom/ /thod pa
15a3(rgyud 'grel): kha TwAM ga dag bsnams/ /zhags pa lcags kyu bsnams pa mchog /dril bu cang te'u thams cad la/ /shes rab 'khyud pa dam pa bde/ /skra ser gyen rdzes zhal 'gyur zhing/ /mche ba gtsigs ldan 'jigs byed pa/ rtag gi pags ba'i na
15a4(rgyud 'grel): bza' bsnams/ /sprul gyi rgyan gyis 'jigs mdzad pa/ /de gyur pa yi bdag nyid las/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad rnam par bsgom/ /drag po khro bo 'bar bas bskor/ /zhal 'gyur gtsigs shing 'jigs mdzad pa/ /rgyan kun gyis ni kun tu mtshan//
15a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa dang/ /dril bu thod pa kha TwAM ga /mgo bo'i phreng bas lus drag po/ /mgo bo'i ske rags drag pos bcings/ /gdug pa thams cad zhabs kyis mnan/ /shes rab dang ni yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i cod pan
15a6(rgyud 'grel): can/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad bsgom par bya/ /steng dang 'og tu gnas bsam pa/ /khro bo gnyis ni rnam par bsgom/ /gtsug tor rdo rje sa 'og ste/ /dkar po mig sngon 'dra ba'i 'od/ /thod mtshan kha TwAM ga bsnams pa/ /phyag na 'khor lo mdung zhags
15a7(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /lcags kyu rdo rje dril bu bsnams/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas gnas/ /khro bo'i rnam pa'i phur bu ni/ /phyogs bcu po 'dir dgod par bya/ /oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM hUM phaT phaT/ shar du'o/ /oM grih+Na grih+Na huM huM phaT phaT/ byang du'o//
15b1(rgyud 'grel): oM grih+nA pa ya grihA pa ya huM huM phaT phaT/ nub tu'o/ /oM A na ? ho(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga bAn badzra rA dza huM huM phaT phaT/ lho ru'o/ /gsang sngags rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /bgegs rnams kun gyis mgo bo ru/ /lugs su 'byung dang lugs min pas/ /khro
15b2(rgyud 'grel): po'i phur bu dgod bar bya/ /oM b+ha(rgyud 'grel): b+ha(rgyud 'grel): b+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+Ta bi g+hAM hUM phaT/ oM kI la ya kI la ya sarba pA paM hUM phaT/ oM hUM hUM hUM badzra kI la badzra d+ha ra Adz+nyA pa ya ti/ sarba bi g+h+naM kA ya bA k+tsit+ta badzra kI la ya k+Shi la ya/ hUM phaT/
15b3(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra kud+gar? badzra kI lA ko TA ya hUM phaT/ rdo rje blo mchog khro chig gis/ /phyis ni gsang sngags 'di bzlas bya/ /oM kha badzra d+h+rig badzra hUM ka ra badzre hUM phaT/ oM badzra tsan+d+ra badzra hUM phaT/ oM badzra a nA lArka hUM phaT/ oM badzra tiSh+Tha badzra hUM phaT/
15b4(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra kuN+Da li badzra hUM phaT/ oM badzra rak+Sha badzra hUM phaT/ oM badzra ga la badzra hUM phaT/ oM badzra mahA pa la hUM phaT/ oM badzra bI sha na badzra hUM phaT/ oM badzro Sh+NI Sha tsekra barti badzre hUM phaT/ oM badzra pa ta la badzra hUM phaT/ de ltar nga rgyal nyid
15b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis grub/ /skad cig gis ni bgegs med 'gyur/ /sngon po ser po ljang gu ni/ /rdo rje hUM ka ra ru bshad/ /ser po dang ni nag po ljang/ /dud kha ser po dang ljang gu /dkar po dang ni ser po ljang/ /dmar po dang ni ser ljang gu/
15b6(rgyud 'grel): ljang gu ser po dang nag po/ /gzhan rnams kyi ni bdag po bzhin/ /mi bskyod cod pan dam tshig tu/ /bsgoms pas rdo rje 'chang ba dgyes/ /de ltar sgom pa byed gyur pas/ /gal te skyo ba skyes gyur ni/ /stong pa nyid kyi ye shes ni/ /da na
15b7(rgyud 'grel): bya dad pas mnyam par bzhag /oM shU N+ya tAdz+nyA na badzwa swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM /oM a ni mi tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ oM a pra Ni hi tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag /yongs su gyur pa mkha' dbyings te// 
16a1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' dbyings de ru bsgom bya ba/ /yi ge oM ni rnam par bsgom/ /des ni 'khor lo gnyis ka las/ /rnam par snang mdzad bsgom par bya/ /dkar po phyag bzhi rig mas 'khyud/ /g.yas dang g.yon la 'khor lo
16a2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ thod pa dang ni cang te'u dang/ /kha TwAM ga yang de bzhin no/ /de gyur 'khor lor bcas pa yi/ /gzhal yas khang ni rnam par bsgom/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis brgyan byas pa/ /dra ba dra phyed dag gis mdzes//
16a3(rgyud 'grel): dar dbyangs phreng ba dag gis brgyan/ /zur kun gyi ni cha rnams su/ /rdo rje rin ches mtshan pa/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /de yi nang du 'khor lo la/ /re'u mig dgu ste phyir bcu drug /nang gi re mig dbus su ni/ /shin tu
16a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa'i pad+ma ltar/ /lte ba ge sar nye bar brgyan/ /kha dog sna tshogs 'dab brgyad pa/ /re zhig rnams la rdo rje ldan/ /sa gzhi rnam pa sna tshogs 'dod/ /'khor lo pad+ma rdo rje yis/ /phreng bas 'khor lo gsum yongs bskor/ /rin chen
16a5(rgyud 'grel): phreng bas pad de bzhin/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i 'od gsal ba'o/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes bskor ba yis/ /dam tshig gi ni 'khor lo dris/ /yi dags kha dog lnga rnams kyis/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor kun tu bskor/ /rdo rje phyed pas sgo zur gyi/
16a6(rgyud 'grel): ka? ba'i rtse mo dbus nas mtshan/ /phyi ru dur khrod 'jigs pa yi/ /kha dog sna tshogs mchog gi mchog /sna tshogs shing rnams nyams dags mtshan/ /khyi dang ce spyad dag gis 'jigs/ /khwa dang 'ug par bya rgod khra/ /wa dang rtsi li
16a7(rgyud 'grel): ka de bzhin/ /ked rus gdung gis phug pa dang/ /'phyang ba dang ni phyed bsregs dang/ /spyi po kos ko pus mo dang/ /lag pa mgo bo rnams kyis brgyan/ /sgra sgrogs de bzhin glang mgo dang/ /rnam pa sna tshogs sbrul gyis dga' //
16b1(rgyud 'grel): seng ge stag dang phag rgod dang/ /de bzhin don dang ra rnams dang/ /dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma/ /rnam pa sna tshogs 'dus pa mchog /thod pa kha TwAM ga ni bsnams/ /gri gug cang te'u de bzhin no/ /gnod sbyin ro langs srin po rnams/ /de ltar sna tshogs
16b2(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod do/ /de ru nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor blta/ /A la kA li rang sa bon/ /de bzhin nyid dang yang dag mdza' / /stong pa nyid dang chos kyi dbyings/ /mnyam pa nyid dang so sor rtog /bya ba grub pa bsgom pa dang/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa dmigs/
16b3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor 'di ni mchog gi mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' rang rig bcas/ /rim pa 'di yis rnam par bsam/ /dkar po ser po de bzhin dmar/ /ljang gu dang ni zhal rnams bzhi/ /rdo rje dril bus yang dag 'khyud/ /mdud dang dgra sta cang te'u dang//
16b4(rgyud 'grel): gri gug thod pa kha TwAM ga /tshangs pa'i phags pa na bzar bsnams/ /zhags pa tshangs pa mgo de bzhin/ /phyag bcu gnyis kyis brgyan byas pa/ /sems dpa' i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ /thod pa'i cod pan gyis mi bzad/ /rgyan rnams
16b5(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis yang dag rdzogs/ /mtshan dang dpar byang rnams kyis brgyan/ /snying ga ye shes dam tshig ste/ /rdo rje 'chang ba'i cod pan can/ /thabs ji bzhin du shes rab ste/ /phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan byas pa/ /bde chen thabs kyis sbyor ba yis/ /sku gnyis
16b6(rgyud 'grel): yang dag zhu bar gyur/ /'od zer de las lha mo rnams/ /langs nas sna tshogs glu yis bskul/ /khams gsum bde thob kyi gtso bo/ /a la la la ho/ /pad+ma'i bdag po yongs rdo rje/ /bde chen rgyal ba'i tshogs spro ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
16b7(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcu'i gtso/ /rab yongs a la la la ho/ /gtso bo drug pa sems dpa' snying/ /btsun mo rol sbyor sring gsum bdag /a la la la ho/ /dga' ba dag spong zhing rab spang ba/ /bde chen rang bzhin rgyal ba'i gtso/ /glu 'di yis
17a1(rgyud 'grel): ni sbyor ba yis/ /pad+ma'i rnal 'byor ma yi blangs/ /pad+ma'i tshogs kyis bzhengs pa ni/ /rdo rje'i sbyor ba de bas so/ /mgon po la ni 'di yis bskul/ /bde ba chen po 'di gnas las/ /bzhengs nas sangs rgyas thams
17a2(rgyud 'grel): cad de/ /ma lus pa yi rgyal ba spros/ /zhal bzhi phyag ni bcu gnyis pa/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pa gnas/ /zhal gyi mche ba gtsigs pa dang/ /spyan gsum zhal ni rnam par 'gyur/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan dang ldan//
17a3(rgyud 'grel): sku la phyag rgya drug gis brgyan/ /'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan gyi/ /mgo bo dang ni nu ma mnan/ /stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs mnabs/ /rdo rje ro yis rnam par khyab/ /rdo rje phag mo la ni 'khyud/ /'khyud pa yi ni phyag gnyis
17a4(rgyud 'grel): la/ /rtse dgu kha bye rdor dril bu/ /phyag gzhan gnyis po dag la ni/ /glang chen pags pa'i na bza' 'chang/ /g.yas kyi phyag ni gsum pa la/ /rdo rjes mtshan pa mdung 'dzin pa'o/ /bzhi pa la ni lcags kyu ste/ /lnga pa la ni
17a5(rgyud 'grel): gri gug ste/ /drug pa la ni cang te'u'o/ /g.yon pa'i phyag ni gsum pa la/ /thod pa rkang gis bkang ba'o/ /mchod phyir thogs pa'i sbyor pa yis/ /khaTwAM ga ni bsnams pa'o/ /sna tshogs 'phan ni rab tu 'phyang/ /de steng kha bye rtse lnga
17a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /rdo rje dang ni dril bus mtshan/ /dbus su sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan/ /'og tu rdo rje rtse gcig pa/ /bzhi pa la ni rdo rje zhags/ /lnga pa la ni tshangs pa'i mgo /drug pa la ni sta re'o/ /sngo ser dmar dang ljang gu'i zhal/ /drag po
17a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhad sgeg dpa' bo dang/ /rngam dang ljags ni bskyod pa'i zhal/ /de mdun rdo rje phag mo ni/ /zhal bzhi phyag bzhi spyan gsum pa/ /kha dog dkar po ske rags ni/ /dum bus mtshan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das zhal kha dog ltar/ /lha mo'i
17b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag gi kha dog de/ /dmar po ljang gu ser po dang/ /shin tu sngo mdog zhal gyi 'od/ /skra grol gcer bu g.yon pa yi/ /phyag 'khyud pa la ma rungs pa'i /bdud kyi khrag dkar thod pa'o/ /g.yas pa'i sdigs mdzub phyogs kun tu/ /gdug pa sdigs
17b2(rgyud 'grel): shing gri gug 'chang/ /cang te'u tshangs pa'i mgo bsnams phyag /zhal nas khrag ni 'jog pa ste/ /zhabs gnyis kyis ni yang dag dkris/ /bde chen snying rje'i bdag nyid ma/ /snying ga'i lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis/ /ye shes 'khor lo dgug
17b3(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /ye shes 'khor lo legs bkug ste/ /mchod bstod byas nas bzhugs par bya/ /'di nyid kyis ni gnas tshogs rim/ /dgod bya nang gi sbyor ba mchog /bu li ra ma la yar te/ /spyi bor thod pa'i dum bu dang/ /rab tu gtum ma'o//
17b4(rgyud 'grel): dzA landa ra ste spyi gtsug tu keng rus chen po dang/ gtum pa'i mig can ma'o/ /o b+hyan? te rna ba g.yas par keng rus chen po dang 'od can ma'o/ /arbu da ste rgyab kyi char mche ba gtsigs pa dang sna chen ma ste gnas so/ /gau dwa pa ri ste/ rna
17b5(rgyud 'grel): ba g.yon par ? ra be ri dang/ dpa' bo'i blo can ma'o/ /rA me shwa ri ste smin ma'i dbus su 'od dpag med dang/ mi thung ma'o/ /de bi ko Ti te mig gnyis su rdo rje 'od dang/ lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o/ /mA lA ya ste/ dpung mgor rdo rje sku dang
17b6(rgyud 'grel): shing grib ma ste nye ba'i gnas so/ /'di dag ni thugs kyi 'khor lo ste/ nam mkha' la spyod pa'o/ /kA ma ru pa ste/ mchan khung dag la myu gu can dang/ sa srungs ma'o/ /o dre ste/ nu ma gnyis su rdo rje ral pa can dang/ 'jigs byed chen mo
17b7(rgyud 'grel): ste zhing ngo/ /tri sha ku ne ste/ lte bar dpa' bo chen po dang/ rlung gi shugs can ma'o/ /ko sa la ste/ sna rtser rdo rje hUM mdzad dang/ chad 'thung ma ste/ nye ba'i zhing ngo/ /ka ling ka ste/ khar ni rab tu bzang po dang/ lha mo sngo bsangs ma'o/ /lam pa ka
18a1(rgyud 'grel): ste/ mgrin par rdo rje bzang po dang/ rab bzangs ma ste/ tshan do ha'o/ /kany+tsi ste/ snying gar 'jigs byed chen po dang/ rta rna ma'o/ /hi ma la ste/ 'doms su mig mi bzang dang/ kha ga na ste/ nye ba'i tshando ha ste/
18a2(rgyud 'grel): gsung gi 'khor lo sa spyod ma'o/ /pre ta pu ri ste/ mtshan la stobs po che dang 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o/ /gri ha de ba ta ste/ bshad pa'i lam du ni rin chen rdo rje dang/ dum skyes ma ste/ 'dus pa'o/ /sau rASh+Na? ste/ brla gnyis su rta
18a3(rgyud 'grel): mgrin dang mchu can ma'o/ /su barna? dwI pa ste/ byin pa gnyis la nam mkha' i snying po dang/ 'khor lo'i go cha ma ste/ nye ba'i 'dus pa'o/ /na ga ra ste/ sor mo rnams la dpal he ru ka dang shin tu dpa' mo'o/ /sin d+hu'i yul te/ rkang pa'i bol
18a4(rgyud 'grel): dag la pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang/ /stobs chen ma ste/ dur khrod do/ /ma ru'i yul te/ mthe bong gnyis la rnam par snang mdzad dang 'khor lo sgyur ma'o/ /ku lu ta ste/ pus mo gnyis la rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ brtson
18a5(rgyud 'grel): 'grus chen mo ste/ nye ba'i dur khrod do/ /'di dag ni sa 'og na gnas pa'o/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni rdo rje la'o/ /lA ma ni dril bu la'o/ /dum skyes ma dang/ gzugs can ma ni glang po che'i lpags pa 'dzin pa'i khu tshung ma'o/ /khwa
18a6(rgyud 'grel): gdong ma ni rdo rje mdung ma'o/ /'ug pa'i gdong can ma ni rdo rje lcags kyu ma'o/ /khyi'i gdong can ma ni rdo rje gri gug ma'o/ /phag gi gdong can ma ni cang te'u ma'o/ /gshin rje brtan ma ni thod mtshan kha TwAM ga la'o/ /gshin
18a7(rgyud 'grel): rje pho nyam ni zhags pa la'o/ /gshin rje mche ba can ni tshangs pa'i mgo la'o/ /gshin rje 'joms ma ni ster la'o/ /byang chub kyi sems kyi snod rnams ni zhal bzhi la'o/ /pu ja o a/ gau rI de mA/ kA o tri ko/
18b1(rgyud 'grel): ba la ka ha/ pre? gri sau su /nA si ma ku/ 'khor lo gsum ni yongs dag phyir/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i yi ges zhi/ /phung po khams dang skye mched rnams/ /byin gyis brlab dang bya ba ste/ /gzugs kyi phung po la rnam par snang mdzad kha dog dkar po
18b2(rgyud 'grel): oM las byung pa'o/ /tshor ba la ni rin chen rgyal po gser bsregs pa'i mdog lta bu a'o las byung ba'o/ /'du shes la pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug kha dog dmar po h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'o/ /'du byed la rdo rje rgyal po kha dog ljang gu ho las byung ba'o//
18b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam shes nyid la rdo rje sems dpa' kha dog dkar po hUM las byung ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid dpal he ru ka kha dog nag po hi las byung ba'o/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan bzhugs pa/ nyi zla'i gzugs brnyan dbus su bzhugs//
18b4(rgyud 'grel): glang po myur 'gro rma bya dang/ /rta dang seng ge mkha' lding ste/ /yi dags la bzhugs rim pa bzhin/ /rigs drug bdag po bsam par bya/ /snying gar rdo rjes gnon? yin/ /gzhan rnams kyis rim pa bzhin/ /'khor lo rin chen pad+ma dang/ /sna
18b5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rdo rje g.yas na'o/ /g.yon na gri gug nga rgyal bcas/ thams cad la yang spyan gsum nyid/ /mig dag la bruM gti mug rdo rje dkar po'o/ /rna ba dag la hUM zhe sdang rdo rje nag po'o/ /sna la khaM ser sna rdo rje ser po'o/ /kha la A(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags
18b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dmar po'o/ /lus la ho phrag dog rdo rje ljang gu'o/ /skye mched thams cad la haM/ dbang phyug rdo rje kha dog dkar po'o/ /sa'i khams la laM lhung byed ma ser po'o/ /chu'i khams la maM 'chid byed ma nag po'o/ /me'i khams la hi 'gug byed
18b7(rgyud 'grel): ma/ gser gyi mdog can no/ /rlung gi khams la yaM pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ma dmar mo'o/ /nam mkha' i khams la khaM pad 'bar ma sngo nag go /ltung byed ma dang 'ching byed ma/ /'gugs byed gang dang ldan de bzhin/ /rang rang dkyil
19a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la gnas pa/ zhal cig phyag bzhi 'khor lo dang/ /rdo rje pad+ma ral gri dang/ /gri gug g.yas kyi phyag na'o/ /thod pa nyid dang kha TwAM ga /'di rnams kyis ni g.yon pa mtshan/ /zhal gsum phyag drug lha mo ni//
19a2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma yi ni 'bar ma yang/ /thod pa de dran kha TwAM ga /zhags pa lcags kyu nyid dang ni/ /tshangs pa'i mgo dang gri gug ni/ /'di yi lag pa rnams la bsam/ /oM ha snying gar rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po/ /na ma hi spyi bor rnam par snang mdzad
19a3(rgyud 'grel): ser po'o/ /swAhA hu spyi gtsug tu pad+ma gar kyi dbang phyug dmar po'o/ /ba Sha Ta he dpung pa gnyis su sh+rI he ru ka nag po'o/ /hUM hUM ho mig gnyis su rdo rje nyi ma dmar po'o/ /phaT haM lus thams cad la rta mchog ljang gu'o /oM baM ste bar rdo rje phag
19a4(rgyud 'grel): mo dmar mo/ /haM yoM snying gar ya mi ni sngon mo/ /h+rIM moM kha la rmongs byed ma dkar mo/ /h+reM hAM spyi bor skyong byed ma ser mo/ /hUM hUM spyi gtsug tu skrag byed ma ljang gu /phaT phaT lus thams cad la rta mchog ma mtshon cha du ma'i mdog 'dra ba'o//
19a5(rgyud 'grel): zhal gsum phyag drug rdo rje can/ /de las gzhan pa phyag bzhi pa/ /rdo rje dril bu thod pa bsnams/ /kha TwAM ga dang cang te'u mgo /'khor lo la sogs mtshan pa rnams/ /dril bu thod pa nyid dang ni/ /kha TwAM gcang te'u nyid/ /gzhan
19a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi phyag gis mtshon cha yin/ /phag mo zhal gsum phyag drug ma/ /dmar po sngon po ljang gu zhal/ /gri 'gug thod pa nyid dang ni/ /zhags pa dang ni kha TwAM ga /lcags kyu de bzhin tshangs pa'i mgo /lag pa rnams la 'di bsam bya/
19a7(rgyud 'grel): gzhan ni phyag bzhir bsgom par bya/ /zhal gcig phyag ni gsum pa yi/ /phyag ni gri gug thod pa kha TwAM dang/ /cang te'u dril bu de bzhin no/ /phag mo rdo rje sems dpa' yin/ /rnam snang ya mi ni dran bya/ /pad+ma gar dbang rmongs byed ma/
19b1(rgyud 'grel): skyong byed ma ni he ru ka /rdo rje nyi ma skrag byed ma/ /rta yi mchog ni gtum byed ma/ /thugs la hUM yig rdo rje yin/ /A ni ngag gi lam du gnas/ /yi ge oM ni sku rdo rje/ /nag po dmar po dkar po rim/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi//
19b2(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' kun tu khyab bltas te/ /bdud rtsi lnga yis yongs gang ba'i/ /thod pas dbang bskur tshig 'di yis/ /dbang bskur ba ni sbyin par bya/ /ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni/ /de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ba/ /lha yi chu ni dag
19b3(rgyud 'grel): pa yis/ /de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya sh+ri ye hUM/ /phyag rgya rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur/ /bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod/ /zhing skyes lhan cig skyes lha mo/ /mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor
19b4(rgyud 'grel): ma de bzhin/ /rigs skyes ma mo skyes de bzhin/ /mi snang mkha' spyod de bzhin no/ /dma' bar skyes dang mchog gi bzhin/ /bar ma rnam pa sna tshogs mchog /sa spyod mkha' spyod de bzhin no/ /sa yi 'og na gnas pa dang/ /gnod sbyin mo
19b5(rgyud 'grel): dang klu mo dang/ /dri za mo 'am mi 'am ci/ /rig pa 'dzin pa sngon grub pa/ /gang yang bde gshegs brten pa dang/ /dkon mchog gsum la mos gang dang/ /de dag thams cad dkyil 'khor lo/ /mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /glu dang gar
19b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi mchod pa dang/ /sna tshogs gang dang 'dod mchog gis/ /he ru ka la mchod pa byed/ /rlung dang me yi dkyil stengs su/ /a las grub pa'i thod pa la/ /ye shes lnga yi bdud rtsis bkang/ /yi ge bcu drug beM dang ni/ /soM sogs yi
19b7(rgyud 'grel): ge gsum byin brlabs/ /'khor gsum yang dag spros bsgom bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang/ /dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma/ /g.yon du bskor zhing rab bskor bas/ /dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub byed/ /shar gyi 'dab mar
20a1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma/ /de bzhin lA ma byad du yin/ /nub tu dum skyes ma nyid do/ /lho ru gzugs can ma nyid do/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni kha dog nag /sA ma kha dog ser por bshad/ /dum skyes ma ni dmar mo yin/ /gzugs can ma ni ljang gu'o/ /zhal cig
20a2(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya lnga yis mtshon/ /bzhi po kun kyang phyag bzhi ma/ /sbyin gsum skra ni grol ba dang/ /gri gug thod pa kha TwAM ga /cang te'u tshangs pa'i mgo bo bsnams/ /bdud bzhi zhabs kyis mnan pa'o/ /mtshams su gser dang dngul sogs kyi/ /dum pa'i steng du bzhag
20a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba/ /kun de lta bu bdud rtsi bzhi/ /byang chub sems kyi thod pa'o/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo'i shar phyogs su/ /du la ri ma la yar thod pa'i dum bu dang/ /rab tu gtum mo dkar mo dang/ byang du dzA land+ha rang keng rus chen po dang/ /gtum pa'i mig can ma ser mo//
20a4(rgyud 'grel): nub tu u rgyan du ked rus dang 'od can ma dmar mo/ /lhor arbu dar mche ba gtsigs pa dang sna chen ma ljang gu'o/ /me'i phyogs su gau dA ba rir lha dgra dang/ brtan ma'i blo can ma sngo skya ma'o/ /bden bral rA me shwa rar/ 'od dpag med dang mi thung ma dkar ser ro/ /rlung
20a5(rgyud 'grel): gi phyogs su de bi ko Tir/ rdo rje 'od dang lang ga'i dbang phyug ma ljang gu'o/ /dbang ldan du mA la bar/ rdo rje sku dang shing grib ma pad+ma'i kha dog ste/ thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /sgra grol spyan ni gsum pa'o/ /'khyud pa yis ni thod pa 'dzin//
20a6(rgyud 'grel): gdug pa'i sdig mdzub rdo rje 'chang/ /gtsug rgyan rna rgyan mgul rgyan dang/ /rkang rgyan tshangs pa'i srad bu can/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas mgul du brgyan/ /ske rags sil sil sgra sgrog nyid/ /thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa'i/ /dpa' ba zhal gcig phyag bzhi
20a7(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /rang mtshan ral ba'i cod ban can/ /snying rjes grags shing 'jigs par mdzad/ /'khyud pa yi ni phyag gnyis kyis/ /cang te'u kha TwAM lag gzhan la/ /phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan byas pa/ /g.yas brkyang ba yis gnas pas gnas/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo mkha' sbyong yin/ /
20b1(rgyud 'grel): gsung gi 'khor lo'i shar kA ma ru par myu gu can dang sa srung ma dkar mo'o/ /byang oM ? rdo rje ral pa? can dang/ 'jigs byed chen mo dmar mo'o/ /nub tu tri sha ku ner/ dpa' bo chen po dang rlung gi shugs can ma nag mo'o/ /lho ko sa lar rdo rje hUM mdzad dang/ chang 'thung
20b2(rgyud 'grel): ma ljang gu ma'o/ /me'i phyogs ka ling kar/ rab tu bzang po dang/ lha mo sngo bsangs ma ser mo'o/ /bden bral lam pa kar/ rdo rje bzang po dang/ shin tu bzang mo dkar mo'o/ /rlung gi phyogs kany+tsir/ 'jigs byed chen po dang/ rte rna mo ljang gu'o/ /dpal
20b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan du hi ma la bar/ mig mi bzang dang/ khwa gdang? ma nam mkha' i sde bsangs ma'o/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo rnams kyi ni/ /rdo rje phyag la pad+ma nyid/ /gsung gi 'khor lo sa spyod do/ /sku'i 'khor lo'i shar pre ta pu rir/ stobs po che dang/ 'khor lo'i shugs can
20b4(rgyud 'grel): ma nag mo'i/ /byang gri ha de ba tar rin chen rdo rje dang/ dum skyes ma ser mo'o/ /nub sau rASh+Tar rta mgrin dang/ mchu can ma dmar mo'o/ /lho su bar+Na dwI par nam mkha' i snying po dang/ 'khor lo'i go cha dmar mo'o/ /me'i phyogs nA ba rar/ dpal he ru ka dang/ shin
20b5(rgyud 'grel): tu dpa' mo dmar po'o/ /bde na bral kyi phyogs sin d+har?/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang/ stobs chen mo zla ba'i mdog can ma'o/ /rlung gi phyogs ma rur/ rnam par snad mdzad dang/ 'khor lo sgyu ma du ba'i mdog can ma'o/ /dbang ldan ku lu tar rdo rje sems
20b6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' dang/ brtson chen ma dkar mo'o/ /dpa' bo dang dpa' mo dang po'i phyag na 'khor lo'o/ /sku'i 'khor lo sa 'og gnas/ /'khor lo kun gyi dpa' bo dang/ /dpa' mo rnams kyi rim ji bzhin/ /dpral bar rdo rje phreng ba dang/ /pad+ma'i 'khor lo phreng bas mtshan//
20b7(rgyud 'grel): yang na rang gi 'khor lo yi/ /kha dog gis ni lha rnams kyi/ /kha dog rab tu brtags par bya/ /shar dang byang phyogs sgo rnams su/ /sgo srungs bzhi ni gnas pa ste/ /kha gdong ma dang 'ug gdong ma/ /khyi gdong ma dang phag gdong ma'o/ /me dang bden bral la 
21a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su/ gshin rje brtan ma dang/ gshin rje po? nya mo dang/ gshin rje mche ba can dang/ gshin rje 'joms ma'o/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang ma mo dang/ /dpa' bo nyid kyang phyag bzhi pa'o/ /phyogs sgo mtshams
21a2(rgyud 'grel): nas lha mo rnams/ /yi dags kyi ni gdan la bzhugs/ /g.yas brkyang zhabs kyi sbyor ba yis/ /pad+ma'i steng na sgo srungs rnams/ /mtshams kyi lha mo'ang de kun la/ /skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas/ /de bzhin mtshams nas lha ma rnams/ /
21a3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs nyid kyis ni yid 'phrog ma /g.yas na gri gug lcags kyu zhags/ /lcags sgrog dang ni dril bu'o/ /g.yon na me long pi wang dang/ /dri ro Thod pa kha TwAM ga /khwa gdong la sogs mkha' 'gro ma/ /ming dang mthun par zhal dran bye/ /ma he
21a4(rgyud 'grel): bong bu rnga mo rta/ /mtshams kyi btsun mo rnams kyi zhal/ /seng ge stag dang glang po rta/ /mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i zhal/ /sgo'i rtsa ba'i zur dag tu/ /mchod pa'i snam bur gnas pa ni/ /pi wang ma dang gling bu ma/ /rda dung ma dang rdza rnga ma/
21a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhad mo sgeg mo glu gang ma/ /me tog ma dang spos 'chang ma/ /mar me ma dang dri 'chang ma/ /me long ma dang ro 'dzin ma/ /reg bya ma dang chos ldan ma/ /pi wang ma dang sgeg ma sngo/ /gling bu ma dang glu ma ser/ /gang mkhan rnga dung ma ni ljang//
21a6(rgyud 'grel): rdza rnga bzhad pa dkar dang dmar/ /pi wang gling sogs lha mo yi/ /pi wang sogs yangs phyag rnams la/ /rdo dril de las gzhan pa la/ /kha TwAM ga dang thod pa'o/ /rdo dril nga rgyal bcas sgeg mo/ /glu mkhan ma dang rol bcas ma/ /pad+ma bskor
21a7(rgyud 'grel): bcas gar mkhan ma/ /de ltar thams cad phyag bzhi'o/ /me tog ma dkar spos dung ka'o/ /mar me ma ni mar me bzhin/ /dri ma me long ma dmar dkar/ /ro 'dzin ma dmar reg bya ljang/ /chos ni dkar por shes par bya/ /rang gi phyag rgya'i sbyor
21b1(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan /me long la sogs mtshan pa rnams/ /de las gzhan pa'i lag rnams la/ /thod pa dang ni kha TwAM ga /cang te'u sgo na gnas pa yi/ /khwa gdong la sogs bzhi yi'o/ /gri gug kyang ni de bzhin no/ /dang po'i phyag na mtshan ma'o/ /dkyil 'khor
21b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo dpa' mo yis/ /sna tshogs pa yi lta stangs kyi/ /rnam par g.yeng bas bcom ldan bstong/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yi ni lam/ /gtso bo ma lus bde chen thob/ /dga' ba'i bde ba chen po'o/ /a la la la ho/ /srid las shin tu grol ba
21b3(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /da bzhin gshegs mchog dga' ba yis/ /glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni brtags pa yin/ /sku yi 'khor lo mngal nas skyes/ /gsung ni sgo nga las skyes te/ /thugs ni rdzus te byung pa'o/ /thugs ka'i yi ge dam tshig
21b4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /bsnyen pa'i sbyor ba rab tu brtag /mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs mchog gis/ /nye ba'i bsnyen pa'i sbyor ba'o/ /dpa' po'i lus dgong sbyor ba yis/ /sgrub pa yang dag bshad par bya/ /dbang bskur yang dag spyod ba las/ /sgrub pa chen po bstan
21b5(rgyud 'grel): pa yin/ /oM sa ma ya shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harmA:sa ma ya shud+d+ho haM/ /chos kun re gcig mnyam pa las/ /sems kyis gnas par bya ba yin/ /ye shes bdud rtsi'i sbyod ba yis/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi chu 'thung bya/ /oM badzra a mri ta da? ga hUM Tha tha hwaM?:hUM phaT phaT
21b6(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /sku yi 'khor lo rnam par bsgom/ /chu gnas gsung gi 'khor lo ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo bde chen po/ /sa yi dkyil 'khor gnas
21b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /dam tshig dkyil 'khor mchog bsgom bya/ /de ru ye shes dkyil 'khor yang/ /de bzhin bsgom bya rnam par bsgom/ /mchod bstod yang dag mnyes byas te/ /dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya ba yin/ /ji srid skyo bar ma gyur pa/ /de srid rnal 'byor pa yis
22a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgom/ /skyo gyur rnam par dag dran bya/ /gang chos rnam par dag pa 'di dag ni/ /dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i 'khor lo ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag nyid brtan par bya'o/ /de la dag pa dang bde ba dang
22a2(rgyud 'grel): rtag pa dang bdag rnams kyi phyin ci log bzhi rnams kyi gnyen por gyur pa dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ni/ 'di lta ste/ lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang/ tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang/ chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang/ sems dran pa nye bar gzhag
22a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /dran pa ni nyams su myong ba'i dngos po la sems kyis ma brjed pa'o/ /de'i nye bar 'jog pa ni dran pa nye bar 'jog pa'o/ /de yang brjed ngas pa'i gnyen por gyur pa ste/ sngon nyams su myong ba'i dngos po la nye bar 'jog pa ni 'dris pa'i
22a4(rgyud 'grel): yon tan no/ /'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa'i tshogs ni lus so/ /bde ba la sogs pa nyams su myong ba ni tsher ba'o/ /yang dag pa'i mdza' ni chos so/ /so sor snang ba tsam gyis rnam par shes pa ni sems so/ /de rnams kyi rjes su dran pa ni nye bar
22a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhag pa ste/ lus la sogs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/ /yang dag par yang yang 'byung ba mi dge ba'i rjes su mthun pa/ 'dod chags zhe sdang la sogs pa dge ba'i mi mthun par gyur pa/ le lo dang ma dang ba la sogs pa ste/ 'dun pa
22a6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa 'di dag dmigs bas spong ba ni/ yang dag bar spong ba bzhi yin te/ 'di lta ste/ mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba dang/ mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa dang/ /dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par
22a7(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ba dang/ dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul ni ting nge 'dzin gyi stongs 'phel ba'o/ /de'i yan lag ni 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang//
22b1(rgyud 'grel): dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o/ /de la spong bar 'du byed dang ldan pa/ rnam par 'byed pa dang/ 'dod chags dang bral ba dang/ 'gog pa dang/ rten pa med pa dang/ kun tu spong? ba dang/ /yongs su gyur pa nyid? shes pa ni 'dun pa'o/ /de la rnam par 'byed pa ni lam mo/ /
22b2(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spong ba ni/ 'dod chags dang bral ba ste mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /'gog pa ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po kun tu mi sbyor ba'o/ /de rnams yi rten pa rnam par 'byed pa dang/ 'dod chags dang bral ba dang/ 'gog pa la brten pa mang pa'o/ /kun tu
22b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyong ba ni 'dus byas thams cad kyi dngos po la yang dag par sbyor ba'o/ /de yongs su gyur pa ni de'i bdag nyid du gnas pa'o/ /lta bar byed pa'i shes ba 'di dag ni mig la sogs pa dang mtshungs pa'i dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po bstan par bya'o/ /de yang rnam pa lnga ste/
22b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di lta ste/ dad pa'i dbang po dang/ brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang/ dran pa'i dbang po dang/ ting 'dzin gyi dbang po dang/ shes rab kyi dbang po'o/ /de la dad pa ni/ 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa la yang dag ba'i lta ba dang las kyi 'bras bu la nye bar longs
22b5(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa la sems yid ches pa'o/ /sems kyis kun tu sbyor ba ni brtson 'grus so/ /dad pa'i dbang po la brten nas chos gang na brjed pa ni brtson 'grus bstan to/ /brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ma brjed cing don ma brjed pa ni dran ba'i dbang po'o/ /dran pa'i dbang pos chos
22b6(rgyud 'grel): ? ma brjed pa gang mngon du byed pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang por bstan to/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis rtse gcig par byas pa'i chos gang khyad bar du gyur pa ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o/ /ma dad pa dang le lo dang/ brjed ngas pa dang/ bag med pa dang/ rnam par g.yeng ba la
22b7(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa mi mthun pa zad pa las khyad par thob pa'i dbang po nyid stobs su bstan te/ 'di lta ste/ dad pa'i stobs dang/ brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang/ shes rab kyi stobs so/ /rang nyid kyi yang dag par khong du chung ba 'di ni byang chub
23a1(rgyud 'grel): ste sems gnyis dang bral ba'o/ /de'i rgyu ni byang chub kyi yan lag go /de rnams kyang bdun te/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi
23a2(rgyud 'grel): yan lag dang/ shin tu sbyar ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go /de la sems can thams cad
23a3(rgyud 'grel): la phan par byed pa dang/ byang chub tu smon pa dang/ thos shing khong du chud pa ma brjed pa ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go /bdag la sogs pa'i chos rnams mi mthun pa'i phyir/ phung la sogs pa 'byed pa ni chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag/
23a4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub kyi yan lag go /chos rnams ro gcig pa'i sems ni dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go /dga' ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs bdag dang bdag gi bag chags bcom pa las/ lus dang ngag dang sems las su rung ba ni shin tu sbyangs
23a5(rgyud 'grel): pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go /de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mdza' dang/ stong pa nyid dang chos kyi dbyings te/ tshad ma bzhi la sems rtse gcig pa ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go /so so'i skye bo'i sa las nges par byung ba ni
23a6(rgyud 'grel): brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go /nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i snying po ma yin pa lus dang ngag dang sems kyi 'du byed la ltos pa med pa ni btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go /sdig pa 'ba' zhig dang rjes su mthun pa'i
23a7(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad do/ /shes bya'i sgrib pa spong ba'i sgom pas chol? ba ni lam mo/ /de'i phyir 'di 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
23b1(rgyud 'grel): brgyad du bstan te/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang/ yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang/ yang dag pa'i dag dang/ yang dag pa'i las kyi mdza' dang/ yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang/ yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang/ yang dag pa'i dran pa dang/ yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin no/ /de la
23b2(rgyud 'grel): yang dag pa'i lta ba ni chos thams cad bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid dang/ 'jig rten pha rol la blta ba'o/ /yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni blang ba dang dor ba dag spong ba dang/ mngon du byed pa yid kyi byed pa dang/ dge ba 'ba' zhig la sems pa'o/ /yang dag pa'i
23b3(rgyud 'grel): ngag ni bden pa mthong ba'i ngod? ston par byed do/ /yang dag pa'i las kyis mdza' ni/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyis las gang gong? na med pa'o/ /yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni rigs pas bskyod pa'i don to/ /yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don
23b4(rgyud 'grel): phun sum tshogs pa la rjes su sbyor ba lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las so/ /yang dag pa'i dran pa ni ji ltar khong du chud pa'i chos rnams ma brjed pa'o/ /yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni dmigs pa'i rnam pa mngon du byed pa'i sems so/ /rdo rje sems dpa' cod
23b5(rgyud 'grel): pan ni/ rnam dag ye shes lnga nyid do/ /dpa' bo'i rtsa ba'i sngags nyid ni/ /tshangs pa'i srang bur rab tu brtag /rdo rje phag mo'i sngags kyis ni/ /mgul gyis mgul rgyan mtshan pa'o/ /lha yi snying po gsang sngags ni/ /brgya byed phreng bas brgyan pa'o/ /yi
23b6(rgyud 'grel): ge bdun gyi gsang sngags ni/ /rna ba'i rna tsha mdzes pa yin/ /sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma yi sngags/ /pags pa'i na bza' bsnams pa'o/ /rnal 'byor ma ni drug gis sngags/ /rkeng pa ske rags brgyan pa'o/ /dpa' bo'i go cha drug nyid ni/ /phyag rgya sku la brgyan pa'o/ /
23b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo kun gyi rnal 'byor ma'o/ /sngags ni thod pa'i btung ba'o/ /rnam snang mdzad ma'i sngags gang yin/ /mgo por brgyan pa'i thod pa'o/ /dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang/ /lus kyi khams su brtags pa yin/ /lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /tshor? ba dran pa nye bar
24a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhag pa ni lA ma'o/ /chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni du ma skyes ma'o/ /sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni gzugs can ma'o/ /ye shes kyi pad+ma'i rnam par dag pa'o/ /'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni rab tu gtu? mo'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi
24a2(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa ni gtum pa'i mig can ma'o/ /dbyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni 'od ldan ma'o/ /sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni sna chen ma'o/ /dad pa'i dbang po ni brtan ma'i blo can ma'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ni mi thung ma'o/ /dran pa'i dbang po ni lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po ni
24a3(rgyud 'grel): shing grib ma ste/ thuD kyi 'khor lo'i rnam par? dag pa'o/ /shes rab kyi dbang po ni sa srungs ma'o/ /dad pa'i stengs ni 'jiD byed chen mo'o/ /brtson 'grus kyis stobs ni rlung gi shuD ma/ dran pa'i stobs ni chang 'thung ma/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs ni lta mo sngo? bsengs ma/ shes rab kyi stobs ni shin tu bzang mo'o//
24a4(rgyud 'grel): ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub yan lag ni rta rna ma'o/ /brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni kha ga na ste/ gsung gi 'khor lo rnam par dag pa'o/ /dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma/ /shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni
24a5(rgyud 'grel): dum skyes ma/ chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni char 'tshod ma'o/ /dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo'i go cha ma/ btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni shin tu dpa' mo/ /yang dag pa'i lta ba ni stobs che rna ma'o//
24a6(rgyud 'grel): yang dag pa'i rtog ba ni 'khor los bsgyur ma/ yang dag pa'i dag ni brtson chen ma ste/ sku'i 'khor lo'i rnam par dag pa'o/ /yang dag pa'i las kyi mdza' khwa gdong ma/ yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni thug? pa'i gdong can ma/ yang dag pa'i rtsol pa ni phyi'i
24a7(rgyud 'grel): gdong can ma/ /yang dag pa'i dran pa ni phag? gi gdong can ma/ yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dpal? he ru ka'o? /oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha d+harmA d+hA tu swa b+ha ba At+ma kohaM/ dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa ni gshin rje brtan ma'o/ /dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par srung ba ni/
24b1(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje ri pho nya ma'o/ /mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par spong ba ni gshin rje mche ba ma'o/ /mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed? pa ni gshin rje 'joms ma'o/ /dam tshig gi 'khor lo rnam par dag pa'o/ /sen mo dang so dag la ni rbod? pa'i bum bu'o?/ /? ?
