90b7(rgyud 'grel): gis 'thar? bas gton nas su/ /bde ba mchog la dgong bya ste/ /yang dag bla na med pa yi/ /byang chub des par 'dis ster byed/ /de ltar bstod pa byas nas ni/ /'di ltar yang ni brjod par bya/ /nyon mongs 'dam
91a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis mgos pa/ /srid pa'i rgya mtshor bying ba yi/ /de phyir brgal par ma nus pas/ /sems can phung po shin tu sdug /nyan thos la sogs brgal ba dang/ /rgyal sras byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /
91a2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo rnams kyis bde chen 'thob/ /dkyil 'khor shes la spro bar gyis/ /dri ma gsum spangs 'khor lo gsum/ /bla na med par khyod 'jug gam/ /'di nyid lan gsum brjod par bya/ /de bzin slob mas lan gsum mo/ /'gro ba
91a3(rgyud 'grel): gdon pa'i bsam pa yis/ /spro bas 'di skad du ni brjod/ /slar yang bla mas slob ma la/ /'di skad du ni dri bya ste/ /khyod kyis yo byang thams cad ni/ /tshogs sam lan gsum dri bar bya/ /slob mas kyang ni brjod bya ba/ /yo
91a4(rgyud 'grel): byang phun tshogs cung zhig 'byor/ /cung zhig kyang ni ma 'byor brjod/ /gsol ba 'debs ba'i tshigs bcad ni/ /sngags pas tshigs bcad nyi shu gcig /gsol ba btab pa'i bla ma yis/ /slob ma de ni yongs su
91a5(rgyud 'grel): bzung/ /cho ga 'di ni yang dag par/ /yid ni mnyam par legs par bzhag /de la thog mar re zhib ni/ /he ru ka dpal rgyal bdag nyid/ /rnal 'byor gang zhig dkyil 'khor 'dri/ /de yi rnal 'byor rtogs par bya/ /
91a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas he ru ka zhes pa'i/ /slob ma mnyam par bzhag pa la/ /ji lta'i rim bzhin yi ge gsum/ /spyi gtsug mgrin pa snying gar dgod/ /rgyu med mnyam par nyams don du/ /gar yang rnam par mi gnas dang/ /
91a7(rgyud 'grel): brjod dang bral ba'i rang bzhin dang/ /de bzhin 'di ni rang bzhin med/ /slob ma rang bzhin med 'di bya/ /'o gnas brjod pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor du/ /slob ma rdzogs par bskyed nas ni/ /dbang
91b1(rgyud 'grel): bskur yang dag bsdus pa ni/ /yid kyis yongs su brtag pa yin/ /lha mo bzhi yis dbang bskur ba/ /mkhas pas bdud rtsis khrus bya'o/ /pul+li ma la ya la sogs/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi sa bon ldan/ /de yi sa bon mthu yis
91b2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /rab tu gtum mo la sogs pas/ /mdun nas slob mchog go cha bya/ /de nas bsrung ba chen por 'gyur/ /spyi gtsug la sogs thams cad du/ /ji srid pus mo bar mtshams med/ /de yis sems las byung pa'i
91b3(rgyud 'grel): bgegs/ /thams cad du ni 'byung mi 'gyur/ /de ltar yang dag nyer bskyed bya/ /slob ma yongs bzung tshigs bcad dgus/ /de bzhin slob ma yongs bzung nas/ /bsnyen pa yang dag brtsams pa ste/ /dpal ldan he
91b4(rgyud 'grel): ru ka rnal 'byor/ /de yi sngags dang rnal 'byor rig /dkil 'khor yang dag ji lta bar/ /rab tu brtag par su yis nus/ /rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni brtags na 'grub/ /rang gi lha yi rnal
91b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ni/ /bdag gis 'di ru bshad bya ste/ /rnal 'byor can gyis de gnas bstan/ /ji bzhin bsal pa brjod par bya/ /'bab chu ri bo yid 'ong ba/ /'bras bu rtsa ba bcas pa dang/ /me tog sna tshogs bkram pa yi/ /rgyun du
91b6(rgyud 'grel): shing gi grib ma la/ /grong khyer las ring nye ba min/ /skye 'gro yid mthun skye bo spangs/ /gal te med na chu bo'i 'gram/ /nye bar sdong po yal 'dab ldan/ /gal te sa phyogs med na ni/ /rgyal po gang du 'dod par ro/ /grong
91b7(rgyud 'grel): khyer dag gi las? phyogs sam/ /gang du bstan pa'i sa phyogs su/ /yid du 'ong bar yang dag sbyong/ /phyag dang byug pa la sogs kis/ /'bad de rdzogs par byas nas ni/ /dri dang me tog sna tshogs sogs/ /yang dag mchod
92a1(rgyud 'grel): la gtor ma brtsams/ /de nas 'jam pa'i stan la ni/ /yang dag gnas te bdud rtsi lnga/ /g.yas kyi ngos su bzhag nas ni/ /brtul zhugs can gyis ri lu bza' / /slob dpon yang dag rgyud
92a2(rgyud 'grel): shes shing/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i pha rol son/ /phyi rol yan lag blangs nas ni/ /de dag lhan cig rnal 'byor bya/ /de la 'di yis rim shes pas/ /phyag rgya drug dang ldan ba'i lus/ /thal ba spangs pa'i lhag ma yis/ /
92a3(rgyud 'grel): rig ma yang dag brgyan par bya/ /sems can kun la phan don phyir/ /bde ba'i rgyu ru bdag nyid ni/ /he ru ka dpal nyid yin no/ /sngon du smon lam lan gsum brjod/ /kha sbyor rnal 'byor bsgoms byas nas/ /dur khrod chen po
92a4(rgyud 'grel): brtsams par bya/ /ro ni tshig dang ma tshig dang/ /ce spyang bkra mi shis pa'i sgra/ /khwa dang 'ug pa bya rog dang/ /sdong po khung bu sprul dang ni/ /'di ltar 'jigs pa'i gzugs brnyan ni/ /dang por byas te de ma thag /'og
92a5(rgyud 'grel): nas 'byung ba'i rnal 'byor che/ /hUM zhes skad cig gis dmigs la/ /A li kA li lan gsum brjod/ /ra ba lan gsum dgod pa ni/ /gnyi ga yi ni spyi gtsug dang/ /mgrin pa'i snying ga dag tu dgod/ /sngon bzhin 'gro kun
92a6(rgyud 'grel): snang med par/ /de bzhin du ni bdag nyid bya/ /smon lam dbang gis nam mkha' la/ /langs te sems kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM gi yi ge gsum/ /ji? lta ba yi rim pa bzhin/ /steng 'og bar du rnam par bsam/ /de
92a7(rgyud 'grel): nas hUM yig gyur pa las/ /rtse lnga pa yi rdo rje ste/ /de yi lte ba'i dkyil gnas pa/ /yang na hUM gi yi ge blta/ /hUM las 'od zer 'phros nas ni/ /A yig la ni zhugs par bsam/ /de bzhin A:las byung nas
92b1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /oM yig la ni legs par zhugs/ /oM las 'od zer 'phros nas ni/ /oM A:hUM gi yi ge gsum/ /ji srid nam mkha' i mthar thug par/ /de srid yi ge gnas 'dra ba/ /sems can thams cad rnams dag don/ /de
92b2(rgyud 'grel): lta spro bar 'dod pa yin/ /rtsa ba'i yi ge gsum po las/ /'od zer lcags kyu rnam par spros/ /slar ni yang dag bkug nas su/ /yi ge gsum la legs par bsdu/ /phyi nas de yi oM yig ni/ /A(rgyud 'grel): yig
92b3(rgyud 'grel): la ni gzhug par bya/ /de bzhin A yig rdo rje la/ /rdo rje yang ni hUM la gzhug /mgo bo zla phyed thig le sgra/ /sgra yang de bzhin rim shes bya/ /sgra tsam du ni zhugs bya la/ /de yang nye bar dmigs mi bya/ /de ltar byas nas phyi
92b4(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam sbyang bya/ /ya ra la wa'i rang bzhin la/ /rlung dang me dang sa dang chu/ /de steng rus sbal thod pa 'am/ /ji ltar 'dod par brtag par bya/ /der ni a yi rang bzhin la/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par
92b5(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /de steng pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad/ /de'i steng du'i rab bsgom/ /de bzhin du yang 'dab ma brgyad/ /ze 'bru dkar po bcas pa yi/ /grags pa'i rang bzhin sa bon ni/ /gong nas gong du bsgom par bya/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i kha dog
92b6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /nges par 'dir yang brtag bya ste/ /dang por kha dog nag po'o/ /gnyis pa de bzhin ljang gu ste/ /gsum pa'i rnam pa dmar po'o /bzhi pa ser po rnam pa ste/ /mtshams kyi 'dab ma 'dres pa'o/ /rin chen sna bzhi'i rang bzhin gyi//
92b7(rgyud 'grel): ri yi rgyal ? bzhi pa/ /ri bdun ri yis yongs bskor ba'i/ /ze 'bru A li gA li dgod/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas zhing du gnas/ /'di ltar yongs su grags pa yin/ /'di ni rdzogs
93a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rim pa ste/ /'khor lo gsum dang bdag nyid bcas/ /gzhan du ? par dka' ba'i ph yir/ /'bad de legs par gsungs pa yin/ /nA da tsam las byung pa yi/ /de bzhin du ni thig le'o/ /
93a2(rgyud 'grel): thig le las ni zla phyed byas/ /zla phyed las ni de bzhin mgo /mgo bo la ni haM yig go /haM las u ni byung ba ste/ /de ltar hUM yig rdzogs nas ni/ /zla ba'i gzugs brnyan steng du bsgom/ /hUM gi yi ge gcig nyid
93a3(rgyud 'grel): las/ /bde mchog dkyil 'khor ma lus pa/ /gzhal yas khang ba'i mthar thug par/ /ci gsungs skad cig de la bsgom/ /sa bzhir 'bras kyi sa bon bzhin/ /'dir ni phyir 'byin rim pa med/ /dpa' bo rnams dang
93a4(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma/ /rang bdag dus gcig bskyed pa ste/ /dpa' po dbang phyug ze 'bru la/ /de yi kha dog phyag sogs rim/ /bla ma'i man ngag bsrungs pa ni/ /rgya pa ru ni bshad par bya/ /rtsa zhal rang lus thams cad ni/ /
93a5(rgyud 'grel): du ba'i mdog can 'od 'phro ba'i/ /spyi bo g.yon phyogs zla phyed dang/ /ral pa'i dbu rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa ste/ /thod pa lnga yi dbu rgyan can/ /dbus su dpa' mo lha dbang phyug /g.yon du mkha' 
93a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro lA ma'o/ /g.yas ni dum skyes gzugs can ma'o/ /de 'og rdo rje phreng ba dang/ /thams cad du ni spyan gsum pa/ /g.yon gyi zhal ni ljang gu ste/ /rgyab ni shin tu dmar pa'o/ /g.yas kyis zhal ni ser ba ste/ /de ltar
93a7(rgyud 'grel): zhal gyi rim pa'o/ /sku la phyag rgya drug gis brgyan/ /zhe sdang thams cad spangs pa yin/ /mgul rgyan dang ni lag gdub dang/ /spyi gtsug nor bu rna cha dang/ /thal ba dang ni mchod phyir thogs/ /de rnams phyag rgya drug tu grags/ /
93b1(rgyud 'grel): A li kA li rnam dag pa'i/ /thod pa'i phreng ba 'phyar ba ste/ /stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs gang/ /dngos su de dang ldan pa'o/ /dang po phyag ni gnyis dag gis/ /rdo rje dril bu gnyis bzub nas/ /lha mo legs 'khyud 'o
93b2(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'o/ /gnyis kyis glang po'i pags pa'i gos/ /de yi rgyab nas khrag 'dzag cing/ /'ong kyi dkyil 'khor bzhin du bskor/ /g.yon gyi phyag ni gsum pa na/ /ngo mtshar rdo rje kha TwAM ga /bzhi pa na ni thod pa ste/ /rgya ma sha
93b3(rgyud 'grel): khrag bcas ba'o/ /lnga pa na ni zhags pa ste/ /drug pa tshangs pa'i mgo bo'o/ /g.yas kyi phyag ni gsum pa na/ /rtse gsum bgegs ni 'joms pa'o/ /bzhi pa na ni dgra sta ste/ /lnga pa na ni ro langs so/ /drug pa
93b4(rgyud 'grel): mi bzang rde chung sgra/ /phyag ni bcu gnyis dag tu 'dod/ /rus pa yi ni rgyan gyis brgyan/ /pad+ma'i ze 'bru gnas pa yi/ /lha mo thod pa'i phyag gis ni/ /khrag gis bkang nas mgul nas 'khyud/ /dus gcig
93b5(rgyud 'grel): du ni phan tshun 'thung/ /gang phyir zhal ni gcig phyir ro/ /g.yas pas rdo rje bsnams nas ni/ /steng du rab tu brkyang pa nyid/ /de ltar lha mo phyag gnyis ma/ /skra grol 'od kyi tshogs dang ldan/ /thal ba spangs pa'i
93b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya ni/ /lhag ma yi ni tshogs kyis brgyan/ /mi yi rus pa'i ska rags mdzes/ /spyan gsum nam mkha' i gos can no/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs dang ldan/ /gzhan ni g.yon ni brkyang ba'i zhabs/ /
93b7(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs byed yang dag mnan pa yis/ /gnyis ni legs par bsgom par bya/ /shar gyi 'dab mar mkha' 'gro ma/ /g.yon par lA ma ru ni grags/ /rgyab tu du ma skyes ma yin te/ /g.yas su gzugs can ma
94a1(rgyud 'grel): ru grags/ /par 'dab de dang de mdog 'o/ /lha mo bzhi ru grags pa yin/ /mtshams kyi pad+mar thod pa rnams/ /dri chen dri chu khu khrag go/ /pad+ma'i phyi rol 'khor lo gsum/ /snying por
94a2(rgyud 'grel): yongs su brtags pa yin/ /rtsibs ni brgyad brgyad 'khor lo ni/ /de ni 'phar ma sum rtseg go /dpa' bo mgon po zhabs nas ni/ /rked pa'i bar du gnas pa ste/ /sku'i 'khor lo 'di brjod pa/ /stobs po che la sogs
94a3(rgyud 'grel): brgyad do/ /rked pa'i phyogs nas brtsams nas ni/ /nu ma gnyis par yang dag gnas/ /gsung gi 'khor lo ji lta bar/ /myu gu can la sogs brgyad do/ /num nas ni brtsams nas su/ /mgrin pa'i bar du gnas pa
94a4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo ji lta bar/ /thod pa'i dum bu sogs brgyad do/ /rkeng rus che la sogs zhes pa/ /de rnams ming gis g.yon zhes bya/ /dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi yang/ /thams cad phyag bzhi pa nyid do/ /thog
94a5(rgyud 'grel): ma yi ni phyag nyid kyi/ /dpa' bo dbang phyug bzhin du gnas/ /g.yon pa'i phyag na thod pa ste/ /g.yas na de bzhin rde chung ngo/ /dpa' bo zhabs ni g.yas brkyang ba/ /bud med zhabs ni g.yon brkyang ba/ /dpa' mo rnams
94a6(rgyud 'grel): dang mkha' 'gro rnams/ /sngags dang phyag rgya sngon bzhin no/ /nag po dmar bo de bzhin ser/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /dang po'i sgor ni khwa gdod ma/ /g.yon du 'ug ba'i gdong ma ste/ /chub tu khyi gdong mar
94a7(rgyud 'grel): shes bya/ /lho ru pag gi gdong ma ste/ /lhag ma gshin rje brtan ma dang/ /gshin rje pho nya de las gzhan/ /gshin rje mche ba nyid dang ni/ /gzhan yang gshin rje 'joms ? ste/ /lha mo de lhar mtshams rnams su/
94b1(rgyud 'grel): lha mo bzhi ru grags ba yin/ /gtso bo yi ni zhal gyi gdong/ /sgo skyong bzhi yang de mdog go /mtshams bzhi yi ni lha mo rnams/ /mdog gnyis nye ba'i rim pas so/ /sum cu rtsa drug lha mo rnams/ /g.yon gyi phyag
94b2(rgyud 'grel): na thod pa'o/ /g.yas na gri gug shes bya ste/ /gcer bu skra ni grol ba'o/ /ma lus yang dag brjod pa ni/ /thams cad 'di bzhin bsgom par bya/ /'khor lo gsum po nang byas nas/ /gzhal yas khang pa bsgom par bya/ /dri
94b3(rgyud 'grel): dang me tog de bzhin spos/ /bzang po'i lha bshos byug pa dang/ /bzang po'i mar me phreng ba dang/ /bza' dang ston mo bye brag dang/ /sgron ma dang ni bdud rtsi dang/ /sna tshogs pa yi btung ba dang/ /gling bu pi waM rnga phran
94b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs/ /rnam pa sna tshogs glu yi sgra/ /gar ma sgeg mo sogs mchod kyis/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag mchod byed cing/ /rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /dra ba dra phyed du mas brgyan/ /dril bu dang dbyangs ba ngan sogs/ /
94b5(rgyud 'grel): rnga yab me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /ngur khrod rnams ni thams cad du/ /sngar gsungs de yi khyad par ro/ /bsrung ba'i don du phyi rol du/ /ra ba gsum gyis bskor ba ste/ /rdo rje pad+mar 'khor lo ni/ /ra ba zhes ni grags pa'o/ /
94b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas khang gi mdza' yi bar/ /mkhas pas de ltar shes par bya/ /sna tshogs thams cad rdzogs par ni/ /dus gcig tu ni bsgom par bya/ /bye brag mar po sdong? pa yi/ /yang dag brtan zhing bsgom par bya/ /de nas
94b7(rgyud 'grel): gnod mdzes sngags kyis ni/ /mkhas pas bgegs ni bskrad bya ste/ /tshig rkang ngag ni bzhi po de/ /zhal bzhi nas ni brjod par bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs lha ma bzhi/ /thugs kyi 'khor sogs 'khor lo can/ /khwa gdong la
95a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pho nya brgyad/ /so so'i ming ni brjod par bya/ /de nas srung ba'i cho ga'i phyir/ /'di ltar lus kyi go cha bya/ /oM ha zhes bya rdzogs pa yi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' snying gar gnas/ /na ma hi las
95a2(rgyud 'grel): mgo bo la/ /rnam par snang mdzad gnas pa'o/ /swA hA hu las spyi gtsug phyogs/ /pad+ma gang gyi dbang phyug po/ /po ShaT he las phrag gnyis su/ /he ru ka dpal ngag tu grags/ /hUM hUM ho las mig gnyis su/ /de
95a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin rdo rje nyi ma yang/ /phaT haM ni lus kun la dgong/ /de nyid yongs su gyur pa las/ /rta mchog mtshon cha'i gzugs can ni/ /lus kun la ni rnam par gnas/ /oM baM rdo rje phag mo ni/ /lha mo'i lte bar gnas
95a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /haM yoM zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis ni/ /gshin rje ma ni snying gar gnas/ /de bzhin h+rAM oM zhes bya ni/ /rmongs byed ma ni kha la gnas/ /h+reM h+rAM zhes bya mgo bo la/ /skyod byed ma ni rnams gnas pa'o/ /hUM hUM zhes
95a5(rgyud 'grel): bya spyi gtsug dbus/ /rnal 'byor ma ni skrag byed gnas/ /yi ge phaT phaT zhes bya bas/ /ma lus lus kun gtum mo yi/ /mtshon cha yi ni rang bzhin no/ /de ltar yan lag drug dgod pa/ /gnyis la yang ni
95a6(rgyud 'grel): byas par bsam/ /thal mo phye ba'i thod pa yis/ /mkhas pas mchod yon lan gsum sbyin/ /ye shes 'khor lo gzhug pa'i phyir/ /sngags dang phyag rgya yang dag brtsam/ /ji ltar 'khor lo 'dir bstan pa/ /de
95a7(rgyud 'grel): yang de bzhin gnas pa nyid/ /hUM yig snying gar bsam bya ste/ /de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis/ /dpa' po kun tu gnas pa yi/ /ye shes 'khor lo yang dag bskul/ /rkang pa yang dag brkyang bya ste/ /g.yas pa yi ni
95b1(rgyud 'grel): mthob chen gyis/ /g.yon pa yi ni mtheb chen mnan/ /pho nya'i phyag rgya lhag ma ste/ /mthe'u chung gi ni sor mo dang/ /de bzhin rdo rje thal mo brgyad/ /mtheb mo sngon du kha sbyar nas/ /mtheb rtse 'og tu blta bar bya/ /mdzub mo
95b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ni phan tshun du/ /lcags skrag lta bur bcing ba yin/ /dpral ba'i steng du yang dag gzhag /? ni lan gnyis brjod pa yis/ /rkang pa g.yo ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /g.yon dang g.yas su de bzhin no/ /dang gi 'khor
95b3(rgyud 'grel): lo lta bu blta/ /'khar lo 'khor lor gzhug par bya/ /de nas lha mo'i gnas bzhi ni/ /lte ba snying ga de bzhin du/ /kha yi phyogs dang dpal ba ru/ /phyag rgya bzhi ni yang dag dgod/ /de la sngags ni 'di yin no/ /oM sarba bud+d+ha
95b4(rgyud 'grel): DA ki nI ye badzra bar+Na nI ye swAhA/ oM badzra bai ro tsa nA ye swAhA/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): ha ha hUM hUM phaT/ oM sh+rI badzra ha he ru ru kaM huM hUM phaT phaT/ DA ki ni dzA la saM ba raM swAhA/ de nas thams cad bsrung ba'i phyir/ /phyi rol mtshams kyi ra ba ni/ /nam
95b5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' yi ni khongs nyid du/ /rdo rje gur ni bsgoms par bya/ /de ltar yongs su rdzogs byas nas/ /rdo rje pad+ma bsgom par bya/ /byA las byung ba'i rdo rje bsam/ /de bzhin pad+ma dyA las so/ /de nas arg+ha byin nas ni/ /dril bu 'bad
95b6(rgyud 'grel): pas dkrol bar bya/ /phyi dang gsang ba la sogs pa'i/ /sgeg mo la sogs yang dag mchod/ /e ma'o chos e ma'o chos/ /e ma'o chos don yang dag 'byung/ /chos don dag pa bdag med pa/ /rdo rje rgyal po phyag
95b7(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal 'dud/ /sku gsung thugs ni legs dag pa/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa'i gnas/ /'gyur ba med cing snang ba med/ /rdo rje'i ? la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gtso/ /dus gsum 
96a1(rgyud 'grel): lam gyi lam la gnas/ /nam mkha' chen po dbyings byung ba/ /nam mkha' i lam la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /nam mkha' sku ni yang dag byung/ /nam mkha' gsung ni rab 'jug byed/ /nam mkha' thugs ni
96a2(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi mchog /spyod pa'i go 'bad phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /rdo rje sems dpa' theg pa che/ /nam mkha' spyod ba rnam spyod ba/ /kun tu bzang po ma chod pa'i mchog /rgyal ba mchog gi mchod pa gsungs/ /'dod chags zhe sdang
96a3(rgyud 'grel): gti mug che/ /rdo rje theg pa ston byed pa/ /nam mkha' i khams dang mnyam pa'i mchog /rgyal bzhi mchod pa bshad du gsol/ /thar pa'i lam la rab 'jug pa'i/ /theg gsum lam la 'jug pa'i mchog /sangs rgyas
96a4(rgyud 'grel): skal bzang dag pa'i bdag /mi mchog mchod pa bshad du gsol/ /byang chub sems ni yangs pa'i spyan/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor byed cing/ /sku gsung thugs ni yongs dag pa/ /rdo rje theg pa phyag 'tshal
96a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dung/ /bstod pa yi ni tshig 'di ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thun mong gsungs/ /yang dag bstod nas sngags 'di yis/ /snyims pa'i me tog gtor phyag bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAny+tsit+ta/ pra Na me ma badzra banda
96a6(rgyud 'grel): nAM ka ro? mi/ sgrub po lha nyid sku ldan na/ /gad la bstod cing phyag kyang byed/ /phyogs lnga de ltar brjod ce na/ /byis pa rnams kyi log rtog te/ /bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pa la/ /phyag byed pa dang bstod byed ltar//
96a7(rgyud 'grel): nga la nyams pa ci yang med/ /nga la skyon yang byung ba med/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas rgyud kun tu/ /kun mkhyen bcom ldan nyid kyis gsungs/ /mchod rten la sogs bzhengs pa ni/ /bde gshegs bde
96b1(rgyud 'grel): bar gshegs kyis gsungs/ /'dir ni 'khor gsum dpa' bo dang/ /dpa' mo rnams ni yang dag mchod/ /phyag 'tshal ba dang bstod pa ste/ /'di ltar mkhas pas bsgom par bya/ /dpa' bo dbang phyug longs spyod kyang/ /bdag
96b2(rgyud 'grel): la bdag gis bstod pa'am/ /yang na dpa' mo dbang phyug gis/ /yang na 'khor lo gsum gyis bstod/ /sngags pa gang zhig yongs rdzogs pas/ /dga' ba bsrung zhing bsags par bstod?/ /ji srid byang chub sems ma rdzogs//
96b3(rgyud 'grel): de srid bde ba chen po med/ /de phyir rgyud kyi de nyid ni/ /phyi ma las kyang phyi ma brjod/ /de skyes pa yi tshigs bcad brjod/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /de la sogs pa sngon byas nas/ /mya
96b4(rgyud 'grel): ngan 'das la dgod par bgyi/ /de la thug par nyid smras pa/ /byang chub sems ni mtshan nyid do/ /de phyir smon pa'i sems kyis ni/ /phyis ni byang chub 'bras bur 'dong/ /rgyu la 'bras bu brtag pa'i phyir/ /byang chub sems su brjod pa'o
96b5(rgyud 'grel): rigs lnga la ni sbyor pa la/ /gzhan du sems can 'di don med/ /zab cing rnyed dka' gsang ba 'di/ /cung zad tsam yang gsal ma bstan/ /bla ma brgyud pa rim pa yis/ /dam pa'i don de shes par 'gyur/ /de phyir de yid rtogs byed
96b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /ye shes lnga ni bsgom par bya/ /'di ltar me long ye shes dang/ /yang ni mnyam nyid ye shes dang/ /de nas so sor rtog bya zhes/ /bya ba nan tan nyid dang ni/ /lnga pa byang chub sems nyid kyang/ /gdams ngag las ni shes par bya/
96b7(rgyud 'grel): me long dri? med ye shes la/ /sems can thams cad rnam bsgom bya/ /sngags pa'i snying rje chen po yis/ /sems can dmigs pa dang bcas pas/ /sems can mgon med sdug bsngal zhing/ /nus med gzhan gyi 'dren pa med
97a1(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs kyis ni 'khrug gyur pa/ /de phyir mkhas pas shes par bya/ /de nas phyis ni chos rnams kun/ /mkhas pas snying rje bcas pas ni/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi bdag med pa/ /dmigs shing bsgom
97a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dag tu bya/ /dngos 'di rang bzhin med pa ste/ /bdag gzhan yang dag skye ba med/ /sgyu ma dang ni smig sgyu bzhin/ /thams cad stong par bsgom bya ste/ /yang ni so sor rtog pa yi/ /chos la dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i//
97a3(rgyud 'grel): smon lam dri ma med byas nas/ /dag pa'i sems kyis bsgom bya ste/ /bya ba nan tan ye shes ni/ /rtag tu gzhan la phan byed pa/ /nyon mongs can sems rnam dag phyir/ /rnal 'byor pa ni de ltar bsgom/ /sems can
97a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni sangs rgyas su/ /chos kyi dbyings la nges gnas pa/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin phyir/ /sangs rgyas rnams su bsgom bya'o/ /cho ga gcig tu 'dir rtogs bya/ /gzhan yang bla ma'i 'dod pa yod/ /me long
97a5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes phyag rgya che/ /mnyam nyid ye shes mkha' 'gro ma/ /de bzhin so sor rtog pa nyid/ /chos kyi phyag rgyar bsgom par bya/ /bya ba nan tan ye shes ni/ /rdo rje pad+ma sbyor ba'o/ /rnal 'byor pa yis skabs 'dir ni//
97a6(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba'i rgyu phyir sna tshogs kyi/ /sbyor thabs la sogs bstan pas ni/ /lha mo bde bas mchod par bya/ /de nas bsgul bskyod skabs su ni/ /dga' ba rnam gsum dran bya ste/ /dga' ba dang ni mchog dga' dang/ /rab
97a7(rgyud 'grel): tu dga' ba nyid dang yang/ /shin tu bde ba'i thabs kyis ni/ /bzhi pa mchog tu bde ba'o/ /sems can 'gro ba'i don byed rgyu/ /dga' ba rang nyid dgyes pa'o/ /lha mo bde bas dgyes pa ni/ /mchog tu dga' zhes
97b1(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa yin/ /dpa' bo rnams dang mkha' 'gro rnams/ /rab tu dga' bar gnas pa'o/ /shin tu yang dag bde ba'i thabs/ /rang dang gzhan du dbye ba med/ /shes rab grabs? kyi rjes la gang/ /byang chub sems kyi 'bras bur 'dod//
97b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dir yang 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid/ /dngos su byang chub rgyu nyid do/ /sems can gang rnams myang 'das ched/ /mya ngan 'das pas de 'das phyir/ /thug pa med par thal ba med/ /mkhas pa kha cig spyod yul lam/ /gang
97b3(rgyud 'grel): yang thug med 'dod pa na/ /rab tu bzang bar bya ba ste/ /dog med mkhas pas lca yis blang/ /'khor lo gsum la gnas pa kun/ /thams cad thun mong du bya'o/ /de nas dril bu yang dag blang/ /mkhas pa yis ni bstod pa bya//
97b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' po dbang phyug rjes 'gro 'am/ /dpal mchog dang po bstod pa bya/ /he ru ka dpal ye shes che/ /thub pa chen po thabs chen po/ /mgon po chen po rnam pa che/ /shing rta chen po theg chen po/ /snang pa chen po shes rab che//
97b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo chen po don chen byed/ /nga rgyal chen po gzhi chen po/ /rgyal po chen po che ba'i che/ /mthu chen bde ba chen po ste/ /rol pa chen po rtan chen po/ /mchon cha chen po drag chen po/ /'jigs pa chen ba rgod pa che/ /chags
97b6(rgyud 'grel): pa chen po zhe sdang che/ /gti mug chen po stobs chen po/ /cham dam chen mo drag chen mo/ /stobs po che la bsnyems ba che/ /sku gsum lam gsum cha byad can/ /'khor lo gsum srid gsum mchog /dri ma gsum spangs dus
97b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum gnas/ /spyan gsum sum cu'i dbang phyug ste/ /srid las 'das pa srid dam mchog /srid pa ldan zhing srid ba bral/ /yod med srid pa snang ba bo/ /srid pa'i dgra ye gtso bo ste/ /rnal 'byor chen po rnal 'byor spyod/ /rnal
98a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ma yin rnal 'byor brtson/ /rnal 'byor las byung rnal 'byor shes/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor 'joms byed pa/ /dpa' bo rdo rje dbang phyug dgyes/ /rdo rje phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /rdo rje kha TwAM yan lag brten//
98a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje chen po rdo rje phyag /rdo rje gang chen bstan pa ste/ /rdo rje glu ni sgra chen po/ /rdo rje pad+ma ting 'dzin gnas/ /rdo rje gdan ni dga' bas dga' / /gus par byed par bde ba thob/ /skye 'gro rgyal bas skyong byed pa/ /khyod la bdag ni gus pas gnas/ /lus
98a3(rgyud 'grel): ngag yid kyis thams cad du/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba 'dud/ /mkha' 'gro dkyil 'khor phyag 'tshal lo/ /stong nyid ye shes phyag 'tshal lo/ /stong pa'i yid la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de ltar bstod pa byas nas ni/ /sngags kyi bsnyen pa
98a4(rgyud 'grel): yang dag brtsams/ /mkhas pas rtsa ba'i sngags rnams bsams/ /snying po 'am nye ba'i snying po 'am/ /sgra las skyes pa la sogs pa'i/ /gang zhig de yi mthar thug pa/ /sprul pa'i sku ru bshad pa dang/ /gzhan yang longs spyod rdzogs
98a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /ji ltar khwa gdod la sogs brgyad/ /g.yon nas yongs bskor gsum la ni/ /sngags pa bsam gtan mnyam gzhag ste/ /sku yi 'khor lor gzhug par bya/ /de bzhin sku yi 'khor lo g.yas/ /gsung gi 'khor lor gzhug par bya/ /de
98a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gsung po 'khor lor g.yon/ /thugs kyi 'khor lor gzhug par bya/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo lha mo bzhir/ /rang gi g.yon nas gzhug par bya/ /de dag kyang ni ji ltar gnas/ /dpa' bo dbang phyug zhal bzhir ro/ /sngon gsungs pa yi cho ga
98a7(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /go cha chen po bo 'tshar che/ /mgo bo nas ni brtsams nas su/ /brgyad pa gsum gyi yan lag ldan/ /phreng ba yan lag blangs nas su/ /mu tig phye la sogs par sprul/ /ji srid skyo ba ma skyes par/ /sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams bzlas/
98b1(rgyud 'grel): gang yang skyo ba skyes gyur na/ /mtshungs? bar yang dag bsdu bar bya/ /de nyid longs spyod rdzogs sku'o/ /gzhan yang chos kyi sku zhes pa/ /sku gsum yongs su rdzogs che du/ /cha dang rang don 'phel bya'i phyir/ /lte ba'i phyogs kyi snying po la/ /pad+ma ge sar
98b2(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa bsam/ /de stong zla ba'i dkyil gnas pa/ /brtan par hUM gi yi ge bstog?/ /hUM las A li phreng ba dang/ /de bzhin kA li 'od zer spro/ /de nyid 'byung pa'i rlung spros nas/ /de bzhin 'jug pa'i rlung dang bsdu/ /ji srid skyo ba ma skyes par/ /de ltar re zhig yang
98b3(rgyud 'grel): yang bya/ /'jug pa rlung gi hUM yig la/ /de nyid bsdus pas yang dag bsdu/ /sku gsum pa ni rnam gzhag pa/ /rgyud 'di la na legs par grags/ /bsdus nas bstod par rab tu bya/ /de nas bsod nams yongs su bsngo/ /sngags pa yang dag langs nas
98b4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /phyi rol phyag rgya legs bcas pas/ /lhag dang chad pa'i skyon spangs phyir/ /sngags dang lha la bzod par gsol/ /sngags rnams rdzogs dang zhes bya'i phyir/ /mkhas pa yis ni sbyin sreg bya/ /'dir yang phyi rol sbyin sreg zhar/ /lus kyi sbyin sreg
98b5(rgyud 'grel): byed pa lhag /bza' dang ston mo la sogs rnams/ /de bzhin mkhas pas bdag tshim bya/ /zas rnams cung zad sbyang pa ni/ /de yi 'og tu 'bar ba med/ /bdud rtsi lnga ni bsgom bya nyid/ /thod pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de bzhin zla ba re mig dgu//
98b6(rgyud 'grel): oM yig dkyil 'khor re mig la/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): ni mdun gyi re mig la/ /ha ha lho dang rgyab tu'o/ /g.yon gyi re mig hUM yin te/ /dbus la yang ni hUM yig go/ mtshams ni bzhi ru phaT yig ste/ /de la sngags kyis mngon par bsngags/ /de la 'di yi
98b7(rgyud 'grel): sngags rnams ni/ /oM sarba badzra ? mi Ni sarba bAk+Sha sho d+ha ya gu hUM badzra Ni hUM swAhA/ de ltar sbyin sreg bya ba ni/ /sngags dang lta ni tshim par bya/ /tshim par yun ni mi ring bar/ /sgrub pa pos ni dngos grub 'grub/ /de bzhin gshan du yang gsungs pa/ /sngags ni chad dang lhag pa
99a1(rgyud 'grel): dag /rtag tu kha bskang byed 'dod pas/ /de phyir sbyin sreg rab sngags so/ /sku gsung rdo rje can mchog gis/ /'di ltar thun gsum thun bzhi ru/ /sngon du bsnyen pa bla med pa/ /g.yeng pa med pa'i sems kyis su/ /sgrub po mnyam
99a2(rgyud 'grel): par gzhag ste bya/ /oM sh+rI he ru ka zhes sogs/ /lhag ma yi ge brgya mnyam pa/ /sngags pas ci bder brjod nas ni/ /sangs rgyas gsol btab bsdu bar bya/ /oM sh+rI he ru ka sa ma ya ma nu pa' la ya/ sh+rI re he ru ka twe no pa tiSh+Tha Di Dho me b+ha ba/ su bo Sh+yo me b+ha
99a3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ sarba sing d+hi ma me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me tsit+taM sher yang/ ku ru hUM ha ha ha ha ho/ b+hag ban sarba ta thA ga ta badzra me muny+tsa badzri b+ha pa/ ma hA sa ma satwa A(rgyud 'grel): lha dang gnyis med rnal 'byor pas/ /sngags ni rtag
99a4(rgyud 'grel): tu brjod par bya/ /snang ba skye bar gyur na ni/ /de yi dus na dkyil 'khor brtsam/ /dkyil 'khor nye ba'i dus su ni/ /bde med bla med zhag bdun du/ /gzhal yas khang bcas mthar thug par/ /mkhas pas 'khor lo gsum bsgom bya/ /sngon du bsnyen pa sngags
99a5(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas/ /nyis brgya dang ni nyi shu'o/ /dkyil 'khor bri bar rung ba yi/ /'dir ni phyogs kyi sa bshad de/ /lha khang dang ni skyed tshal grong/ /grong khyer dang ni tshong dus kyi/ /shar gyi phyogs su brtsams par bya/ /ji srid byang phyogs la sogs pa'i/ /phyogs bdun
99a6(rgyud 'grel): dag ni spang bar bya/ /shar phyogs dkyil 'khor bris gyur na/ /bzod med pa yang bzod ldan 'gyur/ /lho phyogs char ni dkyil 'khor bri/ /'ci dang 'tshe ba sna tshogs 'byung/ /dkyil 'khor gang la dmigs te 'chi/ /lung rigs sngags ni gzhan du
99a7(rgyud 'grel): min/ /nub kyi phyogs su slob dpon 'chi/ /byang gi phyogs su zhugs pa 'chi/ /de bzhin me yi phyogs cha ru/ /char chen po ni 'bab 'gyur te/ /lho dang nub kyi mtshams la ni/ /mu ge chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rlung gi phyogs su 'dri ba ni/ /rlung dang
99b1(rgyud 'grel): char pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mchod rten gnas su 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig klu yis byin brlabs shing/ /shing grib 'khrigs pa'ang de bzhin no/ /de rnams ma gtogs byang shar mchog /de ru gnas la gang zhig sa/ /rigs kyi rim pa rnams shes
99b2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /bram ze rgyal rigs rje'i rigs dang/ /dmangs rigs dang ni rnam pa bzhi'o/ /bram ze dkar por shes bya ste/ /ser po rgyal rigs su ni brjod/ /dmar po rje rigs shes par bya/ /nag po dmangs rigs su ni grags/ /dkar ba yis nis phyogs su//
99b3(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug rdo rje spyi gtsug dang/ /dbyug pa dang ni bgrad phreng dang/ /rig pa sgrub par bya ba min /tshad dang ldan zhing snum pa dang/ /mtho dang dma' ba' i skyon spangs pa'i/ /shar dang byang du gzhol gyur cing/ /sa phyogs yid 'ong sbyar bar bya/ /thod brtsab
99b4(rgyud 'grel): rus pa skra/ /phub ma rdo ba gseg ma dang/ /thal ba sol ba srog chags ni/ /khru do tshad cam brkos te spang/ /srog chags bcas ni rlung chen 'byung/ /rus par bcas na zug rngu 'byung/ /gseg mar bcas pas klugs par 'gyur/ /phub ma sol pa la
99b5(rgyud 'grel): ni rims /skra dang shing rtsa la sogs pa/ /gnod pa phra mo 'byung ba srid/ /de phyir shis par brjod pa yis/ /'bad pas sa yi cha sbyang bya/ /rgyal po khru ni brgya la bri/ /blon po la ni de yi phyed/ /gtso bo la ni de'i phyed brjod/ /tshong dpon la ni bcu gnyis so//
99b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dir ni sgrub po rnams kyi khru/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni rim par brjod/ /ji ltar lung las gsungs pa'i don/ /rang gi nus pas bri bar bya/ /de la re zhig thog ma ru/ /mkhas pas mngon 'dod phyogs cha ru/ /rus pa'i phye ma dug dang khrag /ske tshe la sogs
99b7(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa yis/ /sa gzhir gtor zhing rtsa sngags kyis/ /bgegs ni bskrad par bya ba'o/ /yang ni rang gi slob ma la/ /sa yi bdag po phyed gtad nas/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg cho ga ni/ /de la gnyis med ldan pas bya/ /gzhal yas khang ni rdzogs pa yi//
100a1(rgyud 'grel): sngar ni zas sogs 'dod pa rnams/ /slob mas ji ltar nus pa nyid/ /sbyin nas gzhan gyis yang dag brtsams/ /sa gzhi legs brdungs mnyam byas te/ ? yi dkyil ni cung zhig bstod/ /gzhal yas khang pa sgo bzhi
100a2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan/ /lugs ma thang ka'i rnam pa sogs/ /me tog rnga yab phreng ba dang/ /dri zhim dri dang bdug spos dang/ /mar me mang po ni ni shing/ /dzA ti tsam pa su na ka /nA ga ge sar yu ti ga /ma la ki oM? phreng ba dang/ /padmo?
100a3(rgyud 'grel): utpal pa ta la/ /kar ni ka la sogs pa dgram/ sna tshogs gos kyis brgyan byas nas/ /phyi rol rgyal mtshan pa dan rnams/ chu shing sdong pos rnam par mdzes/ /dung dang zangs dung sna tshogs dang/ /spra ni sna tshogs pa yis brgyan/ /nye bar
100a4(rgyud 'grel): byug pa la sogs pas/ /phyis ni de kun rgyan par bya/ /de nas brtsam pa bya ba ni/ /sa la gsol gdab la sogs bya/ /de nas rgyud gzhan las grags pa'i/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags sam ni/ /dum skyes ma yi gsang sngags kyis/ /dri zhim chu
100a5(rgyud 'grel): yis bsang gtong bya/ /gnas skabs 'dir ni sa yi char/ /tsan dan gyis ni nye bar byug /lag g.yas sa la reg nas su/ /yi ge hUM sngags de bzhin du/ /lan bdun du ni brjod par bya/ /yi ge brgya pa lan bdun no/ /de nas ? ni bcu
100a6(rgyud 'grel): gsum la/ /sgom pa'i yid ni brtan gyur cing/ /sngon du bsnyen pa sgrub pa yis/ /sngags rig pas ni rjes gnang thob/ /'khor lo gsum ni nam mkha' la/ /mngon sum bzhin du nges par bsam/ /de yi gzugs brnyan 'dra ba yin?
100a7(rgyud 'grel): phyi ni mkhas par dkyil 'khor brtsam/ /blo ldan slob mas yon tan ldan/ /de bzhin yo byad kun tshogs na/ /sngar sbyangs pa yis dbus su ni/ /nye bar gnas nas sa la reg /sa yi lha mo gang yin bskul /bkug la sa la gsol ba gdang//
100b1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo dbang phyug rnal 'byor ldan/ /lag g.yas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /hUM yig gsum ni rnam bkod de/ /'od zer bzang po 'khrugs pa spro/ /sor mo rtse mo sa de la/ /mkhas pas lan gsum bsnun ? bya/ /de yi sbra yis bskul ba? dang/ /de bzhin
100b2(rgyud 'grel): ? gi 'od kyis so/ /sa yi lha mo mdzes ma ni/ /kha dog ser zhing na bza' dkar/ gus pa dang ni mi 'jigs phyag /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam rgyan pa/ /zhal gcig ma la phyag gnyis ma/ /mdun du gnas par rnam bsam nas/ /arg+ha? la sogs dbul
100b3(rgyud 'grel): byas la/ /tshigs bcad gnyis ni 'dir brjod bya/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par ni/ /sa dang ? son pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis/ /ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa/ /de bzhin
100b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis bdud las ni/ /rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri/ /zhes bya lan gsum brjod par bya/ /de la mchod pa byas nas su/ /mngon par dga' ba'i sems kyis ni/ /zhal gyi pad+mar rab bshad ? bsku byed mthon nas lha me ni/ /mkhas pas mnyaM
100b5(rgyud 'grel): par gzhag bltas nas/ /de ltar bgyi zhes brjod par bsam/ /de la de nyid thim par bsam/ /rdo rje bcing ba'i lag mthil gyis/ /sa de la ni bzhag par bya/ /oM badzri b+ha wa hUM/ de ltar brjod nas gzhan yang ni/ oM badzra pri na tiShtha zhes bya ? /sngags rig pas ni
100b6(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags brjod/ /sa de byin gyis brlabs pa ni/ /sa de rung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /sa la gsol btab cho ga ni/ /tshigs bcang bzhi bcu thams pa'o/ /phyi nas de bzhin slob dpon ni/ /phyag rgya'i rgyun gyis brgyan pa dang/ /dkar po gtsug tor dang ni gos/ /tsan
100b7(rgyud 'grel): dan la sogs thig le gsum/ /legs par brlabs pa'i slob du ni/ /rdo rje dril bu bzung ba gang/ /rdo rje drag po rnal 'byor gyis/ /slob ma dpa' po'i cha byang can/ /dum skyes ma yi rang bzhin du/ /sgrub pa'i grogs mchog sprul par bya/ /yang ni mchod pa byas nas 
101a1(rgyud 'grel): su/ /mkhas pas bgegs ni bskad par bya/ /de la slob dpon rim shes bya/ /rkang pa gnyis su a las ni/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bsam par bya/ /aM las mig gnyis dag la ni/ /zla
101a2(rgyud 'grel): ba nyi ma gnyis blta'o/ /maM las g.yas su nyi dmigs te/ /rdo rje 'od zer de bzhin spros/ /mig 'bras hUM las bskal pa'i me/ /rdo rje gsor bar byed brtson pas/ /rkang pa'i 'gros kyi 'od zer tshogs/ /rdo rje dus kyi me 'od 'dra/ /gdug pa 'bros par blta
101a3(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /g.yon pa'i zla ba dri med la/ /oM las byung ba'i 'od zer ni/ /bdud rtsi yi ni tshogs dang ldan/ /rang gi 'khor tshogs 'thung byed cing/ /tshim par byed cing mchod pa'o/ /dbang ldan phyogs nas yang dag brtsam/ /rdo rje bsnyems shing rol
101a4(rgyud 'grel): bcas pas/ /gtso bo slob ma bcas pa yis/ /brgyan cing rdo rje 'gros kyis bskor/ /gser gyi sa gzhi mthar thug bar/ /sa ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin bya/ /g.yon pa dril bu dkrol bya zhing/ /g.yas pa yis ni rdo rje gsor/ /hUM zhes brjod pa'i
101a5(rgyud 'grel): zhal dang ni/ /kun tu rdo rje lta stangs kyis/ /sa der gnas pa'i gdug pa can/ /mkhas pa yis ni bskrad par bya/ /rgya che ba yi tshigs bcad ni/ /sngags dang 'dra bar sangs rgyas gsungs/ /khyod ni dengs shig bgegs kyi tshogs/ /gang
101a6(rgyud 'grel): zhig lha 'am lha min nam/ /gnod sbyin dang ni srin po dang/ /yi dags dang ni sha za dang/ /rjed byed dang ni 'byung po dang/ /mkha' 'gro dang ni grib gnon po/ /rgan po dang ni rgan mo dang/ /rjes su spyod pa'i 'khor rnams ni/ /nam mkha' 
101a7(rgyud 'grel): lding dang mi 'am ci/ /skyes bu sngags so ni grub pa rnams/ /de la sa yi phyogs 'dir ni/ /slob ma che ge mo zhes bya/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub don dang/ /sems can bla na med pa yi/ /ye shes 'thob pa'i rgyu yi phyir/ /he ru ka dpal
101b1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro yi/ /dra ba'i sdom pa 'khor lo gsum/ /zhes bya ba yi dkyil 'khor 'di/ /de nyid bdag gi bri bar bya/ /rdo rje drag po dka' thos nas/ /'di yis myur du 'gro bar byos/ /gal te bka' las 'das pa na/ /he ru ka dpal rdor 'bar bdag /
101b2(rgyud 'grel): khros pas hUM gi zhal dang ni/ /ye shes chen po 'bar ba yis/ /mgo bo tshal pa brgyar 'gas pa'o/ /de nyid sngags pas brjod nas su/ /g.yas phyogs nas ni lan gsum bskor/ /de nas gom pa lnga yis ni/ /gnas lnga du ni 'gro bar bya/ /de skad
101b3(rgyud 'grel): du yang gsungs pa ni/ /bskal pa'i me dang 'dra ba'i 'od/ /rkang pa gnyis las 'od byung bas/ /gdug can 'bros bar bsam pa ste/ /bsreg bzhin du ni bsam bar bya/ /bskrad pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rim pa'i tshul/ /de phyir gsar du rtsis
101b4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba/ /gal te cho ga rgyas 'dod na/ /bskrad pa yi ni cho ga ste/ /tshigs su bcas pa nyer gcig go /de ltar bskrad pa byas nas ni/ /bgegs nyid la ni bur bus gdab/ /'bar ba'i me dang 'dra ba'i 'od/ /khro bo hUM gi nga rgyal gyis/ /hUM gi sgra yis dpa' bo
101b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /mang po bskal pa'i me lta dus/ /mi bzad pa yi drag po'i lus/ /ji bzhin nam mkha' gang bar sbro/ /sum b+ha ni yi sngags brjod cing/ /dpa' bo he ru ka byung nas/ /byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs byas/ /de nyid mdun du gnas pas su//
101b6(rgyud 'grel): bgegs kun gyis ni bskor ba yis/ /bgegs kyi bdag po nyid bkug nas/ /nam mkha' i snying po gar dbang phyug /rnam par snang mdzad ngo bo nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i rang bzhin can/ /seng ldeng gi ni phur ba bzhi/ /de nyid rtse mo yi ni dbyibs/ /rdo
101b7(rgyud 'grel): rje'i rnam pa shin tu rno/ /sor brgyad pa yi tshad tsam ni/ mkhas pa yis ni rab tu bya/ /me yi phyogs nas brtsams nas ni/ /thams cad du ni phyi rol mtshams/ /oM badzra kI laM kI la ya hUM zhes bya ba ni brgyad brgya bzlas/ /spyi bo nas brtsams skang pa'i bar
102a1(rgyud 'grel): bgegs kyi bdag po phur pas gdab/ /yang na ye shes kyis nus na/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi phur pas gdab/ /kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag sems tsam mo/ /zhes bya ba'i tshig gis 'thang pas so/ /phur pas gdab sngags
102a2(rgyud 'grel): 'di yin te/ /oM g+ha:g+ha:g+hA ta ya b+hA ta ya/ /sarba duSh+TAM phaT/ kI ba ya kI la ya/ sarba pA pi? phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badzra kI la ya /badzra d+ha ra adz+nya pa ya ti kA ya bAk+tsit+ta kI la hUM phaT/ phur bu de yi steng du ni/ /a yig las ni nyid dkyil 'khor/ /me 'dra
102a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs/ /de yi 'od kyis bgegs 'joms pa/ /sde dang bcas pas thal bar 'gyur/ /de nyid las ni skyes pa la/ /yang 'byung dogs pa'i bgegs gzhom phyir/ /mkhas pa yis ni stong nyid bsgom/ /de nas ha ya gri ba
102a4(rgyud 'grel): gdon/ /gzhal yas khang gi phyi rol bzhag /mtshon cha yi nir ba'i gzugs/ /yongs su gyur pa rnam bsgom bya/ /de nas h+rI:yig las skyes pa/ /de bzhin nam mkha' khyab pa'o/ /shes rab chos 'byung phyag rgya bsam/ /de yi steng gi rim
102a5(rgyud 'grel): pa la/ /a yig las skyes ma lus pa'i/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i rang bzhin nas/ /bsams nas rdo rje'i blta ba yis/ /kun tu mnyam par blta bar bya/ /blo ldan gyis ni hUM yig gis/ /sngags ni lan brgyar brjod par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi
102a6(rgyud 'grel): ni sa nyid dang/ /sa gzhi yongs su dag pa'o/ /rtog pa la gnas sngags pa yis/ /sa ni gang zhig spyod byed pa/ /zla gsang byang chub sems spangs pas/ /sa de dag par mi 'gyur ro/ /sngags pas rdo rje sems dpa' bzlas/ /rdo rje lta bas
102a7(rgyud 'grel): yang bltas te/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni sa'i chang/ /rkyen dang ldan yang dge ba yin/ /sa sbyang ba yi cho ga ni/ /tshigs su bcad pa bcu dgu pa'o/ /'bar pas de ltar legs sbyangs pa/ /mnyam par bzhag pas de nyid la/ /ji ltar gsungs
102b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i cho ga 'dis/ /yongs su bzung bar bya ba ste/ /rang rang gnas su nyer gnas pa/ /gzhal yas khang pa bsgom par bya/ /sngar brjod pa yi rim pa yis/ /rnal 'byor shes pas phyag rgya bzung/ /'khor lo gsum ni ma lus ba/ /dbyer med pa yi
102b2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor brtson/ /slob ma rnal 'byor dbyer med pa'i/ /de nas rang ? nga rgyal bya/ /lha rnams kyang ni tha mi dang/ /yab ni tha dad brtags pa yi/ /slob mas dpa' yi gsol ba gdab/ /dpa' bos gsol ba btab nas su/ /rang gi bdag nyid leD
102b3(rgyud 'grel): bsgom bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba/ /zhes sogs tshigs bcad bdag bstod nas/ /bdag ji? lta yis byin brlabs pa'i/ /mngon sum nga rgyal ldan par bya/ /kun tu nga rgyal ldan par bya/ /kun tu nga rgyal ldan gyur kyang/ /khengs pa yang
102b4(rgyud 'grel): dag mi bskyed par/ /mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyis ni/ /bdag nyid dga' bar bya ba ste/ /dang 'di bdag skyes 'bras bu yod/ /bdag 'tsho 'dras bu bcas pa yis/ /mi mnyam lha dang mnyam pa ru/ /gyur pa dag ni the tshom med/ /bdag
102b5(rgyud 'grel): gis nyi ma dang ni mchog /deng bdag mchod sbyin bla na med/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugS brtse ba'i/ /bka' lung dag ni bdag gis bya/ /bdag nyid skyes pa nyid kyis ni/ /dkyil 'khor ba yi 'khor lo gsum/ /sgeg mo la sogs yang
102b6(rgyud 'grel): dag mchod/ /'bad bas dril bu dgrol nas su/ /'bad pas mchod dang bstod pa dang/ /de bzhin phyag la sogs pa bya/ /nye ba'i snying po gsar sngags bzlas/ /sngon gyi nam mkhar btegs pa yi/ /ye shes 'khor lo brtan byas te/ /yang ni
102b7(rgyud 'grel): brtan par byas la bsgom/ /bar snang la ni rnam gzhag pa/ /de dang mnyam par sbyor bas bya/ /sngags kyi cho ga 'dir yang ni/ /'og nas 'byung ba'i rim pa yang/ /thams cad bsdus pa'i gzugs kyis ni/ /rdo rje drag dpal rnal 'byor ldan/ /zhags
103a1(rgyud 'grel): pas rdo rje byin gyis rlabs/ /de phyir rol bcas longs nas ni/ /sder bzhin ma dang bu dag las/ /nyi ma dang ni zla ba'o/ /ji ltar lta bas der bltas te/ /kun tu yang ni blta bar bya/ /gser gyi sa gzhi mthar thug par/ /sa gzhi rdo rje'i
103a2(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin bya/ /rol bcas gom pas bsgom byas la/ /rdo rje bsnyems pa'i nga rgyal gyis/ /sngags pos hUM yig brjod bya zhing/ /yang ni sa gzhi yongs bskor nas/ /de nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ /de nas phyag rgya lhan cig langs/ /thaMs cad
103a3(rgyud 'grel): du ni blta ba dang/ /bsnyems pas sa gzhi yongs su bskor/ /rdo rje sems dpa' brjod par bya/ /yang ni de dbus bsngod nas su/ /a ni g.yas kyi mig la bsam/ /de las byung ba'i nyi ma la/ /hUM yig las ni byung ba yis/ /rdo rje 'bar tshoD
103a4(rgyud 'grel): 'bar 'khrug pa'i/ /phyogs kun yongs su dag par bya/ /bgegs rnams ma lus bcom par ni/ /de rnams rnal 'byor 'bad pas bsgom/ /'dod pas mdza' yas dpag med kyi/ /'jigs pa'i 'od kyis kun tu ni/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba
103a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khrugs cing dran/ /zhe sdang rab ba drag po ni/ /blo dang ldan pas blta bar bya/ /du mar brtags pa de nas ni/ /bgegs tshogs rgyal byed mthug po yi/ /'dod chags ra ba dmigs par bya/ /rlung gis rab tu bskul ba yi/ /ma lus mun pa'i
103a6(rgyud 'grel): ? g.yog sprul/ /gdug can rmongs byed bsgom pa ni/ /de ltar gti mug ra ba'o/ /hUM las skyes pa'i rdo rje ni/ /zhe sdang rdo rje'i rang bzhin brjod/ /a las skyes pa'i pad+ma ni/ /pad+ma 'dod chags rang bzhin brjod/ /oM las skyes pa'i 'khor lo
103a7(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /'khor lo gti mug rang bzhin 'dod/ /ra ba gsum ni rnam bkod nas/ /de ltar shes nas bsgom par bya/ /mig g.yas pa ni nyi ma ste/ /de bzhin g.yon du zla ba'o/ /de yi sna rtser oM yig ste/ /'di god de yi rim pa'o/ /nang gi thams cad byas
103b1(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /yang ni ra ba gsum bya'o/ /mtshon cha'i dra ba'i rang bzhin bya/ /steng du khro bo rta rang bzhin/ /bskal ba'i me ni 'bar ba yis/ /glog gi mdog ni lce bgril zhing/ /drag po chen po bsam bya ste/ /des ni lhag pa'i bgegs gzhom bya/ /de bzhin du
103b2(rgyud 'grel): yang gsungs pa ni/ /bskal pa'i me dang 'dra ba'i 'od/ /'od zer 'phro ba'i phreng btsan/ /nyi ma stong phrag bya ba'i 'od/ /ma lus bgegs ni 'joms byed pa'o/ /sa gzhi yongs bzung cho ga ni/ /tshigs bcad nyi shu rtsa dgu'o/ /sa gzhi rjes su bcu bzhi
103b3(rgyud 'grel): la/ /rang bzhin dri ma med pa yi/ /ye shes rgya mtsho sa yi char/ /slob ma la sogs lhag gnas bya/ /de yang re zhig thog mar ni/ /dka' ba med par don la mkhas/ /gru bzhi byas pa dag pa la/ /dkyil 'khor las ni nyis 'gyur lhag /de nas
103b4(rgyud 'grel): skud pa dkar po byas/ /rang dang sgrub pa'i grogs dag gis/ /tsan dan dmar po dang bsres pa'i/ /sA lu btags pas spang bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor chad ni gyur pa'i?/ /nyis 'gyur gyi mi thig gdab pa/ /dag pa'i tshangs thig gnyis gdab bya/ /de yi
103b5(rgyud 'grel): phyed 'gyur rtsa thig go /sgo ni dkyil 'khor brgyad cha ste/ /sgro 'khyud kyang ni de bzhin no/ /dpa' bo rnams kyi gnas dang ni/ /mtshams bzhi yang ni de bzhin no/ /de yi phyed ni 'gram dang ni/ /logs dang 'dod yon 'od rnams so/ /de yi phyed ni tshon sna'i
103b6(rgyud 'grel): sa/ /dra ba bye dra phyed rnams de bzhin/ /rta bas sgo yi sum 'gyur te/ /chu srin gdong byung rta babs dang/ /'dod yon bum las byung ba'i/ /rta babs kyi ni ka ba'o/ /yang na gru bzhi dang ldan pa'o/ /tshangs pa'i thig ni gnyis bya ste/ /tshangs thig gnyis nas
103b7(rgyud 'grel): phyogs thig go /tshon snga'i? sa ru zhes bya ste/ /tshon sna'i snam bu de bzhin no/ /mtshon sna'i sa tshad gsum dor la/ /'od kyi 'khor lo gsum bya'o/ /grong gi phyi rol 'od zad do/ /nang gi grong du zhugs nas ni/ /rtsa ba'i thig nas brtsam byas te/ /
104a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo gsum po dag la ni/ /thig bzhi dag ni bskor nas su/ /sgo yi tshad kyis bya ba'o/ /lhag ma pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad/ /'khor lo'i rtsibs las lhag par bya/ /rdo rje pad+ma 'khor lo'i phyed/ /thugs kyi 'khor rtsibs mu khyud
104a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /rdo rje la sogs drag po ni/ /re khA gnyis par bzhi bri'o/ /tshon rtsi snam bu phyi rol tu/ /grwa dang sgo khyud sgo mtshams rnams/ /rdo rje nyi ma rig chen zla/ /yongs su bskor nas 'od 'bar ba'o/ /sgo yi phyed ni dra ba dang/ /nyi ma'i snam bu soD
104a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /mchod snam thig la brten nas su/ /phyi rol thig ni kun tu sbyar/ /rta babs chu srin las mtshan pa'i/ /dril bu rgyal mtshan pa ngan dang/ /me tog phreng ba dra rnga yab/ /mda' yab phreng ba la brten nas/ /rlung gis bskyod bzhin ba yi
104a4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /de bzhin ma lus brtag par bya/ /dur khrod kyi ni rnam pa'o/ /'od zer 'bar bas 'khrigs pa ni/ /rdo rje pad+ma 'khor lo'o/ /'khor lo gsum ni gang yin dgong/ /tshon rtsi sa gzhi kun tu ni/ /rnam pa lnga ru go bar bya/ /thig skud phra ba 'di
104a5(rgyud 'grel): yis ni/ /dbus su thig bzhi gang ba par bya/ /de bzhin ma lus brtag par bya/ /gang dang gang gis mtshan ma ni/ /gnas skabs gang du gsungs pa ste/ /ye shes thig ni btab nas su/ /tshon rtsis dag gis bri bar bya/ /dgongs 'dus ye
104a6(rgyud 'grel): shes dkyil 'khor ni/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor brtag par bya/ /sgeg mo la sogs ji lta bar/ /nye bar mchod pas yang dag mchod/ /gling bu pi wang rje? phran sogs/ /de ltar sgra ni sngon 'gro ba/ /phyi nas yang dag bstod byas te/ /de nas mkhas
104a7(rgyud 'grel): pas phyag bya'o/ /de la yang dag 'jam stan la/ /gnas de sngar bzhin mdun du ni/ /rdo rje drag bo'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dgug par bya/ /ye shes gsang ba'i 'khor lo gang/ /'di ni sngar med par ni med/ /de nas?
104b1(rgyud 'grel): bzung ste thams cad dang/ /gsang nas gsang ba'i ngo bo nyid/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bkug nas su/ /sa gzhi de la gcig gyur bar/ /sngags pas yang dag gcig 'gyur brtag /gnyis kyis yi ges go cha bya/ /de rjes kyang ni bsrung ba ni/ /
104b2(rgyud 'grel): lha'i nga rgyal bsrung bar bya/ /yi ge gsum gyis bsngags pa yi/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang tsan dan bcas/ /mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyis ni/ /sa gzhi kun tu byug par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni lha gnas su/ /sngags ni de dang der gsal bya/ /oM
104b3(rgyud 'grel): badzra maN+Da laM hUM dzA/ dgug pa'i sngags so/ /oM badzra kI la ya guSh+Ta maN+Da laM hUM phaT/ phur? pa'i sngags so/ /oM ? tsa kra a d+hi tiSh+ThaSh+Tha sid d+ha ya hUM/ byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so/ /oM h+ri:ta ha hUM hUM phaT ces bya ba la sogs pa lhag ma'o//
104b4(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo rnal 'byor ldan pa yis/ /de yang sngar bzhin dkyil 'khor sprul/ /de nas de la ye shes kyi/ /'khor lo gang du gzhug byas nas/ /yang dang byin brlabs mchod nas su/ /mchod yon zhabs bsil dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas rnam
104b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal bum zhes pa/ /mdun gyi nam mkha' la sogs sprul/ /rtsa ba nag med mchu 'phyang zhing/ /lto ba che la mgrin pa ring/ /rang bzhin med par dmigs rnams su/ /mkhas pas paM las skyes pa ru/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las bdas dmigs nas su/ /de yi lte bar
104b6(rgyud 'grel): ge sar bcas/ /dbang po dbang phyug lha mor ldan/ /de la sngon bzhin bsgom bya ste/ /yongs su rdzogs pa bsgom par bya/ /'dod chags chen po'i mes bzhu nas/ /byang chub sems kyi rgyun tu ni/ /de nyid du yang bsam par bya/ /de nas dri dang
104b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'i tshu/ /phyis ni der ni cung zad blugs/ /smon la sogs pa ldan par ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni rab byas te/ /ha sa de ba bri ta ti/ /kaN+Da ka ri daN+Do ta pa la dang/ /rnam par rgyal ba dkar po ni/ /sman lnga ru ni dge bar grags/ /mi dge bar
105a1(rgyud 'grel): ni 'joms par byed/ /'bru ni gro dang 'bras so ba/ /til dang ma sha nas su brjod/ /rin chen gser dang dngul dang ni/ /byu ru mu men mu tig go /dri chen dri chu byang chub sems/ /de bzhin sha chen dang ni khrag /de
105a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams bdud rtsi lnga zhes bya/ /bla med byang chub rgyu yin no/ /mya ngan med dang byang chub shing/ /a mra n+ya gro lum pa ra/ /lnga po yal ga lo mar grags/ /bum pa'i kha ni mdzes par bya/ /bum pa dkar po byas nas ni/ /pad+ma nyis rtsegs bri bar bya/ /
105a3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i 'dab ma gcig la ni/ /rdo rje phyag rgya? yang dag bri/ /gos bzangs mgrin pa brgyan nas su/ /yal gas kha ni brgyan par bya/ /dpa' bo kun la so sor ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas te/ /brgyad kyis lhag pa'i stong phrag gcig /
105a4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo dbang phyug snying po bzlas/ /oM badzra da ka hUM zhes pa/ /brgya rtsa brgyad ni zla bar bya/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor phyogs dang ni/ /bum pa la yang de bzhin no/ /thun gsum du ni mngon bsngags te/ /bdug pa la sogs yang dag
105a5(rgyud 'grel): mchod/ /dkyil 'khor la ni bskor bar bya/ /dbus kyi bcom ldan mdun du ni/ /bum pa de bzhin bzhag par bya/ /gzhan ni las ni thams cad pa/ /ro langs mtshan ma gri gug bya/ /dus skyes ma yis mngon par sngags/ /shar gyi sgo yi
105a6(rgyud 'grel): byang du bzhag /yang dag mchod la 'di ltar brjod/ /ji srid dkyil 'khor bya ba ni/ /de srid bya ba ma rdzogs par/ /bcom ldan 'das ma khyod kyis ni/ /bdag gi gdug pa bskrad par mdzod/ /de yi rnal 'byor rdzogs nas su/ /yang ni phyogs
105a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi gtor ma sbyin/ /shar gyi phyogs la brten nas su/ /gtso bo rang gi gtor ma sbyin/ /byang du mngon par phyogs nas su/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po mngon par ldan/ /me tog rnam par dgram par bya/ /'bad pas dkyil 'khor rang gi sngags/ /de nas phyir
105b1(rgyud 'grel): ni lhag gnas bya/ /sbyin sreg mchod pa la sogs brtsam/ /slob ma dad cing gus ldan pa/ /mkhas pas cho ga 'di bya'o/ /de la re zhig thog mar ni/ /slob ma me tog thal sbyar bas/ /yang dag spyi bos phyag byas nas/ /bla ma la ni
105b2(rgyud 'grel): 'di skad brjod/ /khyod ni ston pa dga' chen po/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag phyag 'tshal/ /dam tshig de ni bdag la stsal/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang/ / s skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol/ /thar pa chen po'i greng mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag kyang gzhug tu gsol/ /de nas slob ma'i lus sogs ni/ /gzugs ni bral bar bya ba ste/ /de nas rang bzhin med dmigs nas/ /bdag po'i
105b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyor bas de rdzogs bya/ /lus la sogs pa byin brlab cing/ /sngar bzhin du ni cho ga bya/ /slob ma'i gtso bo mdun byas nas/ /slob dpon rang gis 'di skad brjod/ /bu tshur shog cig theg chen gyi/ /cho ga sngags kyi sbyong pa'i tshul/ /khyod la yang
105b4(rgyud 'grel): dog bshad par bya/ /khyod ni tshul ched? snod yin te/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das kyang/ /de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang/ /da ltar byung ba'i mgon po gang/ /'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa de/ /de dag kun gyis gsang sngags kyi/ /
105b5(rgyud 'grel): cho ga bzang po 'di mkhyen nas/ /dpa' bas byang chub shing drung du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa mchen? med brnyes/ /gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de/ /skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa/ /stobs chen dag kyang de yis bcoM?//
105b6(rgyud 'grel): de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yi blo gros 'di gyis shig /rtog pa de ni spangs nas su/ /bzang po brtson pa'i yid kyis nyon/ /ma lus legs pa'i blo gros kyis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs dang/ /bde gshegs rnams kyis byin
106a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis rlob/ /de ltar 'bad pas spro ba bskyed nas/ /gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ /de la cho ga 'di yis ni/ /sdig pa bshags pa la sogs bya/ /slob dpon dag ni dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes
106a2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ /dus 'di nas ni rab bzung nas/ /ji srid byang chub snying gnas par/ /bla na med pas yang dag pa'i/ /sangs rgyas sku gsum rnam gnas pa'i/ /skyabs su bdag ni mchi bar bgyi/ /bla na med pa'i chos chen po/ /nges 'byung bar du
106a3(rgyud 'grel): skyabs su mchi/ /bla med phyir mi ldog pa yi/ /byang sems dge 'dun skyabs su mchi/ /de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum brjod/ /slob dpon bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni/ /dus 'di nas ni rab bzung nas/ /bdag
106a4(rgyud 'grel): gis skye ba thog med ni/ /'khor ba nas ni 'khor bgyi bgyid/ /bgyid du stsal dang rjes yi rang/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /spyan sngar de dag ma lus bshags/ /de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum brjod/ /slob dpon dag ni
106a5(rgyud 'grel): dgongs su gsol/ /ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /sems med ye shes sems bskyed pa/ /de bzhin bdag kyang sems bskyed do/ /de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum brjod/ /phyogs bcu de bzhin gshegs kun dang/ /rdo rje rin chen
106a6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma las/ /rigs su zhugs pa thams cad dang/ /snying po phyag rgya sngags rnams dang/ /rigs pa'i lha rnams dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni/ /phyogs bcu de bzhin gshegs kun dang/ /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma las/ /rigs
106a7(rgyud 'grel): dzhugs kun gyi sbyan sngar dang/ /snying po phyag rgya sngags rnams dang/ /rig pa'i lha rnams spyan sngar du/ /bla med sems kyis sdig pa bshags/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan mkhyen/ /chos dbyings yang dag nges bgyis pa'i/ /bla na med pa'i
106b1(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams kun/ /rjes su yi ni rang bar bgyi/ /gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams/ /rgyas par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /bla med theg chen 'khor lo ni/ /bskor phyir gsol ba gdab par bya/ /gang yang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /
106b2(rgyud 'grel): ji srid sems can khams gnas pa/ /de srid mya ngan mi 'da' bar/ /gsol ba dag ni gdab par bya/ /bdag gi dge ba'i las 'di yis/ /'jig rten ma lus sangs rgyas shog /'gro la phan phyir chos bstan pa/ /sems can sdug bsngal mang
106b3(rgyud 'grel): sgrol shog /ces ni bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /de nas snying po sngags bzlas pa'i/ /dri yi chu yis gang byas pa'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i phyag gis ni/ /sngags shes pas ni snying gar gtugs/ /de yi rjes su byin brlabs nas/ /sngar bzhin du ni cho ga
106b4(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /ji ltar mchod pa rnam lnga yis/ /de la so sor mchod par bya/ /khaN+Da ro has mngon bsngags pa'i/ /dri zhim chu yis lus la byug /me tog dkar po spyi bor sbyin/ /'o ma dang bcas u dum sogs/ /mngar ba dag gi so shing ni/ /sor du
106b5(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnyis tshad byas nas/ /de rnams lag par byin nas su/ /shar du phyogs pas dor ba'o/ /khaN+Da ro has mngon sngags pa'i/ /chu yis kha bshal sbyin par bya/ /so shing gang du lhung ba yis/ /dngos grub rgyur ni shes par bya/ /sngar
106b6(rgyud 'grel): bstan stan la bzhag nas su/ /de rnams kyis ni lag mthil du/ /yi ge gsum gyis mngon bsngags pa'i/ /yang dag mchod rten ku sha sbyin/ /de nas yang ni sngags 'di yis/ /bsngags pa yis ni dri zhim pa'i/ /bdun rtsi lnga
106b7(rgyud 'grel): yi chu sbyin bya/ /'thungs pas sdig pa nyams phyir ro/ /de la 'di yis gsang sngags ni/ /oM h+ri:bi shud+d+ha d+harmA sarba pA ba ni tsA sha ya sho d+ha ya sarba bi kawa a pa na ya hUM/ de rnams bsrung ba'i chad du ni/ /yi ge gsum gyis bsngags pa
107a1(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /mdud pa gsum byas skud pa ni/ /dpung pa g.yon par bcing bar bya/ /dpa' bo drug gi go cha bya/ /gnas gsum yang ni de bzhin no/ /de rnams bsrung ba byas nas ni/ /chos 'di 'di ltar bshad par bya/ /theg
107a2(rgyud 'grel): pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i/ /lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan/ /khyed rnams deng ni dong bas ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur/ /skal ldan rang byung chen po ni/ /'jig rten kun gyi 'dren pa'o/ /gang zhig yod dang mod las
107a3(rgyud 'grel): 'das/ /nam mkha' 'dra bar dri ma med/ /rnyog med rtog ge'i yul min pa/ /zab mo rtog par dka' ba'o/ /zab mo brtag par dka' ba ni/ /spros pa thams cad dang bral ba/ /spros pa kun gyis ma spros pa/ /las dang bya ba dang bras te/ /
107a4(rgyud 'grel): bden pa gnyis la mi brten pa/ /ye shes gtso mchog shes par bya/ /gang 'dod pa yi tshul du gnas/ /'khor lo gsum dag chen po ni/ /drag po'i steng du yang dag gnas/ /he ru ka dpal dka' i dran gyis/ /bsrung bar byas nas de nas smra?
107a5(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar rmi lam rmis pa ni/ /bdag gis mdun du smra bar gyis/ /zhes bya brjod nas slob ma de/ /nyal mal dag tu btang bar bya/ /yon tan ldan pa'i slob ma de/ /dkyil 'khor sa gzhir gzhug bya ste/ /bsgom dang bzlas pa la sogs bya//
107a6(rgyud 'grel): slob ma'i lce la a yig las/ /gsal bar zla pa dpag med bsam/ /rang gi lha mo legs 'khyud phyag /dmigs pa de snying zla ba la/ /a yi yi ge mdzes pa dgod/ /sgrub pa pos ni sngags 'di yis/ /lwe la yang dag byin gyis
107a7(rgyud 'grel): brlab/ /oM pad+ma sa ra ta thi ti satya/ mA ban+ta? ya h+rI:ces bya'o/ /ga bur a ka ru bsras pa'i/ /de nas spos ni bzung bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor pa dang sangs rgyas dang/ /nye ba nyid du snyan gsan dbab/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs
107b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dang/ /sras bcas 'jig rten la grags dang/ /rdo rje rin chen rigs dang ni/ /de bzhin pad+ma las kyi rigs/ /snying po phyag rgya rig sngags dang/ /gang zhig lha kun gyi ni tshogs/ /chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa ni/ /de ring bdag la dgongs su
107b2(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya bas ni/ /ji ltar nus pa'i nyer spyod pas/ /dpal ldan bde mchog dkyil 'khor mchog /kun tu bdag gis pri bar bya/ /slob ma rnams la rjes brtse dang/ /khyod rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /rjes su brtse bar nyer
107b3(rgyud 'grel): dgongs la/ /nye ba nyid du mdzad par rigs/ /zhes bya brjod nas yang dag mchod/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus pa kun ni/ /'di yis de bzhin dkyil 'khor steng/ /nam mkha' la ni sngar bzhin bzhag /de yi dkyil 'khor pa kun ni/ /dag pa'i shel
107b4(rgyud 'grel): dang 'dra ba ru/ /rang gi 'od kyi 'khor lo 'bar/ /dkar po rgyan gyis brgyan pa ni/ /gzhal yas khang par yang dag dmigs/ /zla ba'i 'od dang mnyam pa'o/ /de bzhin he ru ka dpal zhi/ /legs par bltas la yang dag dgug /dang snying zla ba'i hUM
107b5(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer gyis/ /de nas rang gi lus la gzhug /kha sbyor sbyar bas yang dag gnas/ /bsrub dang bsrub pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rang gi lus la thim gyur nas/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni sa la nyal/ /de bzhin du yang gsungs pa ni/ /slob ma'i gtso bo
107b6(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa/ /bye brag shes pa'i yon tan can/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor bltas nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor dang ni nye bar nyal/ /zhes pa'o/ /lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga ni/ /tshig su bcad pa bco lnga'o/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon dang/ /lha yis
107b7(rgyud 'grel): rab tu bskul nas su/ /gnyid las bsad par gyur nas ni/ /rdo rje drag dpal rnal 'byor ldan/ /nam mkha' la gnas dkyil 'khor bsam/ /de bzhin glu dang sgra la sogs/ /bdug spos dag dang mchod byas nas/ /ye shes thig ni
108a1(rgyud 'grel): gdab par bya/ /gzhon nu mas byas skud pa 'am/ /de bzhin dpa' bo rin gyis nyos/ /sku nyag med cing legs dag pa/ /se so lnga lnga ru ni ba/ /dkar po la sogs kha dog lngar/ /gtso bor byas la yang dag par/ /thig skud
108a2(rgyud 'grel): lnga ni bsgril bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor las lhag nyis 'gyur bya/ /sngags pa yi ni mthe'u chung tshad/ /sgo yi nyi shu cha lta bu/ /sbom bra gnyis su dgra brjod nas/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni ye shes thig /ji ltar mdung par mi 'gyur phyir/ /shing la sogs
108a3(rgyud 'grel): par dkri bya ste/ /gser la sogs pa'i snod bzhag nas/ /dri dang me tog yang dag brgyan/ /yi ge gsum dang spal ba yi/ /swAhA'i yi ge ji ltar rim/ /ye shes lnga yi tshul gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas kun sku rang bzhin no/ /dpal ldan he ru ka
108a4(rgyud 'grel): dpal dpa' / /rang gi lha mo yang dag ldan/ /hUM gi yi ge brjod tsam gyis/ /thig skud blo ldan byin gyis brlab/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin gyis/ /thams cad du ni rnams pa gsum/ /thun mong du yang rnam par blta/ /ye shes lnga yi rang
108a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bya/ /de nas dza las mig la ni/ /nyi ma zla ba'i mdog ser dgod/ /oM dIpta driSh+Ti aM ku shi dza:zhes brjod lcags kyu rnam pa yis/ /sprul pa'i 'od zer tshogs dang ni/ /sngags de yang ni lan gcig brjod/ /he ru ka dpal sogs
108a6(rgyud 'grel): kun mdza' / /'bar ba'i lta bas blta bar bya/ /de la mchod pa byas nas ni/ /brtul zhugs can gyis de ltar bskul/ /dkyil 'khor thig ni bskul ba yis/ /rdo rje thig tu gdab 'gyur ro/ /'bar ba'i lta ba'i lcags kyus bkug /he ru ka
108a7(rgyud 'grel): dpal byin brlabs pa'i/ /rang gi snying gar lag pas thig /sgrub pos thig ni rdzogs gdab bya/ /oM a n+yo n+ya a nu ga ta sarba d+harmA(rgyud 'grel): oM pa ra spar a nu pra piSh+Ta(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harmA(rgyud 'grel): oM a d+hyan+ta a mu pra biSh+Ta(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harma(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod de don ni sngon
108b1(rgyud 'grel): du byas nas dngos po bzhin/ /g.yog dang bcas pas bsngags te bzlas/ /yid la mi byed nam mkha' la/ /sngags 'di yis ni bsgril bar bya/ /oM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): ha ha huM hUM phaT/ de skad bzlas te bsgril byas la/ /de la gser sogs snod du ni//
108b2(rgyud 'grel): yang dag me tog spos la sogs/ /sngar bzhin du ni yang dag mchod/ /mig gnyis ma dang Ta las ni/ /nyi ma zla ba sngar bzhin blta/ /rdo rje khu tshur ma Ta nyid/ /brtan par byas nas sngags bzlas bya/ /sngags ni/ oM badzra sa ma yi su tra
108b3(rgyud 'grel): mA tikra ma hUM/ brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa bya/ /yig gsum stong phrag bar du bzla/ /yang ni dkyil 'khor gyi si sa/ /de la kun tu byug par bya/ /me tog legs bkram mchod yin no/ /rdo rje can kun nam mkha' gnas/ /sgeg mo sogs
108b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis legs mchod nas/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ /de la yi ge bdun sngags ni/ /rang gi yid kyis brjod bya zhing/ /he ru ka dpal bdag gyur nas/ /du ma skyes ma yi rang bzhin gyis/ /byin gyis brlab pa mngon
108b5(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ /sgrub pa'i grogs mchog spro zhing bskul/ /rdo rje khu tshur dag gis su/ /lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas ni/ /grogs po'i lag par byin nas su/ /phyogs kun dag ni mnyam par bya/ /oM dzaM dza dza zhes brjod nas/ /grogs
108b6(rgyud 'grel): po la ni btang bar bya/ /des kyang lag g.yon khu tshur gyis/ /yang dag bzung nas de skad brjod/ /thig gnyis rgyab nas bskyed nas su/ /rim pa ji bzhin drang zhing bzung/ /dang po nub dang lho yi ni/ /sgo ru sgrub pa po gnas bya/ /shar
108b7(rgyud 'grel): dang byang du kha bltas nas/ /lte ba'i phyogs su bzung bya zhing/ /gang zhig sngags pas las byed pa/ /de bzhin sgrub po grogs kyis bya/ /yang ni g.yon nas bskor nas su/ /sngags de nyid ni brjod par bya/ /oM badzra sa ma ya sU tra mA ti
109a1(rgyud 'grel): kra ma hUM/ shar du phyogs pas de bzhin du/ /sa yi gzhi ni de nyid la/ /tshangs thig gnyis ni yang dag par/ /mnyam par bzhag pas brkyang bar bya/ /sngags pa thig ni 'debs pa na/ /nam mkha' ma lus khyab pa
109a2(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /de yi sgra yi bde gshegs rnams/ /de nyid lan cig bskul ba yis/ /khyed ni sems can don du bab/ /'di nyid kyang ni bsam par bya/ /de nas slob dpon sgrub grogs dag /bskor zhing 'gro ba'i bya ba ni/ /g.yon pa'i spyod pa gtso
109a3(rgyud 'grel): bo'i phyir/ /kun tu g.yon pa'i tshogs bya/ /de lta na yang bltos pa yi/ /rtogs par dka' bas g.yas skor du/ /rlung dang dbang ldan mtshams gnas dag/ /me dang bden bral mngon phyogs te/ /sngags pas mtshams kyi thig gnyis ni//
109a4(rgyud 'grel): ji lta'i rim pas brkyang la gdab/ /de bzhin me ru gnas pa ni/ /byang du bltas pas de lta bar/ /lte ba'i phyogs su gnas pa yis/ /de yis dbang po'i phyogs thig gdab/ /de nas de bzhin rlung phyogs kyi/ /sngar bzhin du mi gnas nas su//
109a5(rgyud 'grel): sngags pas lho ru mngon phyogs pas/ /nub kyi phyogs thig gdab par bya/ /de nas de nyid du 'dug nas/ /shar du mngon par phyogs gnas te/ /bskor bar 'gro ba'i bya ba yis/ /mkhas pas byang gi phyogs thig gdab/ /me yi phyogs su
109a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jug? nas su/ /de bzhin nub tu mngon phyogs pas/ /lho yi phyogs thig btab nas ni/ /de bzhin grwa bzhi ru ni 'gyur/ /'khor lo gsum brjod dkyil 'khor ni/ /'khor lo thig ni rgyas bstan pa/ /yang dag rdzogs par sngar brjod pas//
109a7(rgyud 'grel): 'di'i? rgyas par ma byas so/ /rab la sogs thig rnams ni/ /ye shes thig ni sdus pa ru/ /de nas phyis ni brtags byas la/ /mkhas pas yang dag mchod la bzhag /ye shes thig ni gshegs gsol nas/ /sngon po la sogs pa yi
109b1(rgyud 'grel): tshon/ /gser la sogs pa'i snod nyid du/ /bkang nas cho ga brtsam par bya/ /thig gi tshon sna lnga po nyid/ /hUM las dkyil 'khor bdag po ni/ /dkyil 'khor kun dang yang dag ldan/ /bsams la de ni raM bsgom bya/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
109b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams khams te/ /oM ni ji ltar 'od ldan ba/ /bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs tshig gis/ /rdul tshon rnams ni 'thung ba'o/ /rdul tshon mang bden gang brjod pas/ /sems can sangs rgyas thob bya'i phyir/ /sems can rjes su chags pa
109b3(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /bden nges tshon gyi 'bar bar shog /sbyor ba'i stobs ni goms pa yis/ /gang zhig stobs kyis 'bar pa'o/ /de nas yi ge gsum po ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas te/ /oM badzra ci tra sa ma ya hUM zhes/ brgya rtsa brgyad yongs
109b4(rgyud 'grel): bzlas nas ni/ /bdag po rnal 'byor ldan pa yis/ /phyis ni yang dag mchod par bya/ /bla med shes rab blangs nas su/ /rang gi dril bu sgra yis ni/ /rang la mtshan ma ngan la sogs/ /rim gyis med par byed pa'o/ /dbus su thig le dkar
109b5(rgyud 'grel): po'i tshan/ /sher gyi 'dab mar nag po'o/ /g.yon gyi 'dab mar ljang gu'o/ /de bzhin rgyab kyi 'dab ma dmar/ /g.yas kyi 'dab ma ser por dgod/ /de ltar thig le lnga po de/ /yang dag rnyed nas lag g.yon gyis/ /sngags kyis
109b6(rgyud 'grel): bskul ba brjod pa ni/ /oM badzra rA ga sa ma ya oM A:hUM khu tshur g.yon pas dbang ldan nas/ /nang nas ri mo lnga bri bya/ /phyi nas slob ma ci bde bar/ /dkyil 'khor nang du gnas nas ni/ /dkar po ljang gu dmar po dang/ /de bzhin
109b7(rgyud 'grel): gzhan ni ser sngon po/ /phyi rol du ni kha dog sogs/ /ra ba rnams su yang dag grags/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i tshad kyi bri/ /de bzhin spom min phra ba min/ /'khyogs pa ma yin nyams pa min/ /mkhas pas ri mo bri bar bya'o/ /de
110a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du ni yang gsungs pa/ /sbom pas nang ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /phra bas nor ni nyams par ro/ /'khyog po yis ni 'byed par byed/ /chad pa yis ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gzhan du yang ni brjod pa ni/ /sdom
110a2(rgyud 'grel): pa yis ni khong nar 'byung/ /phra bas nad dang nor zad do/ /de la sogs pa'i skyon rnams ni/ /slob dpon slob ma dag la 'byung/ /sgom phra mthe'u chung gi ni tshad/ /dkyil 'khor khru ni drug du 'dod/ /thun mong gi ni dkyil 'khor
110a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi/ /sgo yi nyid shu tsha de yin no/ /rdul tshon shar dang byang dang ni/ /nub dang lho phyogs nyid du ni/ /de la sogs pa phyogs kyi cha/ /zhal gyi mdog tu bri ba'o/ /dkar po sngon po bsres pa'i mdog /dbus kyi char ni bri bar bya/ /'di
110a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid bu ni gsang dbang bskur/ /gzhan nyid kyang ni brtag pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor bri ba'i dus su ni/ /rlung la sogs pa byung ba na/ /gcig tu dam pa'i don du ni/ /byang chub sems ni bsgom par bya/ /g.yon na ral gri rtse mo la//
110a5(rgyud 'grel): 'phan la ba yi mar nag gis/ /snying po sa bon hUM phaT ni/ /sngags rig pa yis phyi rol bri/ /stobs po che yi 'gying ba'am/ /rdo rje drag dpal rnal 'byor ldan/ /ral gri de ni sprin la sogs/ /rlung la mngon par phyogs nas su/
110a6(rgyud 'grel): lan cig khro bo'i las kyis su/ /phaT kyi yi ge brjod bya zhing/ /mtshon cha 'debs pa'i tshul byas ni/ /sangs rgyas byas kyang rlag par byed/ /de ltar bzlog nas de rjes la/ /snod ni bzang po la sogs su/ /gnas min par lhung rdul
110a7(rgyud 'grel): mtshon ni/ /de bzhin ras la sogs pa yi/ /yi ge brgya pa'i sngags kyis ni/ /bzlas pa'i dri yi chu dag gis/ /dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas su/ /phyi dang nang du bsang gtor bya/ /tsan dan a ka ru ni spangs/ /chu srin sdeng mo
110b1(rgyud 'grel): ga bur dang/ /bla rtsi ka ra sbrang rtsing ldan/ /bdug spos mang po rgyun ma 'chad/ /phyogs dang mtshams su snod byas nas/ /mdun du me mar sdong po bzhag /sna tshogs me tog phreng ba ni/ /bla re'i steng nas 'phyar bar bya/ /de nas dkyil
110b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dbus su ni/ /lag pa g.yon pa reg byas nas/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po gsang sngags te/ /lan bdun du ni bzlas par bya/ /nyi ma rgongs ka de nyid la/ /gang dang rnga ni lhag pa yi/ /glu dang sgra la sogs pa kun/ /sangs rgyas zhing
110b3(rgyud 'grel): du rnam gnas pa'i/ /'khor dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas kun/ /nam mkha' i phyogs su rnam gnas pa'i/ / /dkyil 'khor rnams la yang dag mchod/ /gsol btab 'di yis spyan drang bya/ /ma lus phyogs bcur bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs
110b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs/ /bdag ming rdo rje can zhes pa/ /dkyil 'khor bdag gis brtag par bya/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni 'dir gshegs la/ /dngos grub rnams ni deng stsol cig /de ltar brjod nas phyag byas te/ /thugs kyi ye shes
110b5(rgyud 'grel): rdor hUM las/ /lcags rgyu'i rnam pa'i 'od zer tshogs/ /bcom ldan dpa' bo gtso bo ni/ /sprul pa'i gzugs kyis gnas pa ni/ /kha sbyor gyur pas yang dag gnas/ /de phyir yang dag bskul nas byon/ /de la hUM las zhugs par bya/ /dkyil
110b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba kun bsam byas pa/ /bar snang la gnas lhan cig tu/ /ji ltar gnas su lhan cig tu/ /hUM gis byas pa la gcig tu bsgom/ /ri mo la sogs rnam bkod la/ /de ltar rang gi dkyil 'khor gzhug /dkyil 'khor dbus byung pad+ma
110b7(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /'dab ma brgyad pa ge par bcas/ /pad ster dpa' bo dbang phyug gis/ /lha mos 'khyung bas yang dag gnas/ /shar gyi 'dab mar mkha' 'gro ma/ /byang gi 'dam mar lA ma ste/ /nub 'dab dum skyes ma yin la/ /lho ru gzugs 
111a1(rgyud 'grel): can ma gnas so/ /dri chen dri chu khu ba khrag /dung chen bzhi ru gnas pa ni/ /mtshams kyi 'dab ma bzhi po la/ /g.yon nas brtsams te dgod par bya/ /de bzhin 'khor lo gsum bsten pa/ /dpa' bo'i rtsibs
111a2(rgyud 'grel): la de bzhin dgang/ /rgyur nas g.yon gyi rim pa yis/ /dang rang lha mo yang dag ldan/ /dang po thugs kyi 'khor lo ste/ /gnyis pa gsung gi 'khor lo dang/ /gsum pa sku yi 'khor lo ni/ /lugs las bzlog pa dgod par bya/ /dang
111a3(rgyud 'grel): po'i sgor ni khwa gdod ma/ /de nas 'ug gdong byang du ste/ /khyi gdong nub tu shes par bya/ /lho ru phag gi gdong can no/ /mtshams su de bzhin gshin rje bstan/ /gshin rje pho nya gzhan dang ni/ /gshin rje mche ba can zhes dang/ /de bzhin
111a4(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje 'joms ma dgod/ /dkyil 'khor lha rnams bkod nas su/ /sngags 'di dag ni brjod par bya/ /oM badzra A be sha ya kra ma hUM/ /yang na yi ge gsum dran bya/ /gal te rdul tshon ma nus na/ /dkyil 'khor dang mnyam ngas? la ni/ /
111a5(rgyud 'grel): snang? nas tshon gyis bri bar bya/ /gal te yang ni ma nus na/ /de dang de nas sngags bsgom bya/ /he ru ka mchog phyag rgya bzhi/ /nges par bri bar dgos pa'o/ /cung zhig dkyil 'khor ma rdzogs pa/ /de yi dus na yongs rdzogs 'gyur/ /
111a6(rgyud 'grel): lha gi 'khor lo rnam bkod nas/ /'di ltar spos la sogs pa yang/ /dkyil 'khor pa kun mngon byas mchod/ /so so'i skye bo rnal 'byor dmigs/ /me tog phreng bas yang dag bzung/ /khros pa'i hUM yig brjod par bya/ /hUM gi yi ge
111a7(rgyud 'grel): brjod? nas su/ /sngags pas dkyil 'khor du ni 'jug /rnal 'byor g.yas dang g.yon gyis ni/ /blta zhing dril bu dkrol bar bya/ /skor ba lan gsum byas nas su/ /bsgyur ba'i me tog phreng blangs nas/ /brtul zhugs can gyis
111b1(rgyud 'grel): slar yang ni/ /rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya/ /khro bo lta stangs yang dag ldan/ /nub la sogs pa'i sgo bzhi ru/ /gnas nas yi ge gsum ni brjod/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo bzhi ni/ /mkhas pas yid kyis dbye bar bya/ /sgo dbye ba la
111b2(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags ni/ /oM badzrod? g+ha Ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha ya hUM phaT/ /de nas bdud rtsi lnga ldan pa'i/ /dri yi chu dang bcas pa yi/ /he ru ka dpal mdun du ni/ /dung chos dag ni bzhag par bya/ /sngags pa rig ma dang bcas pas/ /de bzhin dkyil
111b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor du ni 'jug /de nas rjes gnang blangs nas su/ /rang nyid byin gyis brlab par bya/ /rang gi ming ni brjod nas su/ /spyi bos kyang ni phyag bya'o/ /'og nas byung ba'i cho ga 'dis/ /lha rnams yang dag bskul bar bya/ /mi bzang ma lus
111b4(rgyud 'grel): bdud kyis gus byas pa'i/ /ma lus 'gro ba'i rang bzhin sngon du byas/ /rang byung mdza' med srid pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no/ /sa kun snying po gcig pu 'dir spyon cig /de ltar sngags pas bskul nas su/ /mkhas pas yang dag 'jug par
111b5(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /hUM bzhi pa yi sngags dang ni/ /dpa' bo lnga dang bcas pas bya/ /oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM oM grih+Na grih+Na hUM/ oM grih+NA pa ya grih+NA pa ya hUM/ oM A na ya ho/ b+ha ga wAN badzra hUM phaT/ sngags 'di dag ni brjod pa na/ /rang snying hUM yig las byung
111b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i/ /'od zer rnams kyis ma lus dgug /rang gi sras bcas 'dir gnas pa/ /nam mkha' i phyogs nas 'ongs pa yis/ /ngal zhing zhal ni bzhad bcas pa/ /rang gi dngos grub grub 'dod na/ /sems can kun la bde ster ba/ /dkyil
111b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor mngon phyogs 'ongs nas su/ /steng du gnas ba bsam par bya/ /rdo rje dril bu blangs nas ni/ /sdang? brjod pa yis bstod pas bstod/ /bcom ldan brtan por bzung byas nas/ /shin tu bshes ni nyer gnas la/ /'di yis bsgoms pas da?
112a1(rgyud 'grel): de kun/ /rang rang gzugs kyis gzhug par bya/ /lha yi 'khor lo kun la ni/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis rgyas gdab bya/ /rnam pa kun gyis mchog ldan pa'i/ /rang rang kha dog phyag mtshan 'chang/ /sprul pa'i sku yi
112a2(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin ni/ /phyag rgya chen po ru ni grags/ /dbang po gnyis kyis snyoms 'jug pa/ /bsgom pa'i bdag nyid de don du/ /shes rab mi mo gzugs 'dzin pa/ /de ni dam tshig tu ni brjod/ /byang chub sa bon skyed byed gang/ /zhing
112a3(rgyud 'grel): du byed pa'i bdag nyid de/ /yang dag mthar ni rnam dag pas/ /chos kyi phyag rgya ru ni brjod/ /sems can phung po ma lus pa/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyud chen du/ /rdo rje pad+ma snying brtser gang/ /las kyi phyag rgya ru ni grags/ /'on
112a4(rgyud 'grel): kyang de bzhin lha mo rnams/ /dga' rol dam tshig tu ni grags/ /las kyi phyag rgya de bzhin du/ /rang gi bya ba de skad cig /phyag rgya bzhi yis rgyas gdab po/ /de bzhin rgyas gdab rim nyid du/ /dpa' dbang rang gi lha mo rnams/ /
112a5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo rnams dang gtso bo ni/ /dbang bskur ba ni rab tu sbyin/ /bsam gtan gyis ni legs mnyam bzhag /sems can don la byed brtson pas/ /spro dang de bzhin gzhug par bya/ /phan tshun tha mi dang mi gnas/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po
112a6(rgyud 'grel): gsang? sngags ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya/ /de los gzhan pa'i lha rnams kyi/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla bar bya/ /des kyang dkyil 'khor grub par ni/ /'gyur ba ru ni the tshom med/ /gtso bo sngags ni bzlas pa yis/ /rnam rgyal bum
112a7(rgyud 'grel): pa de nas ni/ /de yi mdun du bzhag par bya/ /lhag ma rnams kyi sngags kyis bsngags/ /de rnams 'khor lo'i rdul tshon gyi/ /phyi rol tu ni mkhas bas bzhag /ji ltar 'dod pas mtshams bzhi ru/ /mtshan ma yang dag ldan de dgod/ /de
112b1(rgyud 'grel): nas arg+ha la sogs dbul/ /pus mo g.yas pa sar gtsugs nas/ /spos la sogs pas yang dag mchod/ /yang na yi ge gsum bsngags pa'i/ /las kun pa yi bum chu? yis/ /snod gcig tu ni bsang gtor bya/ /yang dag blangs te btung la
112b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs/ /bldag dang bzhi pa dang bca' bar ldan/ /de la yig gsum mngon par bsngags/ /oM sarba bid pU ra pU ra a barta ya ho zhes bya'o/ /dpa' bo rnams la so sor ni/ /gos zung ngag ni dbul bar bya/ /gtso bo la ni dri mchog dang/ /rnam pa sna tshogS
112b3(rgyud 'grel): ras yug dbul/ /med na ji ltar nus pa yis/ /lnga las nyung bar mi bya'o/ /sngags pas mchod pa rnam lnga yis/ /lha rnams so sor mchod par bya/ /de la 'di yi gsang sngags ni/ /oM d+hu baM pra tIts+tsha swAhA/ oM gand+haM pra tIts+tsha swAhA/ oM g+hak+taM
112b4(rgyud 'grel): pra tIts+tsha swAhA/ lha dang dbyer med pa yi gzugs/ /sgeg mo la sogs cha lugs kyis/ /sngon du gsang sngags 'di brjod cing/ /mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA hA sya lA sya ra ti krI TA sau khya a nut+ta ra pU dza me g+has
112b5(rgyud 'grel): mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ gal te 'byor na mchod pa ni/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan sogs/ /glu dang gar dang rnga la sogs/ /rgod dang sgeg la dga' bas spro/ /phyi dang gsang ba'i rnam pa yis/ /mchod pa'i rigs kyi tshogs kyi ni/ /
112b6(rgyud 'grel): lus kun dri yis byug pa dang/ /brtul zhugs can gyis yang dag mchod/ /de bzhin du yang gsungs pa ni/ /dam pa'i mchod pa 'di yis ni/ /yid ni dga' ba skyed par byed/ /de phyir kun bdag rnal 'byor gyis/ /bdag gzhan kun
112b7(rgyud 'grel): gyis mchod par bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /'og nas 'byung ba'i sngags 'di yis/ /de la lan gsum brjod par bya/ /mchod pa kun gyis rang bzhin gyi/ /sna tshogs pas mchod bsgom bar bya/ /sngags ni/ oM a nut+ta ra sarba pU dza me
113a1(rgyud 'grel): g+ha sa mud ga te tsa ra hi maM ga ga na hUM phaT swAhA/ de nas lhag dang chod pa yi/ /skyon ni bsal bar bya ba'i phyir/ /bsam gtan bzlas dang bstod byas nas/ /ji ltar de bzhin bzod par gsol/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi byin
113a2(rgyud 'grel): brlabs dang/ /dam tshig kyang ni dran pa dang/ /sems can kun gyi snying rje yis/ /dngos grub ma lus bsgrub par bgyi/ /zhes bya'o/ /de nas shar sgo las byung nas/ /bcom ldan 'das dang lhan 'ongs pa'i/ /dbang po la sogs
113a3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bdag kun/ /tshig gi nye bar spyan drang bya/ /de la tshig ni 'di yin te/ /kha cig bcom ldan lhan cig 'ongs/ /phyogs kyi bdag po 'khor dang bcas/ /gang 'dir gnas pa de dag kun/ /de rnams bdag la rjes dgongs phyir/
113a4(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar yod pa'i dri dang ni/ /me tog sogs kyis gtor bzhes la/ /sems can rnams la byams sems dang/ /slob ma yang dag bgegs med mdzod/ /de nas der gnas arg+ha ni/ /chu ni gnyis pas gsum dbul lo/ /mchod pa lnga
113a5(rgyud 'grel): ni? nyer blangs nas/ /bdud rtsi lnga ldan gtor ma ni/ /yi ge gsum gyis mngon bsngags te/ /de nyid brjod pas sbyin par bya/ /mchod pa byas nas de mthar ni/ /de nas phyogs skyong gtor ma sbyin/ /de nas dri zhim yan lag bkru/ /
113a6(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs kyis ni brgyan byas nas/ /dang po lha rnams tshim pa'i phyir/ /zhi ba yi ni sbyin sreg bya/ /de la 'di yi cho ga ni/ /dam tshig ldan pa'i btsun mo bzung/ /rang gi lha mo'i rnams gang bsam/ /dkyil 'khor nang du
113a7(rgyud 'grel): de dang ni/ /gnas nas dbang nyid snyoms 'jug nyid/ /thugs kar ye shes kyi ni lha/ /gnyis kar yang ni yang dag bsam/ /de bzhin haM las hoM gzar bskyed/ /dbus su me ni 'bar ba yis/ /de bzhin lce ni hUM las bskyed/ /
113b1(rgyud 'grel): zhag chen gyis ni mchod pa 'am/ /mar dang bsres pa rnams bsam bya/ /bdud rtsi lnga sogs yang dag ldan/ /blo ldan ston mo'i sbyin sreg bya/ /phan tshun kha yi thab khung 'dir/ /ma tshim bar du sbyin spag? bya/ /gang gis de ltar ma nus na/ /de la phyi
113b2(rgyud 'grel): rol sbyin sreg bya/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg cho ga ye/ /byas nas de ni yang dag bsdu/ /'on kyang gsang ba'i cho ga yis/ /tshim par byas nas nye bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin phyi rol sbyin seg gis/ /lha rnams nye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas phyi rol gsang ba
113b3(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag mchod/ /des rjes rang sems brtan bya'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor pa rnams so so ru/ /bdag gis mngon du byas nas su/ /slob ma rnams la rjes brtse'i phyir/ /gsang ba yi ni rgyud las kyang/ /ji skad bstan
113b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshig gsungs so/ /bdag gis de ma thag tu ni/ /ji bzhin gsungs ba'i cho ga rjes gnas/ /de phyir dkyil 'khor pa la ni/ /shin tu yid ni bde ba thob/ /mig rgyas zhal ni 'dzum pa yis/ /byams dang snying rje bsam pa can/ /gang gis blta
113b5(rgyud 'grel): zhing gnas pa dang/ /bdag dang slob ma rjes rtse bas/ /cho ga 'di yis yang dag par/ /de yi dkyil 'khor kun la ni/ /dga' dang tshim par bsams nas su/ /de yi las kyis de dbang 'gyur/ /de yi rjes su slob dpon ni/ /rang gi rig pa dang ldan pas/ /
113b6(rgyud 'grel): rang gis bsdus nas bzung ba yi/ /thog mar skyabs gsum la sogs pa/ /byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed/ /de nas dkyil 'khor du gzhug ste/ /mkhas pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa/ /de yi rim 'dir shes par bya/ /dkon mchog gsum la
113b7(rgyud 'grel): skyabs su mchi/ /sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags/ /'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis bzung/ /oM sarba yo gi kA ya bak tsit+ta mud ta pA da ya mya a sheSh+Ta a na ba sheSh+Ta sad d+hA tu hi ta su khot+ta ma sid d+hi a kyan ta
114a1(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ba ba saM sid d+hi ma hai shA rya tsa/ /me tog phreng ba blangs nas su/ /thal mo gnyis ni yang dag sbyar/ /blo ldan dkyil 'khor gzhug bya ste/ /sngags 'di dag ni dag par bya/ /A kha bi ra hUM zhes saM/ /oM sh+rI badzra he he ru ru
