114a2(rgyud 'grel): kaM huM hUM phaT/ DA ki ni dzA la shaM ba ri zhes brjod do/ /gtso bo slob dpon dag gis ni/ /dpa' bo dbang phyug gzugs bzung nas/ /de nas 'jug pa'i dus su ni/ /slob mas 'di bzhin du brjod de/ /oM pra be sha ya b+ha ga bAn/ ma hA mok+Sha su raM/
114a3(rgyud 'grel): sarba sid d+hi su khaM raM myaM pa ra ma su khot+ta ma sid d+ha dza:hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): pra sid d+hya b+ho/ /gnyig zhugs nas phyag byed cing/ /de yis rol? cing dga' bas bskor/ /de ltar phyag byas rjes su ni/ /skor ba gsum ni bya ba yin/ /sngags pas
114a4(rgyud 'grel): de ltar brjod nas su/ /de nas yang ni mdun gnas te/ /rgyud gzhan las ni grags pa gang/ /de nyid 'dir ni lan cig brjod/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /rdo rje chen po nor chen po/ /ye shes chen po 'phrin las che?/ /rdo rje sems
114a5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' deng bdag shog zhes bya'o/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi chu 'thungs nas/ /de nas snying gar zla dkyil 'khor/ /bsam pa aM yig dmar po las/ /de rjes byed pa'i 'od zer gyis/ /'gro dang 'ong bar rdzogs byas te/ /brtul zhugs can gyis de brjod
114a6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /dpa' bo dbang phyug rjes zhugs nas/ /dpa' bos yang dag byin brlabs te/ /de bzhin rdo rje phag mo bzhin/ /btsun mos yang dag byin gyis brlab/ /tiSh+Tha badzra bsam bya zhing/ /yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya/ /de nas thal mo gnyis
114a7(rgyud 'grel): bar du/ /phyis ni me tog phreng gnas pa/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bya ste/ /sngags 'di dag ni brjod par bya/ /oM pa ra ma su kha a sha ya la sita? bI lA shan mi ter na mA mi b+ha ga wan A(rgyud 'grel): khaM bI ra hUM pra tIts+tsha ku su mAM dza?  li nA tha ho//
114b1(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba bcing ba sogs byas nas/ /he ru ka dpal phyag byas te/ /shes rab ye shes dbang bskur te/ /kun tu lung ni bstan pa dang/ /rdo rje brtul zhugs mthar thug pa/ /mdor bsdus nas ni thams cad blang/ /'og nas 'byung ba'i rim pa nyid/ /byas la rang
114b2(rgyud 'grel): rig bcas pa dang/ /bya rgyu dag ni de rjes bya/ /de nas rang gi 'dod pa bsgom/ /rdo rje gar dang nyer spyod pa'i/ /mchod pas yang dag mchod par bya/ /de bzhin sgra ni snyan pa yis/ /dam tshig gsum gyi blu blang ba/ /yang dag mchod pa ? ste/ /de nas glu ni
114b3(rgyud 'grel): bla med blang/ /nam mkha' las byung mtshan nyid phyir/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog /rdo rje chen po rang bzhin sems/ /rdo rje sems dpa' deng bdag 'grub/ /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi
114b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal/ /mi 'gyur mchog ni bdag grub shog /nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa ni/ /'dod chags ma lus rjes chags pa/ /'dod chags chen po dga' ba che/ /bcom ldan de nyid grub par mdzod/ /shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog /'dod nas grol ba de bzhin
114b5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /byang chub sems ni bdag grub shog /kun gyi mchog ste grub chen po/ /dbang phyug chen po phyag rgya'i mchog /grub pa'i rdo rje char? bstod pa/ /rdo rje snyems bdag phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas slob ma gzhug don du/ /
114b6(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pas 'di ltar brjod bya ste/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis/ /dpal he ru ka slob dpon che/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems kun gyis/ /gsungs pa'i cho ga dag gis ni/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i tshogs ni/ /sems can don ni bdag gis bgyi/ /de la
114b7(rgyud 'grel): rjes gnang de rjes bdag /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /nye ba ru ni gnas par 'gyur/ /de nas rjes su gnang na rung/ /bdag gis nye bar bsam bya ste/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis kyis/ /bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs brjod bya/ /
115a1(rgyud 'grel): sems can kun gyi yid khyab pa/ /sems can kun gyi yid la gnas/ /sems can kun gyi yab gcig po/ /mchog gyur dam tshig mchog 'dod pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung 'gyur ba/ /khyod la yang dag
115a2(rgyud 'grel): bstan par bya/ /bden pa 'di yis mgon po bdag /khyod kyi 'dod pa yongs rdzogs shog /mkhas pas phyis ni 'di spyad bya/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi byin brlabs dang/ /dam tshig kyang ni dran pa yis/ /snying rje sems can thams cad don/ /ma lus
115a3(rgyud 'grel): grub par bya phyir ro/ /zhes so/ /de nas slob ma dbang bskur 'os/ /de bzhin rang gi rigs dang bcas/ /sngar brjod pa yi sngags nyid dang/ /he ru ka dpal gzugs kyis ni/ /yi ge gsum gyis byin brlabs cing/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan
115a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ /sna tshogs gos ni bskon pa dang/ /de bzhin gtsug tor bla gos dang/ /mig dang gdong ni bcing bya zhing/ /rang ni rigs dang bcas pa la/ /yid dang legs par phul nas su/ /tha mar phyag ni bya ba ste/ /shar sgor thog mar re zhig ni//
115a5(rgyud 'grel): thal mo yang dag sbyar byas nas/ /de nas brkyang bar byas nas su/ /gus pas 'di ltar brjod par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza u pas+tha nA ya Ata ma naM nIr ya ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta ak+Sho b+hya(rgyud 'grel): a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa maM/ zhes bya brjod pa de nas ni/ /
115a6(rgyud 'grel): lus kun gyis ni phyag bya'o/ /snying gar bcom ldan zhugs pa ru/ /yid kyis yongs su rtag par bya/ /de bzhin lho sgo nyid du ni/ /thal mo de nyid snying ga ru/ /de bzhin bcas nas sngags 'di yis/ /rin chen sngags ni brjod par bya/ /oM
115a7(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza A b+hi She ka ya At+mA nAM nirya? ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta ratna saM b+ha ba a b+hi Shiny+tsa a b+hi tiSh+Tha swa maM/ /zhes brjod pa nyid kyis ni/ /mkhas pas dbral bas phyag bya'o/ /rin chen 'byung ldan rdo rje yis/ /dbang bskur bar ni rnam
115b1(rgyud 'grel): brtag bya/ /de nas phyis ni nub kyi sgor/ /de bzhin mgo bor thal mo sbyar/ /'di ni byas nas brjod pa ni/ /chos kyi mchod pa rab mchod nyid/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza pra brta na ya At+ma nAM nirya ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta a mi tSha? b+hA pra ? ya maM/ zhes
115b2(rgyud 'grel): brjod gdong gtsos phyag bya'o/ /'od dpag med pa'i rang bzhin 'dis/ /de ni nus pa ldan par brtag /de bzhin byang sgor gnas nas su/ /snying gar thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /dngos grub thams cad byed pa yi/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya/ /oM sarba ta
115b3(rgyud 'grel): thA ga ta pU dza karma Ne At+mA nAM nirya ta yA mI/ /sarba ta thA ga ta a mo g+ha sid+d+hi ku ru mAM/ zhes brjod pa nyid kyis ni/ /mkhas pas spyi bos phyag bya'o/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa nus pa ru/ /don yong grub pa bsam par bya/ /'khrugs pa med pas mi
115b4(rgyud 'grel): bskyod pa/ /gtso bo dpa' bo bcom ldan no/ /rin chen thams cad 'byung gnas phyir/ /de nyid rin chen 'byung ldan no/ /mdza' yas chos kyi lam ston phyir/ /de nyid 'od dpag med du brjod/ /dngos grub thams cad rab ster bas/ /de nyid don yod grub
115b5(rgyud 'grel): par brjod/ /de ltar 'od kyang mdor bsdus nas/ /rig pa thams cad de yang ni/ /mkha' 'gro la sogs mchod rnams kyis/ /mngon par byin gyis brlab bsam bya/ /me tog lag bzung de yis ni/ /bla ma la ni phyag bya ste/ /shar sgor mngon
115b6(rgyud 'grel): par phyogs pa yis/ /gus pa 'di ltar brjod par bya/ /dam tshig de ni bdag la gsol/ /sdom pa yang ni bdag la gsol/ /rdo rje rigs kun bsdus pa yi/ /slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug mdzod/ /phyir mi ldog pa dbang bskur ba'i/ /skal
115b7(rgyud 'grel): ba chen po bdag la stsol/ /dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub go 'phang mchog /slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol/ /mtshan dang dpe byang rjes 'jug pa'i/ /'dom gang 'od sogs yang dag ldan/ /sangs
116a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas sku ni yid 'ong stsol/ /mgon po chen po bdag la stsol/ /dbang bskur pa ni ngo mtshar che/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /rtag tu bdag ni slob dpon mdzod/ /de bzhin slob dpon gnas nas su/ /de
116a2(rgyud 'grel): yi tshig gi sgo nas ni/ /rigs kun la ni mkhyen gsol gang/ /rim pa ji bzhin bya ba ni/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis/ /byang chub sems ni yongs bzung dang/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir 'jug cing/ /dam tshig sdom pa nong
116a3(rgyud 'grel): par 'tshal/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad dpa' bo la/ /gus pa yis ni gsol gdab pa/ /de ltar slob ma la ni brjod/ /de nas gzhan yang slob ma la/ /gsang ba chen po rigs dag pa/ /gsang mtshan yongs su bzung ba ru/ /bdag nyid chen
116a4(rgyud 'grel): po khyod 'dod dam/ /de ltar bdag ni 'tshal zhes bya/ /de ltar byas nas de rjes su/ /rigs lnga yis ni dam tshig brjod/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song/ /'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i/ /
116a5(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig brtan par gyur pa'o/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dag /blo chen khyod kyis bzung bar bgyi/ /byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ /shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do/ /slob dpon bdag kyang bzung bar bgyi/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /'di ni
116a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i rigs dag pa'i/ /dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po la/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu btang/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa
116a7(rgyud 'grel): gsum/ /dam chos khyod kyis bzung bar bgyi/ /'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i/ /dam tshig sdom pa'i mchog yin no/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du bzung bgyi zhing/ /mchod pa'i las kyang
116b1(rgyud 'grel): ci nus bgyi/ /gzhan yang bcu bzhi 'di dag ni/ /pas pham par ni rab tu grags/ /rtsa ba'i ltung bar shes bya ste/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /gdugs re zhing ni gdon par bgyi/ /mdza' shes rdo rje spun dang ni/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams
116b2(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen bkur bya/ /spang zhing dor bar mi bya ste/ /de ltar ci nas spyad par bya/ /theg pa dman pa 'dod mi bya/ /sems can don la rgyab mi phyogs/ /'khor ba spang bar mi bya zhing/ /mya ngan 'das pa dga' mi bya/ /gsang ba gsum gyi lha rnams
116b3(rgyud 'grel): la/ /brnyas pa nyid du mi bya'o/ /phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang/ /mtshan ma 'gom par mi bya'o/ /khyod kyis srogs chags bsad mi bya/ /ma byin par yang mi blang zhing/ /'dod las log par mi spyod de/ /brdzun gyi tshig kyang mi smra'o/ /sems
116b4(rgyud 'grel): can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ bya ba ma yin thams cad spang/ /legs par nye bar bsten bya ste/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bskur bya/ /lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang/ /dag gi las ni rnam pa bzhi/ /yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni/ /ci nus par ni rjes su
116b5(rgyud 'grel): skyongs/ /'di dag dam tshig yin par bshad/ /khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya/ /des kyang 'di skad brjod bya ste/ /slob dpon 'dir ni bdag la gson/ /gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal ba/ /ji bzhin bdag ni bgyid par 'tshal/ /de yi de nyid 'di yis
116b6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /mkhas pas phyis ni sdom pa sbyin/ /gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mdza' yas mu med pa na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mgon po
116b7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams dang ni/ /de sras bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba 'di/ /dus 'di nas ni rab bzung ste/ /byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /byang
117a1(rgyud 'grel): chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ /tshul khrims kyi ni brlab pa dang/ /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang/ /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum
117a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis brtan por bzung bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /dong? nas brtsams te bzung bar bgyi/ /nam du yang ni mi spang ngo/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag/
117a3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag nyid du bzung bgyi zhing/ /slob dpon dag kyang bzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po la/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba rnams/ /nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba/ /pad+ma'i
117a4(rgyud 'grel): rigs mchog dag pa yi/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos ni bzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du bzung bgyi zhing/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci
117a5(rgyud 'grel): nus kyi/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyi zhing/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gi sdom pa ma lus bzung/ /ma grol ba ni bdag gis dgrol/ /ma bsgral ba ni bdag gis bsgral/ /dbugs ma
117a6(rgyud 'grel): 'byung? ba dbugs dbyung zhing/ /sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod/ /oM sarba ta thA gA ta yo gi kA ya bak+tsit+ta mutpA da ya ShA mya sheSha Na ba sheShA sa ta d+hA tu hi ta su rtse ta ma sid d+hi a tan+ta b+ha wa sid d+hima he shwa ra a d+hi pa tyA tsarma zhes brjod do/ /
117a7(rgyud 'grel): de yis slob ma byang chub sems/ /bla med par ni bskyed nas su/ /snying gar rdo rje bzhag byas te/ /snying po 'di ni brjod par bgyi/ /su ra te sa ma ya ra stAM? ho(rgyud 'grel): sid+ha badzra ya thA su khaM/ /'di yis slob ma bskul nas ni/ /'dod don
117b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad 'grub par 'gyur /sa ma ya stAM sngags kyis ni/ /me tog phreng ba 'bang pas bzung/ /de ni slob dpon gyis bcug nas/ /yang ni gsol ba gdab par bya/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni/ /rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches/ /sems can kun la
117b2(rgyud 'grel): phan don du/ /slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bya/ /snying po dkyil 'khor 'di nyid ni/ /rdo rje ye shes thob pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang du/ /bdag gis slob dpon zhug par bgyi/ /A khaM bI ra hUM zhes brjod pas/ /slob ma gzhug par
117b3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /dam tshig skyong bar byed pa 'di/ /de nas 'di skad brjod bya ste/ /deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis/ /ngas khyod la rdo rje ye shes bskyed par bya yis/ ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
117b4(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub thob par 'gyur na/ dngos grub gzhan lta ci smos/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams la brjod par ma byed cig /dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ lag pa g.yas pa'i rdo rje ni/ /spyi bor bzhag la 'di skad brjod/ /de ni dam tshig
117b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ste/ /gal te las rab khyod 'di smra/ /khyod kyis spyi bo 'gas par byed/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid ni/ /khyod kyis snying la yang dag zhugs/ /gal te tshul 'di smas nas ni/ /de ma thag tu dral nas gshegs/ /de nas bdud rtsi lnga ldan pa'i/ /chu ni thong
117b6(rgyud 'grel): par gnas pa la/ /snying po lan cig yongs su bzlas/ /de ni 'thung ngu gzhug pa'o/ /rdo rje chu la oM A:hUM pa paM(rgyud 'grel): blo ldan gyis ni 'di brjod bya/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ste/ /rdo rje bdud
117b7(rgyud 'grel): rtsi chu 'thub cig rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni/ /dkyil 'khor ma zhugs ston 'gyur ram/ /skye bo tshogs kyi nang du ni/ /ma dang dgod par brjod mi bya/ /deng phyin chad khyed kyi rdo rje dag po nga yin gyis/ /ngas 'di gyis shig ces bsgo ba khyod kyis bya dgos so/ /
118a1(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /yang ba ma spangs par tshe'i dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re/ /yang slob mas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs
118a2(rgyud 'grel): la/ rdo rje drag po bdag la dbab? tu gsol/ /de nas dam tshig rdo rje 'di/ /rdo rje drag po zhes su brjod/ /ye shes rdo rje bla na med/ /de ring bdag la dbab tu gsol/ /de ltar rdo rje dbab ces bya/ /de rnams rtag tu brjod par bya/ /gal te babs
118a3(rgyud 'grel): par ma gyur na/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /de snying zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /rdo rje drag po kha sbyor bsgom/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /de yi bskul bskyod las byung ba/ /a yig dmar po'i 'od zer gyis/ /de yis lus kun yongs bkang
118a4(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /de nyid yang dag brjod pa yis/ /sngar bzhin du ni gzhug par bya/ /slob dpon rjes su bzung ba ni/ /rig dang bcas pas bsam byas na/ /de nas nges par 'bab pa yi/ /yang dag byin rlabs 'byung ba'o/ /ye shes de nyid de la ni/ /de nyid du ni brjod
118a5(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /yang ni lce la bsam bya ba/ /a yig dmar po dgong pa ste/ /smros shig rdo rje can nyid kyis/ /dge dang mi dge smra bar gyis/ /de nas 'bab par gyur na ni/ /brgya phyed yi ges brtan byas la/ /de rjes yang dag byin brlabs brtan/ /tiSh+Tha badzro dri
118a6(rgyud 'grel): b+ho me b+ha ba/ h+ri da ya me a d+hi tiSh+Tha sarba sid d+hiM me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me tsit+ta sh+re yang/ ku ru hUM ha ha ha ha ho:zhes bya'o/ /yang dag dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni/ /bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bya/ /lha rnams kyi ni rigs kyi rim/ /ji ltar bsod
118a7(rgyud 'grel): nams de bzhin shog /gang zhig dngos grub gyur pa yi/ /de yi rigs kyi snod yin na/ /ji ltar bsod nams mthu yis su/ /dkyil 'khor 'di yang de bzhin shog /sngar brjod pa yi tshig gis ni/ /me tog phreng ba dor bar bya/ /'phangs pa'i
118b1(rgyud 'grel): me tog phreng ba ni/ /lha yi gnas la bab shes bya/ /oM ? pe sha ya ku laM shaSh+dyaM mahA ba laM/ 'di brjod nas ni phreng ba blang/ /bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs 'di ni/ /sngags pa mkhas pa yis ni bya/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /bden pa 'di
118b2(rgyud 'grel): yi dkyil 'khor du/ /gzugs brnyan lta bur slob ma ni/ /gsal zhing sdig med mthong bar shog /de nas mig gnyis zla ba la/ /oM gyis byin brlabs bsgoms par bya/ /snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /bdag po yang dag dmigs nas su/ /
118b3(rgyud 'grel): de yi mig gi 'od zer gyis/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni lha rnams kyi/ /spyan dang dbyer med ngo bo nyid/ /yang dag dmigs nas phyi nas ni/ /mig gnyis la ni yang dag bsdud/ /yang ni 'jug pa'i rnam pa yis/ /de yi bcings pa dgrol bar bya/ /mig
118b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byed pa yi tshig 'di ni/ /ji lta ba bzhin brjod bya ste/ /oM rdo rje drag po rang nyid ni/ /mig 'byed pa la ma? rtson par mdzad/ /mig ni thams cad 'byed mdzad de/ /rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med/ /'di brjod bcings pa bkrol nas su/ /de la lan cig dri bar bya/ /
118b5(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis mig gis ci mthong 'gyur/ /ji bzhin du ni smra bar gyis/ /dkar po ser po de bzhin dmar/ /ljang gu nag po nyid dang sngo/ /de ltar dngos grub shes byas la/ /dkyil 'khor bstan phyir 'di brjod bya/ /kye rdo rje ltos shig bya'o/ /de ltar brjod nas 'dir brjod
118b6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la bltos/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin brlabs pas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi rigs su skye/ /mthong bar dngos grub sbyor ba dang/ /phun sum tshogs kun mchog tu 'gyur/ /dam tshig bskyabs pa dngos grub
118b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /sngags bsgrub pa la brtson par gyis/ /bsod nams dad pa'i stobs bzhin du/ /dkyil 'khor mthong ba de nas ni/ /sna tshogs 'od zer 'phro ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor mthong bar the tshom med/ /de nas he ru ka dpal sogs/ /kun tu dkyil 'khor pa
119a1(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi/ /de nas lha yi de nyid ni/ /gus pa yis ni brjod par bya/ /sh+rI gang bla na med pa'o/ /he ni rgyu dang bral ba ste/ /du ni brjod dang bral ba'o/ /ka ni gang du mi gnas pa/ /he ru ka dpal zhes brjod do/ /rdo rje ye shes dbyer
119a2(rgyud 'grel): med phyir/ /rtag tu sdig pa 'joms pa dang/ /gang zhig 'dod chags dman sbyong ba/ /rdo rje sngon sang phag mo'o/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dang tshul gang/ /mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags/ /gang zhig gdug pa rtag za ba/ /de ni lA mar rab tu
119a3(rgyud 'grel): bshad/ /nyon mongs dum bur 'joms pas na/ /dum skyes ma zhes rab tu brjod/ /sna tshogs gzugs su 'chad bas na/ /de ni gzugs can ma zhes brjod/ /gdug pa'i thod pa dum byed pas/ /thod pa'i dum bu zhes su brjod/ /gang zhig gcug?
119a4(rgyud 'grel): drag tshar gcod pas/ /gtum mo zhes ni rab tu brjod/ /yi dags chen po 'dra ba gang/ /de ni keng rus chen por brjod/ /gang phyir mig gnyis gtum 'bar bas/ /de phyir gtum mig ma zhes brjod/ /dur khrod chen po'i rang bzhin phyir/ /
119a5(rgyud 'grel): de ni keng rus chen por brjod/ /bla med 'od dang ldan pas gang/ /ming ni 'od ldan ma zhes bya/ /mche ba gcig par ston pa gang/ /ming gis 'jigs par byed pa'o/ /gdug pa sdig mdzub byed pas na/ /de nas sna chen ma zhes brjod/ /lha
119a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams yid 'dod pa bzhin phyir/ /lha dgra zhes ni bya bar brjod/ /dpa' rnams blo yi rang bzhin pas/ /'dir ni dpa' bo'i blo mar brjod/ /gang zhig 'od? ni dpag med pas/ /'dir ni 'od dpag med par brjod/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi bde
119a7(rgyud 'grel): sgrub gdag?/ /de ming bde byed ma zhes brjod/ /gang gis dbyer med 'od byed pas/ /de ni rdo rje'i 'od du brjod/ /lang ka ru ni skyes pas na/ /lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ru brjod/ /lha rnams kun gyis mi phyed pas/ /rdo rje lus zhes brjod par
119b1(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /gang gi shing gi grib mtshungs pas/ /shing grib ma zhes bya bar brjod/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub myug 'byung bas/ /de ni dpa' bo'i myu gur brjod/ /mkha' 'gro glang po zhon 'gro bas/ /sa srungs ma zhes bya bar brjod/ /rdo rje ral pas 'jigs
119b2(rgyud 'grel): byed pas/ /rdo rje ral pa zhes su brjod/ /gang zhig gdug rnams rab ston pas/ /'jigs byed chen po zhes byar brjod/ /dpa' rnams nang nas rang bzhin dpa' / /de ni dpa' bo chen por brjod/ /rlung gi shugs dang mtshungs pas na/ /rlung shugs
119b3(rgyud 'grel): ma zhes bya bar brjod/ /mu stegs thams cad 'jigs mdzad pas/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad ces ni brjod/ /dam tshig srung la ched byed pas/ /chang 'thung ma zhes brjod par bya/ /dpa' bo rnams kyi gzugs bzang phyir/ /de ni shin tu bzang zhes
119b4(rgyud 'grel): brjod/ /rnal 'byor rnams rtsa'i rang bzhin can/ /de ni sngo bsang ma zhes brjod/ /rtag tu bzang po'i rang bzhin phyir/ /rdo rje bzang po zhes su brjod/ /kun tu dpal dang ldan pa'i phyir/ /de yang shin tu bzang zhes brjod/ /mu stegs ngan pa sgrag?
119b5(rgyud 'grel): byed pas/ /'jigs byed chen po zhes su grags/ /tshig rnams nyan par byed pas na/ /rta rna ma zhes rab tu grags/ /gang phyir blta bar dka' dus phyir/ /mig mi bzang zhes bya bar brjod/ /zhal dang zhal du sbyor bas na/ /de ni bya gdong ma
119b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod/ /stobs chen pha rol gnon pa'i phyir/ /de ni stobs chen ma zhes brjod/ /gdug can 'khor lo bzhin bskor bas/ /'khor lo shugs ma zhes ni brjod/ /dbul ba'i sdug bsngal 'grogs pas na/ /de ni rin chen rdo rje brjod/
119b7(rgyud 'grel): dum bur byed cing gcod pas na/ /phyis ni dum skyes yid 'ongs ma/ /rta mchog dag gi rang bzhin phyir/ /de ni rta mgrin zhes ni brjod/ /rnal 'byor gu na la mdzes pa'i phyir/ /de ni chang 'tshod ma zhes brjod/ /shin tu gzi brjid rang bzhin
120a1(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /de ni nam mkha' i snying por brjod/ /'khor lo lta bur chos 'dra bas/ /de ni 'khor lo go tsha? ma/ /he ru ka dpal 'dra bstan pas/ /de yi ming yang brjod pas ni/ /dpa' rnams mchog gi rang bzhin phyir/ /shin
120a2(rgyud 'grel): tu dbang po mchog gi mchog /gang dang bstod pa'i rang bzhin phyir/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug 'dod/ /rtag tu nyin re bden byed gang/ /da yang stobs po che zhes brjod/ /snang dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin phyir/ /de ni rnam par snang mdzad brjod/ /rnal
120a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor rnams kyis 'khor lor gnas/ /'khor los bsgyur ma zhes ni brjod/ /sems can dbyer med ston pas na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes ni brjod/ /gang la brtson 'grus che mnga' bas/ /brtson 'grus chen mo zhes ni brjod/ /bya rog
120a4(rgyud 'grel): lta bu gdong ldan mas/ /khwa gdong ma zhes bya bar grags/ /'ug pa'i gdong dang yang dag ldan/ /de ni 'ug gdong ma zhes grags/ /khyi gdong ma dang phag gdong ma/ /de bzhin gzugs ni 'dzin par brjod/ /gshin rje brtan ma pho nya mo/ /
120a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan ni gshin rje mche par 'bod/ /gang zhig gshin rje 'joms byed pas/ /gshin rje 'joms ma zhes ni brjod/ /de rnams lha yi de nyid do/ /ji ltar 'khor lo lnga de nyid/ /yid kyi dkyil 'khor mchog gyur pas/ /dkyil 'khor ngag
120a6(rgyud 'grel): tu mnyam par brjod/ /gzhal yas khang pa zhes bya ba/ /gru bzhi pa ni yang dag blang/ /kun tu tshad dang ldan pa yi/ /tshul khrims sdom pa mchog gyur pa'i/ /rgyan gang yin par bshad pa'o/ /dad pa'i dbang po la sogs sems/ /ra
120a7(rgyud 'grel): ba lnga ru yang dag byung/ /gang gis rnam par thar pa bzhi/ /sgo bzhi ru ni yang dag bshad/ /yang dag spong ba bzhi nyid ni/ /rta babs ka ba'i rnam par byung/ /dran pa nye gzhag bzhi ye shes/ /kha khyer bzhi ru brjod pa yin/ /rdzu 'phrul
120b1(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa bzhi nyid ni/ /sgo khyud bzhi ru brjod pa yin/ /byang chub yan lag bdun phreng ba/ /ba dan me tog phreng bar brjod/ /rnam kun mkhyen nyid ye shes ni/ /ting 'dzin gnyis su brtags pa yin/ /lam gyi ye shes khyad par ni/ /rnga yab tu ni brjod pa yin/
120b2(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs kun ni zad byed pas/ /de bzhin dra ba zhes su brjod/ /nye ba'i nyon mongs 'joms pa du/ /tshogs gnyis bsags pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /nyon mongs skyes pa 'phrog byed pas/ /dra ba ched par rab tu brjod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po ni/ /rtag
120b3(rgyud 'grel): tu ka par 'gyur ba yin/ /'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad/ /ka ba brgyad du brjod pa yin/ /de yi dkyil gyi pad+ma gang/ /skyon gyis ma gos pa ru bstan/ /'khor lo gsum du gnas pa ni/ /sems sogs dri ma gsum bral yin/ /rtsibs su
120b4(rgyud 'grel): yang dag bshad pa ni/ /nyon mongs nye nyon spangs pa'o/ /rdo rje la sogs phreng ba gang/ /blo bur dri ma spangs pa yin/ /sangs rgyas yon tan de dag kun/ /dkyil 'khor du ni brjod pa yin/ /sems can don kun yang dag brtson/ /de nyid rdzogs
120b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyis bstan/ /de nas bdag po rnal 'byor ldan/ /rnam rgyal bum pa chu yis ni/ /oM A:hUM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ sngags 'di dag ni gton pa yis/ /yal ga bzung ba'i khu tshur gyis/ /dbang bskur ba ni sbyin par bya/ /de nas de yi
120b6(rgyud 'grel): mgo bor ni/ /ral pa'i cod pan mdzes khyab pas/ /rjes su 'thun pa'i gzugs bsams te/ /gus pas dbu rgyan dbang bskur bya/ /de nas rang gi mtshan ma'i dbang/ /lag pa dag tu sbyin par bya/ /rang gi mtshan ma'i rjes 'gro ba'i/ /
120b7(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di nyid ni gang yin brjod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje dbang/ /de ring khyod la bskur bar bya/ /de ltar gang gi ming yin pa/ /kye yi sgra ni sngon byas te/ /shes rab thabs kyi ting 'dzin yang/ /yang dag ched du byas nas su/ /phyag
121a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya ched bzhi'i gang ma ngag bstan/ /de nas yang ni slob ma yis/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni/ /gus pa yis ni phyag byas te/ /me tog bcing ba la sogs kun/ /bzung nas rdo rje brtul zhugs blang/ /'di
121a2(rgyud 'grel): de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i phyag na gnas/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcad/ /phyag na rdo rje brtul zhugs bstan/ /de nas rdo rje bzung nas ni/ /sngags 'di dag ni brjod par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid d+hi
121a3(rgyud 'grel): badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha twaM d+ha ra yA mi badzra satwi hA:hi hi hi hi hUM zhes bya'o/ /sngags pas tshigs cad 'di brjed nas/ /de nas dril bu brtul zhugs sbyin/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi /shes rab thabs kyi rjes 'gror
121a4(rgyud 'grel): bshad/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang/ /byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed/ /gang zhig de ltar dbang bskur bas/ /dngos grub tu 'gyur the tshom med/ /lha gang mngon tu bya ba yis/ /de yis las gang sgrub par nus/ /rig pa'i
121a5(rgyud 'grel): dbang gi tshe ga'o/ /de ltar de nas byas nas su/ /phyis ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i rim/ /bya ba yi ni cho ga yis/ /pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor yang dag bstan/ /de nas bdag po rnal 'byor gyi/ /nga rgyal dag ni byas nas su/ /slob ma'i
121a6(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo gus pa yis/ /'og nas 'byung ba'i cho ga 'dis/ /de nas dbang bskur don du ni/ /rang nyid kyis ni gsol ba gdab/ /de nas rang nyid langs nas su/ /slob ma pad zla la gnas bsam/ /de nas rang lha'i bsam gtan
121a7(rgyud 'grel): gyis/ byin gyis brlabs ba la sogs bya/ /de bzhin chu la sogs pa'i dbang/ /mkhas pa yis ni sngar bzhin bya/ /'dir ni ji lta'i khyad par gyis/ /gtso bo rnam rgyal bum pa'i chu/ /de yi sngags brjod sngon sang bas/ /'di ni rgyun
121b1(rgyud 'grel): mi 'chad dbang bskur/ /ji srid rnam rgyal la sogs pas/ /slob dpon he ru kar grub pas/ /oM A:hUM badzra a b+hi Shinyu zhes/ /sngags 'di rang gis brjod par bya/ /shes rab can gyis de yi mgor/ /he ru kar ldan cod pan ni/ /rdo rje
121b2(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba rnams bsams te/ /sngar bzhin du ni de dbang bskur/ /de nas khro bo rdo rje sbyin/ /rdo rje dbang bskur zhes su brjod/ /gang zhig rgyud gzhan du grags pa/ /blo dang ldan pas de nyid brjod/ /rtag tu 'dod chags las byung khro/ /rdo rje me
121b3(rgyud 'grel): yi phung po'i sku/ /'bar ba'i rdo rje sbyor ba che/ /mkha' 'gro ma kun 'bar ba'o/ /h+rI:bdag po'i dbang bskur byin nas su/ /dril bu sgra ni bsgrags par bya/ /a kA ro mu khaM zhes bya sogs/ /de nas chos 'di rab bstan bya/ /thams
121b4(rgyud 'grel): cad nam mkha' i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' i la yang mtshan nyid med/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad mchog nyid sgrub par bya/ /d+hI:yang na srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag /ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i
121b5(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' yis/ /srid pa mchog tu byed par 'gyur/ /de nas ming gi dbang bskur ba'i/ /de bzhin cho ga sbyin byas nas/ /rig dang lhan cig tu bzhag ste/ /sdug bsngal mang po dag bya'i phyir/ /nyams myong bde ba sla bar rtogs/ /shin tu
121b6(rgyud 'grel): bde ba rtogs pa'i thabs/ /'di ni dam tshig bde legs te/ /ji ltar yid la 'dod pa ni/ /'dod pa kun la nyer longs spyod/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bas/ /bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya/ /ji srid 'khor bar gnas pa ru//
121b7(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo mchog tu gyur ba ste/ /de srid sems can dpag med don/ /mi ldog par ni nus par gyis/ /gsang mchog dam tshig gi ni thabs/ /bsod nams byin rlabs sgrub pa dang/ /dngos grub kyi ni dbang phyug 'grub/ /sems can don ni brtan par byed//
122a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya'i dam tshig brjod bya ste/ /yid kyi sku ni brtan pa'i phyir/ /gang gis thams cad skur bstan pa/ /de yi phyag rgyar rab tu grags/ /de nas de bzhin nyer 'dug la/ /slob ma rig dang yang dag ldan/ /yid dang rjes
122a2(rgyud 'grel): mthun zas sogs dang/ /sna tshogs btung ba 'thungs nas su/ /kha na ga bur dris sgo bya/ /lus ni dri zhim byug byas ste/ /phan tshun rgod dang sgeg la sogs/ /dga' ba'i rol pa rnams byas nas/ /dbang nyid yang dag snyoms 'jug pas/ /de
122a3(rgyud 'grel): yi dga' ba de yang dag 'chang/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun/ /bkra shis glu la sogs pa yis/ /de dag yang dag bskul bar ni/ /bdag gis rnam par bsams bya ste/ /dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che/ /khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas
122a4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /gsang gsum gnas las byung ba yis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya/ /de ltar brjod nas slob ma'i khar/ /rdo rje nas lhung pad gnas pa'o/ /a ho su khaM zhes kyang brjod/ /nges kyang gang zhig bkug pa rnams/ /rdo rje ye shes byung
122a5(rgyud 'grel): don de/ /shin tu gsang ba chen po'i don/ /dbang bskur ba ni ngo mtshar che/ /rdo rje dril bu yi ni sgra/ /mchog tu dga' ba skyed byed pas/ /de nyid 'dir ni brjod pa yis/ /dbang bskur rang gis sbyin par bya/ /gang de dga' ba'i rang bzhin la ni bde byed
122a6(rgyud 'grel): de yang brtags pa tsam/ /gang zhig chags bral rgyu 'am gnyi ga yang ni srid pa'i rtse mo'i rgyu/ /gang ni yid kyis cur zhig brtags pa yid kyis spangs pa'i ngo bo'i phyir/ /rnam par mi rtogs mya ngan 'das las gzhan du kha cig gnas pa'i
122a7(rgyud 'grel): yul ni med/ /'di yi de nyid mi shes pa'i/ /slob ma la ni bshad mi bya/ /blo ldan rtogs pa med pa la/ /'di ni shin tu gsang ba sbyin/ /de nas de nyid la gnas pas/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams yang dag mchod/ /mnyam par bzhag pas
122b1(rgyud 'grel): sngon bzhin du/ /rdo rje dril bu de nas sbyin/ /de nas brtsams nas rnal 'byor pa/ /rgyud kun las ni gsungs pa ni/ /ma lus lus pa med pa yi/ /cho ga yis ni dkyil 'khor bri/ /ji ltar mdog par 'dod pa yi/ /rang 'dor lha yi 'jug pa nyid/ /mchog dang
122b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bring dang tha ma ni/ /ji ltar ming? kyis su/ /ji ltar nus pa bzhin du sgrub/ /phran tshogs la sogs pa yi las/ /de yi dngos grub sgrub pa la/ /rang dang gzhan grags the tshom med/ /rdo rje slob dpon dbang bskur ba'o/ /de ltar rdzogs pa'i slob
122b3(rgyud 'grel): ma la/ rjes su gnas pa'i dbang pa'i dbang bstan bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni phyi rol tu/ /khru gnyis dor bar dkyil 'khor bya/ /phyogs kun du ni gru bzhi pa/ /phyogs kun dra bas rgyan pa ni/ /bya ba kun byed phyogs gcig bya/ /de yi dkyil du pad+ma ni/ /sna tshogs
122b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dab ma bri bar bya/ /rdo rje drag dpal gzugs su ni/ /'jam pa'i stan la yang dag gnas/ /de ring pad+ma'i stan la ni/ /mnyam par gzhag pa bsgom par bya/ /de nas slob ma gus can gyis/ /yon gyi mchog ni dbul bar bya/ /rig ma mdzes pa
122b5(rgyud 'grel): dbul bya ste/ /de dang lhan byung byang chub sems/ /mkha' 'gro la sogs rab gtum rnams/ /de dang lhan cig mchod par bya/ /dbang gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa yis/ /slob dpon phyag rgya gsol bar gdab/ /bdag nyid rdo rje can zhes
122b6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /byang chub sems ni bsgom byed pa'o/ /dbang bskur don du gsol ba 'debs/ /slob dpon go 'phang ngo mtshar che/ /skal pa chen po bdag la gsol/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi dbang bskur ba/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub pa/ /gang zhig bdag
122b7(rgyud 'grel): gis sems can kun/ /rnyog med don ni bdag gis bgyi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi don byas pa/ /khyod kyi legs dri brtul zhugs kyis/ /de nas yang ni slob ma la/ /blo ldan 'di ltar gsol ba gdab/ /slob dpon ngag gis langs nas su/ /ri ma
123a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dis dbang bskur rtags pa yin/ /slob ma rang lha'i rnam pa ru/ /ji ltar sngar bzhin bskyed bya ste/ /gnas gsum yig 'bru byin brlabs nas/ pad+ma la gnas bsam par bya/ /slob dpon dpa' bo nus ldan pas/ /de yi
123a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur grub pa'i phyir/ /sngar bsnyen pa yi gsang sngags sam/ /de bzhin yi ge gsum gyi ni/ /sngags pas yungs kar dkar po la/ /lan cig bsngags te brjod pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor pa ni gtor zhing brdeg /de nas rang nyid lha yis
123a3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /bkra shis glu yis sngags ni brjod/ /langs la rig dang bcas pa yis/ /bum pa'i chu yis dag byed cing/ /de nas bla med dbang bskur bya/ /med na bdud rtsi sngas gang ba'i/ /bum pa la ni de bzhin brdeg /rgyal ba dag gis gsungs
123a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ltar/ /rang nyid kyis ni dbang bskur bya/ /gal te nus pa med gyur na/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rgyal mtshan dang/ /gling bu po wang rnga rnams dang/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gs sna tshogs/ /rin chen rgyan gyis mchod pa rnams/ /de bzhin gshegs
123a5(rgyud 'grel): pa yang dag ldan/ /nam mkha' gang par bsgoms par bya/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /'dod chags chen po zhu ba yis/ /de ltar bum pa'i bdud rtsi lngas/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams la sogs pa/ /bdag nyid yongs su bskor bsam
123a6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /rnam rgyal bum pa'i chu yis ni/ /bkra shis glu dang bcas pa yis/ /slob ma 'di ni dbang bskur zhing/ /slob ma la ni 'di brjod bya/ /oM ma hA su kha badzras twa a b+hi She ke Sha twA ma b+hi Shiny+tsa mi sarba ta thA ga ta ad+hi pa ti tAM DriDho? me b+ha bsod?
123a7(rgyud 'grel): d+hya na ma ste/ b+ha ga bAn mahA badzra d+ha ra su ra ta stwaM mahA badzra satwa oM A:hUM/ badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang mkha 'gro dpa' bo yi/ /dbang ni de ltar bskur bzhin par/ /rjes su mthun par bsam nas ni/ /dbang bskur par ni
123b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa yin/ /'dir ni bkra shis tshig bcad ni/ /med pa'i phyir na rgyud gzhan las/ /rjes su mthun pa yang dag blangs/ /mkhas pa yis ni cho ga bya/ /de nas dbu rgyan dar dbyangs sogs/ /gsang pa'i mthar thug dang ldan pa'o/ /shes rab ye shes
123b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba'i/ /de ltar go cha yis ni sbyin/ /de nas stan la gzhag nas su/ /phra zhing snyan tshig 'di brjod do/ /'di ni khyod kyi bzung ba mchog /rtag tu khyod kyis brten par bya/ /sngags pa rang gi byin brlabs pa'i/ /slob ma la ni phyag rgya gtang/ /de lhang
123b3(rgyud 'grel): slob ma dbang bskur ba /slob ma yon tan gtso bor 'gyur/ /brtan pa dang ni g.yo kun gyi/ /'di ni slob dpon du ni 'gyur/ /de nas brtsams te de yi ni/ /gsang pa mchog gi bshad par bya/ /rgyud kun tu ni gang cung zad/ /sbas shing bris pa'i phyag rgyan ni//
123b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor pa yis/ /de nas stan la rab 'dug go/ phyi dang gsang sogs mchod pa yis/ /mchod pa yang dag mchod nas su/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams/ /de ltar yang dag rim pas mchod/ /de nas nga rgyal me
123b5(rgyud 'grel): lo da ni/ /ji bzhin bstan pa 'di bzhin brjod/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /srid po'i mtsho la mngon par brgal/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /khyod kyi sems can rnams la bshad do/ /sgra yi nga rgyal ldan pa yis/ /de ltar
123b6(rgyud 'grel): pi wang sgra brjod par/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /sgra yi rjes su 'gro ba yi/ /shes rab mngon du rtogs gyur cig /gang gis 'jig rten thams cad du/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /kun tu sgra brnyan lta bu yi/ /chos kyi 'khor
123b7(rgyud 'grel): lo bskor par bgyi/ /de yi nga rgyal ldan pa yis/ /snying gar dri sku 'di skad brjod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /skye med lhag par mos gyur cig /gang gis sangs rgyas zhing kun gyi/ /'jig rten pa ni kun gyis kyang/ /rang gis lus
124a1(rgyud 'grel): las bla med pa'i/ /bsam gyis mi khyab dri bro shog /ro yid rgyal ldan pa yis/ /legs par sbyangs pa'i bdud rtsi lnga/ /yang dag gom par bya ba'i phyir/ /tshig gis 'di skad brjod par bya/ /ro kun rang
124a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin med pa'i ngor/ /rnam par mngon du rtogs gyur cig /gang gis sangs rgyas byang sems kun/ /sems can du gyur thams cad la/ /lha rdzas dpe med ro yi mchog /sprul la dbul bar bgyid par shog /reg pa'i nga rgyal ldan
124a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yis/ /rnal 'byor ma ni rnal 'byor brtson/ /rang rig reg bya mngon byas nas/ /reg bya'i de nyid brjod par bya/ /khyod kyis reg bya mi dmigs par/ /lhag par mngon du rtogs gyur cig/ khyod kyis reg pa 'ba' zhig gis/ /khyad
124a4(rgyud 'grel): par rang gis rnam rtog byung/ /sna tshogs bla na med pa yi/ /reg bya'i khyad par mngon rtogs shog /rang gi sems ni yongs gyur pa'i/ /lha rnams dag ni thams cad dang/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' 
124a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad sogs/ /yang dag 'byor pa reg bya yi/ /bde ba dag ni 'byor par shog /de ltar mchod pa byas nas su/ /gser gyi thur ma la sogs la/ /yang ni sngags 'di yis ni sngags/ /oM badzra NetA? a pa ha ra pa Ta laM h+rI:zhes so//
124a6(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyis ni/ /'dug pa la yang 'di skad brjod/ /ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yi/ /'jig rten ling thog gsal ba ltar/ /bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i/ /ling thog rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal/ /de nas slob
124a7(rgyud 'grel): ma'i mig la ni/ /mig sman skud pa'i tshul bya ste/ /sngags pas me long bstan byas la/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid brjod par bya/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/ /bzung du med cing brjod du med
124b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu dang las las kun tu byung/ /rang bzhin med cing brjod du med/ /de ltar chos 'di shes bya ste/ /sems can don ni bla med kyis/ /skyob pa yi ni rigs skyes so/ /de nas sarba ta thA ga ta A nu rA ga ya swa zhes brjod do/ ho yis mda' bzhu
124b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyin par bya/ /de nas de yis gzhan yang ni/ /de bzhin phyogs bzhir mda' bzhi 'phang/ /steng du gcig dang 'og tu ni/ /mnyam par gzhag pas 'phang bar bya/ /badzra satwa A:? nas/ /de nas me long sbyin par bya/ /rnal 'byor lhur
124b3(rgyud 'grel): len slob dpon gyis/ /de la de nyid 'di ltar brjod/ /rdo rje sems pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag rang nyid ni/ /bu khyod kyi ni snying la gnas/ /hUM gis chos kyi 'khor lo ni/ /de mdun de yi stan? du
124b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhag A:dang ldan pas lag g.yas su/ /dung sbyin nas ni 'di skad brjod/ /deng nas brtsams nas 'jig rten du/ /skyob pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo ni/ /'khor lo bla na med pa bskor/ /dri med 'khor los dgang bar bgyi/ /the tshom med pa'i
124b5(rgyud 'grel): sems kyis ni/ /'di las yid gnyis med par mdzod/ /chos kyi tshul mchog spyod pa ni/ /mtshungs med kun tu bstan par gyis/ /sangs rgyas rnams la byas bzo bar/ /'dug pa nyid du brjod pa yin/ /de nas rdo rje 'chang kun gyis/ /khyod ni
124b6(rgyud 'grel): bsrung bar rtag tu gnas/ /de nas de bzhin gzhan nyid kyis/ /blo ldan dam tshig mnyam par gyis/ /thabs dang shes rab sems kyis ni/ /ma bya ba ni ci yang med/ /dog pa med par rtags byed pa/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la sbyor/ /ji lta ji ltar
124b7(rgyud 'grel): sems can kun/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'dul 'gyur ba/ /de lta be? ltar sems can don/ /'dod chags sogs kyis dag par byas/ /gang yang dam tshig la sdang ba/ /skye bo dam tshig nyams pa dag /sangs rgyas bstan pa skyong ba yis//
125a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bad pa yis ni bsad par bya/ /sems can kun la phan don du/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sbyor ba yis/ /pha rol sems ni 'phrog gyur yang/ /sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /'dod chags lta bu bde med pas//
125a2(rgyud 'grel): de ni skye 'gro la rtag sbyin/ /sems can don du gzhan bud med/ /bsten pa las ni bsod nams 'thob/ /sangs rgyas la sogs smos pa la/ /rin chen 'byung ldan rnal 'byor gyis/ /tshig rtsub sbyor ba byas nas ni/ /bla na med pa'i dngos grub med
125a3(rgyud 'grel): 'od dpag med pa'i brdzun tshig smra/ /don yod grub pa'i ting 'dzin mchog/ rgyud gsungs cho ga blo ldan gyis/ /dam tshig dag pa bsten par bya/ /de nas he ru ka dpal zhes/ /sogs pa yang na rang gis bstod/ /thal mo sbyar nas phyag byas la/ /yang?
125a4(rgyud 'grel): ni slob ma nyid la brjod/ /sems can kun la phan don du/ /sems can kun la thams cad du/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs kyis/ /rdo rje chos 'khor bskor bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bas rgyal/ /kun gyi bdag po zhes bya ba'i/ /rdo
125a5(rgyud 'grel): rje 'khor lo bskor bar gyis/ /zhes pas rjes su gnang ba yis/ /dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o/ /de ltar byas nas de rjes su/ /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor du ni zhugs/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni bltas nas su/ /sngags kyis bskul ba brjod par bya /ting 'dzin
125a6(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags rgyal po yis/ /gsang ba sbyin pa bsam bya ste/ /rgyud 'dir brjod pa'i dam rdzas ni/ /mkhas pa yis? ni bza' bar bya/ de nas 'di ltar byung ba dang/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag rnal 'byor brtson/ /rdo rje ming ni dbang bskur ba'i/ /de
125a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs par lung bstan bya/ /de'i? dir rim pa shes bya ste/ /rdo rje drag dpag gzugs su ni/ /de bzhin slob ma nyid kyang gnas/ /rang ni bdag po rnal 'byor ldan/ /lag pa g.yon pa chos gos na/ de bzhin 'dzin pa yin tshul/ /mchog
125b1(rgyud 'grel): ? pa yi tshul gyis g.yas/ /mnyam par gzhag pas 'di skad brjod/ /da yis deng khyod lung bstan yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /ngan 'gro sring pa dag las gton/ /srid pa shin tu ngag phyir ro/ /kye? dpal rdo rje che ge mo/ /de bzhin gshegs
125b2(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad grub/ /sa ma ya s+thaM? zhes pa'o/ /phyag rgya chen po 'di dang ni/ /gang gis cho ga 'di yis ni/ /lung bstan par ni byas pa gang/ /he ru ka la sogs lta dang/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'khor gnas pa'i/ /
125b3(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig sbyor pas mgrin gcig gis/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub brtan zung bstan/ /gsang chen mchog gis dam pa yi/ /'di ltar phyag rgya chen po yis/ /'di yis byin gyis brlabs dang ni/ /stobs nyid dag ni 'di dag la/ /de la dang pa ru ni
125b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis/ /de ltar brjod nas de rjes su/ /yang dag dbugs dbyung sbyin par bya/ /gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du/ /mthong ba dang ni zhugs pa yis/ /mig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /de ring khyod ni legs par gnas/ /bde chen theg pa
125b5(rgyud 'grel): 'di la ni/ /phyin chad 'chi ba yod min te/ /mi mtshungs pa dang mi shigs par/ /'jigs pa med par dga' bar rol/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod 'das/ /srid pa shin tu dag phyir ro/ /dngos grub dam tshig sdom par ni/ /khyod kyis 'dir
125b6(rgyud 'grel): ni rtag tu bzung/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin brjod/ /bka' 'di rtag pa mchog yin no/ /rdo rje zhes bya'i phyag rgya gang/ /byang chub sems ni gtang mi bya/ /gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom med/ /dam pa'i chos
125b7(rgyud 'grel): ni mi spang zhing/ /nam yang btang bar mi bya'o/ /ma shes pa 'am rmongs pa yis/ /de yis nongs na bshags par bya/ /rang gi bdag nyid mi spangs zhing/ /dka' thub kyis ni gdung mi bya/ /ji ltar bde bas bde ba bzung/ /'di ni ma 'ongs rdzogs sangs
126a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya rnams/ /nam yang btang bar mi bya'o/ /slob dpon smad par mi bya ste/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /gang zhig slob dpon smod pa ni/ /sangs rgyas kun la smad pas na/ /'di yis rtag tu
126a2(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal 'thob /rims dang dug dang dbyig dug dang/ /mkha' 'gro gza' yi 'tshe ba dang/ /bgegs dang log 'dren drag po yis/ /bsad nas sems can dmyal bar skye/ /de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje slob dpon bla ma che/ /dge ba
126a3(rgyud 'grel): rab tu mi spyod pa/ /nam du yang ni mi smad do/ /bla ma la ni rjes mthun yon/ /gus dang bcas pas dbul bar bya/ /de nas rims sogs gnod pa rnams/ /slar yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rang gi dam tshig slob dpon ni/ /rang srog gis kyang
126a4(rgyud 'grel): brten bya ni/ /sbyin min bu dang chung ma dang/ /longs spyod g.yo ba smos ci dgos/ /bskal pa bye ba du mar ni/ /grangs med par yang rnyed dka' ba'i/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang brtson ldan la/ /cho 'di nyid la ster bar bya/ /rtag tu rang gi dam tshig bsrung//
126a5(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par? rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul/ /de sbyin sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /rtag tu byin pa nyid du 'gyur/ de las bsod nams tshogs yin te/ /tshogs las dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur/ /de ring bdag
126a6(rgyud 'grel): skyes 'bras bur bcas/ /de ring bdag ni legs par gnas/ /lha dang dam tshig mnyam pa ru/ /gyur par bdag ni the tshom med/ /tshe ldan de ring dbang bskur bas/ /rdo rje 'chang bcas sangs rgyas kun/ /khams gsum gyis ni rgyal srid
126a7(rgyud 'grel): che/ /bdag po rgyal por gnas pa'o/ /grong khyer mchog tu zhugs pa yis/ /de ring bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur /de ring sangs rgyas nyid thob par/ /khyod ni the tshom med pa yin/ /rang gi dam tshig mi zad par 'gyur thar pa ni/ /
126b1(rgyud 'grel): bsten bya yid kyi drin gyi rdo rje skye bar gyis /shin tu skye sla'i bde ba sangs rgyas kun gzugs sku/ /rtag pa de ni khyod kyis rtog par rab gyur cig /ces bya'o/ /bla ma yi ni zhabs gnyis la/ /slob ma yis ni phyag 'tshal te/ /ji ltar gsungs pa
126b2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs kun/ /rjes su bgyid ces dag gis brjod/ /de ltar dam bcas byas pa yi/ /slob ma la ni phan nyid dang/ /sngar brjod pa yis rim pa yis/ /rdo rje dril bu brtul zhugs sbyin/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i phyag
126b3(rgyud 'grel): na gnas/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang/ phyag na rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM sarba ta thA gA ta sid d+hi badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha twaM d+hA ra yA mi badzra satwa hi hi hi hi hUM zhes bya'o/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya/ /'di brjod pas na dril bu sbyin/
126b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab dbyangs kyis rjes 'greng bshad/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bsrung/ /byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed/ /de nas spos dang me tog sogs/ /bkra shis spyod pas brgyan byas te/ /mgo por gdugs ni
126b5(rgyud 'grel): bzung nas su/ /de nas bla ma rang nyid kyis/ /rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa yi/ /slob ma de la skor byed gzhug /sngags pas 'di ltar du ni brjod/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyis bskor ba yis/ /mnga' bdag mdog sngon rgyal gyur cig /dmar pos ji ltar
126b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzes byas rgyal gyur cig /dam tshig gis brgyan bzhes pa rgyal gyur cig /zla phyed mgo bor brgyan pa rgyal gyur cig /lha mo'i 'khor los brgyan pa rgyal gyur cig /dang po sangs rgyas sku mchog gnas pa rgyal gyur cig /'dod dang thar pa nor
126b7(rgyud 'grel): dang chos sbyin rgyal gyur cig /rnam pa lnga la dga' rol rang sbyin rgyal gyur cig /phyag na rdo rje bde ba'i mgon po rgyal gyur cig /de nas sgo yi mdun du ni/ /gdugs dang bcas pas phyag bya'o/ /slob ma la ni 'di brjod bya/ /
127a1(rgyud 'grel): slob ma rgyud 'dzin por 'gyur ro/ /de ltar brjod nas de yi tshe/ /slob dpon lag gis gdugs gsal nas/ /slob ma de nyid bslad nas su/ /de nang 'di ni nyam du gzhug /de ring dkyil 'khor slob dpon dang/ /sngags
127a2(rgyud 'grel): dang rgyud ni khyod kyis bzung/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /lha rnams kyis kyang mthun par 'dod/ /khyod kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin/ /'bad pa yid ni bri byas la/ /sgrub pa po rnams sngags la sbyor/ /de la bu khyod kyis bya bas/
127a3(rgyud 'grel): dka' las chen po byung gyur kyang/ /sems can rnams la mi phan pa'i/ /bya kun ser sna mi bya kun/ /zhi ba'i don du mkhas pa yis/ /sbyin sreg gi ni cho ga bya/ /de nas sbyin sreg rdzogs nas su/ /bla ma yis ni yon blangs te//
127a4(rgyud 'grel): gser dang dngul dang rin chen sogs/ /rta dang glang po rgyal srid do/ /slob mas kyang ni de rjes su/ /bcom ldan dam tshig nyid kyis ni/ /he ru ka dpal shes rab che/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo sdom/ /zhes bya sems la sdom gnas nas/
127a5(rgyud 'grel): skor ba lan gsum byas nas su/ /lus kun yan lag gtug byas te/ /ji ltar sngar bzhin phyag bya'o/ /bdag rang bla ma la phul nas/ /mchod pa yis ni mchod par bya/ /ji srid bla ma dgyes par du/ /de srid bla ma mnyes par bya/ /
127a6(rgyud 'grel): gang gang cung zhig yid 'ong ba/ /shin tu khyad par can de nyid/ /de nyid mi zad 'dod pa yis/ /de dang de ni bla ma dbul/ /gang gis shin tu btang dka' ba/ /de byin dpag med yin par 'dod/ /de ltar gang zhig dbang bskur ba/ /de ni
127a7(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon yin par brjod/ /de la gsang sngags byin pa yis/ /dngos grub 'dir ni the tshom med/ /de nas oM badzra sadwa sogs/ /rdo rje glu ni brjod par bya/ /rdo rje gar gyi sbyor ba yis/ /sgeg mo sogs kyis mchod par bya/ /'dod pa'i
127b1(rgyud 'grel): yon tan lngas kyang ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rab mchod de/ /ci bde bar ni slob ma kun/ /mchod pa byas nas mkhyen par gsol/ /ji ltar rang gi 'dod pa yis/ /spos la sogs pa mchod par bya/ /ji ltar 'byor bar gyur pa yis/ /zhugs
127b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i slob mas bza' bca' dang/ /rnam pa sna tshogs ro dang zas/ /gzi bar nus pa'i chang dang ni/ /gang zhig rgyud gzhan grags pa yis/ /glu dang skra yi mchod pa rnams/ /mchod pa'i sgra ni dbul bar bya/ /bla ma yang dag bde bar mchod/ /
127b3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du yang gsungs pa ni/ /chang bcas chang min btung ba dang/ /ji ltar 'dod pas longs spyod par/ /ji bzhin rim pas bsgom par bya/ /de nyid gsang ba'i glu chen po/ /bde ba'i sgra dang gar kyang bya/ /dga' ba'i rol pa sna tshogs
127b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /gtso bo la sogs kun mchod nas/ /de nas mang po bsam bya zhing/ /sngar bzhin du ni brjod par bya/ /kun la dam tshig byin nas ni/ /ji ltar dgar 'os nger ni btang/ /de nas phyi rol mchod pa dang/ /yid kyis mchod pa gtso bo
127b5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /sngags pa gus pa yis ni mchod/ /yang ni nyi ma shar dus su/ /he ru ka dpal ye shes che/ /zhes bya la sogs tshig gis ni/ /ji ltar yang dag bstod nas phyis/ /rgyal pa rnams la mkhyen par gsol/ /so so skye bor gyur gang dang/ /
127b6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ma thob gang gis dang/ /nye bar mkho pa med pa dang/ /brjed dang shes bzhin ma yin pas/ /cung zhig cho ga nyer mtshang/ /de dag bkru zhing bzong par 'os/ /de ltar gsol ba btab nas ni/ /de nas 'dis ni gshes su gsol
127b7(rgyud 'grel): oM khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang/ /slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM badzra mu(rgyud 'grel): de nas tshogs pa rtogs byas la/ /ye shes
128a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi ni dkyil 'khor gtso/ /zhal ni dgod cing tshim pa yis/ /slob dpon slob ma'i yon tan brjod/ /rang gi 'od kyis sems can kun/ /rang rang phyogs su brten nas su/ /de bzhin ji ltar 'dod pa yis/ /rang gi 'od kyis gsal bar
128a2(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ /de nas ji ltar spros pa yi/ /gus pas lha yi dkyil 'khor ni/ /rang gi lus la gzhug par bya/ /de nas mkhas pas phur bu gdon/ /sngags ni/ oM badzra kI li kAM la ya sarba bi dyAn badzra d+ha ra Adz+nyA ya hUM hUM phaT/ zhes bya'o/ /de la byin gyis
128a3(rgyud 'grel): brlabs pa yi/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rdul tshon cha/ /de la spos la sogs pa yis/ /yang ni yang dag mchod nas ni/ /blo ldan gyis ni gshegs su gsol/ /A kA ro mu khaM la sogs pa/ /brjod nas de don mngon du bya/ /mnyam par bzhag
128a4(rgyud 'grel): pa mi dmigs bya/ /gtso bo rang gi snying gar gnas/ /mchod nas de bzhin bstong byas la/ /de nas rnal 'byor nye bar bsdu/ /tshon rtsi chu bo 'am rgya mtsho 'am/ /de nyid du ni dor bar bya/ /de nas sa ni yang dag par/ /ba yi lci bas byugs byas te/ /bdag
128a5(rgyud 'grel): dang slob ma de bzhin sogs/ /phan pa'i phyir na sbyin sreg bya/ /de nas kyang ni sngags pas kyang/ /de bzhin du ni phur bu ba/ don/ /legs par khrus ni byas nas su/ /bdag med par ni bsgom par bya/ /de nas phyis ni slob dpon gyis/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni yo
128a6(rgyud 'grel): byang kun/ /rang nyid kyis ni longs spyod bya/ /slob ma la ni mi bgo'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni yo byang kun/ /slob dpon gyi ni rig pa yin/ /dam tshig can gang slong gyur na/ /slob ma la ni ni dman yang gus par gyur pa yis/ /'di dag mdzos par rab tu /'khor lo
128a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa ru ni ma byas sems/ /des na de la bdag sems zhugs gyur pas/ /lhag dang chang don mkhas pa rnams kyis shes/ /blo ni dman yang gus par gyur pa yis/ /'di dag mdzes par rab tu byas pa yin/ /rang gi yul la skyon dang yon tan na/ /mi bya
128b1(rgyud 'grel): dad pa yis ni phye ba yin/ /'dir ni mchog gi khur chen dpa' bo dang/ /yang ni dpa' bo rnams kyi dpa' bo yang/ /de phyir legs bstan dam tshig bcas pa yis/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis bdag la bzod par 'os/ /don dang gzhung 'di mdzes par byas 'di yis/
128b2(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams kyis ni 'gro ba rnams la ni/ /yun rings 'jigs pa med par dga' ba dang/ /bdag gzhan bde ba mchog ni bskyed gyur cing/ /de nyid gsal skye rmongs pa rab 'joms shing/ /mchog tu mi 'jigs ster ba'i mnga' bdag shog /nor ni ma lus bskyed
128b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gzhi/ /skyed pa'i sa ni lang ka ste/ /rgyal ba'i zhabs kyis byas pa la/ /mdza' ni bzang po'i ming gsal byas/ /nyon mongs tshogs ni spangs pa yi/ /legs par bstan pa'i blo gros kyis/ /yon tan tshogs ni rjes rtogs pas/ /rdzogs par byas kyis bsam par
128b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis/ /dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga tshigs su bcad pa dgu brgya pa/ slob dpon rgyal ba bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyis mkhan po paN+Ti ta 'jam dpal dang/ bod kyis lo tsa ba dge slong ba ris?
128b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //lhan cig skyes pa'i bde mchog bzhugs// */ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI si ha dza saM ba ra swa tiSh+Tha nA ma/ bed skad du/ /dpal ldan cig skyes pa'i bde ba'i mchog /bdag byin gyis rlab pa zhes
128b6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor rnam gsum shes bya ste/ byin gyis brlabs dang rab rtags dang/ /rdzogs pa gzugs brnyan bsam med do/ /shin tu brtson ldan dpa' bo des/ /skad cig gcig gis sbyor ba yis/ /bde chen lhan cig skyes pa'i
128b7(rgyud 'grel): sku/ /mkha' ltar dga' ba'i rang nyid las/ /shin tu bla ma'i rnal 'byor bya/ /la la ra sa d+hU tI yang/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med sku/ /a haM bde ba'i rnam pa can/ /chengs pa'i 'khor lo rdzogs par bsgom/ /srog ni 'dzin par byed pa ste/ /rtog
129a1(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad legs par bsnga/ /nyi ma zla pa'i 'phen sdud kyang/ /sbyor ba bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /rdub pa dgang zhing btang ba yin/ /bag chags bsregs pa'i me dpung gis/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten g.yo bar byed/ /'bar

129a7(rgyud 'grel): bsam mo/ /'od zer de nyid kyis sems can thams cad gsal bar byas la/ /tshad med pa bzhi bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i rjes su chos thams cad stong pa nyid du sngags 'dis bsgom par bya'o/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud d+ha:sarba d+harmA:swa b+ha ba bi
129b1(rgyud 'grel): shud d+honyahaM/ de'i rjes su oM shud+d+hA tA dz+nyA na badzra swa ? ba At+mako haM zhes brjod pas/ snying ga'i nyi ma'i steng du/ hUM ye shes lnga'i ngo bo gsal ba nyid du dmigs par bya'o/ /'od zer spros te bgegs bsregs la/ snying ga'i hUM yongs su gyur pa las/ rdo rje

130a3(rgyud 'grel): po nA ro pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal he ru ka'i sgrub thabs bzhugs/ /rgya gar sbad du/ /sh+rI he ru ka sA d+ha ni nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal he ru ka'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag
130a4(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das sdud cing/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das la bzhugs/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo sgyur/ /dpa' bo rmad byung che la 'dud/ /lte ba'i dbus las byung zhing phra/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs la gnas/ /mkha' 'gro

130a7(rgyud 'grel): nas dang por snying ga yi/ /pad+mar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /de'i dbus su yi ge ni/ /thugs las byung ba rnam par bsgom/ /de yi lus ngag yid kyi ni/ /chos rnams stong pa nyid du bsgom/ /'od kyis bla ma rang lha dang/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni

130b2(rgyud 'grel): byams dang snying rje dang/ /dga' dang btang snyoms bsgoms par bya/ /gang phyir gnyid log sang pa yi/ /bye brag gsal bar mi dmigs pas/ /de phyir sems kyi rnam 'phrul ni/ /'di dag thams cad log pa yin/ /gcig dang du mas rnam dpyad na//

130b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di brtan par byed pa yi/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud d+ha:sarba d+harmA:swa b+hA ba shud+d+honyahaM/ oM shU n+ya tA sarba d+harmA swa b+hA ba shUd+d+honyahaM/ de nas pa byung pad+ma dang/ /raM las byung ba nyi dkyil du/ /hUM las khro bos rdo rje ni/ /spro ba'i bdag

130b6(rgyud 'grel): g+ha(rgyud 'grel): g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya sarba duSh+TAM phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya sarba pA paM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badzra kI la badzra d+ha ra Adz+nyA pa ya tre kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzra kI la ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra mung+ga ra badzra kI la A ko ta ya hUM phaT/ phur bu gdab cing brdung ba yi/ /de yis
130b7(rgyud 'grel): glags skabs mi rnyed phyir/ /rdo rje dra ba bsams par bya/ /de yi nang du chos dbyings ni/ /b+ha ga'i dbyings su rnam par bsam/ /rlung dang me chu sa rnams kyi/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni bsam par bya/ /de rnams steng du ri rab ste/ /de yi steng du hUM byung bsam/ /rlung
131a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs yongs su gyur pa las/ /gzhal yas khang ni nyid gyur pa/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ /dra ba dra phyed chun phyang dang/ /me long la sogs rnams kyis brgyan/ /dbus su sna tshogs
131a2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma yis/ /mdzes byas pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad/ /lte ba la ni 'jigs byed dang/ /dus mtshan dag ni rab tu bsgom/ /phyogs kyi 'dab mo bzhi po la/ /ro ni gdan gyi gzugs can yin/ /'dab ma gzhan la bdud rtsis gang/ /snod ni bum pa la

132b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa'o/ /'di rnams phyag g.yas gri gug ste/ /g.yon na bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'i/ /thod pa nyid dang kha TwAM ga /sku gsung thugs rnams dag rtsol rnams/ /de yi phyi rol thugs 'khor lo/ /rdo rje phreng ba nag pos bskor/ /phyogs mtshams cha

132b7(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshin rje mche ba can/ /dmar dang ser bar shes par bya/ /gzhan yang gshin rje 'joms ma ni/ /ser dang nag por rab tu bshad/ /dang po'i lha mo g.yon skor te/ /de bzhin gzhan dag g.yas skor yin/ /de lta bu yi 'khor lo che//
133a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid dang ni bcas par bsgom/ /rab gtum ma dang gtum pa'i mig /'od ldan ma dang sna chen ma/ /dpa' bo'i blo ma mi'u thub ma/ /lang ka'i dbang phyug shing grib ma/ /sa srungs ma dang 'jigs chen
133a2(rgyud 'grel): ma/ /rlung gi shugs ma chang 'thung ma/ /sngo bsangs ma dang rab bzang ma/ /rta rnam dang bya gdong ma/ /'khor lo shugs ma dum skyes ma/ /sna chen 'khor lo'i lam mo dang/ /shin tu dpa' mo stobs chen ma/ /'phor les bsgyur ba stobs chen

133a5(rgyud 'grel): dang mig dang ni/ /de bzhin du ni dpung mgo gnyis/ /mchan khung gnyis dang nu ma gnyis/ /lte ba dang ni sna rtse gnyis /kha dang lkog mar rnam dgong cing/ /snying ga dang ni mtshan nyid dang/ /gsang gnas gzhang? kha de bzhin brla/ /byin pa sor mo
133a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang ni/ /rkang mthil de bzhin mthe bo dang/ /bus mo dag la rim bzhin gnas/ /bul+lI ra dang dzA lan d+ha/ /u rgyan de bzhin arbud/ /gtso bo'i gnas su gyur pa yin/ /da yis sngar bshad bzhi po gzhan/ /mtshams su gnas par
133a7(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa yang/ /nye ba'i gnas kyi steng na bzhugs/ /go dA ba dir gyur pa cig /rA me shwa rar gnas gnyis pa/ /de bi ko Ta ma la ber/ /lha mo gzhan gnyis gnas pa yin/ /kA ma rU pa o drer ni/ /zhing gi gtso mo gnyis gnas so/ /ko? sa tri
133b1(rgyud 'grel): sha ku nar bcas/ /nye ba'i zhing gtogs gzhan dag gnas/ /ka ling+ga dang lam+ba ka /tshando har bshad pa ru gzhan/ /kany+tsi dang ni gsang can duAng/ /nye ba'i tshando har gtogs nas/ /gri ha de ba ta de bzhin/ /pre ta pu rir bcas par ni/ /'dus
133b2(rgyud 'grel): par gtogs pa gzhan gnas so/ /su bar+Na dwI par bcas pa'o/ /sau rASh+Ta ni nye ba yi/ /'dus par bshad de gzhan dag gnas/ /nA gang sing d+hu'i yul dag ni/ /dur khrod yin te gnyis rtag gnas/ /ma ro nyid dang ku lu ta/ /gang yang lha mo
133b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gnas der/ /nye ba'i dur khrod yin zhes bya/ /des 'dis yi dbang phyug ma/ /sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po ni/ /'khor lo'i rnam par rtag du bzhugs/ /thugs gsung sku yi dbye ba yi/ /'jig rten gsum na rnam par grol/ /mtho
133b4(rgyud 'grel): ris sa bla sa 'og tu/ /skad cig gis ni sku gcig 'gyur/ /pu dza o a gau ra de mA/ /kA o tri ko ka la ka hi/ /pre gri sau su nA si ma ku/ /gzugs ni rnam snang yin zhes bya/ /tshor ba rdo rje nyi ma yin/ /'du shes pad+ma gar dbang
133b5(rgyud 'grel): phyug /'du byed rdo rje rgyal po'o/ /rnam shes phung por gyur pa yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rtag tu bzhugs/ /he ru ka dpal mgon rang nyid/ /gsang ba mchog gis dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /'di ni ngag par rab
133b6(rgyud 'grel): ti bshad/ /mig gnyis gti mug rdo rjer 'gyur/ /rna ba zhe sdang rdo rje 'dzin/ /sna ni phrag dog rdo rje ste/ /kha ni 'dod chags rdo rje 'dzin/ /reg pa ser sna rdo rje ste/ /yid ni rdo rje 'dzin dbang po/ /he ru ka dpal bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin
133b7(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa nyid du bzhugs/ /sa ni ltung byed ma zhes bya /gsong ma chu yi khams yin te/ /me ni 'gugs ma yin par bshad /gar dbang rlung du bshad pa yin/ /nam mkha' i khams ni rnal 'byor ma/ /pad+ma'i dra ba yin par bshad/ /phung po khams
134a1(rgyud 'grel): dang skye mched kyi/ /dag pa yin par 'di bshad do/ /rdo rje gsum la yid gsum dgong/ /ye shes yi ge he ba dza/ /mdzub mo mdung byas gung mo sbyar/ /mthe bo rdo rje brtan por sbyar/ /de ni dpral ba'i dbus gzhag
134a2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /bcu zhing bskor bas bskor bar bya/ /rkang pa mnan cing steng du blta'o/ /gyen du phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing/ /phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i/ /dpa' po rnal 'byor ma rnams 'gugs/ /phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che/ /kun spyod
134a3(rgyud 'grel): cho ga las bshad de/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor mas/ 'jig rten gsum yang sgrub par byed/ /oM sarba pI ra yo gi ni kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ oM badzra shud+d+hanyahaM(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harmmA? yo
134a4(rgyud 'grel): ga shu da d+honyahaM/ oM ha dpal rdo rje sems dpa' / /snying gar rnam par dgod par bya/ /na ma hi ni rnam snang mdzad/ /mgo bor gnas par rnam par bsam/ /swAhA hu ni pad gar dbang/ /spyi gtsug tu ni yongs su bsgom/ /bauSh+Ta ha ni
134a5(rgyud 'grel): phrag pa ru/ /dpal ldan he ru kar bsam bya/ /hUM hUM ho n rdo rje nyi/ /mig u rnam par dkod par bya/ /phaT haM yan lag thams cad du/ /mtshon char rta mchog rnam par bsam/ /dpa' bo thams cad 'di nyid kyis/ /yan lag dug
134a6(rgyud 'grel): gis rab tu dgang/ /oM baM rdo rje phag mo ni/ /lte ba'i phyogs su bsam par bya/ /haM yaM ya mi ni snying gar/ /h+rIM moM rmongs byed ma kha la/ /h+rEM h+rIM skyong byed ma spyi bor/ /hUM hUM skrag byed ma spyi gtsug /phaT phaT yan lag kun mtshon char//
134a7(rgyud 'grel): gtum mo yongs su bsgom par bya/ /rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad kyi/ /cho ga 'di nyid yin par bshad/ /de nas dngos grub kun rtsol ba'i/ /bde gshegs rnams lo dbang bskur gsol/ /ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni/ /de bzhin
134b1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs kun khrus gsol ba/ /de bzhin bdag gis lha yi chu/ /dag pa yis ni khrus bgyi'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya sh+ri ye hUM /rnal 'byor pa ni dbang bskur 'gyur/ /dpal ldan mi bskyod cod pan can/ /snying ga'i sa
134b2(rgyud 'grel): bon 'od lcags kyus/ /sangs rgyas bkug nas zhu tshul du/ /bdag gnas pa spu'i bu ga las/ /mchod pa'i lha mor bdag cag spro/ /de nas rkang pa brgyad sngags kyis/ /dbye ba rnam par spangs te bstod/ /bdag nyid lha yi gzugs can te//
134b3(rgyud 'grel): chos kun ba yi bdag nyid can/ /de nas rlung me pad+mar ni/ /rang 'byung dang ni bzhi mnyam dang/ /gla rtsi dang ni ga bur dang/ /rta mchog gis ni yang dag brgyan/ /hUM gi rdo rje dkar legs dpyad/ /a yis rab tu rtogs byas shing/ /oM gyi 'od gyis
134b4(rgyud 'grel): 'bar gyur par/ /byin gyis brlabs nas mngon par bza' / /rang lce pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/ /hUM byung rdo rje dkar po dgong/ /phyi nang bdag nyid can gyi gzugs/ /'khor lo de yis rang tshim bya/ /'khor lo bzhir ni rab brtags pa/ /'khor lo ma lus kun
134b5(rgyud 'grel): dbyad bya/ /dpa' bo sa bon lce ru bsam/ /a ba d+hu tI'i gnas de la/ /rkan gyi phyogs su lce sbyar la/ /byas nas rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom/ /rkan gyi phyogs su gyur lha mo/ /bzhi pa yi ni gsum pa la/ /brgyad pa'i dang po bcu drug pa/ /dang po'i 'og
134b6(rgyud 'grel): ma sa bon yin/ /man ngag dag ni 'di nyid kyis/ /spros pa med pa'i gnas rtogs 'gyur/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i gsang sngags ni/ /chog bzhin du bzlas par bya/ /mgon po'i snying po 'am yang na ni/ /de yi nye ba'i snying po 'am/ /lha mo'i snying po
134b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ka ni/ /ji srid mi skyo bar du bzlas/ /de nas rnal 'byor mas lha yi/ /rnam pa byang chub phyogs su bsgom/ /lus dang tshor ba chos dang sems/ /dran pa nyer gzhag dngos las byung/ /mkha' 'gro de bzhin lA ma dang/ /dum skyes gzugs can ma rnamS
135a1(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /'dun dang brtson 'grus dpyod pa dang/ /sems nyid bzhi par gyur pa ste/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang po bzhi po las/ /rab gtum la sogs gzhir 'gyur ro/ /dad dang brtson 'grus dran bsam gtan/ /de las gzhan pa bzhi

135a4(rgyud 'grel): ma/ /yang dag las ni khwa gdong ma/ /yang dag 'tsho ba 'ug gdong 'gyur/ /yang dag stsol ba khyi gdong can/ /yang dag dran pa pag gdong yin/ /ting nge 'dzin du bcom ldan bzhugs/ / dge ba'i chos ni bskyed pa la/ /gshin rje brten

135a6(rgyud 'grel): ltar bsgom pa dag gyur nas/ /mnyam par bzhag ste bzlas brjod bya/ /ci nus par ni bzlas byas na/ /de yi 'og tu gtor ma dbul/ /sngar bshad pa yi cho ga yis/ /lha rnams dgos pa sngon 'gro can/ /dpa' bos khams rnams rnam spyad nas//

135b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan ni mi bya'o/ /rkang pa brgyad kyis mgon po mtshed/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs rang ming lus/ /oM dang hUM gnyis ming spel la/ /mthar yang hUM phaT sbyar bar bya/ /'khor lo gsum gnas rnal 'byor ma/ /ka ra ka ra sogs pa la
135b3(rgyud 'grel): mchod/ /'dir ni tshig ni thams cad kyang/ /snga ma'i tshul gyis spel bar bya/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te bI re shA ya dang por bri/ /mahA ka lpAg ni'i sgra dang/ /sammi b+hA ya de rjes bri/ /de nas dza TA ma ku Ta/ /u? TA yi sgra pri bya/ /daMSh+TA? ka rA lo
135b4(rgyud 'grel): gla dang/ /b+hISha? Na mu khA ya bri/ /sa ha sra b+hu dza'i sgra rjes la/ d+hA su rA ya bri bar bya/ /parshu pA sha hya ta dang/ /shU la kha TwAM ga d+ha ri Na/ /byA gah+ra'i sgra dang dzi na'i tshig /aM ba ra d+ha rA ya bri/ /mahA d+hu ? ka ra/ /de rjes ba spu ShA ya bri//
135b5(rgyud 'grel): thog mar oM dang tha mar phaT/ bar du hUM hUM nges par sbyar/ /sngags ni rkang pa brgyad ces bya/ /la la tshig re'i mdza' ru sbyar/ /ka ra'i sgra dang de bzhin du/ /ku ru'i sgra yang gnyis su bya/ /ban d+ha trA sa ya gnyis te/ /k+Sho b+ha ya
135b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis de bzhin du/ /h+raM h+roM h+ra(rgyud 'grel): h+ra(rgyud 'grel): pheM pheM dang/ phaT dang da ha'i tshig gnyis bya/ /pa tsa b+hak+Sha'i tshig gnyis/ /ba sa thu ngu nges par sbyar/ /ru d+hi ran+t+ra'i tshig gnyis dang/ /mA lA ba lampi ne dang/ /grih+Na grih+Na de bzhin
135b7(rgyud 'grel): du/ /sapta bA tA la ga ta/ b+hu dza ga sarpaM? bA brjod/ /tardza? dza ya yang lan gnyis brjod/ /A kaDdya? A kand+hya? dang/ h+raM h+raM dz+nyau dz+nyau nges par sbyar/ /k+Sh+maM k+Sh+maM haM haM dang/ hUM hUM ki li ki li dang/ si li si li hi li gnyis/ /d+hi li 
136a1(rgyud 'grel): d+hi li hUM gnyis phaT/ /bcas pas rtsa ba'i sngags su bshad/ /oM sh+rI badzra he he dang/ /ru ru kaM yang de nas brjod/ /hUM DA ki ni dzA la saM/ /bar zhes bya ba yang bri/ /swAhA'i mthar bcas mgon po yi/ /snying po'i
136a2(rgyud 'grel): yi ge nyi shu gnyis/ /de dang nye ba'i yi ge bdun/ /go bzlog pa yi bzung bar bya/ /Ta pha hUM hUM ha ha h+rI(rgyud 'grel): oM/ /phag mo'i gsang sngags gnyis ka yang/ /lugs las bzlog par shes par bya/ /hA swA Ta pha hUM hUM ye nI r+N+Na wa dzra ba ye nI
136a3(rgyud 'grel): ki DA d+ha dbu rbas oM/ /'bum bzlas pa yis 'grub 'gyur te/ /'phral du yid ches byed pa yin/ /mtshams kun du ni gtor ma dag /kun sbyong rgyud las bshad bzhin bya/ /oM a ra li ho dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM ba ho badzra DA ki ni sa ma ya stwa?
136a4(rgyud 'grel): dri sh+ya ho/ /oM kha kha khA hi khA hi sarba yak+Sha rAk+Sha ra b+hu ta pre ta pi shA tsenmA dA pasmA ra badzra DA ki n+ya da ya/ /i maM ba li grih+NaM tu/ sa ma maM rak+ShaM tu /sarba sid+hi mme pra yats+tsha tu/ ya thai baM/ ya theSh+TaM/ b+huny+dzan+tu/ bi ban+tu /mA ti kra man+tu/ ma ma sarba ka ra ta

136b1(rgyud 'grel): pa ma lus myur du sel bar mdzad/ /'khor bar rgyu bar mdzad cing 'khor ba'i nang du gnas mi bzod/ /de ltar ngo mtshar spyod yul bcom ldan gtum chen skur ldan phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dpal he ru ka'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ slob dpon rin chen

136b3(rgyud 'grel): sh+rI tsakra saM ba ra maN+Dal maM ga la gA thA /bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa/ dpal 'khor lo bde mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bkra shis gang zhig chos kyi dbyings las nges byung zhing/ he ru ka dpal

136b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i snod bzhi dpa' po'i zhal la reg par spyod/ /bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog /bkra shis gang zhig nam mkha' i gnas nas legs spyod pa'i/ /'khor lo sngon po rtsibs brgyad mu khyud rdo rje'i phreng/ /gnas la sogs par
136b7(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo dpa' mo gnyis med rol/ /bden po nges kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog /bkra shis gang zhig sa steng gnas nas legs spyod pa'i/ /'khor lo dmar po rtsibs brgyad mu khyud padmo'i phreng/ /zhing la sogs par dpa' bo dpa' mo

137a2(rgyud 'grel): be dpa' mo gnyis med rol/ /bden pa nges kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog /bkra shis gang zhig dkyil 'khor sgo bzhi mtshams rnams su/ /khwa gdong la sogs ma mo yid 'phrog gzugs gnyis ldan/ /thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don

137a5(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs 'phyar/ /bden pa nges kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog /bkra shis gang zhig rta babs pad+ma chos kyi 'khor lo gdugs/ /mchos? pa'i ri dags dang bcas ba dan bar? drug legs 'phyar zhing/ /rlung gis spyod pa'i dril bu
137a6(rgyud 'grel): dag la chos kyi sgra 'byung ba/ /bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog /bkra shis gang zhig yongs su bskor ba'i dur khrod brgyad rnams su/ /phyogs skyong shing chen mchod rten brgyad ni gnas pa la/ /gdong brnyan ljon? zhing zhing sbyong
137a7(rgyud 'grel): brgyad? ni kun nas gnas gyur pa/ /bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog /bkra shig gang zhig ye shes me brgyad rab tu 'bar gyur pa/ /byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin sprin chen brgyad ni 'dus gyur pa/ /dga' bo la sogs
