161b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i man ngag rdzogs so// //slob dpon gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa/ grub pa'i slob dpon sa wa ra pa'i rim pa'o/ /bla ma b+ha ren+d+ra ru rtse'i zhal snga nas dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o// //
161b2(rgyud 'grel): / 'khor lo sdom pa'i rab gnas bzhugs// */ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI tsakra saM ba ra pra tiSh+Thi/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rab gnas/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho
161b3(rgyud 'grel): gas rab tu gnas par bya ba ni/ tshe grangs bzang po rgyu skar rgyal/ gza' phur bu la ri mo bri ba'am/ lugs su blugs pa 'am/ 'bur du brkod pa'i khang par phyin la/ sa sbyang ba'am/ ma sbyangs pa'i gnas su sa'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du byas la/
161b4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor 'dom gang pa la/ ba'i rnam lngas legs par byug /dri zhim po'i chus byugs la/ dri'i thig li dang me tog gi tshom bu bkod la/ yon chab me tog dri zhim po bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa'i chang bzang po bshams nas/ bum pa
161b5(rgyud 'grel): gcig bcas te de yang gnas dang ldang ba nyid dang ni/ zhes bya ba'i de kho na nyid dgu'i don ji lta ba bzhin bsgoms la/ grangs kyi bsnyen pa rtags dang/ mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa byas nas/ sbyin sreg gtor ma byas te/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon dag
161b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i khrus byas/ mdzes pa'i gos gyon/ rgyan btags/ rten la dri zhim po'i chus byugs te/ me tog gi phreng ba btags te/ kham phor gyi snod du me mdag blugs la/ thang ga la sogs ba'i rten de'i bgegs bskrad par bya ste/ zhal bzhi
161b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sngags kyis lag pa g.yon pas yungs kar blangs te/ de la g.yabs la de'i bgegs bskrad? par bsams la/ me'i nang du blugs par bya'o/ /de bzhin lag pa g.yas pas kyang bya ste/ lan gsum du bya'o/ /sku gzugs sam/ gleD
162a1(rgyud 'grel): bam la sogs pa la rab gnas gang byed pa'i rten de ras kyis g.yogs la hUM bruM sh+raM gyi sngags kyis gtums pa bzhag par bya'o/ /de nas nyi ma 'char khar dkyil 'khor gyi thig btab pa la/ tshon dgye zhing lha bkod la/ /
162a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga nas bshad pa bzhin byas la/ mchod pa bshams bu mo lnga g.yon dos su khrus byas/ rgyan btags la bzhag /chos 'byung gi dkyil 'khor du thod pa'i steng du me long la sin d+hu ras bris la bzhag go /de nas rten de la khrus bya
162a3(rgyud 'grel): ste/ dkyil 'khor de'i byad phyogs su/ khrus kyi khang pa yid du 'ong ba shel gyi gzhi la rin po che'i ka bas brgyan pa/ mu tig dang/ rin po ches spras pa la sogs pa bris la khrus kyi khang ba der stegs bu'i steng du 'bol ba'i stan la 'dug
162a4(rgyud 'grel): la/ mdun gyi stegs bur rab gnas byed par 'dod pa'i ras ris sam/ glegs bam la sogs ba mdun du bzhag la/ me long brten pa la bum pa'i chus khrus gsol la/ bstod ba dbyangs dang bcas pa bya ste/ de la bstod pa'i dbyangs
162a5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ khams gsum gyis ni bya ba/ gsang ba gsum gi gnas las byung/ /dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che/ /mi ldog pa yi khrus gsol lo/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni/ /da bzhin gshegs
162a6(rgyud 'grel): kun khrus gsol ba/ /lta yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a bi She ka sa ma ya sh+ri ye hUM/ gzugs kyi khung po rnam dag pa/ /nyon mongs gti mug spyod byed pa/ /me long lta bu'i
162a7(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyis/ /dpal ldan sku yi sku khrus gsol/ /tshor ba'i phung? po rnam dag pa/ /nyon mongs nga rgyal spyod byed pa'i/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis/ /dpal ldan yon tan dbang bskur ro/ /'du shes phung po rnam dag pa/ /nyon
162b1(rgyud 'grel): mongs 'dod chags spyong byed pa'i/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis/ /dpal ldan gsung gi dbang bskur ro/ /'du byed phung po rnam dag pa/ /nyon mongs phrag dog spyong byed pa'i/ /bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis/ /dpal ldan phrin las dbang
162b2(rgyud 'grel): bskur ro/ /rnam shes phung po rnam dag pa/ /nyon mongs zhe sdang sbyong byed pa/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis/ /dpal ldan thugs kyi dbang bskur ro/ /ji ltar dam pa tog dkar dga' ldan nas/ /lha mdzes lhums nas bltams pa
162b3(rgyud 'grel): khrus gsol ltar/ /sku gdung ring bsrel dri ma med par bcas/ /sprul sku yid 'ong rnams la sku khrus gsol zhes pa dang/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta su sna sta pra ti sha ye swAhA/ zhes bya bas/ 'dag chal du 'os pa/ sprul 'dab ma dang/ nye
162b4(rgyud 'grel): shing dang bag phya'i chal dang/ ba'i rnams lnga dang/ yung ba dang/ 'bras yos dang/ til mar dang/ sprang rtsi dang/ 'o ma dang/ gan ta pa tra dang bcas pa/ sku gzugs nyid dang/ ras ris dang/ po ti yin na me long gi steng du bstan
162b5(rgyud 'grel): tsan dan dang/ ga bur gyi dri'i thig le byas la/ me tog dang bcas pa la ku sha'i pir gyis bkru bar bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bi sho d+ha ni swAhA/ bya ba dang/ oM ma la saM sho d+ha ni swAhA/ zhes brjod cing bum pas bkru'o/ /sug pa dang
162b6(rgyud 'grel): pul tog dang/ spang mas kyang bkru'o/ /de ltar sku gzugs la sogs ba la lan gsum mam lnga'am bkrus la/ byug pa dang khrus mi btub pa res ris la sogs pa rnams la ni/ me long la bltas la me long gi ngos kyi gzugs brnyan
162b7(rgyud 'grel): la bum pas khrus? gsol bar bya'o/ /de nas phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba gser gyi ri po 'dra/ /'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma gsum spangs ba/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa 'dab 'dra'i spyan mda' ba/ /de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis
163a1(rgyud 'grel): dang po'o/ /de yi nges par gsungs pa'i mchog rab mi g.yo ba/ /'jig rten gsum na grags shing lha dang mis mchod pa/ /chos kyi dam pa skye dgu rnams la zhi byed pa/ /de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gnyis
163a2(rgyud 'grel): pa yin/ /dge 'dun dam pa chos ldan thos pa'i bkra shis 'byung/ /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyis mchod pa'i gnas/ /tshogs kyi mchog rab ngo tsha shes dang dpal gyi gzhi/ /de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gsum pa'o/ /zhes bya
163a3(rgyud 'grel): ba la sogs pa bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa brjod cing bum pa'i chus khrus gsol la/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rigs pa'i lha mo la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang khrus gsol bar bsam mo/ /gos gtsang ma dris bsgos pas sku phyis byas te/
163a4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la ni bla gos dang/ snam sbyar gsol bar bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gos sna tshogs dang/ khro bo rnams la gos sngon po dang dmar po 'bul zhing/ po ti yin na yang zhal sbyar la na bza' 
163a5(rgyud 'grel): gsol bar bya'o/ /bkra shis dang tshigs su bcad pa gdon par bya'o/ /rten dang po sta gon la gnas pa'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po spyan drang ba 'am/ gtsug lag khang yod na dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams gtso bo dang bcas pa der bstan
163a6(rgyud 'grel): la/ bdag nyid gtso bo dang tha mi dad du bsgoms la mchod bar bya'o/ /de ltar bdag nyid dkyil 'khor la mchod pa'i rjes la/ yon bdag rnams dang/ rab tu gnas par byed pa rnams la/ dbang bskur ji ltar 'os pa'i bstod
163a7(rgyud 'grel): pa byas la bus mo sa la btsugs te/ lag pa g.yas pas spos snod bzung la/ g.yon pas dril bu'i sgra sgrogs shing/ dam pa'i rdo rje bcom ldan 'das/ /rig pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje 'chang chen che ge
163b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag /ji ltar nus pa'i nges spyad kyis/ /rig pa'i rgyal po 'di zhes pa'i/ /sang ni rab gnas bgyi bar 'tshal/ /slob ma rnams la brtse phyir dang/ /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /bcom ldan 'das la gus bdag la/ /rjes su gcas?
163b2(rgyud 'grel): bar mdzad par rigs/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom dang/ /gang yang gsang sngags lha rnams dang/ /'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas gyi bstan ba la/ /dga' dang rdo
163b3(rgyud 'grel): rje'i spyan mnga' ba/ /bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la/ /thugs brtse nye bar bzung nas kyang/ /thugs rje ldan rnams rab gnas mdzod/ /ces gus pas lan gsum brjod do/ /yang phyi nang gsang bas mchod la/ yi ge brgya pa gdon/
163b4(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor sta gon la gnas par bya'o/ /de nas yang mtshan mo nyal nas/ phyi de nang par tho rangs nas rdo rje slob dpon dag pa'i khrus byas/ mdzes pa'i rgyan gyon la/ rab tu gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa
163b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi gzhal yas khang dang gdan skad cig mas bsams te/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du/ gtsug lag khang mchod rten gyi ri mor bris pa/ lugs su blugs pa/ 'bur du bstod pa rnams sa bon yi ge oM la bsdus te/ de
163b6(rgyud 'grel): yongs su gyur pa las/ phyag mtshan sa bon dang bcas pa bsam mo/ /de las 'od 'phros pas sems can gyi don byas/ rab tu gnas par bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phog nas tshur 'dus te/ sa bon dang/ phyag mtshan dang
163b7(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa la thim nas/ de yongs su gyur pa las /rnam snang du gyur pa sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /go cha gyon ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang bar bya ste/ rgyud nas 'byung ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyas dbang bskur/ rigs
164a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi bdag pos dbu rgyan glegs bam mam srung skud bgrang phreng gsung snang ba mdza' yas su/ lha'i ming ma shes pa/ rdo rje dril bu la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan rdo rje sems dpa' i sku bskyed thabs gong dang 'dra'o/ /de
164a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams la phyi nang gi mchod pa byas la/ /rin po che sna bdun dang/ bkra shis kyi rdzas brgyad la sogs pas/ 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad kyis mchod la/ sbyin sreg dang/ gtor ma byas la/ dag pa'i rdo rje bcom ldan 'das/
164a3(rgyud 'grel): rig pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mgon po thugs rje che bdag nyid/ /rig pa'i rgyal po 'di zhes pa'i/ /'gro la phan phyir rab gnas bgyid/ /rdo rje 'chang chen che ge bdag /ji ltar 'dod pa'i das sbyor kyis/ /thams cad
164a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dir ni rab zhugs nas/ /thugs rje can rnams rab gnas mdzod/ /de nas spyan dbye ste/ /mig dbye ba ni/ ye shes kyi rnam par shar du gzhug pa'i phyir nang par nyi ma 'char kar dngul gyi snod na yod pa'i mar dang sbrang rtsi gser
164a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi thur mas blangs la/ ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis/ /'jig rten ling tog bsal ba ltar/ /de bzhin rgyal ba rnams kyi spyan/ /sems can don du dbye bar bgyi/ /oM tsak+Shu tsak+Shu sa man+ta tsak+Shu bi sho d+ha ne swAhA/ zhes pas
164a6(rgyud 'grel): gser la sogs pa'i thur mas spyan dbye bar bya'o/ /de nas snyan dbye bar bya ste/ gser las byas pa'i rna brung thogs la/ sgra rnams thos pas phongs gyur pa/ /rgyal bas chos kyi rda brdungs ltar/ /de bzhin sems can don
164a7(rgyud 'grel): gyi phyir/ /rgyal ba'i snyan ni dbye bar bgyi/ /oM di bya kar Na ye swAhA/ de nas shangs dbye bar bya ste/ gser la sogs pa'i rmang tsher thogs te/ /zag bcas phung po dri spangs pa'i/ /'gro ba sems can kun
164b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi phyir/ /rnam par dag pa'i dri brnyes ltar/ /rgyal ba'i shangs ni dbye bar bya/ /oM dibya? dz+nyA na ye swAhA/ de nas thur ma thobs la zhal dbye bar ste/ /chos kyi nga ro dga' ba yis/ /'gro ba thams cad tshim mdzad ltar/ /ro mchog brgya
164b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan zhal ras dam pa 'di/ /dbul zhing brgyal ba'i zhal ni dbye bar bgyi/ /oM di bya mu khA ye swAhA/ so shing dbul ba ni/ rin chen mchog grub kar bI ra yis/ /bkur sti rim gro tshems kyi dri bsal ltar/ /bde gshegs gsung
164b3(rgyud 'grel): gi dngos grub thob gyur nas/ /'gro kun skad du chos kyi don rtogs shog/ oM sarba ki shab da ni b+hi/ gal te 'khor lo sgyur ba'i cha lugs yin na/ /dung gi so mangs kyis dbu skra bshad do/ /dbu skra lcang lo mthon mthing g.yas su
164b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khyil/ /rin chen 'bar bas brgyan pas rab tu mdzas/ /lha mi kun gyis blta bas mi ngoms te/ /bsod nams thob phyir rgyal ba'i dbu skra bshad/ oM karma ma la d+ha ra li hUM/ rin po che'i dbu rgyan dbul ba ni/ /bde gsheD
164b5(rgyud 'grel): sku la mtshan dang dpe byang ldan/ /byang chub mchog gi rgyan gyis mdzes lags kyang/ /rin chen do shal se mo ngo la sogs/ /rgyan gyi khyad par dam pa mchod par dbul/ /oM rata a laM kA ra hUM/ de nas sbu gri
164b6(rgyud 'grel): thogs la/ rab tu byung ba'i gzugs yin na skra 'jar ba dang/ ji ltar rang byung mchod rten drung/ /ston pas khyim pa'i rtags spangs ltar/ /'gro ba sems can don gyi phyir/ /khyim pa'i rtags rnams spang bar bgyi/ /oM sarba
164b7(rgyud 'grel): sho d+ha na khats+tsho da hUM/ rnam sbyar dang/ bla gos dang/ sham thabs gsol nas/ ji ltar dman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis/ /rgyal ba'i skul? na bza' gsol ba ltar/ /de bzhin 'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /ngo tsha khrel yod
165a1(rgyud 'grel): gos mchog gsol bar bgyi/ /oM di bya bi si pra Na ye swAhA/ chu tshags dang/ lhung bzed la sogs pa thogs la/ oM pu ka sa bI ra ye swAhA/ de nas thugs kar rdo rje bzung la/ mtshan dang dpe byad
165a2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa bskyed ba'i phyir/ dung dang dpal be'u g.yung drung 'khyil ba dang/ bkra shis rdzas brgyad dag gis rnam brgyan pa/ /rgyal ba'i thugs la rnam par brgyan par shog /oM tra tre sha ma hA ma hA bu ru Sha la k+Sha Na shi ti a nu byany+dza
165a3(rgyud 'grel): nA ye swAhA/ byang chub sems dpa' i cha lugs yin na/ so mangs dang khab dang/ bsnyung bu dang/ gri gug dang/ chu gri rnams phul la/ 'gro ba sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /rig pa'i gnas lnga dag la brlab bya'o?
165a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes/ /ji ltar thugs dam rgya che bzhes pa bzhin/ /mkho ba'i yo byad rnams ni dbul bar bgyi/ /oM a ba yu bu ga sa pa ri ka ra me swAhA /de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa' la thun mong du rin po che sna bdun
165a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ bkra shis rdzas brgyad dang/ 'jig rten pa'i bkra shis pa'i bil ba star ka dang/ zho dang/ ras yug dkar po dang/ gdugs gser gyi yu ba can rnams dbul/ dang po las thams cad pa'i chus bsangs la/ dri'i
165a6(rgyud 'grel): thig le dang/ me tog tshom bu bkod la/ theg mchog bla re gdugs dang ba dan dang/ /bdud bcom rgyal mtshan lhab lhub ting 'phan dang/ /gar? dang rol mo'i mchod pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor mdzes par
165a7(rgyud 'grel): brgyan par bgyi/ /ji ltar mi dbang 'khor lo sgyur ba yis/ /rin chen sna bdun tshogs dang ldan pa ltar/ /rgyal ba rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' la/ /rin chen sna bdun tshogs rnams dbul bar bgyi/ /lha yi rgyal po lha min
165b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yul rgyal nas/ /bkra shis lha mo brgyad kyis mchod pa ltar/ /rgyal ba rnams dang byang chub sems rnams la/ /bkra shis rdzas brgyad dag gis mchod par bgyi/ /'jig rten khyim bdag rnams na dpal bsten nas/ /sil pa
165b2(rgyud 'grel): ltar ka bum pa bzang dang bcas/ /mdun du bdar? nas bkra shis byed pa ltar/ /rgyal ba sras dang bcas la dbul bar bgyi/ /de nas 'dod pa lnga'i longs spyod gter bzang 'bul ba ni/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg? ldan pa'i/ /mchog tu gyur
165b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i longs spyod rnams/ /bdag gis dad pas 'bul bar bgyi/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /oM badzra di bya a ? sa mA d+hi d+hyA ni pri Na ne swAhA/ zhes pU dza lnga yang bya'o/ /de nas 'byor pa yod na sbyin sreg bya'o/ /med na sgyed po
165b4(rgyud 'grel): dkar po gsum btsugs la/ sa las byas pa'i snod gtsang mar dkar gsum dang mngar gsum gyi gzhi la sman sna tshogs btab ste/ sbyin sreg gi me 'am/ rig ma'i me la dbyangs skyong gi sngags zlos shing bskol par bya'o/ /de nas tsA ru
165b5(rgyud 'grel): dbul bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bdud rtsi lnga dang dpa' bo lnga dang bcas pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon dang/ yon bdag gnyis kas sku'i gdan khri nas bzung nas/ me tog gi phreng ba phul te/ ji srid me dang? chu dang ni/ /
165b6(rgyud 'grel): rlung gis bskal pa 'jig par du/ /yon bdag bsod nams spel ba dang/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /ji ltar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun/ /dga' ldan gnas su rab bzhugs nas/ /lha mo sgyu ma'i mngal 'jug ltar/ /de
165b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin 'dir yang bzhugs su gsol/ /mgon po rtag tu 'dir bzhugs la/ /me tog la sogs 'di bzhes mdzod/ /che ge mo yi don gyi phyir/ /byang chub sems ni 'phel bar mdzod/ /oM su pra tiSh+Tha badzra swAhA/ smad dang snying ga ?
166a1(rgyud 'grel): pa ru/ /rdo rje gsor ba de rnams la/ /lan gsum bskor nas bzhag par bya/ /lta rnams brtan par 'dod pa yis/ /bshad par gyur pa'i tshigs bcad gdon/ /blo ldan brtan par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas phyogs
166a2(rgyud 'grel): skyong dang/ mahA kA la dang/ yul gyi bgegs la gtor ma byin la/ 'gro ba sems can don slad du/ /bde gshegs rnams ni bzhugs kyi bar/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir/ /sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan bsrung bar mdzod ces
166a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la yang mchod pa dbul/ bde bar gshegs pa sprul ba'i sku bsrung bar zhal gyis bzhes pas ji srid bcom ldan 'das bzhugs kyi bar du bsrung bar mdzad du gsol zhes brjod pa dang/ gtso bo
166a4(rgyud 'grel): nus pa ma mchis pas/ /ma rnyed pa dang mtshang ba'i/ /'dir ni nongs bgyis gang lags pa'i/ /rmongs pa bdag gi kun bzod mdzod/ /ces pa'i bzod par gsol te/ dge ba 'di yis myur du bdag /'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas
166a5(rgyud 'grel): shog /sangs rgyas ma thob bar du yang/ /bde 'gro phun sum tshogs par shog /tshe 'di la yang bsam grub cing/ /bar chad thams cad nyer zhi shog /ces dge ba bsdos nas/ 'di skad gsungs bzhin rab gnas pa/ /de ni nges byas
166a6(rgyud 'grel): byed du bcug /khyed kyis de kun yongs rdzogs pas/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /bla ma yong su mnyes gyur na/ /las rnams rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /dbul po rnams kyis gus pa yis/ /bla ma yongs su mnyes par bya/ /zhes bsgo
166a7(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o/ /rab tu byung ba'i gnas brtan dang/ /khyim pa'i gtso bo rnams la yang/ /snyigs ma lnga'i dus kyi sprul pa'i sku 'di yin gyis/ 'di khyed kyis ma nyams par bsrungs shig ces bcol bar byas la/ lugs ma'am ras
166b1(rgyud 'grel): ris sam po ti yin na/ na bza' bzang po la drangs la/ shing rtal bskyon nas dri thig le byas te/ 'gro ba rnams dad par bya ba'i phyir/ grong khyer rnams bskor bar bya'o/ /yon bdag dang slob ma rnams kyis sku gzugs la phyag 'tshal ba dang/
166b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa dang bskor ba dang/ glu dang gang dang/ rgyan gdags pa dang/ bkra shis ba rnams byed du gzhug /dkyil 'khor ni rang rang gang yin pa'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i cho gas rab tu gnas par byas la/ de nas rab gnas la phul ba'i rdzas kyi
166b3(rgyud 'grel): lhag ma rnams ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhag ma zos shing/ sdig pa 'dag bar byed pas/ rang dang slob mas bza' bar bya'o/ /spyad du btub pa rnams ni/ oM swa b+hA bas bsangs la bzhag go /rig pa'i bsrung ba dang/ bgrang
166b4(rgyud 'grel): phreng ni skad cig tsam gyis bya'o/ /dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i cho ga slob dpon gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa'o// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra pA Ni dang/ lo tsa ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur pa'o// //
166b5(rgyud 'grel): /bcu gsum bdag nyid kyi cho ga bzhugs// */ /rgya gar skad du/ tra yo da shAt+ma ka sh+rI tsakra sam+ba ra maN+Da lo pA yi kA/ bod skad du/ bcu gsum gyi bdag nyid dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi chog /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' 
166b6(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas dus gsum yang dag rig mdzad pa/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpar spyi bos phyag byas nas/ /bcu gsum bdag nyid can gyi sdom pa de yi ni/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni cho ga 'dir ni bshad par bya/ /dkyil
166b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor chen po myur bar mtshog tu grub 'gyur zhes/ /gzhan gyi don gyi blo yis nges par bsam nas ni/ /dbang bskur rab gnas chog sgrub thabs la sogs rnams/ /byas pa 'di las nges par bsngags pa'i cho ga nyid/ /brtan zhes zab
167a1(rgyud 'grel): mo'i chos shes pa/ /rab gnas gtor ma'i pha rol son/ /sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor de nyid shes/ /rig pa kun la shin tu mkhas/ /gsang sngags nges pa'i tshul la gus/ /gzugs ldan ltan sdug pa dang//
167a2(rgyud 'grel): bla ma la gus snying rjer ldan/ /sdom pa 'byung ba'i ston pa po/ /lha khang mchod rten gnas dang ni/ /'khor gyi khyams dang gtsang? ma'i sa/ /gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod duAng/ /der ni dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya/ /yongs su brtags
167a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sa yi char/ /rko ba la sogs mi bya ste/ /lag pas reg nas hUM yig gi /sa sbyang ba yi gsang sngags bzla/ /sna tshogs pa rnams stong nyid du/ /ro gcig par ni nges mos na/ /de yis sa ni dag 'gyur te/ /de bzhin nyid
167a4(rgyud 'grel): dag rgyu phyir ro/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni sa yi che/ /nyis 'gyur du ni sbyang bar bya/ rang gi sems ni yongs dag par/ /gyur na de nyid sa dag 'gyur/ /zhes bya'o/ /sa sbyang ba'o// //de phyir mchog gi slob dpon gyis//
167a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dir ni dkyil 'khor bya ba yin /yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su ni/ /re shig sngon du bsnyen pa bya/ /de'i rjes su dkyil 'khor gyi sa la me tog dgram zhing 'dug nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdus par gyur pa'i bcu gsum gyi
167a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid can dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje'i slob dpon gyis bsrung ba'i 'khor lo la sogs pa byas nas/ bgegs gzhom pa'i phyir spos kyis snod thogs nas lce hUM las skyes pa'i rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu gsil bar gyur pas/ ma
167a7(rgyud 'grel): lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi /sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs/ /bdag ni che ge rdo rje can/ /'dir ni dkyil 'khor bya bar 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas la sogs kun byon la /bdag la grub pa stsal du gsol/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
167b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa rnams la snyan gsan phab nas mchod par bya'o/ /de nas sngags pa rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa khwa gdong mi la sogs pa'i gzugs ma'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i slob ma bzhi rnams kyis sam/ gcig gis kyang rung ste g.yon skor
167b2(rgyud 'grel): gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /mtshan nyid min pa thams cad spang/ /kun
167b3(rgyud 'grel): tu bzang po sku yi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /zhi ba'i chos mchog las byung ba/ /ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong mdzad/ /kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /sems can? kun gyi sems chen
167b4(rgyud 'grel): po/ /dag cing rang bzhin dri ma med/ /kun tu bzang po thugs kyi mchog /dkyil 'khor kha lo bsgyur ba gsungs/ /shes tshigs su bcad pa bzhis gsol ba btab par gyur pa dang/ da ni sangs rgyas byang chub sems/ /rdo rje nyi ma nga nyid de/ /
167b5(rgyud 'grel): don yod rdo rje chos kyang nga/ /sangs rgyas thams cad nyid kyang nga/ /zheS nga rgyal ba brjod cing/ de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi sdigs mdzub gnyis brkyang ste sbyar ba'i rtse mo 'og tu phyogs pa spyi bor 'dzin pas hUM badzra t+tiSh+Tha zhes brjod cing mdun du bsgom
167b6(rgyud 'grel): shing spros pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la nam mkha' mthil na gnas pa thams cad kyang bcug ste langs la shar du phyogs pas sems can rnams ma rig pa'i mun par chud cing bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa rnams la nges par bltas nas snying rje
167b7(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan zhing nga rgyal ba'i thugs? can gyis bdud rnams bskrad par bya ba'i phyir 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i mig g.yas par ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa dang/ mig g.yon par Ta las zla ba'i rnam pa/ mig 'bras gnyis
168a1(rgyud 'grel): hUM las bskral pa'i me'i rnam pas sna tshogs pa 'di la kun tu rnam par brtag par bya'o zhes bsgyings pa dang bcas pa'i g.yo bas rkang mthil 'bar ba'i rdo rjes rol zhing gsor bas sna tshogs rdo rje'i rkang stabs byas te
168a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas rnams su dril bu dkrol bar bya'o/ /gdug pa'i tshogs rnams gzhom pa'i phyir/ /kha nas hUM yig 'don pa'i zhal/ /'khor lo'i sa la g.yon skor du/ /sngags pa yis ni bcag par bya/ /gza' dang 'byung po 'dre la sogs/ /
168a3(rgyud 'grel): lus ngag yid la gnas pa rnams/ /nges par 'joms kyis dengs shig ces/ /de tshe bgegs kyi tshogs rnams bskrad/ /su yang rung pa'i lus srul po rnams dang/ /bgegs kyi tshogs rnams gzhan du 'byer bar gyis/ /nga ni
168a4(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan snying rje'i stobs yin te/ /srung ba'i 'khor lo rab tu sbyor ba po/ /kun nas 'bar ba'i rdo rje yis/ /lus skyes rnams kyi lus dags bya/ /gal te kha cig bdag las 'da' / /'dir ni 'jig 'gyur gzhan du min/ zhes bya bas

168a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas lag pas nye reg bya zhing 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad dang yi ge brgya pa yang lan bdun bzlas nas der lha'i 'khor lo spro zhing bsdu pas nyal bar bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni sa yongs su gzung

168b1(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer lnga'i sna tshogs rdo rje la gnas pa'i hUM gi yi ge las kun tu rgya che ba nas kyi 'bras bu'i tshad kyi rdo rje lte ba'i gzugs kyis dum bu gcig tu gyur pa/ rdo rje'i ra ba dang gur dang mda'i dra ba dang bla re dang 'og tu sna tshogs rdo rje'i rang bzhin
168b2(rgyud 'grel): can gyi sa bsgom nas nyi ma sna tshogs rdo rje dang bcas pa yongs su gyur pas 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis kun tu tshig par gyur par bsam mo/ /de'i dbus su rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las phyogs dang phyogs bral du khwa gdong ma la sogs pa mkha' 'gro
168b3(rgyud 'grel): ma shing rnams steng du dang/ dum skyes ma 'og tu/ dum skyes ma gnyis pa rnam par spros nas de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las spros pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis phyogs bcu'i bgegs rnams bkug nas de ? bras? la gtang par bya'o/ /

168b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa/ stod bdag nyid kyi gzugs can phyag g.yon pas gzung nas g.yas pas gri gug yongs su gyur pa'i rdo rje'i tho ba bcus hUM las skyes pa'i khron pa bcur bgegs de rnams bcug la/ oM g+ha g+ha/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba
168b6(rgyud 'grel): duSh+Tan phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya sarba pA paM/ hUM hUM hUM phaT badzra kI la ya badzra d+ha ra Adz+nyA pa ya ti sarba big+ha nAM/ /kA ya bAk+tsi twaM kI la ya hUM hUM zhes brjod cing rang gi phur bu rnams la/ oM badzra mung+gar ko Ta hUM zhes brjod cing gdab par

169a1(rgyud 'grel): pas dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi dri bzangs kyis byugs pa'i dbus su baM las byung ba'i sa'i lha mo bsgoms nas lag pa g.yas pa'i zla bar hUM gsum bkod la sor mo gsum gyis bsnun pa'i sgra'i tshogs rnams kyis
169a2(rgyud 'grel): bslang ba'i ye shes sems dpa' dang ro gcig par gyur pa'i lha mo ser mo phyag g.yon pas gser gyi bum pa bzang po dang cig shos kyis khas len pa'i tshul can zhal gcig pa zla ba lta bu lta'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa mdun na gnas par bltas nas/

169a5(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i 'bar ba'i hUM gi tshogs kyis sa 'og gi bar du rdo rjer byas par bltas te/ badzra dri Dha? tiSh+Tha zhes lan gsum gyiS sa byin gyis brlab po/ /'di lta bus rang gi dbang du gyur par mos bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni lhag par gnas pa'o/ /de nas
169a6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su yi ge gsum gyis dri bzangs dang bdud rtsi lngas nye bar byugs la/ dri bzang po'i me tog gcal du dgram zhing sngags pas khrus dang dri bzang pos byug cing ji ltar rnyed pa'i gos dang rgyan dang gtsug tor gyis 'dug
169a7(rgyud 'grel): cing 'khor lo'i dbang po'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas bdud rtsi lnga dang tsan dan dang gur kum la sogs pa rnams kyis maN+Dal bcu gsum du phyugs der rang gi dam tshig gi 'khor lor lhag par mes shing nam mkha' i mthil na bzhugs pa'i ye
169b1(rgyud 'grel): shes kyi 'khor lo blos bkug nas gzhug cing phyi dang gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis mngon par mchod cing bstod nas bdud rtsi myang bar bya'o/ /de nas bsgoms pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis phyi rol tu slob dpon lho'i phyogs su 'dug cing byang du mngon par phyogs
169b2(rgyud 'grel): pas 'chang par 'gyur ba'i lha so so so so'i tshul gyis sam/ bum pa gcig gi tshul gyis kyang rung ste las thams cad pa'i bum pa lhag por bya'o/ /bla re dang mthil du so sor dri bzang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du ku sha sar pa'i stegs la gzhog /

169b4(rgyud 'grel): lnga ni bri? ta ti dang kaN+DA ka rI dang gzhan gyis mi thub pa dkar po dang sa ha de ba dang daN+Dotpa la ste sman lnga'o/ /gur gum dang a ka ru dang graN+Thi dang tsan dan dang pa traM ga ni dri lnga'o/ /gser dang dngul dang mu tig dang byu ru dang rA dza bart+ta ni rin po che lnga'o/ /
169b5(rgyud 'grel): de rnams bum pa'i lto bar bcug nas glang po che dang nor phyugs dang pong? bu logs pas ma rnyogs pa'i chu klung la sogs pa las blangs pa ste sA li bzang po dang gzhan pa'i snod kyis ma reg pa'i chu bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa blug ste snying por tsA tu dang dzaM bu
169b6(rgyud 'grel): dang n+ya gro dA? dang a shwat+tha dang u duM bA ra rnams dang gzhan gang yang rung ba ba dan dang gdugs dang bcas pa rnam par sgeg pa rnams ni kha la ste/ me tog dang bcas pa'i phreng ba 'od can dang ras zungs kyis mgrin pa dkris pa/ chos 'byung dang pad+ma dang
169b7(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma la gnas ba'i rang rang gi mtshan mas mtshan pa rnams ni 'dod pa la sogs pas dkar por byas te gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas de rnams la gzhon nu mas bkal pa'i skud pa dkar po bdun gyis sam/ kha dog lnga'i skud pas kyang rung ste hUM lan bdun
170a1(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa/ oM badzra she kha ra ruTTa maTTa di shAM ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM zhes pa gsum mam bdun gyis yongs su dkri bar bya'o/ /yang na rnam bar rgyal ba'i bum pa'i steng du/ oM badzra mri to da ka Tha(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes bya ba 'dis lan bdun
170a2(rgyud 'grel): bzlas te ye shes kyi bdud rtsir gyur ba rdo rje'i rdul phra rab kyi rang bzhin bdud rtsi lnga dang dri bzangs kyi chu'i snying por dung dang me tog gi phreng ba dang rdo rje yang gzhag nas nang du/ oM tapte ma hA tabte swAhA/ zhes bya ba 'dis ma nges pa'i chang dam
170a3(rgyud 'grel): chu klung gi chu gnyis kyang rung pa'i chu la dang lha'i 'khor lo'i mtshan ma la de bzhin kho nar skad cig gis zhes bya bas dmigs nas snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od kyis bkug pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas gzhug par bya'o/ /

170b1(rgyud 'grel): ya ma dU tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma daMSh+TI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma tha nI ye huM hUM phaT/ dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma rnams kyi'o/ /oM khaN+Da ro he huM hUM phaT/ dum skyes ma'i las thams cad pa'i sngags so/ /de nas rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i

171b7(rgyud 'grel): rje can/ /dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje sngags kyi mthu yis ni/ /ye shes mnyam med yang dag brnyes/ /gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med pa/ /gang gis shAkya seng ge sogs/ /mchog rnams kyis ni bdud kyi ?
172a1(rgyud 'grel): mi bzad chen po stobs chen bcom/ /'jig rten rjes 'jug rtogs nas ni/ /'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /ces yang dag

172a3(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa 'dzin du gzhug ste/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dus 'di nas gzung nas ji srid byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du bla na med pa'i byang

172a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum/ /dge ba dang ni chos sdud dang/ /sems can don byed tshul khrims ni/ /bdag gis so sor brtan par gzung/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /dkon mchog gsum mchog bla na med/ /sdom pa sangs rgyas rnal 'byor
172a6(rgyud 'grel): byung/ /deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi/ /rdo rje chen po'i rigs bsdus la/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang/ /de nyid kyis ni rab tu gzung/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen chen po'i rigs mchog gi /dam tshig
172a7(rgyud 'grel): yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re bzhin du lan drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /pad+ma chen po'i rigs dag pa/ /byang chub chen po 'byung ba la/ /phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum/ /dam chos so sor gzung bar bgyi/ /
172b1(rgyud 'grel): las chen rigs ni bsdus pa la/ /sdom pa thams cad yang dag ldan/ /mchod pa'i las ni ci nus bzhin/ /kun nas so sor gzung bar bgyi/ /rtsa ba'i ltung ba spang bgyi zhing/ /de bzhin sbom po'i ltung ba spang/ /sems can rnams la bsnyen
172b2(rgyud 'grel): bkur bgyi/ /thams cad du yang byams pa'i sems/ /lus kyi las ni rnam pa gsum/ /ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang/ /yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag gi /dge ba'ang bdag gis bskyang bar bya/ /myos pa'i ltung ba spang bgyi zhing/ /rgod pa'i bya
172b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'ang de bzhin te/ /theg pa dman la dga' ba yang/ /rab tu 'bang pas mi bya'o/ /lha sogs de bzhin gtso bo la/ /ma gus par yang mi bgyi'o/ /phyag rgyal sogs khyad par rnams/ /mnan par yang ni mi bya'o/ /byang chub sems ni

177a6(rgyud 'grel): skor gyi mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma rnams kyi gri gug sngon po rnams so/ /me la sogs phyogs bral gyi 'dab ma ser po dang ljang gu dang ser po dang nag po rnams la byang chub kyi sems kyis gang ba'i
177a7(rgyud 'grel): thod pa rnams so/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnam su g.yon skor gyis kha gdong ma dang 'ug gdong ma dang khyi gdong ma dang phyag gdong ma rnams kyi dang/ me la sogs phyogs bral rnams su gshin rje brten ma dang gshin rje pho nya ma dang gshin?
177b1(rgyud 'grel): rje mche ba ma dang gshin rje 'joms ma rnams kyi sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i gri gu sngon po rnams so/ /de'i phyi rol gyi stegs bu'i snam bu ni pad+ma rA ga'i mdog go /sna tshogs shing rnam par bkra ba'i rin po che rnams gser gyis
177b2(rgyud 'grel): bcings pa ni rin po che'i snam bu'o/ /snam bu sngon po la ma ka ra'i kha nas 'thon pa rnam pa sna tshogs shing rnam par bkra ba'i rin po che'i do shal dang do shal byed pa 'byr? ba rnaMs so/ /snam bu sngon po la ba ku li dang kra ma shIrSha la dkar po rnams te ka ba'i steng du
177b3(rgyud 'grel): ku li dang? rin po che dang rmig pa dang gser dang chu srin dang gser dang rmig pa dang rin po che dang rmig pa dang gser mda' yab kyi snam bu ste/ de la rta rmig dang chu srin dang rmig pa gnyis ji ltar mdzes pa'i kha dog gi /gzhan rnams ni sngar bshad do/

182b2(rgyud 'grel): maM zhes brjod cing bskor ba byas thal mo sbyar te dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgor 'dug nas oM sarba bI rA DA? ki nI pU dzo pasnrA? na yAdma ni ni rya ta ya mi sarba bI ra DA ki nI bredz+nyo pA yAt+ma naM sam+ba rA d+hiShpra? mAM zhes bya bas dbus su'o/ /oM sarba ? rA? ki ?
182b3(rgyud 'grel): pU dzo pas+thA? nA yat+mA naM ni rA ta yA mi sarba pI ra bI ri NI? DA ki n+yA d+hi taMSh+Tha mAM zhes bya bas shar la'o/ /oM sarba nA ri DA ki nI pU dza karma Ne At+ma ni ni ? ta yA mi sarba bIr DA ka nI lA mA zhes pas byar pa'o/ /oM sarba ?
182b4(rgyud 'grel): DA ki nI pU dzA pra ba t+ta? nA yAt+ma naM niryA ta yA ma sarba pI ra DA ki nI /baN+Da ro hA badzra d+harma pra bart+ta ya mAM zhes pas nub du'o/ /oM sarba bI ra ShA ni/ nI pU dzA b+hi She kA yAtsha na na ryA tayA me ? ra D 'a ki mA ru pa n? badzra rat+ta b+haM ?
182b5(rgyud 'grel): mAM zhes pas lhor ro/ /oM gu ru tsa ra No bas+thA? nA yA naM niryat+ma yA mi oM sarba sarba ba ri tA NArtha yA tA?  ni niryA ta yA mi zhes bla ma la phyag byas nas/ 'di brjod par bya ste der khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs

187a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya'i dam tshig tu ni bshad/ /lus ni thams cad brtan byed pa/ /gang yin des na phyag rgyar grags/ zhes ye shes kyi phyag rgya byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir 'dod pa lnga la nye bar longs spyod pas phyag rgya chen mo la sogs
187a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya'o zhes byin nas kha sbyor gyi rim pas phyag rgya la 'khyud ba'i tshul byed du gzhug go /zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya ma'i dam tshig go/ //de ltar dam tshig gsum dang ldan pa'i slob
187a7(rgyud 'grel): ma rdo rje sems dpa' i gzugs can la rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis dbang bskur bar dmigs nas/ /dbang bskur rdo rje chen pa ni/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i
187b1(rgyud 'grel): tshigs su bcad pa brjod cing/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga tA b+hi She ka sa ma ya sh+ri ye hUM swAhA zhes brjod de rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas mi bskyod pa cod pan du rnam par bsams nas de bzhin gsheD
187b2(rgyud 'grel): pa gzhan rnams dang lha mo rnams kyang ye shes sems dpa' i ngo bos gzhug par bya'o/ /oM su pa tiSh+Tha ta badzro swAhA/ zhes byin gyis brlabs la mchod par bya'o/ /de skad du yang/ shes rab bcu drug lon pa la/ /lag
187b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dag gis yang dag 'khyud/ rdo rje dril bu mnyam sbyor ba/ /slob dpon gyi ni dbang du 'dod ces gsungs so/ /de'i rjes su mdor bsdus pas dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid dang rnam par dag pa yang brjod par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor pad+ma zhes
187b4(rgyud 'grel): bshad de/ /yid kyi dkyil 'khor mchog yin no/ /khang pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba/ /ye shes sems dag brtsegs zhing bsdus/ /phung po lnga ni mdor bsdus nas/ /sangs rgyas ldan ni rab tu grags/ zhes so/ /don dam par
187b5(rgyud 'grel): ni rang bzhin med pa'i bdag nyid can gyi de bzhin nyid kho na dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid dang lha'i de kho na nyid do zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyi dbang ngo// //de nas slob dpon gyis snying po la sogs pa'i sngags
187b6(rgyud 'grel): lan gsum bzlas nas/ /bcom ldan 'di la sbyin lags kyis/ /'di la nye bar mdzad du gsol/ zhes brjod cing slob ma la sbyin no/ /des ni/ bcom ldan bdag gis gzung lags kyis/ /bdag la nye bar mdzad du
187b7(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ zhes sngags gzung nas lan gsum bzla bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni sngags gtad pa'o// //de nas gser gyi thur mas de'i snod na gnas pa'i mar dang sprang rtsi'i mig sman slob ma'i mig la
188a1(rgyud 'grel): praM yig bsams nas oM badzra ne tra? pa ha ra pa Ta laM hwI(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod cingni ga sman byug pa'i tshul byas nas 'di brjod par bya ste/ /thur ldan sman pa'i rgyal po yis/ /ji ltar 'jig rten rab rib bzhin/
188a2(rgyud 'grel): bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa'i/ /rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal/ /zhes bya ba ni mig smon// //de nas slob ma la A(rgyud 'grel): yig bzlus pa'i me long bstan la/ /chos rnams gzugs ? lta bu
188a3(rgyud 'grel): ste/ gsal zhing dag la rnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las yang dag byung/ /rdo rje sems dpa' me long bzhin/ /der ni gsal dag rnyog pa med/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag rang nyid ni/ /bu khyod kyi ni snying
188a4(rgyud 'grel): la bzhugs/ /rang bzhin med cing gnas med par/ /chos rnams de ltar shes nas khyod/ /sems can don ni mnyam med byos/ /gang phyir skyob rnams sras su skyes/ zhes bya ba ni me long ngo// //de nas hoM?:
188a5(rgyud 'grel): yig las byung ba'i gzhu ho(rgyud 'grel): yig gis byin nas sarba ta thA ga tA nu rA ga ya swa zhes brjod de/ slob ma rnams kyis kyang sarba ta thA ga tA nu rA ga yA mi shes brjod cing bgegs thams cad 'bugs par bsams nas phyogs bzhir mda'
188a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi 'phang bar bya ste steng du gcig dang 'og tu gzhan no zhes bya ba ni mnga' 'phang ba'o// //de nas b+h+ruM yig las skyes pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo oM badzra he tu maM zhes brjod cing slob ma'i lag pa g.yas su A(rgyud 'grel): yig las
188a7(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa'i dung oM badzra b+hA Sha raM zhes brjod cing g.yon du dbyangs dang po las skyes pa'i glegs bam dbyangs dang po brjod pas dang/ dbyangs tha ma las skyes pa'i dril bu/ dbyangs tha ma brjod cing byin nas dril bu dkral du gzhug ste/
188b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad nam mkha' i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/ /nam mkha' mnyam par sbyor ba las/ /kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal/ zhes de'i rjes su 'di skad du brjod par bya ste/ deng nas brtsams te sems bskyed bcas/ /
188b2(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /tshes kyi dung ni bla med pa/ /thams cad du yang gang bar gyis/ /som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing/ /dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis khyod/ /gsang sngags spyad pa'i tshul mchog gang/ /'jig rten la ni rtag
188b3(rgyud 'grel): tu shod/ /de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la/ /byas pa shes par nye bar brjod/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun yang/ /khyod la rnam pa kun du bsrung zhes so/ /de bzhin du thun mong gi rjes su gnang ba byin nas rim pas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gzugS
188b4(rgyud 'grel): su dmigs te slob ma la brjod par bya ste/ 'jig rten kun tu thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul bas sna tshogs pa'i/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin bdag /yid
188b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nor ltar mtho ba yis/ /dogs dang bral zhing zad min par/ /sems can don ni phun tshogs byas/ /chos kyi sgra'i gnas su rdo rje dang/ rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang/ las kyi sgra bcug nas rjes su gnang ba rnam pa lnga sbyin par
188b6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /slob mas kyang bla ma'i zhabs kyi pad+ma gnyis la phyag byas nas/ gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa/ /de ltar bgyi'o zhes brjod do zhes bya ba ni rjes su gnang ba'o// //de nas slob ma rdo rje sems dpa' i gzugs su dmigs
188b7(rgyud 'grel): nas/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i phyag na gnas/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcad/ /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ zhes bya ba 'dis hUM las skyes pa'i rdo rje byin la slob mas kyang oM sarba ta thA ga tA sid d+hi
189a1(rgyud 'grel): badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Ta e Sha twAM d+hA ra yA mi badzra satwa h+rI(rgyud 'grel): hi hi hi hi hUM/ zhes brjod cing rdo rje gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i brtul zhugs so// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam gyi tshul du chos
189a2(rgyud 'grel): gos kyi rna ba g.yon ba'i khu tshur gyis gzung ba byas shing g.yas pa mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgyas/ srid pa'i ngan 'gro las bton nas/ /srid pa shin tu dag bya'i phyir/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /'di ni nga yis lung?
189a3(rgyud 'grel): bstan bya/ /kye'i che ge mo badzra ta thA ga tA sad d+hya sa ma ya stwaM b+hUr b+hu ba(rgyud 'grel): swA(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba 'dis slob ma me tog phog pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs su bya'o/ /gang yang drangs shing 'phags pa'i phyag rgyas lung
189a4(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' i 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor ba rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par mdzad de phyag rgya dang gsang
189a5(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di nyid rab tu bsgoms so zhes dad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni lung bstan pa'o// //de nas slob ma'i snying gar sngags thams cad kyis mngon par bsngags nas lag pa g.yon la kaM ka ?  bcings zhing mgo bor
189a6(rgyud 'grel): gdugs bzung bas bskor ba byed du bcug nas thal mo sbyar ba dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor gyi sgor gdug phab nas/ rgyud rnams 'dzin par 'gyur ba yi/ /slob ma 'di ni phul pa lags/ zhes brjod cing dkyil 'khor gyi dbang
189a7(rgyud 'grel): phyug la gsol ba btab nas slob ma'i snying la 'bab ba'i tshig 'di skad brjod par bya ste/ da ni khyed rnams dkyil 'khor gyi/ /slob dpon sngags dang rgyud 'dzin par/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /lha rnams
189b1(rgyud 'grel): dag kyang dgongs par 'gyur/ /sems can kun la brtse don du/ /khyod kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin/ /rab tu 'bad de bri bar bya/ /mchog tu gsang ba dam pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor mthong zhing zhugs pas na/ /sdig pa kun las rnam
189b2(rgyud 'grel): grol 'gyur/ /deng ni khyed rnams bde bar gnas/ /bde chen theg pa 'di las ni/ /phyin chad 'chib khyod la med/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod 'das/ /srid pa'i mdza' ni shin tu grub/ /deng khyod skye ba 'bras bur bcas/ /gang la
189b3(rgyud 'grel): legs par rab tu gnas/ /dam tshig lha rnams dang mnyam par/ /'gyur ba la ni the tshom med/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje can kun gyis/ /de ring tshe ldan dbang bskur bas/ /khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che'i/ /bdag po nyid du khyod des so//
189b4(rgyud 'grel): de ring bdud rnams las rgyal nas/ /grong khyer mchog tu khyod zhugs te/ /de ring sangs rgyas nyid 'thob par/ /'gyur ba 'di la the tshom med/ /'dod chags bral ba lta bu'i sdig /khams gsum na ni gzhan med de/ /des 'dod la chags
189b5(rgyud 'grel): bral bar/ /khyod kyis nam yang mi bya'o/ /'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing/ /myur bas khyod ni ci las 'jigs/ /sha lnga bdud rtsi bzang bya ste/ /de phyir dam tshig gzhan yang bsrungs/ /srog chags bsang par mi bya zhing/ /bud med
189b6(rgyud 'grel): rin chen spang mi bya/ /slob dpon spang bar mi bya ste/ /dam tshig shin tu 'da' bar bka' / /shes rab thabs kyis bsams pa yis/ /mi bya cung zad yod ma yin/ /ma 'jigs khyod la sdig pa med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsung ji
189b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ /de ltar yid ni rab dang rdo rje nyid du gyis/ /rang gi dam tshig mi zad bde ster bsten? par kyi/ /'gro ba bde ba nyung las rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ /mtshungs pa'i rtag pa nyid du khyed rnams phyin par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang chos nyid 'di dang cho
190a1(rgyud 'grel): ga ji lta ba bzhin dbang bskur ba gang yin pa la dge ba'i phyir sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis du sdug pa bzhin du rab tu dang ba'i thugs kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni dbugs dbyung ba'i
190a2(rgyud 'grel): cho ga'o// //dbang bskur ba de rnams la bum pa byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir bum pa'i dbang bskur ba'o// //de nas yol pa dang snam bu la sogs pa rnams kyis 'gol bar byas pa'i gnas su
190a3(rgyud 'grel): slob ma rang gi sems dga' ba'i shes rab ma bcu gnyis lon pa 'am bcu drug lon pa yang rung/ gzugs dang mtshan phun sum tshogs shing dam tshig dang sdom pa la gnas pa la gnas pa bla ma la bul nas bus ma'i lha ngas? la
190a4(rgyud 'grel): btsugs te lag pa sbyar nas bla ma la rdo rje sems dpar mngon sum du mos pa byas nas/ khyod kyi zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis/ /bdag gis bla med bya ba thob/ /de phyir gsang ba'i dbang gis ni/ /mgon po rjes su gzung bar mdzod/ /ces
190a5(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba gdab bo/ /bla mas kyang skad cig gis stong pa nyid kyi mthar dpal sdom pa'i sku dang shes rab phag mo'i gzungs su bskyed nas rdo rje dang pad+ma 'du bya ba sngon du 'gro bas snyoms par 'jug par bya zhing oM sarba ta thA ga

190a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags chen pos zhu bar gyur pa a ba d+hU tI nas 'ongs pas dga' ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis rdo rje nor bur lhan cig skyes pa rang nyid kyis rig par byas nas mthe bong dang srin lag dag gis nor bur bcir nas rdo rje nam
190b1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' i khams su rnam par bsams pa'i shes rab kyi pad+ma las byung nas slob ma gsung rdo rje'i gzugs can gyi khar/ 'das pa'i rdo rje 'chang sogs kyis/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas sras dbang bskur/ /byang chub sems kyi bza' ba
190b2(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /de bzhin bu khyod dbang bskur ro/ /zhes dang rtsa ba'i sngags kyang brjod la byang chub kyi sems dbab par bya'o/ /shes rab gdong yar bcing ba dang/ /thabs kyi gdong yang de bzhin te/ /mthe bo ming med dag gis

190b4(rgyud 'grel): la gos med pa nyid du pad+ma na gnas pa'i bdud rtsi'i thig le rnams de'i khar gzhug ste/ des kyang de bzhin du btung bar bya'o/ /shes rab dang thabs dag gis kun rdzob pa'i gsang ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyis dbang bskur ba'i phyir zhes
190b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni gsar pa'i dbang bskur ba'o// //de nas 'dod pa'i shes rab ma de nyid las tha dad pa gzhan yang rung si la ga bur? dang gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa'i phyag rgya gtad par 'os pa ste/ gang gis bdag
190b6(rgyud 'grel): ni khyod drin las/ /lhan skyes ye shes thob gyis te/ /shes rab ye shes dbang bskur ba/ /dbang byug mchog gis bdag la stsol/ /zhes gsol ba btab par gyur pa de las slob ma'i lag pa g.yas pa dang de'i lag pa g.yon ba ste
190b7(rgyud 'grel): de gnyis rang gi lag pa g.yon bas gzung la/ /g.yas pas slob ma'i spyi bor rdo re gzung nas/ /'dir ni khyed rnams dbang po yin/ /bdag gis 'di la 'di gtad do/ /zhes dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams dbang 
191a1(rgyud 'grel): du byas nas/ gzugs ma yid 'ong 'di khyod kyis/ /bsten byar sangs rgyas rnams kyis brtags/ /'khor lo rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bde ba dam pa myang bar gyis/ /thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs rgyas

191a3(rgyud 'grel): rab ma gtad par bya'o/ /des kyang dri bzang po dang me tog gi phreng bas lus nye bar mdzos par byas shing rgod cing dga' ba'i bzhin gyi mdangs kyis/ bu khyod spro pa nyid dam cing/ /bshang gci la sogs tha? ba dang/ /sha khrag khu ba de bzhin

191a6(rgyud 'grel): e ma ba? yi pad+ma 'di/ /bde ba kun dang yang dag ldan/ /gang zhig chogs bsten byed pa/ /de yi mdun na bdag gnas so/ /'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste/ /sems can khams ni rab dgrol byed/ /bde chen rgyal po rang nyid ni/ /dngos
191a7(rgyud 'grel): po kun la rnam par gnas/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa la sogs pa/ /pad+mar bya ba ji bzhin gyis/ /bde chen rgyal po rang nyid ni/ /'di nyid na ni rtag tu bzhugs/ /b+haM dza mokA ho:zhes so/ /de nas rang nyid 'khor lo sdom pa'i sku dang shes
191b1(rgyud 'grel): rab phag mo'i gzugs su bskyed nas hI hUM dag las skyes pa'i pad+ma dang rdo rje dag A:aoM yig las skyes pa'i lte ba dang nor bur bsams nas rdo rje'i kha phaT yig ser po dang shing yig bya ste/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i rtsa g.yon na
191b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas shing 'dug pa sor mos cung zad bskul bas shes nas de bla mas brjod pa las so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga tA nu rA ga Na badzrA swa b+hA bAt+ma ko haM/ zhes brjod cing/ bla mas nye bar bstan pa'i dga' ba'i dbye ba rnams rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi
191b3(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyis bkug pa'i dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus bla mas byin pa'i 'khor lo'i mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i yid kyi dga' ba brtsam par bya'o/ /rdo rje pad+mar rab gzhag nas//
191b4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems ni dbyung mi bya/ /bskyod par byas nas de dga' ba'i/ /sems kyis gang bar bsgom par bya/ /ye shes 'di ni che phra zhing/ /byang chub snying po mkha' 'dra ba/ /rdul bral thar ster zhi ba nyid/ /khyod kyi pa yang rang nyid do/ /rnal
191b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa yis ji srid du/ /byang chub sems 'dor mi byed pa/ /de srid rgyun mi 'chad pa yi/ /dga' ba ci yang 'thob par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems ni ltung? gyur na/ /dngos grub kun gyi gter yin pas/ /phung po rnam shes brgyal
191b6(rgyud 'grel): ba la// ma smad dngos grub ga la yod/ /mkha' dbyings rdo rje sbyor ba las/ /reg pa'i bde ba rmad byung che/ /gang de mchog tu dga' ba yi/ /byed pa po ste bskyed bar bya/ /mchog dang dga' bral dag gi dbus/ /brtan par
191b7(rgyud 'grel): mtshon la brtag par bya/ /pad+ma'i nam mkhar nor bu yi/ /lte ba bsdoms pa'i gnas su'o/ /rdo rje skyil krung gi sems ni/ /no 'bur nang du gnas par blta/ /gang gang ye shes skye 'gyur ba/ /ye shes rang bzhin de yis chog /'dod
192a1(rgyud 'grel): chags med cing chags bral med/ /dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs te/ /rnal 'byor gang tshe ye shes mthong/ /bde ba brtan bya 'gyur ba'ang min/ /thun nas yang na nyin mo gcig /zla ba 'am zla phyed lo dang ni/ /bskal
192a2(rgyud 'grel): pa 'am bskal pa stong du yang/ /ye shes mngon par sbyor bas gnas/ /slob mas cha shas gzung nas ni/ /pad+ma'i lto bar phyung ba na/ /de nas ro ma yis ni sems/ /byang chub sngon du 'gro bas gzung/ /shes rab las lhan cig skyes pa'i
192a3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes zhes bya ba ni shes rab ye shes so// //de nas ji skad bshad pa'i chogs shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba nyid la 'bras bur gyur pa bzhi pa'i dbang sbyin par bya'o/ /yang gsungs pa/ ji skad gsungs pa'i

192a5(rgyud 'grel): par bya zhe na/ du pa las ni mer shes dang/ /chu skyar las ni chu shes pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' yi ni rigs/ /blo dang ldan pas mtshan mas shes/ /bzhin gyi chu skes rab dang zhing/ /dga' bas lus kyi spu ldang ba/ /de nyid mthong nas
192a6(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pa yi/ /slob ma dam pa rjes gzung bya/ /shes rab ye shes de nyid myu gur gyur pa'i byang chub kyi sems bsgom pas rab tu 'phel bzhin pa/ sgrib pa med pa nyid dang ldan pa'i de kho na nyid chos thams cad bsam gyis mi
192a7(rgyud 'grel): khyab pa'i rang bzhin yan lag bdun dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rang bzhin ni bzhi pa'i don yin no/ /yang gsungs pa/ der ni thog ma dbus mdza' med/ /srid min mya ngan 'das pa min/ /bdag
192b1(rgyud 'grel): med gzhan yang med pa ste/ /'di de mchog tu bde chen po/ /yang gsungs pa/ rgyu dang bral zhing 'gro la rtag tu shar/ /gang zhig dus su des bar gsungs pa na/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'ang tshig gi dbul 'gyur ba/ /bde pa'i rgyal
192b2(rgyud 'grel): po gcig pu rgyal gyur cig /bla mas bstan pa ma yin na/ /slob mas go ba ma yin te/ /lhan cig skyes pa bdud rtsi'i ro/ /su la su zhig gis ni brjod/ /blo yi spyod yul ma yin pas na tshig gis gdags pa med/ /rgya chen po
192b3(rgyud 'grel): la bla mas gzhag pa gtam gyi 'jug pa gzhi/ /de ni rim gyis snying rje la sogs yon tan la 'doms te/ /dang? ldan rnams kyi snying gi gnas su rang nyid 'byung ba yin/ /'o na byang chub kyi sems skyes pa'i mtshan nyid ci zhe na/ gnyid log
192b4(rgyud 'grel): pa yi dbang po bzhin/ /yid ni snang med thim 'dra ba/ /g.yo med bzhin duAng snang ba yi/ /lus ni dam pa'i bde bas brgyal/ /dbang po'i sde rnams 'jug pa med pa dang/ /srid pa'i sa bon rnam rtog mdza' dag nyams/ /kun tu
192b5(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba 'di de mkha' mtshungs kyang/ /bsil ba thob pa'i myong ba a la la/ /'dir ni dbang ni thim par gyur/ /bdag kyang de bzhin song ba'i che/ /lhan skyes dga' ba sbyin byed pa/ /bla ma'i zhabs la gsal bar dris/ /de nyid
192b6(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa/ gang zhig shar du tshe na dbang po dang/ /yul rnams mnyam du nub gyur de la 'dud/ /mkhas dang 'gro ba'i snying la ci yang gnas/ /phyis ni mngon dga' rgyal ba'i mdzes sku gcig /de bas na/ 'di na dam pa'i bde ba'i
192b7(rgyud 'grel): stobs las blo/ /gang gi rnam par rtog pa mdza' dag bcom/ /mkhas pa de ni bya ba byas pa ste/ /gzhan pa de rnams rkang gnyis phyugs yin no/ /gang du dngos dang dngos med bral zhing dben/ /rang gsal 'dzag pa'i dga' ba'i
193a1(rgyud 'grel): rang bzin rgyas/ /'di ni nam mkha' i mthar yang khyab par byed/ /rnam pa thams cad dang bral dri ma med/ /dkyil 'khor phal cher de yis gsal bar mthong/ /bde ba thams cad kyi ni gzhir gyur te/ /lhan
193a2(rgyud 'grel): cig skyes pa'i dga' ba bzhi par brjod/ /de'i phyir the tshom med par sku gsum gyi rjes su 'jug pa mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen po kho na bzhi par shes par bya'o/ /zhes bya'o/ /de ltar dbang bskur ba thob pa'i slob mas bya ba byas
193a3(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di brjod par bya ste/ deng bdag skye ba 'bras bur bcas/ /bdag gi gson pa'ang 'bras bur bcas/ /de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes/ /sangs rgyas sras su bdag gyur to zhes so/ /de nas bla ma la de bzhin gshegs pas
193a4(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa'i yon dbul bar bya ste/ sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang gos la sogs pa dang/ khyad par du rang gi lus so zhes bya ba ni mngon par dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o// //de nas slob dpon gyis rgyas pa dang
193a5(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba'i phyir tshe ga bzhin sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de la me'i lha mo la bskyed par gyur pa na slob ma'i mthe bong nas gzung nas kha dog lnga'i srad bus yang dag par bcings pas sam/ rang nyid rgyas pa dang zhi pa'i sbyin sreg bya ste/ me
193a6(rgyud 'grel): la mar gyis bkang ba'i mthar thug pa byas nas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa'i rdzas rnams kyi dkyil 'khor chen po mchong cing gang dang glu dang rol mo la sogs pa'i yo byad dang bcas pa'i dam tshig gi kun tu spyod pas
193a7(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma'i cho ga rnams kyis 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i bdag po tshom zhing yang dag par mchod nas sbyin bsreg gi bya ba rdzogs par byas te/ slob ma'i 'dod pas yon sbyin pa sngon du 'gro ba'i
193b1(rgyud 'grel): mchod pas dgyes pa dang/ de nas 'thon nas phyi rol tu gzhag pa'i phyogs kyi gtor ma'i mthar zhugs nas 'khor lo la phyag byas te/ 'khor lo'i dbang po la mchod yon la sogs pa phul nas dge ba bsngos te dkyil 'khor la
193b2(rgyud 'grel): lan gsum du bskor nas shar sgor 'dug ste bcom ldan 'das la mngon du phyogs pas he ru ka'i yi ge brgya pa lan gsum brjod cing/ ma rnyed shes bya ba la sogs pas bzod par gsol nas/ oM khyed kyis zhes bya ba la soD
193b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ oM A:hUM badzra mu:zhes bya bas ye shes 'khor lo gshegs su gsol nas dam tshig gi 'khor lo bdag nyid la nang du bcug ste/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarbba d+harmmA Ni A bya nutdaNna? twAt/ oM A:hUM phaT swAhA/ oM A:hUM mu:?
193b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod cing chos thams cad skye ba med par mos pas dril bu dkrol zhing lag par gnas pa'i rdo rjes dang por sgo nas brtsams te tshangs pa'i thig gi lam nas gtso po'i gnas ji srid par dbyi zhing rang gi spyi bor rdul chen? cung zad

193b7(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa'i brgya bzlas nas 'o mas bkru bar bya zhing phur bu'i lha rnams kyang gshegs su gsol te khung? bu yang dgang bar bya'o/ /zhi ba la sogs pa don du gnyer ba yong na sbyin zhing rdul tshon lhag ma rnams ni rnam par rgyal ba'i
194a1(rgyud 'grel): bum par blug nas glang po che la sogs pa'i gzhon pa'i steng du bkod nas gos la sogs pas brgyan zhing/ rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis gzung ba'i do li la gnas pa'i slob dpon nam dril bu dang

194a7(rgyud 'grel): oM A:padmA ya hUM swA hA/ oM A:tak+Sha kA ya hUM swAhA/ oM A:bA su ka ye hUM swAhA/ oM A:mahA padmA? ya hUM swAhA/ oM A:shaM kha pA lA ya hUM swAhA/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): kark+ko Ta kA ya hUM swAhA/ oM A:ku li kA ya hUM swAhA/ zhes bya ba

194b6(rgyud 'grel): ni kun da de nyid rang gi lag par gzung nas de nyid kyis bkrus pa'i bum pas so sor blangs nas bum pa de chus gang ba byas shing bkra shis kyi glus bla ma'i spyan sngar 'gro ba byas nas yang dkyil 'khor gyi khang par zhugs nas

195a3(rgyud 'grel): chos la thugs gcig pa/ chos mkhas blo yi dbang po chos kyi blo gros mi yi dbang/ /de yis bdag la gsol ba btab las dkyil 'khor cho ga rnams/ /cher gsal 'di byas pa ni skye bo gzhan la phan phyir ro/ /zhes

197b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa dang/ /gang gi rang bzhin du dag pa sgyu ma lta bu'i lha dang/ ji ltar dag pa skye med du dag pa'o/ /bdag gir 'dzin pa dag par bya ba'i phyir/ /de nas rdo rje'i ra ba bsam par bya ste/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/ bdag
197b3(rgyud 'grel): gi snying gar nyi ma la gnas pa'i hUM 'od zer gyi phreng ba 'phro ba bsams la/ de las 'od zer sna tshogs 'phros pas bdag dang khams gsum pa'i dngos po thams cad sgyu ma ltar skye med du shes par byas nas/ /tshur 'dus pas
197b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag khams gsum rnam rgyal du bsams pa ste/ /bdag gir zhen pa las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyir ro/ /de ltar bdag med pa'i shes rab de'i las dang mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir ra ba la sogs pa bsams pa ste/ de yang
197b5(rgyud 'grel): oM sum b+ha la sogs pa'i sngags bzhi phyogs bzhir bsam de las rdo rje'i ra ba gru bzhi pa bsam par bya'o/ /sa gzhi ni hUM las sna tshogs rdo rjer bsams la/ de'i 'od kyi snang bas bla re dang/ gur dang/ mda'i bra ba dang/
197b6(rgyud 'grel): me'i rab bsam par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje'i ra ba dang me'i ra ba'i bar du shar du khwa gdong /byang du 'ug gdong/ nub tu khyi gdong/ lhor phyag gdong ma bzhi/ mtshams rnams su mtshams ma bzhi/ steng khwa gdong dang 'og khyi
197b7(rgyud 'grel): gdong can bsgom par bya'o/ /de yang le'u bcu 'dun pa las/ /khro bo rnam rgyal la sogs pa/ sgo dang mdza' yi mtshams rnams su/ /sna tshogs 'dul pa'i thabs can gyis /sems can don la brtson par mdzad/ ces pas
198a1(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs 'dul ba'i thabs ni bud med kyi 'dul pa rnams la bka' bsgo rnams su sprul pa'i phyir ro/ /de rnams kyi phyag na khro bo'i phur pa bsnams par bsams la/ yang sngags mtshan bzhi brjod
198a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ hUM gi 'od zer gyi sgo las khro bo zhags pa dang lcags kyu bsnams pa rnams kyis phyogs bcu nas bgegs thams cad bkug pa la phur bu gdab pa ste/ oM g+ha:g+ha(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa brjod par bya'o/ /de nas mud ga ras
198a3(rgyud 'grel): brdung bar bya'o/ /de ltar na shes rab de nyid kyi las dang mtshan nyid ma phyed cing 'byed pa dang/ rtog pa dang/ lhan cig mi gnas pa dang/ de nyid bsreg pa'i phyir rdo rje ra ba dang/ khro bo'i ra ba dang/ me'i ra pa'o/ /zhe sdang gis
198a4(rgyud 'grel): bslar? ba'i brdeg pa ni ma yin no/ /'o na kun rdzob tu gnod bya gnod byed med do zhe na ni rgyu 'bras la skur pa yang yin la/ yang na ni tha dang kyi tshul gyis bzlog pa la 'gal ba med do zhe na/ kun rdzob tu rgyu 'bras med pa ma
198a5(rgyud 'grel): yin gyi/ 'on kyang zhe sdang gis bslad pa'i sbyor pas bzlog par bya ba ma yin te/ kun rdzob nyid du yang byams pa la sogs pa'i go cha dang don dam par skye med du shes pas so/ /de yang ci zhe na/ kun rdzob tu chos
198a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad sems tsam las gzhan ma yin te/ de bas na sems la sogs par g.yo ba nyid bdung dang bgegs yin no/ /de yang ngan song sbyong ba'i rgyud las/ ji srid yid kyi lo ga g.yo ba de srid bdud kyi spyod yul
198a7(rgyud 'grel): lo/ zhes gsungs so/ /sems gnyen po las 'khyar ba nyid bdud la sogs pa yin no/ /'o na sangs rgyas las ches mkhas pa yod pa ma yin pa na thams cad la grags pa yin la/ de rgyud las bshad pa ci zhe na/
198b1(rgyud 'grel): de? ni bden mod kyi rang don du gnas pa gang yang med do/ /de'i phyir nges brjod las/ mi gsod gsod pa med pa yin/ /gang gis rang sems thul ba yis/ /bdag gi sems ni bcings pa yin/ /gang la gang gis gsod pa
198b2(rgyud 'grel): yod/ ces pa dang/ yang byams pa'i go cha bgos pa dang/ /snying rje chos kyi go cha yin/ /shes rab mtshon char ldan pa yis/ /nyon mongs bdud rnams bzlog par bya/ /bka' yis 'khor lo bsrung ba che/ /phur bus bgegs
198b3(rgyud 'grel): med dngos grub 'gyur/ /bsrung ba'i cho ga 'di dag gis/ /bsgrub pa po la byang chub stsol/ /gtso bo'i bka' ni blang bar bgyi/ /rnal 'byor par ni gar gnas par/ /bgegs rnams thams cad med par mthong zhes gsungs pa'i
198b4(rgyud 'grel): phyir ro/ /de ltar ma yin par bka' la lob par rtogs te ngan pa'i las dang ldan pa ngo bo nyid kyis 'og tu 'gro? ba la phyogs pa nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i zhags pas bcings pa zho chun ltar 'khor ba rnams dang khyad par med
198b5(rgyud 'grel): pas lam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa yang ma yin no/ /de ltar bdag med pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa la khyad par can gyi tshogs skye bas de nas shes bya ba la sogs pa la/ de yang yul gang la brten nas rdzoD
198b6(rgyud 'grel): pa ni lha dang bla ma las te/ de nas shes pa ni khams gsum rnam rgyal he ru kar bsgyur la/ de'i snying gar a las zla ba de'i steng du hUM 'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba bsam pa'o/ hUM de'i 'od kyi snang bas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
198b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas ming? pa la he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor sum cu rtsa bdun no/ /bla ma ni der dbang bzhi bskur ba'o/ /sogs pa ni bla ma gzhan dang mgran gyi lha sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' o/ /bltas la zhes pa ni/ tha mi dad par blta ste/
199a1(rgyud 'grel): de yang snying ga'i 'od zer gyis bla ma'i drin dran pa'i tshul gyis/ bzhu la he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor la bstim/ de ltar lha dang bla ma tha dad med pa la mchod pa la sogs bya'o/ /gang gi don du zhe na/ sdug bsngal
199a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi me 'bar ba rnams kyi don du'o/ /tshul ji ltar rdzogs zhe na/ skye med du shes pa'i tshul gyis so/ /de ltar bsod nams kyi tshogs dang ldan pa la ye shes kyi tshogs skye bas/ de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/ oM swa b+hA ba shud d+ha:
199a3(rgyud 'grel): ste rang bzhin dag pa'o/ /gang dag ce na/ sarba d+harmmA(rgyud 'grel): ste chos thams cad do/ /ci'i rang bzhin du dag ce na/ sgyu ma la sogs par ro/ /de la don ni 'di yin te/ gzung 'dzin la sogs pa dang bral ba brdzun pa'i rnam par rtog pa gom
199a4(rgyud 'grel): par byas pa'i bag chags kyis bsgos pa'i rang gi'i sems snang ba rmi lam la sogs pa dang/ khams gsum po 'di dag khyad par med par btags la/ snang ba tsam po de yang stong pa nyid du bsam pa'i phyir yang ni stong pa nyid
199a5(rgyud 'grel): bsam bya ste/ zhes pa la sogs pa la yang gi sgra ni sngar sgyu ma lta bur bsgom pa las ltos so/ /gang stong pa nyid du bsgom zhe na/ byang chub kyi tshogs la sogs pa ste/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos thams cad dang/ rnam par
199a6(rgyud 'grel): byang ba bsod nams kyi tshogs ni byang chub kyi tshogs so/ /de yang rang gi sems tsam las gzhan min la de nyid yor ltar snang ba'o/ /de nyid ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin no/ /de nas oM shU n+ya la sogs pa'i sngags brjod pa sngon
199a7(rgyud 'grel): du 'gro bas brdzun pa'i rnam par rtog pa goms pa'i dbang gis rang gi sems sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i snod bcud kyis 'jig rten du rnam par 'khrul pa'i dri ma sbyang ba'i phyir ji ltar nam mkha' sgrib g.yogs ni/ rdul dang/ khug rna
199b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ du ba dang/ kha ba dang sprin dang bral ba'i ston ka'i nyi ma byed kyi dkyil ltar/ 'jig rten gsum po ma lus pa thams cad stong pa 'od gsal pa'i rang bzhin du bsgom pa ni nam mkha' rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ e'i cha byad bzang po'o/ /de ltar
199b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags rnam pa gnyis lan gsum brjod pa ni/ stong pa nyid rtogs nus pa dang/ stong pa nyid kyi dran pa gso ba dang/ gnas pa brtan pa dang/ ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs pa dang/ tha mal pa'i lus ngag yid gsum spong ba dang/
199b3(rgyud 'grel): rten dang brten pa thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rnam 'phrul du rtogs pa'i phyir ro/ /da ni e'i cha byad la dbus su laM gis brgyan pa'i phyir/ de nas langs la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/ 'byung ba bzhi dang ri rab bskyed pa ni go sla'o/ /de nas
199b4(rgyud 'grel): rten dang brten par bcas pa'i lha bskyed pa'i phyir/ de'i dbus su A li kA li sbyor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/ A li bcu drug shes rab kyi rang bzhin yongs su gyur pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang/ kA li sum cu rtsa bzhi thabs kyi rang bzhin
199b5(rgyud 'grel): yongs su gyur pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya'o/ /de'i dbus su shes bya ba ni nyi zla'i bar du hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga pa rdo rje sems dpa' i rang bzhin can de'i lte ba la yi ge hUM 'od zer gyi phreng ba 'phro par bsam par bya'o/ /de'i 'od zer gyi 'gro
199b6(rgyud 'grel): ba thams cad gyi zag bcas kyi phung po thams cad sbyangs nas/ zag med dpal he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor du byas te slar bsdus la/ de yongs su gyur pa ni de rnams las dpal he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rten dang brten par bcas
199b7(rgyud 'grel): pa bsam par bya'o/ /zla ba la me long lta bu'i ye shes dang nyi ma la mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang hUM 'od zer gyi phreng ba so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang/ 'od zer gyis gzhan don byas pa bya ba grub pa'i ye shes dang rdzogs pa chos
200a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes las byang chub pa'o/ /zla ba la chos lnga ste/ dkar ba dang/ cha bcu drug pa dang/ mun pa sel ba dang/ tsha ba'i gdung bzhi par byed pa dang/ 'jig rten gyis mthong
200a2(rgyud 'grel): na dga' ba'o/ /de bzhin du kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems kyang dkar ba dang/ cha bcu drug pa dang/ lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes gsal bar byed pa dang/ nyon mongs pa 'dod chags kyi gdung ba zhi bar byed pa dang/ sems can dga' ba
200a3(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa'o/ /de bzhin du don dam pa byang chub kyi sems kyang/ nyes pa'i skyon med pas dkar ba dang/ nang la sogs pa stong pa nyid bcu drug ston pas cha bcu drug dang/ ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba dang/ nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba zhi
200a4(rgyud 'grel): bar byed pa dang/ 'od gsal mthong bas dga' ba bskyed pa'o/ /nyi ma la chos gsum ste/ dmar ba dang/ 'dam rdzab skems pa dang/ myu gu la sogs pa smin par byed pa'o/ /de bzhin du kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems kyang/ thig le dmar ba
200a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ 'dod chags la sogs pa zhi bar byed pa dang/ bu tsha la sogs pa 'phel bar byed pa'o/ /de bzhin du snying rjes sems can la chags pas dmar bar chos mthun pa dang/ nyon mongs pa'i 'dam rdzab skems pa dang/
200a6(rgyud 'grel): thabs dge pa'i myu gu la sogs pa smin par byed pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i rang bzhin la/ rgyu 'bras byang chub kyi sems cha gnyis ston pas cha gnyis dang/ gdul bya'i rgyud la 'phro bas 'khor lo dang/ spros pa'i mdza' brgyad
200a7(rgyud 'grel): dang bral bas rtsibs brgyad dang/ mi'i seng+ger gyur pas seng thod dang/ gdul bya 'dul bas khro zhal dang/ sems can smin par byed pa la chags pas pad+ma dang/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pas nyi zla dang/ snying rjes sems
200b1(rgyud 'grel): can mi gtong bas chu srin gyi khams byung ba'o/ /thugs rjes khyab pa'i phyir kha gyes pa dang/ ye shes bzhi chos kyi dbyer su 'dus pas rtse mo nang du 'dus pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpas chos nyid dngos su ma byas pas ni cung zad kha gyes pa'o/ /de
200b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings ji lta par thugs su chud pas rdo rje rtse mo 'dus pa'o/ /sems can dang sangs rgyas rang bzhin mi mnyam pa med pas dbus rtse mo thal byung du byung pa'o/ /lus ngag yid gsum yongs su dag pas cha gsum pa'i
200b3(rgyud 'grel): cha gzungs dang ldan pa'o/ /'od zer spro bsdu la chos bzhi dang ldan pas chos mthun bzhi yin te/ /nam mkha' las 'byung ba dang/ rang gzhan gsal bar byed pa dang/ mun pa 'dzoms pa dang/ thams cad la khyab pa'o/ /de bzhin du
200b4(rgyud 'grel): spro bsdus 'gro don byed pa yang/ rgyu stong pa nyid las byung ba dang/ 'od zer lnga dang ldan pa dang/ nyon mongs pa lnga 'dzoms pa dang/ /sems can rang gi 'dod pa'i lhar gyur pa'i phyir khyab pa'o/ /nga ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag
200b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ye shes las byang chub pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir/ dpal he'u ka nyi ma la bzhugs shing dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang bcas pa/ dur khrod brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o zhes bya ba la/ dur khrod brgyad ni gtum drag dang/ tshang
200b6(rgyud 'grel): ching dang 'bar bas khyab pa dang/ rkeng rus can 'jigs su rung ba'o/ /ha ha rgod dang/ dpal 'dzin dang/ mun chen dang/ /ca co sgrogs pa'o/ /zhing skyong brgyad ni/ seng+ge'i gdod can ser po/ /ce sbyang gi gdod can dkar po dang/ khyi'i
200b7(rgyud 'grel): gdong can dmar po dang/ stag gi gdong can ljang gu dang/ khwa'i gdong can ser po dang/ /lcung? ka'i gdong can sngon po dang/ khyu mchog gi gdong can ser po dang/ ug shud kyi gdong can ser po'o/ /de dag ma'i gzugs can shing 
201a1(rgyud 'grel): las ro stong byung ba'o/ /de la zhing skyong brgyad ni/ sangs rgyas rabs bdun dang byams pa ste brgyad do/ /gdul bya la gdong tha dad par bstan pa'o/ /byang chub kyi shing brgyad dang/ klu brgyad dang nyon mongs pa brgyad
201a2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ sprin brgyad dang ye shes brgyad dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad thugs rje chen po'o/ /de la rnal 'byor ba dur khrod brgyad kyis dben par gnas pa ni/ nges 'byung gi yan lag mi rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal rtogs par byed pa
201a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ 'jig rten gyi chos la chags pa spong pa'i phyir ro/ /de la brten nas nges 'byung gi lam skye med rtogs pa'i phyir dpal he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor nang du gnas pa'o/ /de bas na mi rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal rtogS pa la
