276b2(rgyud 'grel): ? pa ni kang rus chen po dang gtum pa'i mig can ma ste/ brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o/ /skra dang spu ni keng rus chen po'o/ /nub dang rna ba g.yas pa uDDyA na la kang rus dang 'od ldan ma ste/ dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o/ /phags pa
276b3(rgyud 'grel): dang dri ma la ni keng rus so/ /lho dang mgo bo'i rgyab arbu da la ni mche ba gtsigs pa dang sna chen mo ste/ sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o/ /shal ni mche ba gtsigs pa'o/ /gnas de bzhi sa rab tu dga' ba'o/ /me'i phyogs dang rna ba g.yon pa go dA?
276b4(rgyud 'grel): ril ni chang dgra dang brtan pa'i blo can ma ste ngad pa'i dbang po'o/ /rtsa rgyus ni chad dgra'o/ /bden bral gyi phyogs dang smin ma'i dbus su bA? me shwar la ni 'od dpag med dang mi'u thung ma ste/ brtson 'grus gyi dbang po'o/ /rus pa la ni 'od ?
276b5(rgyud 'grel): tu med pa'o/ /rlung gi phyogs dang mig de bi ko Ti la rdo rje'i 'od dang lang+ga'i dbang phyug ma ste/ dran pa'i dbang po'o/ /mkhal ma la ni rdo rje'i 'od do/ /dbang ldan gyi phyogs dang phrag pa gnyis mA la ba la rdo rje'i sku dang shing sgrib ma ste//
276b6(rgyud 'grel): ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o/ /snying rje ni rdo rje'i sku'o/ /nye ba'i gnas te sa dri ma med pa'o/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo min mkha' la rgyu ba'o/ /gsung gi 'khor lo dmar po pad+ma'i phreng bas brgyan pa'i shar gyi rtsibs dang/ mchan khud kA ma
276b7(rgyud 'grel): rU pa la ni myu gu can dang sa srungs ma ste/ shes rab kyi dbang po'o/ /mig ni myu gu can no/ /byang dang nu ma o dre la ni rdo rje ral pa can dang 'jigs byed chen mo ste dang pa'i stobs so/ /mkhris pa ni rdo rje'i ral pa can no/ /zhing ste sa 'od
277a1(rgyud 'grel): byed pa can no/ /nub dang lte ba tri sha ku ne la ni dpa' bo chen po dang/ rlung gi shugs can ma ste brtson 'grus kyi stobs so/ /glo ba ni dpa' bo chen po'o/ /lto dang sna'i dbang po ki sa la la ni rdo rje hUM mdzad dang chang
277a2(rgyud 'grel): 'thung ma ste dran pa'i stobs so/ /rgyu ma ni rdo rje hUM mdzad do/ /nye ba'i zhing ste ma 'od 'phro ba can no/ /me'i phyogs dang kha ka ling+ga la ni rab tu bzang po dang lha mo sngo bsangs ma ste ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs so/ /gnye ma ni rab tu bzang po'o/ /bden
277a3(rgyud 'grel): bral gyi phyogs dang mgrin pa lam pa ka la ni rdo rje bzang po dang shin tu bzang mo ste shes rab kyi stobs so/ /lto ba ni rdo rje bzang po'o/ /tshan do ha ste sa shin tu spyang dka' ba'o/ /rlung gi phyogs dang snying ga kany+tsa la ni 'jigs
277a4(rgyud 'grel): byed chen po dang/ rta rna ma'o/ /ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go /lgangs pa ni 'jigs byed chen mo'o/ /dbang ldan gyi phyogs dang 'doms hi ma lA yi ni mi bzang dang/ bya gdong ma ste brtson 'grus yang dag byang
277a5(rgyud 'grel): chub kyi yan lag go /'doms par ni mig mi bzang ngo/ /nye ba'i tshan ngo ha ste sa mngon du gyur pa'o/ /sa la rgyu ba'o/ /sku'i 'khor lo dkar po'i khor lo'i phreng bas brgyan pa'i shar gyi rtsibs dang mtshan ma bre ta pu ri la stobs
277a6(rgyud 'grel): po che dang 'khor lo'i shugs can ma ste dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go /bad kan ni stobs po chen po'o/ /byang dang bshad lam gri ha de ba tAr rin chen rdo rje dang khaN+Da ro ha ste/ shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi
277a7(rgyud 'grel): yan lag go /rnag la ni rdo rje rin chen no/ /'dus pa can te sa ring du song ba'o/ /nub dang brla gnyis so'u raSh+Ta la rta mgrin dang shoN+Di ni ste/ chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go /khrab ni rta mgrin no/ /lha dang byin?
277b1(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyis su ? nam mkha' i snying po dang/ 'khor lo'i go cha mA ste/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/ rdul ni nam mkha' i snying po'o/ /nye ba'i 'dus pa can te sa mi g.yo pa'o/ /ma'i phyogs dang rkang pa'i sor mo la na ga ra la dpel he ru
277b2(rgyud 'grel): ka dang shin tu dpa' mo ste/ btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yin lag go /tshil ni dpal he ru ka'o/ /bden bral gyi phyogs dang rkang pa'i bol sin d+hu la pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang stobs chen ma ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba'o/ /mchim ni pad+ma
277b3(rgyud 'grel): gar gyi dbang phyug go /dur khrod des legs pa'i blo gris/ /rlung gi phyogs dang mthe bor ma rol rnams par snang mdzad dang 'khor lo sgyur ma ste/ yang dag pa'i rtog pa'o/ /mchil ma ni rnam par snang mdzad do/ /dbang ldan gyi phyogs dang bus
277b4(rgyud 'grel): mo gnyis ku lu tar rdo rje sems dpa' dang brtson 'grus chen mo ste yang dag pa'i dag go /snabs ni rdo rje sems dpa' o/ /nye bar dur khrod de sa chos kyi sprin no/ /sa 'og tu 'gyur ro/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo sku mdog nag po gsung gi 'khor lo
277b5(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog dmar po/ sku'i 'khor lo sku mdog dkar po/ thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa dpa' bo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ rdo rje dril bus snyoms par zhugs pa g.yas brkyang pa'i bzhugs pa/ ral pa'i cod pan dang dar dbyangs can
277b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya lnga 'chang ba'o/ /rab tu gtum mo la sogs pa ni phyag gnyis zhal gcig pa/ ka pA la dang gdug pa dang/ sdigS mdzub gri gug bsnams pas 'khyud/ /spyan gsum drag po'i gzugs can ma /skra grol bas ni rnam par spros/ /
277b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med spyod pas snyoms par zhugs/ /nam mkha' i gos mnabs pa la gzhol lha mo phyag rgya lnga 'chang ba/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o/ /shar dang byang dang nub dng lho'i sgo rnams la / khwa gdong ma dang 'ug pa'i gdong can ma
278a1(rgyud 'grel): dang khyi'i gdong can ma dang/ phag gi gdong can ma'o/ /me'i phyogs dang bde ba bral gyi phyogs dang rlung gi phyogs dang/ dbang ldan gyi phyogs rnams la gshin rje brtan ma dang/ gshin rje pho nya mo dang/ gshin rje 'jom
278a2(rgyud 'grel): ma'o/ /ji ltar mkha' 'gro sogs 'gro ba/ /khwa gdong la sogs la sogs dbye/ /de bzhin mtshaMs gnaS lha mo ni/ /gzugs gnyis yid ni 'phrog pa'o/ /yi dwags gdan ni 'jigs byed po/ /sems can don mdzad pa la brtson/ /
278a3(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi dpral ba la rdo rje'i phreng ba'o/ /lus kyi dkyil 'khor la lag pa yon pa'i rtse mo la khwa gdong ma ste/ yang dag pa'i las kyi mdza' o/ /mkhrig ma la ni 'ug gdong ma ste yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'o/ /? pa
278a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa'i rtse mo la ni khyi gdong ma ste/ yang dag pa'i rtsol ba'o/ /'khrig ma la ni phag gdong ma ste yang dag pa'i dran pa'o/ /rkang pa g.yas pa'i rtse mo la ni gshin rje brtan ma ste/ dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa?
278a5(rgyud 'grel): tshul can no/ /rkang pa g.yon pa'i rtse mo la ni gshin rje pho nya ma ste/ dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par bsrung ba'o/ /rkang pa g.yas pa'i long mo la ni gshin rje mche ba ste/ mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spong ba yang dag par
278a6(rgyud 'grel): Fsgrub ba 'byed pa'o/ /rkang pa g.yon pa'i long mo la ni gshin rje 'joms pa ste/ mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams kun nas mi skye bar byed pa'o/ /snying ga'i pad+ma'i lte ba'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das thig le'i gzugs can no/ /phyoD?
278a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi'o/ /lte ba'i pad+ma la ni rdo rje phag mo phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin no/ /de ltar phyi dang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor/ /da ni phung po la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa ste/ gzugs kyi phung
278b1(rgyud 'grel): po rnam bar snang mdzad do/ /tshor ba'i phung po rdo rje nyi ma'o/ /'du shes kyi phung po pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dbang phyug go /'du byed gyi phung po ni rdo rje rgyal po'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni rdo rje sems dpa' o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid
278b2(rgyud 'grel): ni dpal he ru ka'o/ /mig la gti mug rdo rje'o/ /rna ba la ni zhe sdang rdo rje'o/ /sna la ni phrag dog rdo rje'o/ /kha la ni 'dod chags rdo rje'o lus la ser sna rdo rje'o/ /skye mched thams cad la ni dpal he ru ka'i dbang phyug go /sa'i khams ni ltung byed
278b3(rgyud 'grel): ma'o/ /chu'i khams ni gsod byed ma'o/ /me'i khams ni 'gugs byed ma'o/ /rlung gis khams ni gar gyi dbang phyug ma'o/ /nam mkha' i khams la ni rnal 'byor ma'i dra ba ste/ de ltar phung po dang khams dang skye mched dag la lha nyid kyi brgyal
278b4(rgyud 'grel): bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas mgo bo la yi ge oM gyis sku byin gyis brlab po/ /lkog ma la ni yi ge A(rgyud 'grel): sa gsung byin gyis brlab po/ /snying ga la ni yi ge hUM gis thugs byin gyis brlab bo/ /lkog ma la snying ga'i dbus su yi ge has ye shes sems
278b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' byin gyi brlab po/ /de dag zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bsam mo/ /oM sarbba bI ra yo gi ni kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): de nas ye shes sems dpa' las spros pa'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyus ye shes kyi dkyil

279a1(rgyud 'grel): cha'o/ /bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i go cha'o/ /lte ba la oM baM rdo rje phag mo'o/ /snying ga la haM oM thun mtshams ma'o/ /kha la h+rIM oM rmongs byed ma'o/ /mgo bo la h+reM h+rEM? skyod byed ma'o/ /spyi

279a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi dam tshig gi /sems ni sems kyi legs mtshon pa/ /kun rtog thams cad spangs nas ni/ /bsgom dang ldan pa'i bzlas pa bya/ /dam tshig mchog gi bzlas pa yis/ /de nas gsang sngags brjod par bya'o/ /hAswA

279b2(rgyud 'grel): lha mo'i snying po dang/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi ni rang gi ming gi yi ge oM dang hUM gi bar du chud pa'i yi ge hUM dang phaT kyi mdza' can dag yin no/ /dpa' bo rnams kyi ni ka ra ka ra la sogs pa'i de kho na bzhin du bzlas so//
279b3(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs nas ni/ /zla ba'i btung mchog btung bar bya/ /chos rnams kun gyi dngos mnyam nyid/ /dam tshig mchog phyir mnyam nyid do/ /chos rnams bdag med lam du ni/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni gzhug

283b1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' gshegs su gsol lo/ /oM khyed kyis 'gro ba'i don kun mdzad/ /rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub gsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang/ /slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol/ /badzra mu(rgyud 'grel): paM baM zhes pas gshegs par
283b2(rgyud 'grel): bsam mo/ /dam tshig sems dpa' rang gi lus la tha mar rang nyid kyi sngags dang/ 'thor 'thung dang gsang gtor sngon du 'gro bas rdzas lhag ma sres la/ de nas yon bdag g.yon du bzhag pa me lha'i zhabs drung gi thal bas ?
283b3(rgyud 'grel): bar thig ye byas pa bstod pa bya ste/ 'jig rten dbang phyug tshangs dbyang mchog gi sras/ /'jig rten me yi rgyal po dag gis dbyang bskur ba/ /shes rab mchog gis nyon mongs thams cad bsreg /'jigs byed ma lha nyid la rnam par
283b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dud/ ces brjod la gshegs par bsam ste/ oM ag na ye e hye hi shwasShAM? tsa pa ri thaM/ sid+d+hi taM/ gats+tsha ma hi/ phya phyug zhes brjod do/ /dam tshig me gdan la thim pa dang/ gdan chu'i rgya mtsho la thim pa dang/ chu rang gi sa
283b5(rgyud 'grel): bon la thim pa dang/ sa bon me gru gsum la thim par bsams la/ me nyid bcos ma'i tha mal par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bsdus pa'i yi ge brgya pa bzlas la/ rang gi lus la go cha bgos te tshams? ma sngags
283b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis bsrung bas bsrungs pa'o/ /lha'i nga rgyal gyis ldang bar bya'o/ /rgyas pa la puSh+TiM ku ru dang dbang la ba shing ku ru dang/ ho zhes pa dang/ drag po la mA ra ya phaT ces pa/ dgug pa la sogs pa la ci rigs par shes par bya'o/
283b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis rgyud dang cho ga gzhan dag las/ btus nas rjes su sbyar gyi rang bzor byas pa min/ /slob mas gsol bdab ngor byas nga rgyal min/ /sbyin sreg byas pa'i dge rtsas 'gro kun khrag 'thung shog /bram ze chen po nyin mdzad
284a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjes rim ba ji lta ba bzhin du sbyar ba rdzogs so// //sgrub thabs kun gzigs bcugs/ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI badzra DA ki nA ma mahA tan tra rA dza ut te yaM bo d+hi tsi t+ta a ba
284a2(rgyud 'grel): lo ka mA la sA d+ha no pi ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las btus pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs byang chub kyi sems kun du gzigs pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po 'phags
284a3(rgyud 'grel): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgyu 'phrul chen mos kun 'khyud pa'i/ /dpa' bo rdo rje can btud nas/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i ri ma pa yis/ /de yi sgrub thabs bri bar bya'o/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid bcos?
284a4(rgyud 'grel): dang por ro ni bsgom par bya/ /sgrub po de yi steng gnas te/ he ru ka nyid bsgom par bya zhes bya ba la/ de la rim pa ni 'di yin te/ rang gi snying gar re pha las/ /byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /de nyid du ni hUM
284a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa/ /thabs dang shes rab gzugs can bsam/ /hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje ni/ /kha dog nag po drag chen po/ /de'i lte ba'i dbus gnas par/ /slar yang hUM gi de nyid bsgom/ /hUM ni yongs su gyur pa las/ /sgrub po
284a6(rgyud 'grel): zhe sdang bdag nyid bsam/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs shing/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lha gzugs bya/ /khro la sa bon sngon po ste/ /rdo rje nyi ma de bzhin no/ /zhi ba'i sa bon zla ba'i mdog /zla ba rdo rje la
284a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas bsam/ /sgrub po lha yi gzugs bzung la/ /de nas lha yi mchod pa sgro/ /lha'i mig dang ldan pa yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad blta bar bya/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs pa/ rnal 'byor bskyed par gsungs pa'o/ /
284b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos sa bon/ /rang snying zla bar bsam nas su/ /bde gshegs de yi 'od zer gyis/ /mdun du bkug par blta bar bya/ /arg+ha la sogs lus byung pa/ /phyi dang gsung pa'i mchod sogs bya/ /de nas phyag
284b2(rgyud 'grel): ni byas na su/ /de 'og bdag nyid 'di ltar dbul/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /kun nas bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni/ /dus 'di nas bzung ji srid du/ /byang chub snying po
284b3(rgyud 'grel): mchis kyi bar/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /yang dag byang chub des mdzad pa/ /de bzhin bla med byang chub sems/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge
284b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /de nas brtsams te mchog tu bzung/ /bslab pa yi ni tshul khrims dang/ /dge pa'i chos ni bsdu ba dang/ /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /bdag gis so sor
284b5(rgyud 'grel): brtan por bzung/ /rdo rje'i rigs mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang/ /yang dag nyid du bzung bgyi zhing/ /slob dpon dag kyang bdag gis gzung/ /rin chen rigs mchog rnal 'byor gyis/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong
284b6(rgyud 'grel): ba la/ /nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi stsal bar bgyi/ /byang chub chen po las byung pa'i/ /pad+ma'i rigs chen dag pa la/ /phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum/ /dam chos yang dag gzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi rig
284b7(rgyud 'grel): mchog chen po la/ /mchod pa ci nus bgyi pa dang/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par bgyi/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub sems/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyi zhing/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /sdom pa ma lus gzung bar
285a1(rgyud 'grel): bgyi/ /ma rgal ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi/ /ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing/ /'gro kun mya ngan 'das la dgod/ /byams dang snying rje byas nas su/ /dge ba
285a2(rgyud 'grel): la ni dga' ba bsgom/ /mi dge'o chos la btang snyoms bya/ /sdig bshags la sogs de bzhin no/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa dang sdom pa gzung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas di? dag ?
285a3(rgyud 'grel): gsol nas/ /de 'og? 'di ltar ? bdag gis mchod pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /gang nas ma byon gar ma gshegs/ /phung po khams dang skyed mched? rnams/ /gang yin lha yi rang bzhin nyid/ /rnal 'byor de nyid rdzogs bya'i phyi? ?
285a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas de nyid bsgom/ /gzugs ni sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad/ /tshor ba rdo rje nyi ma yin/ /'du shes pad+ma gar dbang ste/ /'du byed rdo rgyal po yin/ /rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /'di dag kun dngos rang bzhin no/ /rdo rje
285a5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro zhes bya dgrags/ /yang dag gcig pu chen po'i lha/ /bde ba thams cad rab ster ba/ /sgyu ma chen po'i rang bzhin gyis/ /chags bral chags pa zhes byar bshad/ /sa khams ltung byed ma yin te/ /de bzhin du
285a6(rgyud 'grel): khams gsong ma'o/ /me khams 'gugs byed ma yin te/ /de bzhin rlung ni gar dbang ngo/ /nam mkha' i khams ni sgyu ma cher/ /rang nyid 'gro ma zhes byar bshad/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni ?
285a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mchog /'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin gyis/ /de ni rdo rje gtso mor gnas/ /mig gnyis gti mug rdo rjer bshad/ /nyan pa zhe sdang rdo rjer brjod/ /sna ni ser sna rdo rje ste/ /kha ni 'dod chags rdo rjer gsungs/ /lus ni phrag dog/
285b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ste/ /skye mched thams cad mnyam sbyor bas/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde pa'i mchog /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi rnam par dag pa'o/ oM swa d+hA shud+d+ha:sarba d+hArma:swa d+hA ba shud d+ho taM/ /de nas
285b2(rgyud 'grel): dngos kun las grol ba'i/ /chos kun bdag med mnyam par blte/ /thams cad nam mkha' i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la ni mtshan nyid med/ /khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa'i/ /'gro ba sgyu la lta bu yin/ /brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba yi/ /
285b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba dmigs su med pa ste/ /mthong ba dang ni reg pa'i dngos/ /thams cad sgyu ma ji bzhin no/ /gzugs 'di thams cad stong pa nyid/ /stong pa'i tshul gyi mig gis ni/ /dogs pa med par bsgom pa mchog /rnam par mi rtag pa
285b4(rgyud 'grel): yis blta/ /nam mkha' i tshul gyi sems kyis ni/ /der ni thams cad nam mkha' i dngos/ /dogs pa med pa'i bsgom par ldan/ /rnam par mi rtog skye bar 'gyur/ /oM shu nha ta dz+nyA badzra swa b+hu ba At ma ko haM/ bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis
285b5(rgyud 'grel): gsungs/ /stong pa yin ni byang chub po/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i nyi dkyil la/ /der ni hUM las byung ba yi/ /dbus gnas las kyi rdo rje bsgom/ /slar yang hUM gi de nyid bsam/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba las/ /mkha' 'gro ma ye 'khor sgrogs?
285b6(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa/ /sku mdog dmar mo drag chen mo/ /mdung gi dbyibs can 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /spyan dmar kham sku gyen du brjes/ /lang tsho phun sum tshogs par ldan/ /stag gi pags pa'i na bza' 
285b7(rgyud 'grel): can/ /ljags 'dril pas ni cher 'jigs te/ /'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par mdzad/ /de nas rdo rje sngags spro bya/ /oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM hUM phaT/ /oM grih+Na hUM hUM phaT/ oM grih+NA pa ya grih+NA pa ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho:b+ha ga 
286a1(rgyud 'grel): bAn badyI rA dza hUM hUM phaT/ der sngags tshig ni 'di dag gis/ /lha dang lha min mir bcas pa/ /phur bu yis ni btab nas su/ /hUM sngags 'od kyi ra ba dang/ /khyad par du ni bra ba bya/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis
286a2(rgyud 'grel): gsungs/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo dang sngags kyi tshig rnams so/ /shes rab mkha' dbyings dbus bsam pa/ rlung dang me yi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /chu yi dkyil
286a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dbus gnas par/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor de bzhin te/ /'byung ba thams cad bsdus pa las/ /gzhal yas khang brtsegs bsgom par bya/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /kha khyer de bzhin rdo rje mtshan/ /skud pa bzhi ?
286a4(rgyud 'grel): yang dag ldan/ /dar gyi phreng bas mdzes par byas/ /dkyil 'khor grwa rnams thams cad dang/ /sgo dang sgo 'khyud mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen rnam spras pa'i/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab ba/ /shes rab can kyis
286a5(rgyud 'grel): de yi nang/ /'khor lo'i phreng bas rnam brgyan te/ /de yi dbus gyur pang? ma ni/ /dkar pos shin tu mdzes par bya/ /de yi yang ni steng gyur pa/ /pad+ma mdog dmar 'bar dang bcas/ /slar yang de yi dbus gyur par/ /'od?
286a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan pad+ma dmar po bri/ /de nas sngags pa de nang du/ /rdo rje phreng ba kun 'khrug bri/ /slar yang bde chen 'dab brgyad pa/ /yin dra nI la'i 'od 'bar bri/ /rdo rje ka pha'i nang logs su/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam brgyan pa/ /ri rab
286a7(rgyud 'grel): lhun po'i steng du ni/ /sna tshogs pad+ma yid 'ong bsam/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /khang pa brtseg ma'o/ /de dbus stan la rnal 'byor pas/ /dbyangs yig bcu drug las byung ba/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom
286b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /'od zer kun tu rnam par spro/ /de stengs ye shes sa bon las/ /rdo rje nyid du bsgom par bya/ /zla ba rdo rje mnyam sbyor bas /rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya/ /nyi ma rdo rje'i bsam gtan gyis/ /khro ba'i lus su rnam par bsgoms/
286b2(rgyud 'grel): zla ba nyi ma gnyis 'dus pa/ /lha rnams skyed par byed pa'i rgyu'o/ /de skad du yang/ /A lis zla ba kA lis nyi/ /dbus su sa bon bsgom par bya/ /de nyid sems dpa' zhes byar bshad/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can no zhes gsung
286b3(rgyud 'grel): so/ /rang lus las byung 'od zer gyis/ /nam mkha' thams cad g.yogs nas ni/ /bsdus te bkug nas btsud pa yi/ /rnal 'byor zhe sdang bdag nyid 'gyur/ /zla ba ltar dkar 'dzum dang bcas/ /'od zer dmar po 'bar ba
286b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khrug /sangs rgyas phreng ba yang dag ldan/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis yang dag klubs/ /zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /ngal pa dang ni cod pan ldan/ /rig pa bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /spyan gsum 'bar ba chen po ste/ /g.yas
286b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dkar min shin tu zhi/ /g.yo pa dmar zhing 'jigs par byed par byed/ /rgyab zhal gser dang 'dra ba'i mdog /rdo rje kha twAM bsnams pa dang/ /de bzhin thod par dril bu bsnams/ /thod pa la zhugs gar dang ldan/ /dbang
286b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dga' ba'i snyoms zhugs shing/ /rgyal ba'i 'od zer kun du 'khrug /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyu yi rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /shes rab gnas kyi mthar thug par/ /smon lam rnam par sbyong byed cing/ /semS
286b7(rgyud 'grel): can don brtson sems kyis ni/ /dpa' bo srid pa sbyong bar mdzad/ /rtag tu 'dod pas myos pa yi/ /lha yi bu 'di rnams dang ni/ /gzhan yang skye bo chags can phyir/ /'dod chags thams cad dag par mdzad/ /bde chen
287a1(rgyud 'grel): shin tu grub bya'i phyir/ /rtog pa rgyas par sbyin pa dang/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog /rtog pa thams cad la sogs bshad/ /'das pa'i dus na sngon 'byung ba/ /rtog pa la sogs bde ba che/ /der ni rdo rje
287a2(rgyud 'grel): sems chen gyis/ /lhag pa yin lte? gcig bzhugs/ /'jig rten khams rnams thams cad kyi/ /seM can kun don 'byung bya'i phyir/ /glu dang rol mo sogs pa'i gar/ /srid pa kun gyi gtso bor gyur/ /sems can
287a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad 'byung pa'i phyir/ /dga' ba yang dag bsdus pa'i nga?/ /de nas sems skye 'gyur pa yi/ /'dod pa'i chags pa rnam spangs te/ /de 'dul bar ni mkhyen nas su/ /'dod chags chen po ston par mdzad/ /shes rab
287a4(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyi sbyor pa yis/ /chos kyi sku yi chos nyid do/ /bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs/ /shes rab dang kun tu 'khyud pa'i rnam par dag pa'o/ /ri po ri sul tshang tshing phug /chu po chen po'i 'gram rnams dang/ /
287a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dod nas grub pa'i dur khrod du/ /der ni dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya zhes bya ba la/ /bde ba chen po mi g.yo bas na ri po'o/ /sems can dman par 'jug par dga' bas na ri sul te/ phug dang ldan pas ched
287a6(rgyud 'grel): ching ngo/ /chu po chen po'i 'gram rnams zhes bya ba ni de dang snyoms par 'jug pa shes rab kyi chu gnas pas na/ chu po'i 'gram? mo/ /gdod nas grub pa zhes bya ba ni rtag tu grub ste/ 'char ba dang nub pa spangs shing nam mkha' 
287a7(rgyud 'grel): ltar yongs su grub pa rtag tu bde ba chen po'i tshul gyis dmigs pas de'i rang bzhin du byas pa'o/ /dur khrod ces bya ba ni sems can thams cad kyi rgyud mnyam par gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /bcom ldan rdo can gyis gsungs
287b1(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gnas so/ /lag gnyis kun tu 'khyud pa ni/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud bcengs brjod/ /kha sbyor lu gu rgyud du bzhed/ slar yang rnam par grol ba'i lam/ /'bab pa'i tshogs kyi dga' ba'o/ /rdo rje pad+ma dbye ba dang/ /
287b2(rgyud 'grel): sgre tshun sgrang? rtsa byed par bshad/ /bskor ba gang phyir bskyod pa dang/ /mi 'khrul rdo rjes dkrug par bya/ /der ni gsal zhing zhes byar brjod/ /rdo rje thams cad mid par bya/ /rdo rje zhes bya de bzhin gshegs/ /de yi chags pa lcaD
287b3(rgyud 'grel): kyu ste/ /lcags kyu'i skyor ba cho gas dgug /rdo rje'i lam nas phyung nas su/ /pad+ma'i mdzod du gzhug par bya/ /dbang bskur pa yi cho ga yis/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du ni zhu/ /gsang ba'i yig gsum sngags kyi mchog /
287b4(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs yi ge yang dag spro/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur zhing gdon pa'o/ /'dod chags chen po rjes chags pas/ /yi ge las byung rnam spangs shing/ /nam mkha' 
287b5(rgyud 'grel): lta bur bdag med po/ /dag pa nyid du de nas son/ /de nas sems can sangs rgyas kyi/ /bla med don ni nus med pa'i/ /stong pa nyid la rtag bzhugs pas/ /'gro kun steng pas bcom nas ni/ /thams cad dmyal bar ltung
287b6(rgyud 'grel): mthong ste/ /slar yang bdag dang gzhan don la/ /mos pas gus pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de nas 'jig rten khams kun na/ /bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun bsdus te/ /bdag la myur du bskul bar mdzod/ /oM ma hA su
287b7(rgyud 'grel): kha badzra sarba dza:hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): su ra ta staM/ 'dis ni bskul ba tsam gyis kyang/ /dag pa'i bde ba kun ster ba/ 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed cing/ /'gro kun bde ba bskyed par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /khu
288a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gtso bo bskul ba'o/ /de nas mkha' dbyings dbus gyur pa/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams na mkha' la/ /dpag med rigs kyi yongs gar ba'o/ /mkhal
288a2(rgyud 'grel): dbyings nyi ma de dbus su/ /rang gi sa bon mtshan ma ni/ /nyi ma stong bas lhag pa yi/ /'od zer rnon po 'bar zhing 'khrug /mi stag 'phro bas bdun sde bsreg /gong bur bsdus pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /zhu ba las ni skur
288a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhengs pa/ /zhal bzhi pa dang phyag bzhi pa 'am/ /ji srid phyag ni 'bum gyis bar/ /gdan dang mdog dang phyag rgya rnams/ /rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu bsgom/ /phyag rgya chen po'i cho ga yis/ /sku gsum
288a4(rgyud 'grel): chos ni ston par mdzad/ /ting 'dzin yan lag shes par bya/ /bsgrub bya sgrub thabs rigs pas so/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /'bras bu rdo rje 'dzin bskyed pa'o/ /ba? ni 'dod pa'i gzugs kyi mchog/

288a7(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rdo rje can gyi yon tan no/ /oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM hUM phaT/ oM griha grih+Na hUM hUM phaT/ oM grih+NA pa ya grih+NA pa ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga pA na badyI rA dza hUM hUM phaT/ zhal bzhi
288b1(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis ? par byed pa'i sngags gsungs te/ /lugs las bzlog par bya'o/ /oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba atA ma ko haM/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal dang mdog /phyag dang bzhugs tshul de bzhin te/ /sku mdog
288b2(rgyud 'grel): sngon po cher grags pa/ /'jig pa'i dus kyi me 'od 'dra/ /'bar ba'i sku lus sgra che ba/ /'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par mdzad/ /lhag gir bzhad chen tshems kyi 'od/ /lha mo'i dkyil 'khor 'od kyi ni/ /'khor lo bla re dbus gnas
288b3(rgyud 'grel): shig/ 'od ldan phyag ni bzhi bzhi dang/ /thong ka sgyu ma chen mos mdzes/ /g.yon pa pad+ma rA ga mtshungs/ /shin tu khros pas 'jigs su rung/ /sol ba'i phung po 'bar 'dra zhing/ /dza ba'i ku su ma dang mtshungs/ /g.yas gshel
288b4(rgyud 'grel): dang mtshungs pa ste/ /gangs dang kun da zla ba 'dra/ /rgyab ni gser bsregs lta bur 'bar/ /nyi ma 'char ka lta bur mdzes/ /rtsa zhal sngon po chen po ste/ /spyan gsum gyis ni mdzes par byas/ /yi dags chen po mnan na bu?/
288b5(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma la bzhugs gar dang bcas/ /thod pa dang ni kha TwAM ga /de bzhin gzhan na mnga' dang gzhu/ /cho ga'i bya ba de nyid kyis/ /ye shes rgya mtsho bsgom par bya/ /shar ni dkar zhing 'od sngo ste/ /g.yon na kha TwAM dril bu dang/ /gzhan
288b6(rgyud 'grel): na rdo rje thod pa'o/ /byang phyogs ma rkat? ser skya'i mdog /g.yon na kha TwAm zhags pa dang/ /g.yas na rde chung thod pa bsnams/ /nub phyogs dmar zhing ser skya'i 'od/ /gzhu dang mda' yi mdog dang ni/ /sna tshogs pad+ma thod pa dag
288b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yon dang g.yas kyi phyag tu dgod/ /lho ni dkar zhing ser ba'i 'od/ /g.yon na mdung dang rin chen te/ /g.yas na ba dan thod pa bsnams/ /glang chen ci sbyad mi dang ni/ /glang gi thod pa cho ga bzhin/ /dang po ltung byed ma yin
289a1(rgyud 'grel): te/ /gnyis pa gsod byed ma yin la/ /gsum pa 'gugs pa zhes bya ste/ /bzhi pa gar gyi dbang phyug ma/ /rig pa de dag gyen skra 'bar/ /rgyan rnams thams cad rnam par klubs/ /gar dang ldan pas yang dag
289a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs/ /phyogs mtshams dag ni bzhi po ru/ /thod pa rnam pa bzhi po dgod/ /sangs rgyas gzugs kyi rnam brgyan pa/ /spyi gtsug gsal bar yang dag ldan/ /bde ba chen po rin chen che/ /'byung ba bzhi yi tshogs dang ldan/ /skye
289a3(rgyud 'grel): dang gnas dang 'gag ba rnams/ /rtag tu lha mo bzhi yi dngos/ /oM ha ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste snying gar ro/ /na ma hi nI rnam par snang mdzad de mgo bor ro/ /swA hA hu ni pad+ma gang gyi dbang phyug ste spyi btsug tu'o/ /bau Sha Ta he ru
289a4(rgyud 'grel): ka ste phrag pa gnyis la'o/ /hUM hUM ho ni rdo rje nyi ma ste/ mig gnyis su'o/ /phaT haM rta mgrin sde/ yan lag thams cad kyi cho ga'o/ /de nas rang gi snying gar rdo rje'i lte bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la thugs rdo rje hUM gis bskyed par bya'o/ /
289a5(rgyud 'grel): oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): ha ha huM hUM phaT kyi ni mgrin par zla bI dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i gsung rdo rje'o/ /oM badzra he he ru ru kaM huM hUm phaT DA ki nI dzA la saM pa raM swAhA/ /zhes bya bas ni dpral ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i sku rdo rje'o/ /de dag ni rdo rje seM can da'i
289a6(rgyud 'grel): ge cha dang/ sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /lte bar ni oM paM ste rdo rje phag mo'o/ /snying gar haM yoM ste gshin rje me'o/ /khar ni h+rIM mo ste rmongs byed ma'o/ /mgo bor ni h+reM h+rIM ste kun du skyong byed ma'o/ /spyi gtsug tu ni hUM
289a7(rgyud 'grel): hUM kun tu skrag byed ma'o/ /yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon char ni phaT phaT te gtum pa mo'o/ /oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badzra(rgyud 'grel): r+N+Na nI ye hUM hUM phaT swAhA zhes bya bas ni lte bar thugs rdo rje lta bu'o/ /oM badzra bi? ro tsa nI ye tsuM? huM?
289b1(rgyud 'grel): phaT phaT swAhA zhes bya bas ni snying gar sku'i rdo rje lta bu'o/ /oM bau ri hUM hUM phaT zhes bya ba ni khar te gsung rdo rje lta bu'o/ /de ltar gang zhig kun brtan pa/ /sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i lus las byung/ /shes rab zla ba'i stan la gnas/ /sna tshogs
289b2(rgyud 'grel): mdog tu bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid kyi lus te/ nye bar sgrub pa'i sgrub thabs so/ /ye shes dam tshig las byung ba/ /de ni rdo rje can du
289b3(rgyud 'grel): brjod ces bya la ye shes sems dpa' o/ /dam tshig ni rdo rje sems dpa' o/ /de'i rim pa yang 'di yin te/ rang gi sa bon mtshan ma las/ /snying gar ye shes sems dpa' dgod/ /de yi 'od kyis drangs nas ni/ /ye shes 'khor lo rag
289b4(rgyud 'grel): mchod bya/ /rdo rje bsrung ba'i go cha ni/ /mnyam par gzhag pas thams cad bya/ /de 'og dngos po thams cad kyis/ /bdag gi lus la gzhug par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /ye
289b5(rgyud 'grel): shes sems dpa' gzhug pa'o/ /dbang bskur go 'phan bsgoms nas ni/ /de 'og mchod pa brtag par bya/ /ye shes 'khor lo'i rim pa yis/ /mdun du rgyal ba bkug nas ni/ /mchod pa kun gyis mchod nas ni/ /dbang bskur
289b6(rgyud 'grel): phyir ni gsol ba gdab/ /gsang gsum gnas las byung ba yi/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma kun dang/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon po yis/ /brtse bas bdag la dbang bskur gsol/ /des ni sangs rgyas he ru ka'i/ /tshul du nam
289b7(rgyud 'grel): mkhar bzhugs nas ni/ /bdud rtsi lnga yis gang ba yi/ /bum pa kha dog lngar ldan pa'i/ /kun nas dbang ni bskur bar mdzod/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad kyis/ /gsang gsum gnas las byung ba yis/ /khams gsuM
290a1(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis phyag byas pa/ /rin chen dbang bskur chen po sbyin/ /rgyal bas dbang ni bskur nas su/ /spyan ma la sogs glu len cing/ /mchod pa'i lha mo'i tshogs kyis kyang/ /mchod pa kun gyis rab mchod
290a2(rgyud 'grel): byed/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /dbang bskur ba dang mchod pa'o/ /mtshan ma gnyis la sngags sbyar bya/ /de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te/ /bu mo yi ni sna rtse ru/ /a zhes bya
290a3(rgyud 'grel): ba dgod par bya/ /rang gi rdo rje'i bu gar ni/ /baM zhes bya ba yang dag sbyar/ /gang yang gzhan dag 'chad pa ni/ /dyA zhes bya ba pad+ma la/ /bya ni rdo rje'i rtse mo'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs so/ /bcom ldan rdo
290a4(rgyud 'grel): rje can gyis gsungs/ /shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid dga' ba ste sbyor ba dang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje pad+ma phye nas su/ /lam gyi tshogs kyi rgyun nas ni/ /sla?
290a5(rgyud 'grel): yang spro zhing btang bar bya/ /rnal 'byor ma yi 'khor lo kun/ /pad+ma'i lte bar nges par sbyar/ /a ba d+hu tI'i gnas de bzhin/ /smin ma'i bar du bzhag par bya/ /dbyangs yig dang po yang dag ldan/ /bsgoms?
290a6(rgyud 'grel): skad cig de la 'bar/ /de nas 'bar 'phreng rgya mtshor ni/ /kun nas sgo li 'khor lo bsam/ /mgal me 'khor lo la gns pa/ /mkha' 'gro'i tshogs ni de bzhin 'khor/ /yid shugs chen pos
290a7(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba'i mdangs/ /glog lta bur ni gsal ba'i 'od/ /lha yi rnal 'byor tshul gyis ni/ /sa rnams kun tu spro bar bya/ /de nyid dbye bas phyi nas su/ /rtsa rnams thams cad lam du sbyar/ /sngags pas
290b1(rgyud 'grel): rang dgar dbye byas te/ /byin ci log tu nges par sbyar/ /tshar gcod pa dang phan 'dogs pa'i/ /las kyi mchog tu rnam par bsgom/ /sbyor ba yi ni don rnams la/ /dga' chen rnyed dga' 'di yis bsgrub/ /ye shes ldan pa'i
290b2(rgyud 'grel): rang skyes nas/ /yul dang yul du mngon par skye/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs 'di dag /rang rang sa la rnam par rol/ /mgo bo pulnyi ra yin te/ /so dang sen mo rab tu 'bab/ /rab gtum mo dang thod du ma gyis/ /shar gyi rtsibs su
290b3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag bzhugs/ /spyi gtsug ? land+ha ra ste/ /skra dang spu ni rab tu 'bab/ /gtum mig keng rus chen po yis/ /lus ngan phyogs su yang dag bzhugs/ /o DyA na zhes bya'i gnas chen po/ /rna ba g.yas pa'i bla dags te/ /nub tu pags
290b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dri ma las/ /'od ldan keng rus tshul gyis bzhugs/ /arbu da ni rgyab kyis phyogs/ /sha chen dag ni 'bab pa las/ /mche ba gtsigs dang sna tshon ma/ /lho yi phyogs su yang dag bzhugs/ /de dag ni gnas so/ /ge dA ba ri rnam?
290b5(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu rgyus pa 'bab pa las/ /dpa' po'i blo ma lha yi dgra /dbang ldan mtshams su bzhugs par bsam/ /smin dbus rA me shwa ri ste/ /rtag tu rus pa 'bab pa las/ /mi thung mgon po 'od dpag med/ /rlung gi mtshams su bzhugs par
290b6(rgyud 'grel): gyur/ /mig gnyis lha mo'i mkhar yin te/ /rtag tu mchin pa 'bab pa las/ /lang+ka'i dbang mo rdo rje 'od/ /bden bral mtshangs su bzhugs par gyur/ /mA la be n dpung g.yas te/ /rtag tu snying 'phral 'bab pa las/ /ljon
290b7(rgyud 'grel): grib ma ni rdo rje sku/ /byin ja'i mtshams su bzhugs bar gyur/ /de dag ni nye ba'i gnas so/ /yul de kun na gnas pa rnams/ /thugs kyi 'khor lor yang dag bzhugs/ /mkha' la spyod ba zhes bya ste/ /snyoms par zhugs pas yang 
291a1(rgyud 'grel): dag bzhugs/ /mchan khung kA ma ru pa ste/ /rtag tu mig ni 'bab pa las/ /sa bsrungs ma dang myu gu can/ /shar gyi 'dab mar yang dag bzhugs/ /oM tre nu ma gnyis yin te/ /mkhris pa'i khams
291a2(rgyud 'grel): ni 'bab pa las/ /rdo rje ral can 'jigs byed ma/ /lus ngan phyogs su bzhugs par gyur/ /zhing po/ /lte bar tri sha ku ni te/ /rtag tu glo pa 'bab pa las/ /rlung shugs dpa' bo chen po ni/ /nub kyi 'dab mar brten te bzhugS
291a3(rgyud 'grel): gos la ni sna rtse ste/ /sgyu ma'i phreng ba 'bab pa las/ /chang 'thung rdo rje hUM mdzad du/ /lho yi phyogs su bzhugs par gyur/ /nye ba'i zhing/ /kha ni ka ling ga yin te/ /gnye ma'i khams ni rab tu 'bab/ /sngo bsangs lha mo shin
291a4(rgyud 'grel): tu bzang/ /yi dags phyogs su bzhugs par gyur/ /mgrin pa lam bA ka yin te/ /bung bu'i lto ni 'bab pa las/ /shin tu bzang mo rdo rje bzang/ /rlung gi mtshams su bzhugs par gyur/ /rol sa'o/ /snying ga kany+dzi yul
291a5(rgyud 'grel): yin te/ /rtag tu chu zho 'bab pa las/ /rta rna? ma? dang 'jigs byed de/ /srin po'i mtshams su bzhugs par gyur/ /kha ba can ni chu so ste/ /'tshogs ma'i srubs ni 'bab pa las/ /bya gdong ma dang mig mi bzang/ /ma'i
291a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshams su bzhugs par gyur/ /nye ba'i rol sa'o/ /yul de kun na gang gnas pa/ /gsung gi 'khor lor yang dag gnas/ /sa la rgyu ba zhes bya ste/ /snyoms par zhugs pas yang dag gnas/ /mtshan ni yi dags lha
291a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas te/ /bad kan khams ni rtag tu 'bab/ /'khor lo shugs ma stobs po che/ /sku yi 'khor lo shar rtsibs bzhugs/ /bshang lam lha yi khyim yin te/ /nag 'bab khaN Da ro ha dang/ /rin chen rdo rje lus
291b1(rgyud 'grel): bar? du/ /'du ba can no/ /saur'Sh+Ta ni brla gnyis te/ /khrag gi khams ni 'bab pa las/ /glang sna dang ni rta mgrin te/ /nub kyi phyogs su bzhugs par gyur/ /byin pa gnyis ni gser gling ste/ /rtag tu rdul ni 'bab pa las/ /'khor lo'i go cha nam
291b2(rgyud 'grel): mnga' i? snying/ /lho yi phyogs su bzhugs par gyur/ /nye ba'i 'du ba can no/ /sor mo rnams ni grong khyer te/ /tshul ni rab tu 'bab pa las/ /shin tu dpa' mo he ru kar/ /yi dags mtshams su bzhugs par gyur/ /sin d+ha rkang pa'i pol?
291b3(rgyud 'grel): yin te/ /rtag tu mchi ma 'bab pa las/ /stobs chen pad+ma gang dbang phyug /rlung gi mtshams su dgod par bya/ /dur khrod do/ /mya ngan yul ni mthe po ste/ /lud pa dag ni 'bab pa las/ /'khor lo sbyar ma rnam snang mdzod/ /bden bral
291b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshams su dgod par bya'o/ /ku lu tA ni pus mo ste/ /rtag tu sna chu 'bab pa las/ /brtson chen rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /me yi mtshams su dgod par bya/ /nye ba'i dur khro'o/ /yul ni de dag thams cad nyid/ /sku'i 'khor lor yang dag gnas
291b5(rgyud 'grel): sa 'og gnas pa zhes bya ste/ /snyoms par bzhugs pas rab tu bzhugs/ /lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog par na/ /pho nya rnams ni yang dag gnas/ /khwa gdong ma ni shar sgor te/ /byang sgor dug pa'i gdong pa can/ /nub sgor
291b6(rgyud 'grel): khyi yi gdong pa can/ /phag gi gdong can lho sgor dgod/ /dbang ldan gshin rje brtan ma ste/ /gshin rje po nya ma mtshams su/ /bden bral gshin rje mche ba can/ /gshin rje 'joms ma rlung mtshams dgod/ /ma ning yi ge bzhi
291b7(rgyud 'grel): las ni/ /sgo bzhi rnams su bsgom par bya/ /sha Sha sa ha las byung ba/ /dbang ldan la sogs yang dag gnas/ /ro la bcibs shing me ltar 'bar/ /nyi ma la bzhugs gar dang bcas spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs pa ste/ /phyag na kha TAM thod
292a1(rgyud 'grel): pa gri /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par klubs/ /'od zer sna tshogs rnam par 'phro?/ /khro gnyer rim pa ldan la sogs/ /zur mig blta zhing rnam par g.yo/ /khwa gdong la sogs gcer? bu ste/ /mgul ngo? spyi gtsug dpung
292a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyan dang/ /rna cha tshangs pa'i skud par bcas/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas mgul par brgyan/ /rkang gnyis khrol khrol sgra dang bcas/ /g.yon brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi gnyis ldan par/ /dpa' bo rdo rje dril bsnams te//
292a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag ni gnyis kun 'khyud pa yin/ /he ru ka ni skus byung/ /mkha' 'gro nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po'i sku las byung/ /dam tshig ye shes las byung ba'i/ /de nas rdo rje can du brjod/ /dbang bskur go 'phang bsgoms nas ni//
292a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas mchod pa yang dag brtsam/ /de dag thams cad sngon bzhin bya/ /da ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun lho'i sbyor bas rnam par bzhag par bya ste/ ltung byed ma ni lus dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'o/ /bsod ma ni tshor ba
292a5(rgyud 'grel): rdzun pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/ /'gugs byed ma ni chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/ /gar gyi dbang phyug ma ni sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/ /rab tu gtum mo ni 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o/ /gtum mig mi ni brtson 'grus
292a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o/ /'od ldan ma ni dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o/ /sna chen ma ni sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o/ /dbang po'i blo ma ni dad pa'i dbang po'o/ /mi thung ma ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o/ /langka'i dbang phyug min
292a7(rgyud 'grel): dzun? pa'i lag ? go ljon gling ma ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o/ /sa srungs ma ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o/ /'jigs byed ma mi dad pa'i stobs so/ /rlung shugs ma ni brtson 'grus kyi stobs/ /chang 'thung ma ni dran pa'i stabs so//
292b1(rgyud 'grel): sngo bsangs lha mo ni ting nge 'dzin gyis stobs so/ /shin tu bzang mo ni shes rab kyi stobs so/ /rta rna ma ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go /bya gdong ma ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go /'khor lo shugs ma ni dga' ba
292b2(rgyud 'grel): yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ga /dum skyes ma ni shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go /glang sna ma ni chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/ /'khor lo'i go cha ma ni ngan pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan
292b3(rgyud 'grel): lag go /shin tu dpa' mo ni btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag /stobs tshon ma ni yang dag pa'i lta pa'o/ /'khor lo sgyur min yang dag pa'i rtog pa'o/ /brtson 'grus chen mo ni yang dag pa'i dag go /khwo? gdong ma ni
292b4(rgyud 'grel): yang dag pa'i las kyi mdza' o/ /'ug gdong ma ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'o/ /khyi gdong ma ni yang dag pa'i rtsol ba'o/ /phag gdong ma ni yang dag pa'i dran pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro na yang dag pa'i ting nge
292b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin to/ /dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa ni gshin rje brtan ma'o/ /dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams bsrung ba ni gshin rje pho nya ma'o/ /sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spong pa ni gshin rje mche ba ma'o/ /sdig
292b6(rgyud 'grel): pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa ni gshin rje 'joms ma'o/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun lhas rnam par sbyar ba'o/ /snying ga'i dbus gyur pad+ma ni/ /'dab ma
292b7(rgyud 'grel): brgyad dang gser bcas?/ /de yi dbus su gnas pa'i rtsa/ /mar me lta bu'i gzugs can te/ /chu shing gi ni me tog ltar/ /rtag tu 'phyang zhing 'og tu blta/ /de'i dbus bzhugs dpa' bo ni/ /yungs kar spom pa'i tshang tsam ste/ /
293a1(rgyud 'grel): hUM gi sa bon mi shigs pa/ /kha ba lta bu 'bab pa yin/ /bsan ta zhes bya ba yin/ /lus can rnams kyi snying dbang byed/ /rgod ma'i khar ni mi yi gzugs/ /phag mo'i til+la kar ni bzheng/ /las kyi rlung gis
293a2(rgyud 'grel): bskyod nas/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas ni 'bar/ /ba san ta dang phrad pas mnyes/ /snyoms par 'jug pas yang dag bzhugs/ /'di ni sh+rI he ru ka yi/ /bsan til+la ka ru bzhed/ /gzugs sogs rgyu dang mi rgyu ba/ /stong pa nyid
293a3(rgyud 'grel): du yang dag gnas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi bye brag gis/ /sge gsum nas ni yang dag rgyu/ /'gro ba dang ni 'ong ba ru/ /de dag thams cad lus la gnas/ /lte bar a yi gzugs kyis ni/ /thung du zhes ni bya bar grags/ /snying
293a4(rgyud 'grel): gang gnas pa'i yi ge hUM/ /ring ba cha gnyis tshad du gnas/ /mgrin par gnas pa'i yi ge oM/ /cha gsum pu lu ta zhes brjod/ /dpral bar gnas pa'i yi ge haM/ /sgra dang thig le mi shigs pa/ /'khor lo bzhi yi bye drag
293a5(rgyud 'grel): gis/ /sa sogs 'byung ba chen po yin/ /mtshams bzhi ru? ni lhag par gnas/ /pad+ma bzhi las yang dag byung/ /dga' ba bzhi yi tshul gyis ni/ /sbyor ba bzhi las mchog tu gnas/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs gyis ni//
293a6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba dang ni byed pa'i dngos/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i rang bzhin gyis/ /'dir ni ji ltar bde bar rol/ /phyogs bzhi yi ni 'dab ma la/ /'byung ba bzhi yi rtsa bzhi ni/ /mar me lta bu'i gzugs can te/ /mtshams kyi cha la gnas
293a7(rgyud 'grel): nas su/ /rtsa ni gang dag rgyu ba dag /bdud rtsi lnga ni rgyu ba ste/ /mchod pa'i gzugs kyis de la brten/ /de yi gzugs kyi rang bzhin dag /mchod pa bzhi zhes bya bar bshad/ /'di ni lus can snying dbus na/ /rtsa brgyad du ni rnam
293b1(rgyud 'grel): par gnas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi bye brag gis/ /gzhan yang nyi shu rtsa bzhir brjod/ /gnas sogs sa la brten nas su/ /gnas dang gnas yang dag brten/ /mgo go las ni yang dag byung/ /rtsa ni mgo las skyes zhes brjod/ /
293b2(rgyud 'grel): snying stobs rdul dang mun pa'i gzugs/ /de dbus sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i gtso/ /rim pa dag ni 'di nyid kyis/ /blo dang ldan bas phyag rgya bya/ /khwa gdong la sogs sngon ji bzhig ltung byed la sogs rnam par dag /bcom ldan rdo rje
293b3(rgyud 'grel): can kyis gsungs/ /phyag rgya rnams kyi mtshon cha'o/ /a las skye ba'i thod par ni/ /rdzas bcu dag ni bsam par bya/ /rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /spyod ba dang ni 'bar bar bya/ /dang po yi ge ldan par/ /bsgoms na
293b4(rgyud 'grel): skad cig de la 'bar/ /yi ge go bzlog sbyor ba yis/ /rgyud la sngags ni bsgom par bya/ /oM ni thams cad 'bar byed de/ /de nyid gsum ni yang dag brjod/ /lha mo de ltar bsgoms pa yis/ /rdzas kyi dngos grub 'bras
293b5(rgyud 'grel): bu stsol/ /sbyor ba 'di yi dngos grub kyi/ /yid ches yang de ga 'jug par 'gyur/ /thams cad kyis ni mi mthong zhing/ /rnal 'byor can ni skad cig mthong/ /lha mchog las skyes phrogs nas su/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bu mo sbyong//
293b6(rgyud 'grel): gang+ga'i klung? mnyam sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje gsum gyi gnas bzhugs pa/ /lag tu shing tog bzhag pa bzhin/ /rdo rje'i mig gis mthong bar 'gyur/ /gang+ga'i klung mnyam zhing rnams ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid rnamS/
293b7(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi rol mo las byung bar/ /rnal 'byor bdag nyid can gyis mthong/ /'di ni mchog tu gsang chen te/ /sbyor ba kun gyi dam pa yin/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /bdud rtsi myang pa dkyil 'khor rgyal/ /mchog gi ting nge
294a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin to/ /yi ge pho nya la sogs sngags/ /mnga' yi shugs kyi yongs su 'khor/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus su ni/ /sde mtshan brgyad kyis shin tu bskor/ /sngags rnams thams cad 'byung ba ste/ /gzhan yang ci
294a2(rgyud 'grel): yang rung ba ste/ /sgra lnga dag ni yang dag ldan/ /yar la bas rnam par brgyan/ /chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ /lus can rnams kyi snying dga' byed/ /cha rnams bzhi po dag gis ni/ /kun nas yongs su bskor ba ste/ /longs spyod
294a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ /ro rnams kyi ni rten rang bzhin/ /bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che/ /byang chub sems ni sum cu gnyis/ /zla ba nyi ma zhes bya ba/ /g.yon dang g.yas kyis ngos gnyis su/ /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi/ /'gro
294a4(rgyud 'grel): dang 'ong ba byed pa'i rgyu/ /gnas gnyis la ni rtag brten nas/ /'og dang steng du yang dag brten/ /g.yon dang g.yas kyi ngos gnyis su/ /de bzhin dbyangs yig bcu gnyis ni/ /rtag tu steng du bltas par bri/ /ka sogs 'og tu bltas
294a5(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ /ngos gnyis dag tu spel ba ste/ /dbus su de ni sbyar bar bya/ /de ltar bstan pa 'di dag ni/ /rtsa dang sgra yi rang bzhin no/ /gnyis med ye shes rdo rje ste/ /mkha' 'gro sgra yi rang bzhin no/ /des 'byung sangs rgyas thams cad de//
294a6(rgyud 'grel): gang du skye ba zhes byar grags/ /shin tu rnam dag ye shes tshe/ /lha mo kun gyi rang bzhin gang/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ste/ /mchog tu bde bar brjod pa yin/ /rang byung gi ni gzugs 'di nyid/ /spro dang sdud par byed pa'o//
294a7(rgyud 'grel): yi ge pho nya la sogs bsngags/ /der ni cha dang bral ba gang/ /b+ha ga'i dbus su gzugs med pa/ /de ni rtag tu gnas pa yin/ /smin dbus thig le'i pad+ma ru/ /bcu drug skud pas bskor ba yin/ /shes rab thabs kyi mnyam
294b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyor gyis/ /kha sbyor zhes byar brjod pa yin/ /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa ni/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag bzhugs gang/ /'di ni kun mkhyen zhes bya ste/ /kun tu 'gro ba mi shigs pa'o/ /pad+ma yi ni sna rtse ru/ /rgyu dang mi
294b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyur bcas par bsgom/ /yid kyis bzlas dang yang dag ldan/ /dag dang yi ge rnam par spangs/ /nges pa'i go 'phang rtag tu gnas/ /brtan pa chos dbyings rang bzhin no/ /shin tu phra ba rdul dang bral/ /ye shes sku skye dri ma med/ /gsal
294b3(rgyud 'grel): pa mchog gi rang bzhin te/ /mya ngan 'das pa 'ba' zhig yul/ /phan tshun mdung? pa'i gsang sngags ni/ /yul nyid kyis ni dbye bar bya/ /sa bon phreng ba de nas bsgom/ /hUM gi skud pas bcings pa ste/ /sgrub bya 'gog par gyur na ni/ /
294b4(rgyud 'grel): gom pa gcig kyang mi 'gro'o/ /sngags dang thig le 'di dag ni/ /kun rdzob byang chub sems bsgom par/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /'di ye shes rab lhan skyes te/ /de yi gzugs su gyur pas gnas/ /las kyi rlung gis
294b5(rgyud 'grel): bskyod nas su/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di nas 'bar/ /sgyu ma chen mo zhes byar bshad/ /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /skra rtse brgyar gyur pa yi cha/ /skad cig glog gi 'od zer can/ /lha yi rnal 'byor lus su ni/ /lte ba'i
294b6(rgyud 'grel): sgo yi ? gnas/ /phyogs rnams kun tu spros nas ni/ /lho dang lha min kun bsregs te/ /snying ga'i chos kyi 'khor lo ni/ /bsregs te longs spyod 'khor lor song/ /sna bug g.yas nas byung nas ni/ /slar yang zhugs te smin
294b7(rgyud 'grel): mtshams kyi/ /mdzod spu'i khung nas byung nas ni/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi/ /sna sgo g.yon du zhugs nas ni/ /spyi bo'i 'khor lo bsregs nas/ /sngon gyi lam nas
295a1(rgyud 'grel): slar byung ste/ /slar yang spyi gtsug tu ni zhugs/ /bsregs par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /dga' ba bskyed nas lte ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor du ni song gyur na/ /sngon bzhin du ni gnas par gyur/ /dga' ba
295a2(rgyud 'grel): skad cig bye brag gi /bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /mya ngan las 'das ba'i byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po'i bsam gtan no/ /oM na mo b+ha ga wa te bI re shA ya/ mahA kalpA gni?
295a3(rgyud 'grel): san+ni? b+hA ya/ dza DA me ku Totka TA ya/ daMSh+Ta? karA? lo gra b+hI Sha Na mu khA ya/ sa ha sra b+hu dza b+hA su rA ya/ pa ra shu pA sho dyA ta shU la kha TwAM ga d+hi ri Ni/ byA g+h+ra dzi nAM ba ra d+haM rA ya mahA d+hum+b+hAndA? ka ra wa Ta ShA ya/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ k+ShaM k+ShaM phaT phaT ka ra
295a4(rgyud 'grel): ka ra/ band+ha band+ha pha tsa pha tsa/ hiM hiM haM haM/ da ha da d+ha/ ku ru ku ru/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ hUM hUM/ ki li ki li/ pa sa ru Dhi rAn+t+ra mA lA ba laM bi na/ grih+Na grih+Na/ k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sha b+ha ya/ d+ha d+ha A kaThya/ A kaTd+hya/ ci li ci li/ /si li si li/
295a5(rgyud 'grel): sa pa ta pA tA la ga ta b+hu dzaM ga sarba m+bA tardzA? ya ta radza ya h+raM h+raM/ pheM pheM/ h+riM h+riM/ d+hi li d+hi li/ sngags kyi tshig ni kun la yang/ /oM ni thams cad gsal bar byed de/ /hUM hUM phaT ni mdza' ru sbyar/ /rab gtu ma la sogs mkha' 'gro ma//
295a6(rgyud 'grel): dang? ming brjod pa'i sngags la ni/ /dang por oM dang sbyar bya ste/ /hUM hUM phaT ni mdza' ru gnas/ /oM sh+rI badzra he he ru ru kaM huM hUM phaT TA ki nI dzA saM ba raM swAhA/ snying po'o/ /oM h+rI:ha ha huM hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha
295a7(rgyud 'grel): huM hUM phaT/ oM grih+Na grih+Na huM huM phaT/ oM grih+NA pa ya grih+NA ya huM huM phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn badyI rA dza huM huM phaT/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badzra bar+Na nI ye huM huM phaT phaT swAhA/ snying po'o/ /oM badzra bai
295b1(rgyud 'grel): ro tsA ni ye? huM hUM phaT phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM bI ra hUM hUM phaT/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o/ /rje btsun ma'i sngags kyi chi'o/ /oM ha/ na ma hi/ swA hA hu// khauSha Ta he/ hUM hUM ho/ /phaT ha/ de dag ni dpa' bo drug gi go cha'o/ /oM baM/ haM yoM/ h+ri
295b2(rgyud 'grel): mo/ h+riM h+riM/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM ni kun la sbyin par bya/ /rnal 'byor ma drug go cha yin/ /oM a A/ i a'i/ u a'u/ ri rI/ li lI/ e i/ aau aau/ aM a:ka kha ga g+ha nga/ ca cha dza dzha nya/ Ta Tha Da Dha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/?
295b3(rgyud 'grel): sha ? sa ha/ k+Sha:hUM hUM phaT phaT s'wahA/ dpa' bo dang mkha' 'go ma thams cad kyi gnas so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba ti badzra bA rA hi A ryA pa rA dzi ta h+rai lo gya mA te mahA bidye sarba b+hu ta b+ha ywA ba he ma hA badzre badzre ni a dza te a pa rA ? tai ? ? ne tra g+h+ra ma Ni bi sho ba
295b4(rgyud 'grel): Ni ? ? Ni gro d+ha ni ka rA li ni saM trwA sa ni mA ra Ni su pra b+he da ni a pa rthA ye bi dza ye dzaM b+ha ni stwaM b+ha ni mo ha ni/ badzra bA rA hI ma hA yo ge ni kA mi shwa ri kha she ta dya thA po taM ge pro taM ge ha na ha na prA NA king ki ni liM khi ni d+hu na d+hu na badzra haste sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ kha TwAM ga
295b5(rgyud 'grel): kA pA la d+hU ri Ni mahA pi shi to mAM sA a si ni ma nu Sh+yan+tu pri brat+ti san+ni d+hyaM na ra si ro mA lA gan+thi ta d+hA ri ni suM b+hA ni suM b+he ha na ha na pra NAM sarba pA pa satwA nAM sarba pa shU naM mAM sa tshe dkro d+ha ni mU rte daSh+TAM ka ra li ni mahA mu dre sh+rI he ru ka de ba sya aga ma hi Sh+ri sa ha sra shi
295b6(rgyud 'grel): re sa ha sra bA ha be sha ta sa ha sru A na ne dza li ta ta te dzwA dzwA la mu kha pi ga la le ci ni badzra shir rA badzra A sa na mi li si li ti mi li ti mi li he he hUM hUM kha d+hu d+hu/ ru ru/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ a dwai te mahA yo ge ni pa Thi ta sid+he/ drai d+haM dre d+haM graM graM he he ha ha/
295b7(rgyud 'grel): b+hI me ha sa ha sa b+hei re hA h'hUM hUM trai lo kya bi nA sha ni sa ha sra ko Ti ta bA ga ta pa ri bA re ti hUM hUM phaT siM ha ru pe kha:ga dza ru pe ga:trai lo kya ri su da re sa mu dra me kha le gra sa gra sa hUM hUM phaT/ bI ra dwai te hUM hUM phaT/ ha ha mahA pa shu mo nya ni ya gI
296a1(rgyud 'grel): shwa ra twaM DA ki ni lo kA nAM band+ha ni sa tya:bra tya kA ri Ni hUM phaT/ d+hU ta twA sa ni mahA bI re par ma sid+d+he yo gI sh+ra ri phaT phaT hUM hUM phaT/ hUM hUM phaT/ hUM phaT swAhA/ oM ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ band+ha d+ha band+ha d+ha/ trA sa ya tra sa ya/ kO b+ha
296a2(rgyud 'grel): ya kO b+ha ya/ h+rauM h+rauM/ h+ra:h+ra:pheM pheM/ phaT phaT/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+hak+Sha b+hakh+Sa/ ba sa ru d+hi dan+ta mA lA ba li bi ni grih+Na sapta pA tA la ga ta b+hu rdzag sarba m+b+hA? tarTha ya tardza ya/ A kaN+Na? 296a4(rgyud 'grel): khyad par du ni chu la gnas/ /nag po drag po drag chen mo/ /lha sbyin mnyam du bstan pa dang/ /nag po gcig pa 'jigs byed dang/ /rga las 'das dang log 'dren rnams/ /rgan byed ma dang drag byed mo/ /'jigs byed ma dang u ma dang
