296a7(rgyud 'grel): chen me mkha' 'gro ma/ /las kun rjes su sgrub byed ma/ /sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal chen mo/ /rdo rje de bzhin dbang phyug gtso/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen te/ /rdul med rnal 'byor sbyin pa mo/ /rdo rje dbang mo'i bka' 'di
296b1(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /thams cad kun sna? dir skyon cig /oM ka ka ka Dhya na ba ba band+han kha kha khA da na sarba duSh+Ta ha na ha na g+hA ta a phA dyA yas su atsa? kryaM ku ru hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT dza:swAhA/ bdud rtsi yis ni kha bkang ste/ /lha rnams thams cad tshim par bya/ /rnal
296b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byor rnal 'byor ma yis ni/ /las rnams thams cad 'grub par bsgom/ /oM b+hak+Sha b+ha kA sarba yi gI shwa re hUM hUM dza:dza:swAhA/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi gtor ma'i sngags so// //
296b3(rgyud 'grel): oM na mo nI lAM ba rad+ha rA ya badzra pA Na ye mahA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ a ni ka gi gA nA de bA lA ko sa sam bud+d+ha ki Ti/ sha ta saha sra pa'i prit+tA ya/ bi kri taM daSh+TaM ka la rU pA ya agni ra si na yA na yA dza'i ta gi Sha sa sA yam+bI ma na da ya ba su ki nA ga rA dzA bi
296b4(rgyud 'grel): b+hu Shi ta ka ra tsa ra NA ya kriSh+Ta b+hU dza gA ya yadz+nyau pa bI tA ya dza le ta b+hu dza ma Ni mu ku TA ya pu ri ta Ta pa bA da nA ya saM kru ci ta b+hu la tA ya/ da sha na ShaN+Da'o do She NA ya kri han+ta ru pA ya bi d+hu dza hA ya ma he ra ka bak+Sha NA ya ka ra spo Ta tra sa na karA ya su la r+Na
296b5(rgyud 'grel): ka ni pa ra dza me kha lA ya hUM ka na ni da tras? sa na ka rA ya/ a shI ti yo dza na swAhA sra ga b+hi ra sA ga ra dza mu ma na da lA ya/ tskA di tya kaM/ d+ha ba ha nA ya daSh+TaM ka ra lA ya ha si tra TTA TTA hA sa na da nA yA/ mahA saM k+Sho b+ha ka rA ya k+Sha la ru pA ya trai lo kuN+Da k+Sha r+Na
296b6(rgyud 'grel): ka ra NA ya nA gA nAM khri tyu kA la ya e maM gaM gA ni ba le/ ka sa me b+hud+d+he b+ha ga ba ta bi b+ha Shi haM/ man+tA ma bA tra yi Sh+ya me/ b+ho b+ho bAnA gAn d+hi pa ta ye oM daM nI laM ba ra d+ha ra she rA rA/ badzra pA Ni h+ri da ya/ ya(rgyud 'grel): sa mA ti kra ma tha/ mA ku ? ? de raM
296b7(rgyud 'grel): b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/ /tadya thA/ /bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bi bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha/ mahA pa lo ka pA la/ nI dza ha ra dzaM ha ra/ nA gA nAM/ pra ha ra pra ha ra/ sarba nA gA naM ts+tshinda ts+tshinda nA h+ri da yA ni/ b+hinda b+hinda nA ga marmA Ni/ bi ts+tshinda nA h+ri da yA ni/ b+hinda b+hinda nA ga marmA Ni/ bi
297a1(rgyud 'grel): ga na ya nA ni/ bi shi ryaM du nA ga sha rI rA Ni/ tadya thA/ hUM hUM phaT/ nA ga bi dA ra NA ya phaT/ nA tshinda nA ya phaT/ nI la ba sa nA ya phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ba la pa ra kra mA ya phaT/ kri tAM tA ya phaT kri tAM ta rU bA ya phaT/ ro Sha
297a2(rgyud 'grel): NA ya phaT/ kusmaN+Do tshA ba na ka rA ya phaT/ pre ta pi shA tsa pi nA sha ka pA phaT/ yak+Sha pa smar pi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sarba big+h+na bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ sarba sha truM saM g+ha bi nA
297a3(rgyud 'grel): sha ka rA ya phaT/ nI lA ma ba ra d+ha ro badzra pa NI rA dztA pa ya ti swAhA/ /gnod sbyin dang srin po la sogs pas zin pa la ni chu la bzlas te gtor na grol bar 'gyur ro/ /chang bzlog pa ni thal ba la bzlas nas sprin pa bltas te
297a4(rgyud 'grel): gtong par bya'o/ /chu la bzlas te gtong na char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /rims la ni skud pa sngon po la bzlas te lag pa la gdags so/ /zla ba dang nyi ma gzas zin pa'i dus su go ro tsa na la lan stong mngon par bzlas te dpral bar
297a5(rgyud 'grel): thig le byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /don la dmigs te gtsang zhing gtsang ma'i go byon la nyin mtshan du kun tu bsregs te/ lan brgyad brgya bzlas na rmi lam du dge sdig thams cad ston par 'gyur/ /sa la lan bdun brlas
297a6(rgyud 'grel): te tshom po la bltas nas pus na tshom po bas mi mthong zhing bzlog par 'gyur ro/ /me tog gam 'bras bu la lan bdun bzlas te gang la gtor pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs so/ /dpa' bo rdo rje mkha' 
297a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po las btus pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs byang chub kyi seMs can kun du gzigs pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po ka lA ka pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po
297b1(rgyud 'grel): h+rI? ka ra dang/ lo tsa ba chen po 'gos lha btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la thab pa'o// //bcom ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud la rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang mtshungs shin tu legs par mkhyen/ mkhas pa chen po bla ma
297b2(rgyud 'grel): mang po lo tsas blo ldan bdag pa gnas nas bdag gis bris// //rgyu gar skad du/ sh+rI tsakra saM pa ra/ sa ha dza tatpa A lo ka/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sngom pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i de kho na nyid snang ba/ dpal 'khor
297b3(rgyud 'grel): lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang la brten nas rang rig bde chen po/ /stong dang snying rje dbyer med mtshon pa'i gzhi/ /chos dang longs sprul bde ba chen po yi/ /rang bzhin rtsa yi 'khor lo'i mgon btud nas/ /'khor lo bde
297b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog dpal rim las byung las/ /spyod 'chad mgon po'i zhal snga las rnyed pa'i/ /rang rig bde chen ye shes mtshon pa'i thabs/ /dpyid dang thig le bsgom pa'i man ngag bshad/ /bsam gtan khang pa rnam g.yeng skye bo yi/
297b5(rgyud 'grel): 'du 'dzi dang gral rnam par dben pa'i sar/ /yongs su 'dzin pa ma lus rnams spangs te/ /mi g.yo rtse gcig ting 'dzin mchog bsgrub bya/ /bde ba'i stan gnas rdo rje skyil krung dang/ /lag gnyis mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyag rgya can/ /
297b6(rgyud 'grel): lus bsrab nas ni mgrin pa dgug pa dang/ /mig gnyis sna yi rtse mor mnyam sbyar zhing/ /gang la rgyan dang cha lugs phyag mtshan dang/ /mtshan dang dpe byang ma lus yongs rdzogs pa/ /dang snang shes rab phag mo dang 'dus pa'i//
297b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med bde ba'i rang bzhin rang lha'i sku/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu dri za'i grong khyer dang/ /bar ma'i srid dang chu zla lta bu yi/ /lus kyi dbus gnas sa sogs 'byung ba bzhi/ /byams dang snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms dang/ /sbyin sogs rig
298a1(rgyud 'grel): ma bzhi yi bdag nyid dang/ /chos dang longs sprul bde ba che rang bzhin/ /e baM ma yA rtsa yi 'khor lo la/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed byang chub yi ger ldan/ /rdul dang snying stobs mun pa'i rang bzhin gyi/ /rtsa gsum gyis ni yang
298a2(rgyud 'grel): dag sprel byas pa/ /yon tan skyon gyi rang bzhin rtsa gnyis la/ /bsten nas steng dang 'og gi sgo gnyis nas/ /'byung dang 'jug pa srog dang rtsol ba yi/ /gang du mi ba yi rtse gcig gyur pa las/ /dang po ri dags srid bzhin snang ba dang/ /mtshan
298a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa dang du ba'i rnam pa can/ /gsum pa srin bu me khyer dang 'dra zhing/ /bzhi pa sgron ma 'bar ba lta bu dang/ /mtshan ma lnga pa rnam par ma brtags par/ /sprin med nam mkha' lta bu 'byung 'gyur zhing/ /de tshe gang du ye shes me 'bar
298a4(rgyud 'grel): ba/ /gsang ba glog gi 'ong dang mtshungs pa yi/ /steng du 'phro bas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bebs shing/ /bde chen rang rig ye shes ster bar byed/ /gang la brten nas? skyes pa'i ye shes dang/ /rang rig las gzhan brjod par mi nus shing/ /dngos dang
298a5(rgyud 'grel): dngos med rtog pa las grol ba/ /bde chen de bzhin nyid la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /gang zhig skyes pas thog med 'khor ba nas/ /bsags pa'i sgrib pa ma lus kun spong ba/ /gnyis med bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyi/ /gnyug
298a6(rgyud 'grel): ma'i ye shes de la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /rtog pa gang gis rtog pa kun gcod cing/ /sna tshogs snang ba'i dngos kun der mtshon pa/ /bde chen rang rig ye shes gcig bu pa/ /gnyis med rtogs pa'i mchog la bdag phyag 'tshal//
298a7(rgyud 'grel): gang la bstod dang gang gis bstod pa dang/ /ji ltar bstod cing phyag 'tshal dang bral ba/ /spros tshogs gdags pa'i mdza' las rab 'das pa'i/ /mnyam nyid de bzhin nyid la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /gang zhig gomS
298b1(rgyud 'grel): pa mthar phyin pas/ /kun tu rtog pa kun spong zhing/ /rnam par mi rtog ye shes mchog /tshe 'di nyid la ster bar byed/ /brtul zhugs spyod 'chang bla med pa/ /'bar ba'i gtso bo'i bka' drin las/ /rtogs pa'i don
298b2(rgyud 'grel): gang 'dir bsdus pas/ /'gro kun rdo rje 'chang thob shog /dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i/ de kho na nyid snang ba slob dpon chen po dpag med rdo rjes mdzad pa/ rgya gar gyi mkhas pa dI baM ka ra rak+Shi ta dang/ A tsarya mang pa
298b3(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi dbang phyug gis sgyur pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI tsakra sam+b+ha ra tat+twa garb+ha saM gra ha/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i snying po'i de kho na nyid bsdus pa/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshal
298b4(rgyud 'grel): lo/ /gdod nas dag cing gdod nas grol/ /gdod nas zhi ba'i bdag nyid can/ /dngos po kun gyi de bzhin nyid/ /gzung 'dzin bral la phyag 'tshal lo/ /blta bar dka' zhing rtogs par dka' / /brjod 'das tshig gis mtshon min
298b5(rgyud 'grel): par/ /rang giS rig pa'i ye shes ni/ /gnyis med gsal pa'i rang bzhin can/ /gang zhig dri mas bsgribs pa'i sems/ /yul du snang ba'i rjes 'jug pa/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rtog pa ste/ /chags sdang rnam rmongs las la ni//
298b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam g.yeng sdug bsngal dang bcas pa'i/ /'khor ba mngon par 'grub pa'o/ /gang gis bla ma'i drin thob nas/ /sems kyis de nyid rig pa gang/ /ri dbang rtse nas lhung ba ltar/ /grol ba'i thabs ni bla na med/ /gzhan du dka' thub
298b7(rgyud 'grel): mi bzang sogs/ /lus nyon mongs par byed pa yis/ /thar pa'i 'bras bu mi rnyed par/ /slar zhing rnam par 'khor par 'gyur/ /gang gi sems kyi de nyid rig /de las gzhan du grol ba'i thabs/ /bzlas dang bsam gtan la
299a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa/ /pha rol sgrol ba'i bu bzhin 'dor/ /de bas bzlas med bsam gtan dang/ /dka' thub med cing sbyin sreg med/ /dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor pa med pa/ /rang rig ye shes gcig pu nyid/ /
299a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam thar bzhi yi rang bzhin dang/ /dus gsum mkhyen pa'i bdag nyid can/ /rten 'brel bcu gnyis dag pa yis/ /zhal phyag rnam pa'i gzugs can nyid/ /thabs dang shes rab dbyer med sku/ /byang chub phyogs chos sum cu bdun/
299a3(rgyud 'grel): gcig bu'i nyams ni du ma'i gar/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rnam pa'o/ /gang gis de yongs shes pa yis/ /rang bzhin de ni rtogs 'gyur na/ /gzhan du spros pa sna tshogs kyang/ /grol ba'i rgyu nyid kho na'o/ /de phyir rang
299a4(rgyud 'grel): rig mtshon pa yi/ /thabs kyi spros pa sna tshogs pa/ /gaM gA rgya mtsho'i ro bzhin du/ /spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin byed/ /de bas gang gis thabs rig pas/ /bsam gtan la ni mngon par gzhol/ /gzings la lags par
299a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba ltar/ /sems kyi de nyid mthong par 'gyur/ /'dir ni phung po khams rnams dang/ /skye mched drug las rnam grol ba/ /sgyu ma'i gzugs la legs gnas pa'i/ /aM paM rtsa yi 'khor lo la/ /bcu drug thog mar
299a6(rgyud 'grel): thig ler bcas/ /dro ba rnams kyi bzhi pa la/ /dbyangs kyi drug pa dang ldan pa/ /zla byed thig les rnam par mdzes/ /dbyangs yig bcu gsum thig les? rgyan/ ya tshogs brgyad pa'i mdza' gnas pa/ /gzhon med pa de ba ? ma rang bzhin//
299a7(rgyud 'grel): nA da thig le dang bcas pa'o/ /srog dang rtsol ba legs bsngams te/ /sprul par rlung lnga bcings pa yis/ /du ba la sogs rtags mthong nas/ /ye shes me ni rnam par 'bar/ /glog gi 'od dang mtshungs pa yi/ /gsal ba'i gzugs
299b1(rgyud 'grel): can gyen 'gro bas/ /steng nas byang chub sems blangs te/ /'o ma'i rgyun gyis rnam par 'bab/ /lte bar gsang ba'i snyoms 'jug las/ /ye shes skyes gang rang bzhin ni/ /'dod chags ma yin chags bral min/ /dbu mar yang ni mi
299b2(rgyud 'grel): dmigs shing/ /chags dang chags med 'dras gyur pa'i/ /lhan skyes yang dag byang chub nyid/ /zla ba nyi ma'i dbus gnas mig/ /nam mkha' sems gcig gyur pa las/ /rlung rnams ma lus der bcings te/ /yid ni ri dbang ltar
299b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas byed/ /nyin dang mtshan mo rnams spangs cing/ /'gro dang 'ong pa las grol pa/ /dus gsum mnyam par sbyor ba'o/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bde ba che/ /rang bzhin gnyug ma lhan cig skyes/ /dngos po kun gyi de
299b4(rgyud 'grel): kho na/ /sems kyi de nyid mthong ba ngo/ /rang bzhin gyis ni rnam dag pa/ /gzung 'dzin dri bral mngon sangs rgyas/ /dmigs med snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ /'khor ba ji srid gnas kyi bar/ /'gyur ba med pa'i ngo bos bzhuD/
299b5(rgyud 'grel): rin chen sems las gzhan gyur pa/ /'khor med mya ngan 'das pa med/ /sems kyi de nyid rig pa la/ /'khor nyid mya ngan 'das par 'gyur/ /dpal ldan mgon po spyod 'chang pa'i/ /drin gyis rtogs pa de nyid
299b6(rgyud 'grel): gang/ /gzhung lugs rgya mtsho'i snying po yis/ /'gro ba'i sgrib shes sgrib sel shog /dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i snying po de kho na nyid bsdus pa/ slob dpon ku su lu bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
299b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug dang/ A tsarya mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gis bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ sa ta dza tat+twa A lo ka /bod skad du/ lhan cig skyes pa'i de kho na nyid
300a1(rgyud 'grel): snang ba/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku spyod mngon par 'byung brjod sogs/ /rgyud rnams kun tu sbas pa yi/ /zab mo'i de nyid gsang ches pa/ /bla ma'i drin gyis rtogs par bshad//
300a2(rgyud 'grel): brtag dka' rtog ge'i yul min zhing/ /zab mo spros pa nyer zhi ba/ /lkugs pa yi ni rmi lam dang/ /gzhon nus myong ba'i bde ba ltar/ /tshig gis mtshon min rang rig pa/ /ser sna med sogs tshul bzhi yis/ /bla ma
300a3(rgyud 'grel): nye bar bsten pa yi/ /drin thob shes rab ye shes kyi/ /skad cig gsum par gang skyes pa/ /don mtshungs mtshon pas dper nyid de/ /khyim gnas bu ga'i nam mkha' dang/ /dmus lod glang chen yan lag ltar/ /
300a4(rgyud 'grel): don mthong ma yin 'bras zan gyis/ /spabs pa'i bu ram ro bzhin no/ /cha shas dang ni rdzogs pa dang/ /sgrib bcas sgrib pa dang bral ba'i/ /dbye ba las ni rnam rmongs pas/ /ches ma thag dang gang ba yi/ /zla ba sprin
300a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis sgribs pa dang/ /gsal ba'i bye brag ma shes so/ /de ltar na'ang der myong ba/ /bla ma'i gsung gis legs mtshon te/ /rgyud du yang dag goms pa las/ /dang po'i chu la zla ba dang/ /mig dag pa la gzugs bzhin du//
300a6(rgyud 'grel): gsal bar 'gyur gyi yid ches kyis/ /dngos po sna tshogs snang 'di rnams/ /sems las phyi rol 'gyur med kyang/ /rang rig bag chags dbang byas nas/ /yul dang dbang bor snang ba'i sems/ /dbang po'i lam
300a7(rgyud 'grel): na rjes 'gro bas/ /yul rnams la ni mngon zhugs te/ /chags sogs nyon mongs rgyur gyur pa/ /las kyi shis pa'i 'khor lo ltar/ /yun rings srid par yang dang yang/ /sdug bsngal dang bcas rnams par 'khor
300b1(rgyud 'grel): nang du yang dag 'jog pa yi/ /thabs kyis de las rnam bzlog nas/ /rlung bral mar me lta bu yi/ /rnal 'byor rgyun du goms byas nas/ /ma rnyog steng ga'i chu bzhin du/ /rang gi de nyid gsal mthong 'gyur/ /shin tu bzhin bzangs mig
300b2(rgyud 'grel): yangs ma/ /gzugs bzangs lang tsho phun tshogs pa/ /khro med rjes su brtse ba dang/ /dad dang thos sogs yon tan can/ /sgrub las gzhan du mi blta zhing/ /skal bzang byed pa 'ching ba yi/ /sbyor ba la ni rab goms nas/ /mi no/?
300b3(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub sa gzhi yin/ /de dang lhan cig dben par gnas/ /stobs bzangs myos byed bcas bza' zhing/ /blta ba dang ni reg pa dang/ /'khyud dang ma mchu'i ro myangs pas/ /rjes su chags par 'gyur bas ni/ /mtshan pa'i dbye
300b4(rgyud 'grel): bas gsal rtogs bya/ /chags pa chen pos rab rgyas rtsa/ /'tshir dang zlos pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /mngon sum lce yi thur mas drangs/ /nor bu'i nang du legs chung pas/ /mun pa la ni mar me ltar/ /gsal bar nges kyis gzhan
300b5(rgyud 'grel): du min/ /de nyid du ni ye shes mchog /sdom bya thun nam nyin gcig gam/ /zla phyed zla gcig khyud kor dang/ /bskal pa bskal pa stong dag tu/ /de goms pa las mi 'gyur ba'i/ /ye shes dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /der ni leD
300b6(rgyud 'grel): 'du'i dam tshig rdzas/ /rlung gi stobs kyi thob pa 'am/ /dman pa'i sems kyis ngor min pas/ /phyi rol nas ni lces blang bya/ /bla ma'i drin thob dga' ba yis/ /sems kyis zab mo'i de kho na/ /legs bkod gang 'dis 'gro pa
300b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /gnyug ma'i lam gyis bgrod grub shog /dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i/ lhan cig skyes pa'i de kho na nyid snang bar slob dpon ku su lus pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // 
301a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI tsakra saM ba ra tat+twa? u pa de sha /bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom? pa'i de kho na nyid kyi man ngag /dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dag pa'i de nyid mtshon pa yi/ /e baM sbyor
301a2(rgyud 'grel): ba las skyes pa/ /mkha' mnyam dri ma rnam spangs pa'i/ /dbyer med chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyud rnams kun tu ches gsang ba/ /bla ma rim brgyud la 'ongs nas/ /ji bzhin bdag gis nges rtogs pa/ /de 'dir rnam par
301a3(rgyud 'grel): bsal bar byas/ /'khor lo sdom pa pad ma'i tshal/ /spyod 'chang gsung gi nyi zer gyis/ /cha bas legs thob snying po mchog /'gro rnams tshim par byed pa 'di'o/ /gang du bskal pa grangs med par/ /'bad kyang 'dod don
301a4(rgyud 'grel): mi 'thob pa/ /de 'dir tshe 'di nyid sogs kyis/ /dngos grub go 'phang bla med 'gyur/ /lus gdungs sems ni g.yeng byed pa'i/ /dka' thub la sogs rnam spangs te/ /'dod la nye bar brten pa yi/ /lam gyi bde ba'i 'bras
301a5(rgyud 'grel): bu bsgrub/ /gang zhig bsten pas yul kun gyi/ /bde bas yongs su tshim byed cing/ /spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras ster ba/ /mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs ldan pa'o/ /'jig rten rtog pas brtags ba yi/ /rigs
301a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi zhin pa kun spangs nas/ /dbyibs dang kha dog lang tsho dang/ /na tshod la sogs rjes mthun cing/ /dam tshig spyod pa sogs brten pa'i/ /yon tan rnams kyi rten gyur pa/ /brten pas sgrub po dbang phyug gi /
301a7(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub kun gyi gzhi byed pa'o/ /legs brtogs shin tu legs rtags pa/ /brten byed? las gzhan du ni/ /chags sogs 'jig rten dbang gyur pas/ /brten nas sa sbyod sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /chags can ye?
301b1(rgyud 'grel): shes mngon 'dod pas/ /tshul 'di nyid kyis bgrong bya yis/ /de las gzhan pa'i lam gyis ni/ /nam yang grub la brten mi 'gyur/ /shin tu dben pa'i sar gnas te/ /'jig rten g.yeng ba kun spangs pas/ /bde ba'i ye shes
301b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phel byed pa'i/ /rjes mthun longs spyod brten pa dang/ /rigs dang yang dag sbyor ba'i sems/ /mi nyams bde ba'i rten gyur pa/ /de 'dir rang gi stobs kyis sam/ /de bzhin phyag rgya'i stobs kyis kyang/ /nor bu'i nang son dbyer med pas/
301b3(rgyud 'grel): bde mchog bla na med goms bya/ /de goms pa yi sbyor ba yi/ /ras dkar la ni snum dang ni/ /zas la bcud kyis phug pa dang/ /chab rom las ni chu nyid dang/ /chu rnams las kyang rgya mtsho dang/ /chu rlabs las ni chu bzhin 'gyur
301b4(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig mchog tu goms pa'i mthus/ /sna tshogs snang ba der 'gyur te/ /ji ltar bu ram las byas gzugs/ /sna tshogs mdar ba'i ro bzhin no/ /gang 'dir thun nam nyin gcig gam/ /zla phyed zla gcig khyud gong du/ /goms
301b5(rgyud 'grel): pas bskal mang? bye stong du/ /mi 'gyur ba yi ye shes thob/ /'khor lo sdom dpal gzhung lugs las/ /bla ma'i drin gyis legs thob pa/ /de 'dir bdag gis gsal byas pas/ /dge des 'gro kun bla med shog /dpal 'khor
301b6(rgyud 'grel): lo sdom pa'i de kho na nyid kyi man ngag ku su lu pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //kha che'i mkhas pa b+ha dra bo d+hi dang lo tsa ba mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gi bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/
301b7(rgyud 'grel): sh+rI tsakra saM ba ra a dwe to b+hyA no ba de sha yo ga tsatDA li/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i gnyis su med pa'i bsam gtan gyi man ngag rnal 'byor gyi gtum mo/ /dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang la dmigs
302a1(rgyud 'grel): pas srid bar 'ching ba yi/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog kun spyod cing/ /rnam par mi rtog ye shes mchog 'chang? ba'i/ /gnyis med rtsa yi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal/ /gang zhig goms pas sa
302a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum ma lus pa'i/ /rang bzhin bde ba chen po rtogs 'gyur pa'i/ /rang rig ye shes bde chen gcig pu ba/ /gang la brten nas rtogs pa'i man ngag bshad/ /srid pa'i btson rar? gzung 'dzin 'ching ba yi/ /bcing
302a3(rgyud 'grel): bas bcings sdug mgon med gyur pa la/ /snying rje'i rlan gyis nye bar bsgos pa yi/ /yang dag byang chub sems ldan dbang bskur bas/ /yid 'ong khad par bde ba'i stan gnas te/ lha yi bsam gtan mchog la rab? gzhol ba'i//
302a4(rgyud 'grel): lus gnas thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin can/ /spyi bo lte bar gnas pa'i rtsa 'khor lo/ /gang la bcu drug thog mar yi ge thig ler ldan/ /dro ba'i bzhi pa gzhom med rang bzhin can/ /a ba d+hu tI kun nas sprel ba'i?//
302a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i dbus gnas byang chub yi ge thig le la/ /rtse gcig yid kyis 'byung dang 'jug spangs te/ /drod dang du ba 'thul dang 'bar ba las/ /rlung bral mar me 'bar ba'i rtse lta bu/ /glog gi 'od ltar kun nas gsal
302a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gzugs/ /gyen 'gros steng gi 'khor lo'i dbus gnas pa'i/ /gzhom med sa bon hUM yig bzhu byas te/ /gang la brten nas ye shes skye ba'i mchog /byang chub rang bzhin 'o ma'i rgyun 'bab pas/ /gang du thabs
302a7(rgyud 'grel): dang shes rab 'dres gyur pa/ /de ru gnyis med ye shes skye bar 'gyur/ /rang gis rang rig pa yi ye shes mchog /rtog ge rnams kyis brtags pa'i yul min cing/ /brjod bral ye shes lkugs pa'i rmi lam dang/ /
302b1(rgyud 'grel): ci ltar gzhon nu ma yi dbang po gnyis/ /'dus la myong ba'i bde ba ci bzhin pa/ /de ru gnyis med ye shes skye bar 'gyur/ /gang tshe skyes pa'i bde ba che goms pas/ /de las gzhan pa'i dngos po mthong med cing/ /sna tshogs snang
302b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dngos 'di ma lus pa/ /rang bzhin bde ba chen por 'char par 'gyur/ /de tshe mig sogs dbang bo'i yul snang pa'i/ /gzugs la sogs ba'i dngos 'di ma lus pa/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu dri za'i grong khyer dang/ /bar ma'i srid dar?
302b3(rgyud 'grel): chu'i zla ba dang/ /snang brnyan seng ge zla ba'i grong bzhin du/ /ma lus rang bzhin gcig pa mthong par 'gyur/ /de tshe? theg med srid pa'i btson nga? ru/ /bsags pa'i 'ching ba ma lus kun bcad nas/ /gnyis med ye shes bde
302b4(rgyud 'grel): ba chen po yi/ /go 'phang bla na med pa thob par 'gyur/ /dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i gnyis su med pa/ bsaM gtan gyi man ngag/ rnal 'byor gyis? tu? mo/ slob dpon chen po dge ba'i mgon pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
302b5(rgyud 'grel): bal po'i paN+Di ta bA gI shwa ra dang/ lo tsa ba A tsarya mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gis bsgyur ba'o// // */ /lo hi ba yi mngon rtogs 'grel pa sdom pa 'byung ba bzhugs/ // */ /rgya gar skad du/
302b6(rgyud 'grel): lu yi pA dA b+hi sa ma ya bar ti saM ba re dya nA ma/ bod skad du/ lu yi ba'i mngon par rtogs pa'i 'grel pa sdom pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba/ dpal ldan lu yi pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pA rA rlung dang me ngag gis/ /bde ba chen po'i 'khor?
302b7(rgyud 'grel): lo hI/ /gang gis zhu byed bA rA hI/ /de la 'khor ba gnas par 'dung/ /'di mnga' i sten pa 'gro ba ngag dang gnyis med bdag /shes rab ma yi khams ldan bde ba chen po'i bdag /shes rab thugs rje dpyer med nam
303a1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' lta bu'i bdag /de nyid sgrub thabs de bsgom byed pa bdag gis bshad/ /dang por ri spyil la sogs par/ /lho phyogs kha bstan rnal 'byor pa/ /skra grol ro la 'dug nas ni/ /bdud rtsi lnga po khar bcug
303a2(rgyud 'grel): la/ /sh+rI he ru ka zhes yig don/ /bsam zhing sdom pa'i tshul du bsgyur/ /A li kA li 'od zer gyis/ /bgegs bsregs tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom/ /gzugs la rgyal ba rnam snang mdzad/ /tshor ba rdo rje nyi mar bsgom/ /
303a3(rgyud 'grel): 'du shes pad+ma gar dbang phyug /rdo rje rgyal po 'du byed la/ /rnam shes phung po rdo rje can/ /thams cad stong nyid he ru ka'o/ /rim par dpral bar lte ba mgrin/ /rkang pa snying dang spyi bor ro/ /gti mug rdo rje mig dag la/ /zhe
303a4(rgyud 'grel): sdang dag byed snyan gnyis la/ /sna la ser? sna gsong byed ma/ /kha la 'dod chags rdo rje ste/ /phrag dog rdo rje lus dpral la/ /byang chub sems dpa' dbang phyug sbyin/ /skye mched rnams kyi rang snying la'o/ /sa yi khams
303a5(rgyud 'grel): ni ltung byed ma/ /chu yi khams ni gsong byed ma/ /me yi khams ni 'gugs byed ma/ /rlung khams gar gyi dbang phyug ma/ /nam mkha' i rang bzhin pad 'bar ma/ /'di rnams rim pas lte ba snying/ /mgrin pa dbral ba gsang
303a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas su/ /yang na gzugs la sogs pa rnams/ /gzugs brnyan la sogs bzhin du bsam/ /de nas g.yon pa'i mtheb mdzub kyis/ /se gol gtog pa sngon btang nas/ /sum b+ha la sogs sngags bzhi po/ /rtse
303a7(rgyud 'grel): gcig rnal 'byor brjod pa yis/ /nag po ljang khu dmar po ser/ /shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su dgong/ /sa 'og tshangs pa'i gnas par du/ /khyab pa'i lus chen 'bar ba rnams/ /sum b+ha la sogs 'od zer gyis/ /ra ba
303b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi bo de bzhin bsam/ /hUM byung de mtshan rdo rje yis/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i rang bzhin sa/ /'og khyab rdo rje'i 'od rnams kyis/ /rdo rje rtse lngar gyur pa yis/ /ra ba rnams steng zla dra ba/ /de yi 'og tu rdo rje'i gur/ /de 'og rdo rje'i bla re? ma/ /
303b2(rgyud 'grel): rang rang sngags kyis bsam par bya/ /khwa gdong ma la sogs pa bzhi/ /gsang sngags bzhi las byung ba dang/ /gnyis gnyis phyogs 'od las byung ba/ /gshin rje brtan ma la sogs bzhi/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis de rnams
303b3(rgyud 'grel): brgyad/ /ste ma man chad phur? pa'i gzugs/ /de rnams g.yon na phur bu ni/ /de dang de yi ngang tshul can/ /g.yas pa'i lag pa rnams na ni/ /rdo rje'i tho ba chen po 'dzin/ /'phros te song bas phyogs bcu na/ /gnas pa'i bgeD
303b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams rab bkug nas/ /hUM rings brjod 'byung phyogs brgyad kyi/ /khron par de rnams rab bcug nas/ /gdab ba'i sngags kyis phur bus gdab/ /brdung ba'i sngags kyis brdung? bya ste/ /grang? ba dang brdung ba dag gis ni/ /de bzhin
303b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid du ro gcig 'gyur/ /bgegs kyi lhag ma rnams bskrad nas/ /ra ba la thim lha mo rnams/ /chu la chu ni 'bab pa bzhin/ /mtshams kyis bcings pa'i phyir byung ba/ /rdo rje pad+ma 'khor lo yi/ /ra ba rnams kyang bsam par
303b6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /gsang sngags rnams ni 'di lta ste/ /oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM huM phaT/ oM grih+Na grih+Na huM huM phaT/ oM grih+NA pa ya grih+NA pa ya huM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho:b+ha ga wAn/ badzra rA dza hUM hUM phaT/ oM g+ha:g+ha:g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya sarba duSh+TAn
303b7(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya sarba pA paM hUM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badzra kI la badzra d+ha ra Adz+nyA ba ya ti sarba pig+h+nAM kA ya bak+tsit+ta badzra kI la ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra mung+ga ra badzra kI la ya A koTa ya hUM phaT/ de nas snying kar a las zla ba'i dkyil
304a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor te/ /de yi steng du hUM yig 'od zer ldan pa bsam byas nas/ /de'i 'od kyis bkug nas mdun du dkyil 'khor la/ /phyag 'tshal la sogs bdun dang bdag nyid dbul bar bya/ /he ru ka zhes spyi bo
304a2(rgyud 'grel): mgrin pa snying ga ru/ /rim pas bltas te stong pa nyid bsgom gsang sngags brjod/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud+ha:sarba d+harmA(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA shud+d+he haM/ /sngon gyi smon lam dbang gis rang sems oM sogs gyur/ /de las 'od dang 'khor lo'i
304a3(rgyud 'grel): 'phro dang 'du ba bsam/ /de nas rang sems de yang rab tu snang ba tsam/ /de yan gsang sngags brjod cing stong pa nyid du bsgom/ /oM shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+h+ra ba At+ma ko haM/ stong pa'i ngang las langs te yaM yig las byung
304a4(rgyud 'grel): ba/ /de la rlung gi 'khor lo rnam par bsgom bya ste/ /sngo skya gzhu yi dbyibs can mdza' ma ba dan mtshan/ /de'i steng du raM yig las byung me'i dkyil 'khor/ /rtse mo bdun ldan dmar po gru gsum raM gyis mtshan/ /de stengs
304a5(rgyud 'grel): paM yig las byung chu yi dkyil 'khor te/ /dkar po shin tu zlum po bum pas mtshan pa'o/ /de stengs laM yig las byung sa yi dkyil 'khor te/ /ser po gru gsum rtse gsum rdo rjes mtshan pa'o/ /de stengs suM yig las
304a6(rgyud 'grel): byung ri rab lhun po ste/ lcog brgyad ldan pa gling la sogs pas bskor ba dang/ grwa bzhi ngos bzhi rin chen bzhi yi rang bzhin can/ /de stengs pad+ma'i steng du hUM byung sna tshogs rdor/ /de steng paM yig las byung sna tshogs
304a7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma ste/ /'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar lte ba dang ldan pa'o/ /de steng a li ka li las byung nying zla'o/ /zhes bya ba rnal 'byor/ /de la hUM yig rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin can/ /rang gi 'od zer 'phros pas 'khor lo lnga
304b1(rgyud 'grel): po yis/ /'gro ba'i 'khor lo'i rang bzhin byas nas rnal 'byor mas/ /bcas pa'i 'khor lo slar yang bsdus te bsgom par bya/ zhes bya ba rjes su rnal 'byor ro/ /hUM la sogs pa las bskyed nyi ma'i 'khor lor gnas/ /he ru ka dpal
304b2(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' bzhin du rang bzhin med/ /rtag pa'i dbang phyug chang ba'i? u ma de thI? la/ /brkyang bskum g.yas g.yon gnas pa zhal kun spyan gsum ldan/ /'khor lo dur khrod dang ldan gzhal yas khang gi nang/ /mthing nag ljang gu
304b3(rgyud 'grel): dmar po ser po'i kha dog can/ /zhal bzhi dbu la rdo rje phreng ldan phyag bcu gnyis/ /rdo rje dril pu gnyis bcas phyag gis yum la 'khyud/ /gti mug ngag phyir glang po'i paD pa phyag gnyis bsnams/ /g.yas pas rim pas Da ma
304b4(rgyud 'grel): ru dang dgra sta gri gug rtse gsum 'dzin/ /g.yon pas kha TwAM? ga dang thod pa zhags pa tshangs pa'i mgo po bsnams/ /dbu la zla ba phyed pa thod pa'i phreng pa sna tshogs rdo rje can/ /mche ba rab tu gtsigs shing zhal 'gyur ral pa'i thor
304b5(rgyud 'grel): tshugs dag dang ldan/ /blo ldan bsam gtan sbyor bas nyams kun dang ldan pa/ /nyon mongs dri ma dag phyir stag gi pags pa bsnams/ /A li la sogs lnga bcu rnam par dag pa yis/ /mi mgo rlon pa lnga bcu'i ngo shal dang ldan pa/ /
304b6(rgyud 'grel): mgul rgyan stan? cha ? kor spyi gtsug nor bu dang/ /tshangs skung dang ldan thal bas byugs pa du ba'i mdog /phag mo mgon po'i mdun gnas nyi ma lta bur ni/ /mdog dmar thod pa skam po'i phreng pa'i ngo shal can/ /zhal gcig
304b7(rgyud 'grel): ma dang spyan gsum phyag gnyis dang ldan ma/ /gcer? bu bde ba'i ngang tshul sla grol rab dgyes ma/ /thong pa'i dum bu las byas ska rags dang ldan ma/ /g.yon pa bdung khrag bkang pa'i thod pa bsnams pa ste/ /g.yas pa rdo rje sdigs
305a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzub kyis/ /phyogs bcu'i gdug pa rnams 'joms byed/ /bskal pa'i me ltong gzi brjid che/ /khrag la bgyes shing khrag 'dzag ma/ /brla gnyis la ni rab tu 'byung/ /bde chen snying rje'i bdag nyid can/
305a2(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang/ /khaN Da ro he gzugs can ma/ /pad+ma'i phyogs kyi 'dab mar dgod/ /de rnams dngos grub thams cad bsgrub/ /nag mo ljang gu dmar mo ser/ /zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa rnams/ /g.yon
305a3(rgyud 'grel): pa thor pa kha TwAM ga /Da ma ru dang gri gug g.yas/ /spyan gsum ma la skra grol ba/ /gcer bu brkyang bskum gnas pa rnams/ /phyogs mtshams rnams su bum steng du/ /byang chub sems sogs snod rnams so/ /dang por thugs
305a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rtsibs brgyad pa/ /mthing? nag rdo rje phreng bas bskor/ /de shar pul+lI? ra ma la ra/ /rab gtum khaN Da ka pA lar/ /de byang dzA land+ha ra ru/ / mahA kaM ka gtum mig can/ /nub kyi o Di yA na ru/ /kaM ka la dang 'od ldan
305a5(rgyud 'grel): ma/ /lho phyogs arbu dA ru ni/ /sna chen mche ba rnam par gtsigs/ /me mtshams go da a pa rir/ /su ra bi ri dpa' blo can/ bden bral rA me shwa ra ru/ /'od dpag med dang mi thung ma/ /di bi ki Ta rlung mtshams su//
305a6(rgyud 'grel): langba'i? 'bang phyug rdo rje 'od/ /dbang ldan mtshams su mA la bar/ /rdo rje'i sku dang shing grib ma/ /gsung gi 'khor lo dmar po ste/ /pad dmar po'i phreng bas bskor/ /shar ngos rtsibs kyi kA ma rur/ /oM gu ri dang aM?
305a7(rgyud 'grel): ra ba/ /byang du o drer? 'jigs byed che/ /de dang rdo rje'i ral pa can/ /nub kyi tri sha ku ne ru/ /dpa' bo chen mo rlung shugs ma/ /lho yi ko si la ru ni/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad chang 'thung ma'o/ /me yi mtshams kyi ka ling kar/ /byA ma
305b1(rgyud 'grel): de bi rang? tu bzang/ /bden bral mtshams su lam pA kar/ /rdor bzang shin tu bzang mo'o/ /rlung gi mtshams kyi kAny+tsi ru/ /'jigs byed che dang rta rna ma/ /de bzhin dbang ldan hi mA lar/ /mig mi bzang dang kha ga na'o/ /sku? yi 'khor lo
305b2(rgyud 'grel): dkar po ste/ /'khor lo'i 'phreng ba dkar pos bskor/ /shar rtsibs pre ta? bu ri ru/ /stobs chen 'khor lo'i shugs can ma/ /byang gi gri ha de tha? tA ra/ /rin chen rdo rje dum skyes ma/ /nub kyi rtsibs la so rA ? ra?/ /rta mgrin
305b3(rgyud 'grel): dang ni ShauN+Di? ni/ /lho ru war+Na dwI pa ru/ /'khor lo'i go cha nam mkha' i snying/ /me yi mtshams kyi na ga rar/ /he ru ka dpal su bI ri/ /lho nub saM d+hur pad+ma gar/ /dbang phyug dang ni stobs chen mo/ /rlung mtshams ma rung rnam sang?
305b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzang?/ /dpa' mo 'khor lo sgyur ma'o/ /dbang ldan mtshams kyi ku lu tAr/ /rdo rje sems dpa' brtson chen mo/ /dpa' bo rnams ni zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ /brkyang bskum rdo rje dril bu bsnams pas 'khyud/ /g.yas dang g.yon
305b5(rgyud 'grel): na Da ma ru dang kha TwAM ga /dpa' bo ral pa'i cod pan spyan gsuM ldan/ /rab gtum la sogs lha mo rnams/ /zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste/ /thod pa bsnams pa'i phyag gis 'khyud/ /gdug pa 'jigs byed gri gug bsnams/ /gnyis
305b6(rgyud 'grel): ser sbyor bas snyoms par 'jug /dpa' po dpa' mo 'khor lo bzhin/ /khwa 'ug khyi phag gdong can ma/ /mkha' 'gro sogs bzhin phyogs bzhi ru/ /mtshams su gshin rje brtan ma sogs/ /gzugs gnyis lnga ni pa'o lha mo
305b7(rgyud 'grel): brgyad?/ /de rnams zhal bzhi phyag bzhi pa/ /brkyang bskum ro li gdan la gnas/ /g.yon na thong pa kha TwAM ga /Da ma ru dang gri gug g.yas/ /thams cad spyan gsum drag mo ste/ /skra grol gcer bu de rnams so/ /mgul brgyan gdu
306a1(rgyud 'grel): bu dpung brgyan dang/ /rna brgyan dang ni tshangs skud dang/ /thams cad phyag rgya lnga dang ldan/ /dpral bar rdo rje'i phreng ba dkris/ /thod pa'i phreng bas mgrin par brgyan/ /skye rags sil sil sgra sgrags pa'o/ /shar dang
306a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang ldan dbu byas te/ /thams cad phyogs dang mtshams rnams su/ /dur khrod rnal 'byor ma dgongs la/ /g.yon dang g.yas su bskor bar bya/ /shar gyi dur khrod gtum drag na/ /shi ri Sha yi sdong chen dang/ /brgya byin rab brtan la
306a3(rgyud 'grel): bcibs pa/ /gser 'dog rdo rje thod pa bsnams/ /nor rgyas klu yi rgyal po yang/ /mdog dkar ud+pal sngon pos mtshan/ /thal mo sbyar bar byas pa yis/ /mdud cing mgon po'i mdun na gnas/ /byang du tshang tshing a shwad thar/ /
306a4(rgyud 'grel): lus ngan mi la zhon pa ste/ /ne'u le chen skyug pa dang/ /thod pa 'chang ba sku mdog ser/ /klu yi dbang phyug tak+Sha ka /ban du ka yi me tog ltar/ /gdengs ka dpal gyi be'us mtshan/ /mgos btung thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /nub tu ?
306a5(rgyud 'grel): bas khyab pa ru/ /a sho ka yi sdong chen la/ /dkar po gdengs bdun ba ru Na/ /chu srin la gnas thod zhags 'dzin/ /lto 'phye'i dbang phyug karko Ta/ /sai DU sngon po lta bu'i mdog /ri mo gsum ni mgrin par gnas/ /'dud nas?
306a6(rgyud 'grel): spyi bor thal mo sbyar/ /lho ru 'jigs rung la a mrar/ /gshin rje ma he zhon pa ste/ /nag po mig dmar lus pa sbom po/ /drag po be con thod pa 'dzin/ /gdengs ldan dbang phyug pad+ma zhes/ /ston pa yi ni bka' sdod cing/ /dkar
306a7(rgyud 'grel): po thal mo sbyar byas pa/ /dbu la thig le mang pos mtshan/ /ha ha rgod pa dbang ldan du/ /n+ya gro d+ha yi sdong chen po/ /dbang phyug rtse gsum thod pa thegs/ /dkar po glang zhon stag sham can/ /pad+ma chen po klu yi rgyal/ /zla ba'i
306b1(rgyud 'grel): 'od dang mnyam pa'i mdog /gdengs ka la ni rtse gsum mtshan/ /mgo la thal mo sbyar bas gnas/ /me mtshams dpal nags ka raM dzar/ /me lha bongs thung ra skyes bcibs/ /sku mdog dmar po thong pa 'dzin/ /phreng ba spyi blugs bcas
306b2(rgyud 'grel): pa bsnams/ /mdza' yas rma bya'i mgrin pa bzhin/ /mgo la pad+mas mtshan pa ste/ /spyi bor thal mo sbyar gyur nas/ /'dud cing mgon po'i zhabs drung gnas/ /bden bral mun pa mi bzang par/ /srin bu gcer bu sngon po'i mdog /
306b3(rgyud 'grel): ro gnas ral gri thod pa 'dzin/ /mi mgo'i phreng ba'i cod pan can/ /klu rgyal dung mdog rigs ldan ni/ /gdengs ka zla ba phyed pas mtshan/ /spyi bor thal mo sbyar byas te/ /la ta dza Di'i shing la gnas/ /rlung mtshams ardzu na yi
306b4(rgyud 'grel): shing/ /rlung lha du mdog sha ba bcibs/ /ba dan ser pho thod pa 'chang/ /ca co sgrogs par gnas pa'o/ /dung skyong ser po thig les mtshan/ /thal sbyar gus dang bcas pa'o/ /brgyad po klu rgyal sprin la gnas/ /dkar po rgyan gyis
306b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa'o/ /brgya byin la sogs phyogs bdag brgyad/ /yum dang bcas pa phyag bzhi pa/ /gnyis kyis thal mo sbyar ba ste/ /lhag ma dag ni phyag mtshan bsnams/ /sprin rnams rgyal bzang dpal stug dang/ /de bzhin char dang
306b6(rgyud 'grel): shin tu mthug /myur du dbyangs ldan gtum pa dang/ /char pa rnying pa tsam krol lo/ /de brgyad ngur? khrod brgyad rnams na/ /gnas pa'i sprin ni 'jigs byed ldan/ /glog dang 'brug ni sgra rab sgrogs/ /gang yang rung pa'i char rgyun
306b7(rgyud 'grel): 'bebs/ /rang rang phyogs bdag gzhon pa'i gdong/ /srin po rnams ni rang bzhin 'khrug /mi rnams kyi ni sha za zhing/ /khrag 'thung zhing rnams la gnas pa/ /'di rnams shing sdong brgyad pa yi/ /ngos dang ngos kyi phyogs kun
307a1(rgyud 'grel): du/ /nye bar bzang po'i shing rnams gnas/ /me tog 'bras bu phun sum tshogs/ /seng ge ce spyang khyi sgra sgrogs/ /stag dang wa? dang bag rnams dang/ /byi la rkyang dang bri ka sprul/ /khwa dang 'ug pa la sogs bya/ /gsal
307a2(rgyud 'grel): shing bskyon dang mdung gis phug /keng? rus phyed mgo rus pa rnams/ /thab tu tshig dang phyed? tshig pa/ /shas dang ni ro sgrub byed/ /grub thob gtor ma star ba dang/ /rnal 'byor ma tshogs mchod pa dang/ /gri gug thod pa kha TwAM ga /
307a3(rgyud 'grel): rnge? chung kha zas dpag med snod/ /mchod rten dkar po'i ri la gnas/ /grub chen brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /rnam shes brgyad kyi dag pa yang/ /ston pa 'di yi dur khrod rnams/ /de nas byang chub phyogs rnams dang/ /sku
307a4(rgyud 'grel): yi? 'khor lo'i phyogs bshad bya/ /gnas sogs rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sa bcu rnam par dag pa'o/ /pu dza o a go rA de mA/ /kA o tri ko ka la ka hi/ /pre gri sau su na si ma ku zhes bya ba'o/ /snying la mkha' 'gro lus
307a5(rgyud 'grel): rjes dran/ /tshor dran mgo bo ra lI ma ste/ /chos dran mgrin par dum skyes ma/ /lte bar sems dran gzugs can ma'o/ /mgo bo pul+lI ra ma lar/ /'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul rab gtum mo/ /spyi gtsug grong khyer dzA land+ha ra/
307a6(rgyud 'grel): brtson 'grus rdzu 'phrul gtum ba'i mig /o DyAn g.yas pa'i rna ba la/ /dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul 'od ldan ma/ /mgo yi rgyab kyi arbu dang/ /sems kyi rdzu 'phrul sna chen mo/ /gnas te sa rab dga' ba'o/ /go dA bi ra g.yon
307a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rnar/ /dad pa'i dbang po dba' blo ma/ /rA me shwA ri smin mtshams su/ /brtson 'grus dbang po mi thung ma/ /di pi ko Tar mig dag la/ /lang ka'i dbang phyug dran dbang po/ /mA la bar ni sdong grib ma/ /ting 'dzin dbang po dri med pa//
307b1(rgyud 'grel): phrag pa dag ste nye ba'i gnas/ /mkha' spyod thugs kyi 'khor lo'o/ /i ra ba ti kA ma rUr/ /shes rab dbang po mtshan khung gnyis/ /nu ma gnyis la dad pa'i stobs/ /'jigs byed chen mo o h+re ru?/ /zhing dang sa gsum 'ong byed ma/ /
307b2(rgyud 'grel): brtson 'grus stobs ni rlung shugs ma/ /lte ba h+ri sha ku ne ru/ /dran pa'i stobs ni chang 'thung ma/ /ko sa lar ni sna rtse ste/ /sa 'od 'gro ba nye bar zhing/ /ting nge 'dzin stobs kha ru ni/ /sh+yA ma de bi ka ling gar/ /shin tu bzang mo laM
307b3(rgyud 'grel): pA kar/ /mgrin par shes rab stobs dang ni/ /sa sbyang dka' ba mtshan de ha/ /byang chub yan lag ting nge 'dzin/ /rta rna kAny+tsi snying gar gnas/ /ti mA la ye 'doms su ni/ /brtson 'grus yang dag kha ga na/ /mngon gyur nye ba'i chen
307b4(rgyud 'grel): do nya/ /gsung gi 'khor lo longs spyod pa/ /dga' ba pre ta pur rtags la/ /'khor lo'i shugs can bshad lam du/ /gri ha de bar shin tu sbyangs/ /khaN Da ro ha ring? du song/ /sa sta 'du ba can gyi gnas/ /brla gnyis chos rab
307b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par 'byed/ /sau rASh+Ta shauNa DI ni/ /byin gnyis 'khor lo'i go cha ma/ /su war+N+ta? dI par dran yang dag /mi g.yo'i sa ste nyer 'du can/ /btang snyems? byang chub yan lag ni/ /sor mo dpa' mo na ga ra/ /sind+hu rgang pa'i bol dag la'o/
307b6(rgyud 'grel): yang dag lta ba stobs chen mo/ /dur khrod legs pa'i blo gros sa/ /'khor lo sgyur ma? yang dag rtob/ /mthe bong ma ru brtson chen mo/ /bus mo ku lu tAr yang dag dag /nye ba'i dur khrod chos kyi sprin/ /sku? yi sa 'og gnas spyod
307b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /las mdza' khwa gdong kha la gnas/ /'tsho ba 'ug gdong rna phug g.yon/ /rtsol ba khyi gdong ra bag g.yas/ /dran pa phag gdong bshang lam du/ /sh+rI he ru ka'i ting nge 'dzin/ /gshin rjes rten ma rna ba g.yas/ /dge
308a1(rgyud 'grel): chos skyed par byed pa'o/ /skyes pa'i dge ba bsrung byed pa/ /gshin rje pho nya rna ba g.yon/ /mi dge thams cad spong byed pa/ /mig g.yas ba/ shin rje mche ba ma/ /mi dge mi skyed mi bskyed pa/ /gshin rje 'jomS
308a2(rgyud 'grel): ma mig g.yon la/ /rkang 'og gnas pa'i rlung 'khor lo/ /bai raM pa ni gzhu yi dbyibs/ /sum mdo'i phyogs su gnas pa ni/ /gru gsum me yang de bzhin no/ /zlum po'i rnam pa'i tshul can gyi/ /chu yi 'khor lo gsus par gnas/ /snying gar
308a3(rgyud 'grel): sa yi 'khor lo gnas/ /gru bzhi pa ni kun phyogs su/ /sgal tshigs dbyu gu'i tshul du ni/ /de bzhin ri rgyal lhun mo ste/ /de yi spyi gtsug dkyil du yang/ /pang 'dab sum cu rtsa gnyis pa/ /dbyangs yig gsal yig yang dag gang/ /byang
308a4(rgyud 'grel): chub phyogs chos sum cu gnyis/ /pad+ma'i dbus na yod pa gang/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de la brjod/ /mgo bo'i dbus na yod pa gang/ /de la klad pa zhes brjod de/ /de yis dbus su haM yig ste/ /byang chub phyogs chos sum cu bdun//
308a5(rgyud 'grel): thig le'i tshul te rang sgra sgrogs/ /'jig rten kun gyi rtsa ba ste/ /brtan dang g.yo ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ /gnas pa sa bon tshul gyis na/ /gsal dang mi gsal tshul gyis te/ /'dzag pa bdud rtsi'i tshul nyid kyis/ /rnam par
308a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas te nyin mtshan ma/ /ting 'dzin ye shes las byung ba'i/ /sangs rgyas nying ni mdor bsdus nas/ /sangs rgyas sbyor ba yod min na/ /rnal 'byor sangs rgyas mi 'gyur ro/ /de phyir bden dang mi bden yang/ /
308a7(rgyud 'grel): gang gang shin tu gom gyur pa/ /goms pa'i stobs ni rdzogs pa na/ /de gsal mi rtogs blo 'bras bu/ /bsam pa gang dang gang gis ni/ /mi rnams yid ni yang dag sbyor/ /de dang de yi ngo bor 'gyur/ /sna tshogs nor
308b1(rgyud 'grel): khu ji bzhin no/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dbye bas ni/ /yi ge gsum gyi ngo bo las/ /mtho ris mi yul sa 'og gis/ /skad cig gcig gis sku gcig 'gyur/ /skad cig tsam gyis rnal 'byor bdag/
308b2(rgyud 'grel): skad cig phyag rgya'i rnam pa can/ /skad cig dkyil 'khor 'khor lor bcas/ /skad cig gis ni gsang sngags gdon/ /dbang bskur sku gsung thugs rgyas gdab/ /oM A:hUM sarba bI ra yo gi nI/ /kA ya wa ka tsit+ta badzra swa b+ha ba
308b3(rgyud 'grel): At+ma ko haM/ /oM badzra shud+d+ha:sarba d+harmA badzra shud+d+ha haM/ /de nas go cha gnyis shes nas/ /ye shes 'khor lo rnam par bsgom/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor shes pas/ /dam tshig 'khor lo myur gzhug o ha rdo rje sems dpa' dkar/ /go cha
308b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyang snying ga ru/ /rnam par snang mdzad na ma hi/ /mgo la ser po rnam par bsgom/ /swAhA hu pad gar dbang phyug /spyi gtsug tu ni dmar po bsgom/ /bau ShaTa he ni phrag bdag la/ /dpal he ru ka nag po gnyis/ /rdo rje nyi
308b5(rgyud 'grel): ma hUM hUM ho/ /mig gnyis la ni dmar po bsam/ /ljang gu tshigs pa thams cad la/ /phaT haM mtshan ma rta mchog go /dpa' po rnams la 'di kho na'i/ /yan lag drug po yongs su bsgom/ /oM baM rdo rje phag mo ste/ /lte bar
308b6(rgyud 'grel): dmar po bsam par bya/ /snying gar haM yoM ya mi ni/ /h+rI ma kha ru rmongs byed ma/ /h+reM h+riM dpral bar skyong byed ma/ /hUM hUM skrag byed spyi gtsug tu/ /phaT phaT lus tshags thams cad la/ /mtshon cha gtum mo 'di dag mdog /sngon
308b7(rgyud 'grel): mo dmar mo ser mo ljang/ /du mdog dpa' bo rnams la yang/ /lag pa'i mchod pa'i cho gas kyang/ /'khor lo 'di nyid lag par mchod/ /rkang g.yas g.yon gyis mnan nas ni/ /g.yon mig cung dma' gyen du blta/ /
309a1(rgyud 'grel): lag gnyis mtheb rtse 'thur bltas te/ /yang dag mnan nas sdigs mdzub gnyis/ /lu gu rgyud kyis rnam par bcings/ /gung mo gnyis ni sprad byas te/ /lhag ma brkyang nas mgo steng du/ /g.yon dang g.yas su
309a2(rgyud 'grel): bskor bar bya/ /phyag rgya dra ba zhes pa 'dis/ /pheM yig brjod pa dang bcas pas/ /sting gar nyi gnas ting 'dzin sems/ /hUM yig 'od zer gyis bkug pa/ /ye shes 'khor lo pi wang sogs/ /mchod nas bdag la gzhug par
309a3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /oM yo ga shud+d+ha:sarba d+harma yo ga shud+d+ho haM/ /gsang sngags brjod cing pad kor gyis/ /'khyud pa'i stangs kyis mnyes par bya/ /ye shes dus mnyam byon pa yis/ /spyan sogs Da ma ru dang ni/ /bdud rtsi'i thob? pa thogs nas su?/ /
309a4(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis kyang/ /de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /de bzhin bdag gis khrus bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a phi She ka sa ma ya sh+rI ye hUM/ /brjod cing bdud rtsi snod
309a5(rgyud 'grel): thogs kyis/ /dbang bskur bas ni dgyes par bsam/ /bdud rtsi'i lhag ma las byung ba'i/ /rgyal bas de rjes rgyas gdab bya/ /bde mchog spyi gtsug mi bskyod pa/ /phag mo'i rnam par snang mdzad do/ /mkha' 'gro
309a6(rgyud 'grel): ma sogs rin chen 'byung/ /thugs 'khor gnas pa'i mi bskyod pa/ /gsung gi 'khor lo 'od dpag med/ /sku yi 'khor lo rnam snang mdzad/ /dam tshig tu ni don yod grub/ /bdud rtsi ro mas drangs gsol
309a7(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /rab dgyes rkang pa brgyad pas bstod/ /ye shes lnga dang sku gsum nyid/ /gzugs brnyan bzhin du lhag par mos/ /de nas rang gi ston pa mchod/ /de la gsang sngags 'di lnga ste/ oM badzra sh+rI he he ru
309b1(rgyud 'grel): ru kaM huM hUM phaT/ DA ki ni dzA la sam+ba raM swAhA/ snying po'i sngags so/ /oM h+ri:ha ha huM hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'i sngags so/ /oM badzra bai ro tsa TI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ lha mo'i snying po'i sngags so/ /oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badzra war+Na? nI ye huM hUM phaT
309b2(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ lha mo'i nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM ka ra ka ra khaN+Da kA pA la pra tsaN+De huM hUM phaT/ oM ku ru ku ru ma hA kaM ka la tsaN+Da? k+ShI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM band+ha band+ha kaM ka la pra b+hA ba tI ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM trA sa ya trA sa ya bi ka Ta diSh+TI? Na ma hA nA se hUM hUM
309b3(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ oM k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho b+ha ya su ra bai ri Na bI ra ma tI ye huM hUM phaT/ h+rauM h+rauM a mi tA b+ha kharba rI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM h+ra:h+ra:badzra pra b+hA ba laM ke shwa rI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM pheM pheM badzra kA ya dru mats+tsha ye huM hUM phaT/ oM phaT phaT aM ku ri ka e ra wa tI
309b4(rgyud 'grel): ye huM hUM phaT/ oM da ha da ha badzra dza Ti la mahA b+hai ra bI ye huM hUM phaT/ /oM pa tsa pa tsa mahA bI ra bA yu be ge huM hUM phaT/ oM b+hak+Sha b+h+rak+Sha pas ru d+hi rAn+t+ra mA lA ba lam+bi ni badzra hUM ka ra su ra b+hak+ShI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM grih+Na grih+Na sapta pA tA la
309b5(rgyud 'grel): ga ta b+ha dzaM gaM sarba tardzdza tardzdza ya su b+ha de sh+yA ma de bIM ye huM hUM phaT/ oM A kaDDhya A kaDDha badzra b+ha dra su b+ha dre huM hUM phaT/ oM h+riM h+riM mahA b+hai ra ba ha ya kar+Ne huM hUM phaT/ oM dz+nyauM dz+nyauM bi ru pAk+Sha kha ga na ne hUM hUM phaT/ oM k+Sh+maM k+Sh+maM ma hA ba la
309b6(rgyud 'grel): tsakra be ge huM hUM phaT/ ha la ha/ oM hAM hAM ratna badzra khaN+Da ro he huM hUM phaT/ oM hAM hAM ho ya gri ba shoN+DI nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM hUM hUM A kA sha garb+ha tsakra barmmi NI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ki li ki li sh+rI he ru ka su bI ri huM
309b7(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT/ oM shi li shi li pad+ma nart+te shwa ra ma hE? ba le huM hUM phaT/ oM hi li hi li bai ro tsa na tsakra /wart+ti nI ye huM hUM phaT// oM d+hi li d+hi li badzra satwa ma hA bI ri ye huM hUM phaT/ oM kA ka sye huM hUM phaT/ oM u
310a1(rgyud 'grel): lU kA sye huM hUM phaT/ oM shwa nA sye hUM hUM phaT/ oM shu ka rA sye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dA DhI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma du tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma diSh+Ti? NI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma thA nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM
310a2(rgyud 'grel): DA ki nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM lA me huM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro he huM hUM phaT/ oM ru pi nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM bo d+hi tsit+ta badzra ye huM hUM phaT/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa te wI re shE yi huM hUM phaT/ oM mahA kalpA gdi? sen+ni b+hA ya hUM hUM phaT/
310a3(rgyud 'grel): oM dza TA ma ku Totka TA ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM daMSh+TA ka rA lo gra b+ha She Na mu khA ya hUM hUM phaT/ /oM saha sra b+hu dza b+ha su ra ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM pa ra shu pA sho dyA te shu la kha TwAM ga d+ha ra Ne hUM hUM phaT/ oM byAg+ha dza? nAM ba ra d+ha rA ya hUM hUM
310a4(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ oM mahA d+hu mgrA?nd+ha ka ra wa pu ShA ya hUM hUM phaT/ de dag ni mchod pa'i sngags so/ /khaN+Da ka pA so sen mor/ /skra spu mahA kaM ka la/ /pags dang dri ma ra kaM ka la/ /she la mche ba rnam par gtsigs/ /su ra bai ri rgyus
310a5(rgyud 'grel): pa la/ /'od dpag med pa rus? pa la'o/ /mchin pa la ni rdo rje 'od/ /snying la rdo rje'i sku gnas te/ /mig dag la ni aM ku ra/ /rdo rje'i ral ldan mkhris pa la/ /dpa' bo chen po glo bar bzhugs/ /rgyu mar rdo rje hUM
310a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad do/ /rab tu bzang mo gnye ma la/ /rdo rje bzang mo grod par gnas/ /'jigs byed chen po bshang pa la'o/ /smin mtshams la ni mig mi bzang/ /bad kan la ni stobs po che/ /rnag rnams rin chen rdo rje'o/ /
310a7(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo rta mgrin khrag la'o/ /rdul la nam mkha' i snying po gnas/ /tshil la dpal ldan he ru ka/ /mchi ma pad+ma gar dbang phyug /mchil ma la ni rnam snang mdzad/ /snabs la rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /de ltar dpa' bo/
310b1(rgyud 'grel): lus la bzhugs/ /phreng ba'i sngags sogs dpa' bo ni/ /tshangs skung la sogs brtag pa'o/ /dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis/ /lus kyi khams la rnam par brtag /go cha'i dpa' bo drug gis kyang/ /phyag rgya drug gis lus
310b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzes? te/ /phag mo'i phreng ba'i sngags kyis su/ /mgul rgyan phyag rgya'i ngag pa'o/ /mgon po'i snying po'i sngags kyis kyang/ /mgo bo'i phreng ba brgya yi phyed/ /gsang sngags yi ge bdun kyis ni/ /rna cha yis ni rna ba mdzes/ /
310b3(rgyud 'grel): sarba bud+d+ha'i sngags sogs kyis/ /phags pa'i shaM thabs dag pa'o/ /go cha'i lha mo drug gis ni/ /ska rags rgyan gyi dag pa'o/ /'khor lo lnga gnas lha mo yi/ /sngags kyis btung ba'i thod pa'o/ /bai ro tsa na'i sngags kyis kyang
310b4(rgyud 'grel): thod pas ? ya rnam par brgyan/ /kha TwAM ga ni lha yi sku/ /'khor lo sdom pa'i bdag nyid ni/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin phyir/ /shes rab Da ma ru yi sgra/ /dmigs pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa nyin mor
310b5(rgyud 'grel): brjod/ /de yi dngos med rang bzhin phyir/ /rnal 'byor ma ni mtshan mor bshad/ /ji ltar bar do'i sems 'byung ba/ /shes pa tsam de nam mkha' bzhin/ /mdon shes lnga ldan de bzhin tshul/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa mtshan
310b6(rgyud 'grel): dpes spras/ /stong nyid chos kyi sprul pa ni/ /phag mo zhes byar rab tu bstan/ /sh+rI yig gnyis med ye shes te/ /he zhes rgyu sogs stong pa nyid/ /ru yig rnam rtog tshogs dang bral/ /ka zhes gang duAng mi gnas so/
310b7(rgyud 'grel): ngag yul min pa pA yi sgra/ /rA yig rnam pa rnam spangs pa/ /hI yig rgyu yi mi dmigs pa/ /phag mo'i sgrar ni grags pa'o/ /byang chub phyogs kyi rab sbyor gyis/ thams cad shes pa nyid rab bstan/ /sa dang gnas sog?
311a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba yis/ /'gro ba'i bla ma lam shes nyid/ /go cha la sogs rnam dag 'thas/ /rnam pa kun mkhyen nyid kyang ngo/ /go cha gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /de ltar bdag nyid go bgos nas/ /sum b+ha sogs
311a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis gsrung byas te/ /rnal 'byor ldan pas spyod pa bya/ /rtag tu sems can thams cad la/ /sdom pa nyid du ? lta bar bya/ /rkang pa brgyad kyis rab bstod de/ /'jigs pa thams cad rnam spangs nas/ /rnal 'byor blo tshwa? rnam par
311a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyor/ /khams gsum dang ni dbyer med bdag /rigs lnga dag tu kun spyod pa/ /de rnams ro gcig nyid phyir ro/ /rnam par mi rtog bdag nyid sems/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga longs spyod/ /dogs pa thams cad rnam
311a4(rgyud 'grel): spangs te/ /rnal 'byor seng+ge bzhin du spyod/ /ces bya ba ni shin tu rnal 'byor te gsum pa'o/ /A li kA li 'od zer lnga dang ldan pa ni/ /yang dag bkod cing 'khor lo gsum ni spros? nas de/ /rna yi pu ga g.yas pa'i rlung
311a5(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas nas su/ /byung nas 'jig rten thams cad 'khor lo gsum gyur te/ /de nas rna bug g.yon pa'i rlung gi shugs las ni/ /rab tu zhugs nas lte bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ /de yi steng du skad cig hUM yig
311a6(rgyud 'grel): bsam byas nas/ /de dag yongs su gyur nas srid pa'i dbang phyug ni/ /mdog dkar zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams/ /rten med 'ja' tshon ri mo bzhin du blta bar bya /rdo rje phag mo sku mdog dmar mo
311a7(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa/ /sgyu ma'i dga' ba de sgras 'gro ba ma lus pa kub/ /srid dang dur khrod bsrung ba sku gsung thugs dang ni /bde ba chen po yab yum lte bar gnas pa dang/ /bde bas zhu ba las byung dkar dmar hUM a'u
311b1(rgyud 'grel): ha/ /mgo dang zla tshes thig le nA da rab tu thim/ /nA nga cam yang spangs nas su/ /bsam gyis mi khyab rtog pa'ang spangs/ /de las gzungs ni phyag rgya che/ /des ni rim pas thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po ste bzhi
311b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// //de nas myur bar yid kyis dkyil 'khor mos nas ni/ /nA da dkar dmar mdog ldon rang gi lte bar bsgom/ /de nas yi ge gsum pa yang dag rjod byed cing/ /nA da las ni thong nas 'gro ba'i don byas
311b3(rgyud 'grel): te/ /de nas 'khor lo'i lha rnams rlung dang bcas nas su/ /slar yang phyi nas nang du zhugs nas de bzhin yang/ /bla ma dam pa'i gdams pas yang dang yang du ste/ /skyo bar gyur rdo rje'i? bzlas pa rab tu bya/ /snying po nye ba'i snying bo'i sngags
311b4(rgyud 'grel): nA da 'khor lo'i lha tshogs kyi/ /spro dang bsdu ba dag gis ni/ /de bzhin blo ldan dam tshig bzlas/ /chos rnams mnyam nyid nga rgyal gyis/ /phreng sngags rang gi khar zhugs te/ /rdo rje'i lam nas b+ha gar zhugs/ /dbu mar
311b5(rgyud 'grel): zhugs nas kha ru thon/ /lha mo las byung kha ru zhugs/ /bskor sbyor do li'i bzlas pa yi/ /rang lus 'khor lo'i bdag nyid rab tu bsam byas nas/ /yi ge gsum gyis byin brlabs gtor ma phul nas su/ /'bar ba
311b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs kyi bza' ba'i zas ni yang dag bya/ /chos la mnyam nyid nga rgyal ldan pas sngags brjod cing/ /oM sa ma ya shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA:sa ma ya shud+d+ho haM/ oM a mri to da ka hUM hUM tha tha traM aM khaM hUM hUM gis rdo rje dkar po'i rang bzhin
311b7(rgyud 'grel): ljags byas nas/ /yi ge gsum gyis nA da dgyes par mdzad cing gsol/ /nyin phyed skad cig dkyil 'khor mos/ /cho ga sngar bzhin byas nas spyad/ /mtshan phyed na yang de bzhin bya/ /rang smra A li kA lir rtogs//
312a1(rgyud 'grel): spyon spyon dpa' bo chen po kye/ /dag pa'i tshig ni ston pa po/ /stong nyid ye shes kho na 'di/ /chags dang 'jig dang gnas pa'o/ /A li la sogs kA yi bar/ /hUM hUM phaT dang yang dag sbyor/ /oM
312a2(rgyud 'grel): swa sogs pa sngags brjod do/ /'od gsal mngon du phyogs nas su/ /nyal bya thun mtshams thams cad du/ /tha mar yi ge brgya pa brjod/ /khyim nas khyim gzhan 'gro ba bzhin/ /sems nyid dub pa'i ngal so tsam/ /mchi?
312a3(rgyud 'grel): ba de nyid kho nar med/ /'jig rten rnam rtog yin phyir ro/ /'pho ba'i tshe na rnal 'byor ni/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis/ /sna tshogs mchod pa lag thogs te/ /'od gsal gnas su 'khring par byed/ /phan? yon no//
312a4(rgyud 'grel): yaM dang raM las byung bI? rlung dang me bsams te/ /mgo gsum thab la a las byung ba'i pad snod du/ /zan sogs sngags kyis byin brlabs sgron ma lnga dang ni/ /bdud rtsi lngar mos rlung g.yos? mes zhu dmar ba'i mdog
312a5(rgyud 'grel): oM traM aM khaM hUM laM maM baM taM baM/ hUM byung bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin thur bstan kha TwAM gas/ /blugs pas de yang zhu nas kha ba lta bur bsam/ /A li kA li las byung yi ge gsum las 'thon/ /'khor lo gsum gyis sngar bzhin
312a6(rgyud 'grel): skye bo'i don byas nas/ /rgya mtsho la sogs gnas nas bdud rtsi gud? byas te/ /snyoms par zhugs pas zhu nas 'khor lo gsum gyi lha/ /rim bzhin yi ge gsum la rab tu zhugs/ /oM sogs rim thim yi ge gsum
312a7(rgyud 'grel): gyis byin gyis brlab/ /'bar ba'i phyag rgya pheM sngags kyi/ /mdun du 'khor lo spyan drangs nas/ /arg+haM sogs kyis mchod nas su/ /A li kA li yongs gyur te/ /g.yon dang g.yas pa'i lag pa gnyis/ /zla ba nyi ma'i
312b1(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gyur/ /de yi nang du hUM yig ni/ /sngags 'di brjod cing bsgom par bya/ /oM A n+yo n+yA nu ga tA sarba d+harmA:pa ra spha? ra nu pra biSh+Ta sarba d+harmA:atyan+tAnu pa biSh+Ta sarba d+harmA:hUM/ zla ba la sogs yongs gyur pas/ /lag gnyis
312b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje thal? mo la/ /bdud rtsi'i? thod pa bzhag nas sam/ /yang na lag par bsgoms nas ni/ /lha mo rnams ni tshad ma dam tshig tshad ma dang/ /de gsung tshig rnams kyang ni mchog tu tshad ma ste/ /bden pa 'di dag gis ni lha mo
312b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di rnams kyis/ /bdag la rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyud ni 'gyur bar shog /ces brjod mchod par bya ba sogs/ /dbyer med dmigs shing bdud rtsi'i snod/ /shar phyogs la sogs g.yon du ste/ /mtshams su g.yas kyis
312b4(rgyud 'grel): bskor bya ste/ /oM ka ra la sogs sngags brjod cing/ /hUM byung dkar po'i ljags byas pa'i/ /'khor lo gsum gyi lha rnams la/ /rnal 'byor ldan pas gtor ma sbyin/ /oM ka ra ka ra ku ru ku ru/ band+ha band+ha tra sa ya trA sa ya/ k+Sho?
312b5(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ya k+Sho b+ha ya/ h+rauM h+rauM/ h+ra:h+ra(rgyud 'grel): pheM pheM/ phaT phaT/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ ba sa ru d+hi rAn+ta mA lA ba lA mI ne/ grih+Na grih+Na/ sapta pA tA la ga ta b+hu dzaM gaM sarba m+bA tardza ya tardza ya/ A kaDDhya? akaDDhya h+riM h+riM/ dz+nyauM dz+nyauM/ k+ShaM k+ShaM/
312b6(rgyud 'grel): hAM hAM/ hAM hAM/ hUM hUM/ ki li ki li/ si li si li/ hi li hi li/ d+hi li d+hi li/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ badzra a ral+li sogs kyis/ /rnam pa du ma de bzhag la/ oM badzra a ral+li ho(rgyud 'grel): dza hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): badzra DA ki nI sa ma ya stwaM dri sh+yaho(rgyud 'grel): piM? nyang?
312b7(rgyud 'grel): sogs kyi mchod byin nas/ /zhal bsil la sogs byas nas su/ /srid dang zhi ba mnyam par sbyor gyur kun rtog rlabs bcom pa/ /nam mkha' i rang bzhin dngos po mdza' dag de nyid kho nar gzigs/ /shin tu phul byung thugs
313a1(rgyud 'grel): rje'i chu rgyas sems kyi chu bo'i mgon/ /lha mo rnams kyis bdag la shin tu brtse bar mdzod cig /ces bstod mngon par 'dod don gsol/ /phyogs bdag sogs gter de bzhin du/ /oM kha
313a2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs sngags brjod cing/ /gnyis sam gsum gyis bstab par bya/ /oM kha kha khA hi khA hi sarba yak+Sha rAk+ShA sa/ b+hu ha?/ bre ta pi shA tsonma dA pasma ra DA ka DA ki n+yA da ya i maM ba laM grih+nan+tu/ sa ma ya rak+Shan+tu ma ma sarba sid+d+hi
313a3(rgyud 'grel): pra? yats+tshan+tu/ ya thai baM yatheShaM? b+huny+dza tha pi pa tha dzi g+h+ra tha mA ti kra ma tha/ ma ma sarba kA ra ta ya satshu khaM bi shud+d+ha ye swAhA/ ya ka b+ha ban+tu hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ /gtor ma gsol nas de rnams ni/ /bde ba chen po ldan par bsam//
313a4(rgyud 'grel): pi? wang ma sogs rnams kyis mchod/ /go la la sogs dbul ba dang/ /rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags kyis bstod/ /de nas 'dod don gsol ba gdab/ /ts+tsho ma'i lag pas se gol gtog /chad lhag bskang bar bya ba'i
313a5(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /gsang sngags yi ge brgya pa brjod/ /dril bu dkrol ba sngon btang nas/ /pad kor phyag rgyas dgyes par bya/ /oM yo ga la sogs sngags brjod cing/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i dngos po nyid/ /mngon par la byung pa'i
313a6(rgyud 'grel): stangs byas nas/ /srin lag mthe bong se gol gtog /oM badzra mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes byas nas su/ /rang la 'khor lo bzhug par bya/ /gtor ma'i de kho na nyid do/ /snga dro yang dag las las phyogs gtsang ma ru/ /sum b+ha la
313a7(rgyud 'grel): sogs gsang sngags brjod cing rnal 'byor pas/ /bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pas dkyil 'khor byugs nas su/ /pU dza? la sogs gnas sogs brjod cing rim pa yis/ /oM pI tha u pa pI tha/ k+She tra u pa k+She tra/ tshan do ha u
313b1(rgyud 'grel): pa tshan do ha/ me lA pA ka u pa me lA pA ka /shma shA na u pa shma shA na/ de nas skad cig 'byung bzhi ri rab pad+ma la/ /hUM gzhag de yi 'od zer gyis ni rab? bkug pa/ /de la ye shes 'khor lo rjes su bcug nas su/ /de nyid yongs su gyur nas
313b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor rdzogs par blta/ /snying ga'i sa bon las byung pi wang ma sogs kyis mchod dang/ /rin chen bdun po phul nas dag par byas pa yis/ /g.yon pas mngon du yi ge gsum gyis me tog dbul/ /de nas lha dang
313b3(rgyud 'grel): lha mo'i snying po la sogs kyis/ /de yi 'khor la rang rang cho ga rab brjod nas/ /mtshams su g.yas su bskor zhing phyogs rnams g.yon du bskor/ /de nas lag par gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs gsol la/ /oM ha la sogs
313b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis me tog phul nas ni/ /rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags kyi g.yon pa'i me tog ni/ /'khor lor ngor nas mgo la thal mo sbyar nas des/ /rang la g.yon pa'i 'khor lo rab tu gzhug par bya/ /rkang pa brgyad pas
313b5(rgyud 'grel): bstan nas sdig pa bshags sogs dang/ /smon lam gdab dang bzlas brjod yi ge brgya pa dang/ /oM yo ga la sogs sngags dang pad kor phyag rgya yis/ /dgyes par byas te mngon par 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya dang/
313b6(rgyud 'grel): sa reg tsho Di ka dang badzra mu:zhes pa/ brjod cing bdag la 'khor lo thams cad rab bcug nas/ /de nas phyi rol dkyil 'khor ri mo bsub par bya/ /phyi rol gyi mchod pa'i cho ga'o// //mthe bo mdzub mo
313b7(rgyud 'grel): gung mo srin lag mthe chud de rnams khar/ /g.yon par rdo rje can rnam snang/ /rdo rje sems dang rnam snang mdzad/ /'od dpag med dang mi bskyod pa/ /rin 'byung don grub go rim bzhin/ /dkar ser dmar dang mthing
314a1(rgyud 'grel): ga dang/ /dmar ser ljang gu'i kha dog ldan/ /oM ha la sogs byung ba ste/ /zhal gsum phyag drug rdo rje can/ /gzhan rnams zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ /g.yas pa rdo rje rje? chung mgo /dril bu
314a2(rgyud 'grel): thod pa kha TwaM ga /g.yon du'i? rdo rje can gyi zhal/ /dkar dang dmar dang mthing ga'o/ /dbus dang g.yas g.yon rim bzhin no/ /gzhan pa rnams kyis mtshon char brjod/ /'khor lo pad+ma rdo rje rin/ /ral gri gzhan
314a3(rgyud 'grel): kun Da ma ru'o/ /dril bu thob bcas khA TwAM ga /g.yas dang g.yon du go rim bzhin/ /lag thil pad+ma 'dab ma lnga/ /dmar po 'dab ma g.yon skor sbyar/ /lte bar phag mo sku mdog dmar/ /zhal gsum phyag drug
314a4(rgyud 'grel): 'od 'bar ma/ /dmar po mthing ga ljang gu'i zhal/ /thod pa kha TwAM zhags pa g.yon/ /lcags kyu tshangs mgo gri gug g.yas/ /ya mi ni dang rmongs byed ma/ /skyod byed ma dang skrag byed ma/ /gtum mo mthing ga dkar ser ma//
314a5(rgyud 'grel): ljang gu du ba'i mdog can rnams/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung/ /nam mkha' i khams kyi rang bzhin no/ /thams cad spyan gsum skra grol ma/ /gcer bu phyag bzhi lha mo rnams/ /g.yon na thod pa kha TwAM ga /phyag gzhan na ni dril
314a6(rgyud 'grel): bu bsnams/ /g.yas su rde chung gri gug go /zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum gnas pa rnams/ /dkar po gang de zla bar gnas/ /de gzhan rnams ni nyi ma la'o/ /yang na 'di rnams sa bon nyid/ /dang por brjod pa'i rnam par
314a7(rgyud 'grel): bsgom/ /de yi mdog dang rang bzhin can/ /sngags dang lha gnyis khyad med phyir/ /'di yi gzugs brnyan 'khor lo 'am/ /lag pa'i rgyab du bsam par bya/ /de nas lag pa'i sa bon rnams/ /zhu ba'i rdzas kyis
314b1(rgyud 'grel): gdab byas nas/ /'khor lo gsum gyi rang bzhin bsam/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas byin gyis brlabs/ /'di la rdzas ni rkang? brgyad kyis/ /dbul ba'am yi ge gsum gyis so/ /cho ga lha chad dag bya'i phyir/ /gsang sngags yi ge brgya pa
314b2(rgyud 'grel): brjod/ /'khor lo'i mgon po la gsol nas/ /rdzas de snod kyi nang du gzhug /lag pa la yang rdzas rnams ni/ /g.yon pa'i srin lag gis reg nas/ /snying ga lte dang dpral ba ru/ /hUM A(rgyud 'grel): oM gyi sngags brjod cing//
314b3(rgyud 'grel): byugs nas lha yi tshogs rnams ni/ /bdag la rab tu bstim par bya/ /lag pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga'o/ /hUM yig dkar po las byung rdo rje'i rang bzhin ljags/ /g.yas pa dbang? gzar? blu gzar gyis ni blugs pa gang/ /lte ba'i pad+ma rab tu 'bar?
314b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'khor lo ru/ /de ni gza' ba' i dus kyi nang gi sbyin sreg /oM A:au ts+tshi?Sh+Ta badzra a d+hiSh+Ta badzra a d+hiSh+Tha i maM ba liM hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes bya ba 'dis zos pa'i lhag ma'i gtor ma bya'o/ /bdag nyid chen po'i khams kyi zad?
314b5(rgyud 'grel): me tog 'di/ /thun mong rnams kyis gzhal bar mi nus te/ /de phyir 'di la kho bos kyang ni rab tu 'jug par nus par 'gyur ba ma yin mod/ /'on kyang rnal 'byor dbang phyug lu yi'i gsung tshig lhug gzung dka' bas
314b6(rgyud 'grel): goms phyir bzod ma gyur/ /de yi lam gyi rjes su 'gro bar 'dod pas 'di la gnas pa'i tshigs bcad bdag gis byas/ /mtshungs pa med pa yon tan phung po dang po'i mgon po? ston pa yi/ /sgrub pa'i thabs kyi don ni rtsod pa'i snyigs ma
314b7(rgyud 'grel): sel byed bshad pa las/ /mdza' yas dri med gsod nams gang nges 'jig rten sangs rgyas nyid gyur dang/ /bdag kyang 'gro ba'i don sgrub byed cing 'gro ba gnas par gnas gyur cig /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug rnams kyi gtsug
315a1(rgyud 'grel): gi nor bu lta bu dpal ldan lU yis pas mdzad pa/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i mngon par rtogs pa'i 'grel pa sdom pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba bla ma paN+Ti ta chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs
315a2(rgyud 'grel): so// /rgya ? bshar phyogs dza ga tla'i paN+Di ta chen po pi b+hu ti tsan+d+ras/ bod yul gyi dbus drang srong srin po ring sgra rang bsgyur du mdzad pa'o// //
315a3(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bde mchog gi mngon par rtogs pa'i 'grel pa'i TI ka khyad par gsal byed/ /rgya gar skad du/ lu yi pa a b+hi sa ma ya brit+ta TI kA bi sha Na dyo? ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ lu yi pa'i mngon pa'i rtogs pa'i 'grel pa'i TI kA /khyad par gsal byed ces bya
315a4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dga' ba bzhi yi rnam dag pas/ /gang zhig zhal bzhi rnam par gsal/ /nyi ma zla ba me dag pa/ /gang gis 'di la spyan gsum ldan/ /bcu gnyis sa yi dag pa ni/ /de yi grangs
315a5(rgyud 'grel): can phyag gi phreng/ /nam mkha' du ba lta bu'i sku/ /byams pa'i bdag ba nyid kyis gsal/ /bden pa gnyis kyi dag pas ni/ /brkyang bskum gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das/ /he ru ka dpal de nyid la/ /bdag nyid rab tu gus btud nas
315a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo sdom pa'i 'byung ba yis/ /tshigs bcad byas pa'i mngon rtogs kyi/ /khyad par gsal byed ces bya ba'i/ /TI ka bdag gis bshad par bya/ /de la thams cad kyi dang por phyag rgya chen po la 'dun pas/ /gtor ma'i
315a7(rgyud 'grel): las byas nas ci bya zhe na/ dang por ri spyil la (sogs zhas? bya ba la)? sogs pa rjod de/ sogs pa'i sgras rtags gcig bsam/ du 'khrod ngam/ khang stong la sogs pa yongs su bzung/ /sh+rI la sogs ba ni/ sh+rI yig gnyis med ye shes te/ /ha? zhes rgyu
315b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs stong pa nyid/ /ru yig rtog tshogs bral bya ste/ /ka zhes gang duAng mi gnas so/ zhes bya ba yi ge bzhi'i don la mngon du phyogs shing sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i sems kyis/ /sh+rI he ru ko haM zhes lan gsuM

315b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi/ A li kA li'i phreng ba las 'od zer kha dog lnga pa 'phros shing g.yon skor gyis lte ba'i phyogs su lan gsum yongs su bskor par gnas pa las/ 'khor lo gsum gyi lha tshogs spros pas bgegs kyi tshogs brlag par
315b4(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ de nas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi zhes pa ni/ byams pa snying rje dga' ba btang snyoms rnams te/ de la sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i brtse ba nyid ni byams par gsungs/ /sdug bsngal gsum ldan 'jig rten la//
315b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba bsgral 'dod snying rje'o/ /rang gi bsod nams gzhan phan la/ /dangs pa'i sems nyid dga' ba ste/ /chags dang sdang pa ngang bral bas/ /thams cad don byed btang snyoms so/ /'di yi dgos pa 'chad de/ rnam par rtog
315b6(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad kyi dri ma nyams pa'i phyir/ he ru ka'i don snyoms pas stong pa nyid du mos pa'o/ /sdom par mos pa ni/ lus thams cad kyi bya pa'i rnam par dag pa dang/ 'khor pa thog ma med pa nas/ grub pa'i bar bzhin du yongs
315b7(rgyud 'grel): su dag pa'i he ru ka'i tshul nyid kyang shugs kyis bstan no/ /A li kA li sgol pa ni gsung gi dag pa'o/ /byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'phel ba'o/ /nga ni rnam par dag pa'i phung po la sogs pa las 
316a1(rgyud 'grel): kun nas bslang ba'i mchod pa la sogs pa ni/ byang chub myur du thob pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i phyir gsungs te/ gzugs la rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /de la gzugs kyi phung po ni dbang
316a2(rgyud 'grel): po lnga rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ste/ gzugs su rung ba yin pa'i phyir gzugs bcu gcig go /'dir gzugs kyi phung po skye ba'i sa bon gyi rten yin pas/ gzugs kyi gnas gtso bo mgo'i dbus der bum dkar po'o//
316a3(rgyud 'grel): tshor ba'i phung po ni bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin zhes bya ba'i tshor ba gsum yang sems las byung ba'i rang bzhin te/ dbang po drug po la brten pas 'di rnams
316a4(rgyud 'grel): bco brgyad du 'gyur te/ 'di yang drod la brten pa 'di'i gnas kyi gtso bo lte ba ste/ de la aM ser po'o/ /'du shes kyi phung po ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa/ khams bco brgyad kyi khyad par 'dzin pa'i sgo

316a6(rgyud 'grel): pa yin pas der h+rI(rgyud 'grel): dmar po'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i phung po zhes bya ba ni/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa lnga dang/ kun gzhi dang/ yid dang nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dang/ rnam par shes pa brgyad do/ /'di
316a7(rgyud 'grel): la rnam par shes pa thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa/ kun gzhi rnam par shes pa dang/ yid kyi dbang po'i rten srog rlung yin pas de'i gnas ni snying ga ste/ de la hUM dkar po'o/ bzhi po rnams las gzhan 'du byed kyi phung po zhes?
316b1(rgyud 'grel): bya ? sems las byung ba rnams te/ de yang ma rig pa the tshom log par blta ba/ 'jig tshogs su lta ba mthar 'dzin pa'i lta ba dang/ lta ba la mchog tu 'dzin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'i lta ba dang
316b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags nga rgyal phrag dog ser sna khong khro la sogs pa mang po'o/ /de'i khongs su chud pa'i sems byung rnams kyi yang rten rlung ste/ de'i gnas rkang pa gnyis kyi klong por gyi 'og yin te/ de dag la gzugs brnyan ltar
316b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su gyur pI he:ljang gu'o/ /phung po lnga po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid la spyi gtsug h+rI:mthing ga'o/ /de bzhin du mig la sogs par byang chub sems dpa' kun sa bon traM dkar po dang hUM mthing ga /traM ser po/ /a dmar po/ /

317a1(rgyud 'grel): snying phyag na rdo rje dang/ /mkha' snying 'jig rten dbang phyug dang/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel ba/ /kun tu bzang po rgyal sras rnams/ /dkar po mthing ga ser ba dmar/ /sngon po dkar rnams
317a2(rgyud 'grel): go rim bzhin/ /dang po g.yas pas 'khor lo 'phyar/ /g.yon pas thugs kar dril bu bsnams/ /phyag rdor thugs kar rdo rje g.yas/ /g.yon gyis dril bu bkur brten pa/ /gzhan gsum g.yas pas rin chen dang/ /

317b3(rgyud 'grel): gti mug rdo rje'o/ /gzhan rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /lhag ma go sla'o/ /gzugs brnyan la sogs pa ni yang na phung po lnga go rim bzhin du gzugs brnyan dang/ chu bur smig rgyu chu shing dang/ sgyu ma bzhin du nges par

317b6(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM hUM zhes pa'i sngags kyi rdo rje rtse lnga'i rang bzhin cu shig? pa rnams bsam par bya'o/ /oM badzra sha ra dzA la traM shaM traM zhes pa 'dis mnga' i dra ba yang ngo/ /oM badzra pash+dzar? hUM yaM hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis rdo rje'i gur bsgom par bya'o/ /
317b7(rgyud 'grel): 'og ces pa ni rdo rje'i gur gyi 'og tu/ /oM badzra bi dA na hUM khaM hUM zhes pa'i sngags kyis rdo rje'i bla re bsgom par bya'o/ /oM badzra dzwa lA na lArka hUM hUM hUM zhes pa 'dis rdo rje'i dra ba 'bar ba yang ngo/ /khwa gdong ma la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/
318a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i sgras/ 'ug gdong/ /khyi gdong phag gdong ma yongs su gzung ngo/ /gsang sngags bzhi zhes pa ni sum b+ha la sogs pa zhal bzhi pa'i sngags so/ /gnyis gnyis rang rang phyogs 'od las byung ba zhes pa
318a2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ gsang sngags gnyis gnyis kyi 'od zer las kyi 'od zer las skyes pa rnams so/ /gshin rje brtan ma la sogs zhes pa'i sgras ni/ gshin rje pho nya ma/ gshin rje mche ba ma/ gshin rje 'jems ma gzung ngo/ /kha gdong
318a3(rgyud 'grel): bla la sogs pa brgyad kyis phyogs mtshams bsrung ba kho na gzung na gang gis steng dang 'og bsrung zhe na/ brjod pa steng dang 'og gi bsrung ba yang/ rgyud 'di la de rnams kho nas byed de/ sa 'og tshangs pa'i gnas par zhes
318a4(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /khron par zhes pa ni rtsig pa'i nye bar byung ba la'o/ /de bzhin nyid du ro gcig gnas zhes pa ni/ bgegs rnams bsam par bya'o/ /thim zhes pa ni khwa gdong ma la sogs pa rnams so/ /chu la chu zhes pa la soD
318a5(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ khwa gdong ma la sogs pa rab tu zhugs pa'i dus kho nar/ chul chu brdabs pas thigs pa bzhin du byung ba'o/ /de'i dus su rdo rje'i rtsig pa la sogs pa yang bu ga med par gcig tu gyur pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad kyis
318a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba rnams bgegs dang bral bar lhag par mos par bya'o/ /bsrung ba'i gur la sogs pa'i mjug thogs su ci'i don du 'di la stong pa nyid du sgom zhes pa'i klan ka med de/ gang gi phyir rgyud 'di shes rab ches pa dang ldan pa'i
318a7(rgyud 'grel): dbang gis yin te/ shes rab chen po dang ldan pa'i yang stong nyid kho na bsrung ba'i mchog go /'o na bris pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du/ rdo rje'i phreng bas? ci'i phyir zhes pa yang ma brjod cig /gang gi tshe kho na bcom ldan 'das
318b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i tshe kho nar/ dam tshig 'khor los yongs su bcad pa'i/ sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba bskyed pa'i phyir ro/ /zhal bzhi pa'i sngags kyi btu ba'i cho ga la/ re khA brgyad brgyad kyis byas pa/ re mig bzhi bcu zhe dgu
318b2(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur pa la/ a yig thog mar ha yig tha mar gnas pa/ yi ge bzhi bcu zhe dgu bri bar bya'o/ /de la bcu gsum zla tshes thig ler bcas/ zhes brgyad pa la lnga pa'i zhabs/ /zhe gcig pa la bzhi bcu'i gdan/ /so drug pa la
318b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum par ldan/ zhe brgyad pa la lnga pa'i zhabs/ /zhe gcig pa la bzhi bcu'i gdan/ /zhe dgu pa la lnga pa can/ /zla tshes thig le dang bcas pa/ /de bzhin yi ge gzhan yang ngo/ /so brgyad pa dang nyer bdun pa/ zhes bya ba ni thog
318b4(rgyud 'grel): ma'i sngags/ /bcu gsum zla tshes thig ler can/ /bcu dgu pa la zhe gsum ldan/ /dbyangs yig gsum pa dang ldan na/ /zhe dgu pa la so drug gdan/ /bcu dgu la sogs yang de bzhin/ zhe dgu dbyangs yig lnga par bcas/
318b5(rgyud 'grel): zla tshes thig ler ldan pa'o/ /zhe dgu la sogs yang de bzhin/ so brgyad pa dang nyer bdun pa/ /bzung bas gnyis pa'i sngags yin no/ /bcu gsum zla tshes thig le can/ /bcu dgu zhe gsum pa yi gdan/ /dbyangs yig gsum
318b6(rgyud 'grel): la dang ldan pa/ zhe dgu pa las drug ldan/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa can/ /so bdun pa dang zhe gnyis pa/ /bcu dgu la sogs yang de bzhin /zhe dgu pa la lnga pa dang/ /zla tshes thig ler bcas pa'o/ /zhe dgu pa sogs par
318b7(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin/ /so brgyad pa dang nyer bdun pa/ /zhes bya ba ni gsum pa'i sngags /bcu gsum zla tshes thig ler ldan/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa blang/ /so drug zhe gnyis zhe dgu pa/ /dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa yis brgyan/ /bzhi
319a1(rgyud 'grel): bcu bcu dgu so dgu pa/ /gnyis pa zla tshes thig lngar ldan/ /so dgu nyer bzhi zhe gsum gdan/ /zhe dgu pa la lnga ba dang/ /zla tshes thig ler ldan pa ste/ /zhe dgu la sogs yang de bzhin/ /so
319a2(rgyud 'grel): brgyad pa dang nyer bdun pa/ /zhes bya ba ni zhi ba'i sngags so// //de rnams zhes pa ni bsrung pa'i gur bsgom pa'i mjug thogs su/ snying gar zhes pa ni/ bsrung ba'i gur gyi dbus su gnas pa'i thugs kar ro/ /de bstod zhes pa
319a3(rgyud 'grel): ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su/ hUM yig rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin 'od zer lnga 'phro ba dang ldan pa ste/ ngo bo nyid kyi kha dog kyang/ hUM yig gi dngul cu dang 'dra ba ste/ dbus sngo ba nyid dang/ phyi rol dkar ba nyid kyi phyir ro//
319a4(rgyud 'grel): de'i 'od zer rnams kyis bkug pa/ mdun gyi nam mkha' i phyogs su gnas pa/ 'khor lo sdom pa la/ phyag 'tshal sogs bla na med pa'i yan lag bdun pa'i mtshang pa dang bdag nyid dbul bar bya ste/ de la rdo rje
319a5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro khyod la 'dud/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo sgyur/ /ye shes lnga dang sku gsum ldan/ /'gro ba skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba phyag 'tshal lo// //snying gi sa bon 'od byung nas/ pi
319a6(rgyud 'grel): wang 'dzin sogs mdzes rnams kyis/ /phyi nang de nyid gsang ba yi/ /mchod pas mchod pa nyid du brjod/ /de la pi wang ma/ gling bu ma/ rnga zlum ma/ rdza rnga ma rnams/ /sngo ser/ dmar/ ljang gu rnams te rang
319a7(rgyud 'grel): rang gi rol mo kho nas dkrol bu? phyag? gtso bo gnyis dang ldan pa rnams dang/ phyag gzhan gnyis kyis rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa rnams so/ /gzhad ma/ sgeg mo/ glu ma gar ma rnams/ dmar ser/ sngon mo ljang gu rnam so/ /
319b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhad ma'i gtso bo'i phyag gnyis kyis bzhad pa'i stangs dang ldan pa/ sgeg mo gtso bo'i phyag gis rdo rje dang dral bu 'dzin pa'i phyag gtso bo gnyis kyis sgeg pa'i stangs dang ldan pa'o/ /glu ma gtso bo'i phyag gnyis kyi pheg rdob 'dzin pa/
319b2(rgyud 'grel): gar ma gtso bo'i phyag gnyis kyis pad kor spangs can no/ /'di rnams phyag g.yas dang g.yon dag na thod pa dang kha TwAM ga dang ldan pa'o/ /me tog ma/ bdug spos ma/ mar me ma/ drin bu rnams dkar mo du ba mar me'i rtse mo lta bu
319b3(rgyud 'grel): dang dmar mo rnams so/ /'di rnams kyi gtso bo'i g.yas par me tog /dog? phor mar me'i sdong po dang dri'i dung chos rnams so/ /phyag gzhan gsum rnams na Da ma ru dang thod pa kha TwAM ga rnams/ /gzugs ma ro ma reg ma chos
319b4(rgyud 'grel): ma rnams/ dkar mo dmar mo ljang gu dkar mo rnams te/ gtso bo'i phyag g.yas pa'i phyag gcig gis me long sbrang chang gi snod dang gos sna tshogs pa dang/ chos 'byung 'dzin pa rnams te/ phyag gzhan rnams ni Da
319b5(rgyud 'grel): ma ru dang thod pa kha DwI ga rnams so/ thams cad zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa la sogs pa'i dbyangs yig bcu drug gi sa bon las byung ba rnams so/ /de'i rjes su rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags kyis bston pa bya'o/ zhes pa ni mtshad? pa'o/ /
319b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis/ /bdag gi lus dag yid sgo nas/ /sdig bgyis bgyid brtsal yi rang gang/ /de dag rgyal ba'i mdun du bshags/ /sdig pa bshags pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
319b7(rgyud 'grel): ni bsod nams gang/ /gzhan yang rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag bsten rnams dang/ /rang sangs rgyas bla ma dam pa rnams kyi yang/ /de dag thams cad bsod nams shin tu rjes yi rang/ /zhes bya ba bsod nams la rjes su
320a1(rgyud 'grel): yi rang ba'o/ /dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas ma lus ni thams cad ni/ /mdza' yas phyogs khyab thugs rje'i yon tan tshogs rab ldan/ /chos bcas skyon bral 'phags pa'i tshegs rnams
320a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la'ang/ /shes nas bdag nyid gus pas rab tu skyabs su mchi/ zhes pa na skyabs su 'gro pa'o/ /rgyal ba'i yongs su dag pa'i yang dag lam brten nas/ /tshangs dbang drag po sogs kyis rin thang med mi brnyed/ /'di ltar
320a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi nye bar bsags pa'i bsod nams tshogs las ni/ /byang chub mchog sems de ni rab tu bskyed par bgyi/ /rtsal pa'i lam bsten pa dang byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa'o/ /bdag gis 'gro rnams bsgral bya'i phyir/ /
320a4(rgyud 'grel): bgrod dkar? srid pa'i rgya mtsho las/ /rang gi bdag nyid skad cig ma/ /sangs rgyas rnams la dbul bar bgyi/ /zhes bya ba bdag nyid dbul pa'o/ /'di ltar bsod nams kyi tshogs brjod nas he ru ka la sogs pas ni ye shes
320a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi tshogs brjod de/ /mchod pa la sogs pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sogs pa'i sems tsam nyid du mos par bya ste/ rang gi mgo dang mgrin pa snying gar/ he ru ka zhes pa'i yi ge gsum bsgoms te/ /chos rnams
320a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyu dang bral ba de ltar rtog pa dang bral ba/ gang du yang mi gnas pa zhes bya bar nges par sbyar nas/ chos rnams kyi tshul gyi tshul 'di ltar shes pas sems can rnams ni bdag dang bdag gi ba la sogs pa gzung nas 'khor bar
320a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khyams ta/ de la bdag gis he ru kar bsgyur nas par 'gyur/ chos rnams tshul 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyis shes par bya'o/ /zhes chos la dmigs pa'i snying rje bskyed par byas nas/ oM swa b+ha ba zhes bya ba la
320b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs bya'i sngags brjod cing/ khams gsum stong par bsam par bya'o/ /de la mchod bya mchod byed mchod pa la sogs pa rnams kyis sems tsam nyid du mngon par bsgom pa la oM yig go /swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha:sarba d+harma:zhes bya ba ni gzung
320b2(rgyud 'grel): pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho haM zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /yang smon lam gyi dbang gis sems de gong nas gong du gnas pa'i dkar po dmar po mthing ba? /oM A:hUM gi yi ge'i tshul du gnas par bya'o//
320b3(rgyud 'grel): de nas oM yig las sku'i 'khor lo rnams spros te/ 'gro ba'i don byas nas snyoms par 'jug pa sngon du 'gro bas zhu bar byas de nyid kho na la rab tu gzhug par bya'o/ /de bzhin du A:yig las gsung gi 'khor lo'i lha rnamS
320b4(rgyud 'grel): ***bzhag nas/ chos nyid ma rtogs na/ sems can rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa/ sngar bzhin du snying rje chen po dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje'i sa bon du gyur par rnam par bsgoms nas/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra zhes bya ba la sogs
320b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sngags brjod de/ nA da can gyi rnam par rtog pa yang spong ngo zhes bya'o/ /chung du yang stong pa nyid kyi bsgom pa med par/ rdo rje'i gur gyis dbus kho na la/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin chos 'byung e yig gi rnam pa/
320b6(rgyud 'grel): steng yangs pa/ 'og phra ba'i rnam par bsgoms nas dbus su/ gzhal yas khang sgom par byed pa ni kha cig gi'o/ /de'i rjes su stong pa nyid las ldang pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ bai raM pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i rim 
321a1(rgyud 'grel): pas sna tshogs rdo rje mngon par rdzogs par byas nas de'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma bsgom ste/ de'i mtshan nyid brjod pa/ shar sogs phyogs su gnas pa'i 'dab ma skya reng ltar/ /rlung dang me yi phyogs su
321a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dab ma ser po'i mdog /yi dags bdag po dbang ldan phyogs su yang 'dur ba/ /sngon po sprin mdog nges par sna tshogs pad+ma'o/ /'di'i don ni 'di lta ste/ shar la sogs pa'i phyogs la gnas pa dmar po ste/ rlung
321a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshamS dang me mtshams su ser po/ bden bral mtshams su sngon po/ /dbang ldan mtshams su mthing ga'o/ /de'i lta bar A li kA li las byung ba'i zhes pa ni g.yon dang g.yas bskor du gnas pa'i A li kA li phreng ba yongs su
